1.title: Which kid?

Jennifer finishes her cookies and waits for dinner like a good girl.
Anne schedules a doctor appointment for Jennifer.
Anne starts looking for ways to control Jennifer's size.
Other (Your choice)
11.content:
"Aww, it's over already?"
Jennifer huffed softly at the TV, her favourite cartoon had just finished. She poured the last remaining potato chips in the bag into her awaiting mouth and gobbled them up.

Now you see, Jennifer is rather big for her age. In fact she's VERY big for her age. Her big round belly rose up and down with each breath she took as she lay sprawled out on the sofa. Her pink shirt failed to cover it since any shirts made for a girl her age were much too small. She tugged down on it in another futile attempt to make it fit, but as always, to no avail. The shorts she was wearing were very snug on her plump thighs, sticking into them but not painfully so.
What baffled Jennifer was that these clothes fit perfectly about a week ago. She was rather oblivious that she was growing out quicker than she was up. Her doting parents are partly to blame for it, giving her lots of sweets and junk food as a toddler to make her happy. She soon developed a love for it, which became almost like an addiction. Now the likes of chocolate, ice cream, pizza and fries are the only things she would eat with glee. What didn't help the matter was Jennifer's appetite, which seemed to be nearly bottomless!
Her parents quickly noticed her growth and would swiftly add vegetables to her menu, which Jennifer would either leave on her plate or eat slowly and reluctantly. She didn't want those boring old greens, give her a nice big chocolate cake!

Jennifer rolled off the sofa and landed on her feet, like a very overfed kitten. She walked (well, more specifically, waddled) to the kitchen, putting the empty packet in the bin and opened up the pantry, instinctively taking out a box of chocolate-chip cookies for her next course.
"Jennifer!" A familiar voice made her jump. She turned around to see her mother, Anne, looking down at her, hands on her hips.
"Y-yeah?" She squeaked.
"Were you going to take that whole box?" She asked more softly.
"...no?" She lied.
Anne shook her head. "No point in lying, we both know you were going to."
"But I'm hungry!" Jennifer cried in a vain attempt to defend herself.
"Jenny, you're always hungry," her mother sighed, "...fine, but that's your last snack until dinner."
A huge smile appeared on Jennifer's puffy face as she waddled triumphantly to the sofa with the box. Success!
Plopping her big butt back on the sofa, she opened the box and began greedily cramming cookies into her mouth, like she hadn't been fed in weeks.

Anne sighed softly, running a hand through her hair in thought as she watched her ballooning daughter. What was she going to do about that girl's eating?
11.title: Jennifer (8 years old)

choices: Fried chicken and bacon with soda
Steamed veggies and fresh fruit with apple juice
Pizza and bread with soda
112.content:
Jennifer happily devoured the big box of cookies that her mother had allowed her to have. Being who she was though, Jenny very quickly finished the entire box within just a few minutes. “Mmn...huh?” she said as her thick fingers reached the bottom of the box. “Aww...no more...” She held the box above her head and shook it to get the last few crumbs. Jenny looked down at her big belly. It looked like she had eaten a basketball, but is was all fat; it jiggled and wobbled if she poked it. She was about to get up for more when she remembered the talk she had with her Mom. She said that Jenny couldn't have any more snacks til after dinner...

But Jennifer's belly was growling for more, and it wanted food *now.* “Ugh...” she moaned, putting her hands on her fat tummy.”I'm so hungry...oof...maybe she won't find me...what if she does, and then makes dinner smaller?” Jenny sighed, rubbing her poor, empty tummy. She could already smell her Mom's cooking, but she wasn't sure what it was. But her stomach was growling for *anything* that could fill it up.

“Jennifer, dinner is ready!” called Anne. Jennifer didn't need to be asked twice; within seconds she was running to the kitchen as fast as she could, her gut bouncing and wobbling. “Good girl, you managed to wait the whole time without snacking!” Anna said. “It was tough though, but I did...” said Jenny nervously. “Ahh, well sorry about that, I just don't want you getting *too* big...” Anne's stomach let out a little “Rrrrgh...” making her blush a little. “Well, let's eat!”

But what are they eating?
112.title: Jennifer finishes her cookies and waits for din...

choices: "It's just routine"
"About your weight"
"About your diet"
1121.content:
Anna slid a plate onto the table before Jennifer, and the hungry young girl tucked in immediately into the roast chicken and bacon she'd spent so long preparing. As she poured out two glasses of soda, she wondered why she bothered spending long preparing meals; it often seemed like her daughter ate it too fast to notice the taste anyway. Maybe she should just order take-outs in future; it would make things easier, for sure.
Across the table from her, Jennifer was eating at an impressive rate. The plate of food she had placed on the table would have been a large, filling meal for most 8 year olds; to Jenny, however, it didn't even come close to filling her gut, stretched as it was from years of constant snacks and oversized meals. Anna, despite her good intentions, didn't know much about nutrition, and wasn't very good at saying no. Whenever Jennifer had cried as a toddler, her first resort was always to try and feed her, and later on the expanding girl had discovered that, if she whined enough, she could get her mom to give her nearly anything. Anna had also enforced a rigid 'clean plates' policy for years, and several times had fed her daughter way past her capacity in order to never "waste" food.
As a result, Jennifer was soon pushing away her plate away from her, everything eaten except the untouched pile of broccoli in the corner.
"More please!" She said, mouth still full. Anna glanced at the vegetables left on the plate.
"Eat them first, then you can have seconds."
"But mom, I don't like them." The chubby 8 year old complained.
"Jennifer, you're too old now for this nonsense. Just eat the broccoli, then you can have some more." Anna tried to sound firm.
"But I hate broccoli! Can't I have seconds anyway mommy, pleeeease?"
Anna rubbed her temples; she was too tired for this.
"Fine." She relented, and took Jennifer's plate. Over at the counter, she piled another large portion onto the cheap piece of crockery, then brought it back and put it on the table. The moment it was within reach, Jennifer began stuffing food into her mouth so fast it was as if she thought it would vanish if it wasn't finished that very minute. As she watched her daughter gorge, Anna suddenly remembered something.
"Oh, Jenny, you've got an appointment with the doctor tomorrow after school, okay?"
Jennifer looked quizzically at her mom, but couldn't speak due to her mouth being full of food.
"It's only a checkup; the nice doctor will just look you over and make sure you aren't sick at all, and then we can come home."
With an effort, Jennifer swallowed her mouthful of food and looked up.
"Why do I need a checkup?" She asked, frowning.
1121.title: Second Helpings and Ominous Appointments.

choices: Later that night...
The next day...
11211.content:
"It's just a routine checkup, sweetie," Anna assured her daughter, "no need to worry, we'll be in and out in no time."
"Well, okay," Jennifer nodded, stuffing another big bunch of unhealthy food into her mouth and chewing, though with a bit less enthusiasm than usual, Anna noticed.

Then a grin grew across the kindly mother's face. "And if you're a good girl, we can stop for a snack anywhere you like."
Her chubby daughter's eyes widened, and the enthusiasm returned. She tried to say something, but it came out muffled and unintelligible.
"Jenny," Anna gave her an expectant look, "what've I told you about talking with your mouth full?"

Jennifer swallowed, again with some effort. "You mean it?!"
"Of course, sweetheart," Anna chuckled, amused by her child's excitement, then added with a smirk, "if you eat one piece of broccoli, you can even get ice cream."
Jennifer's grin quickly inverted, noticing that the pile of broccoli was still there. "But moooom-"
"Just one little piece, Jenny," her mother insisted, adding a little sternness to her voice, "and you won't have to eat it again."

Breathing a long sigh of annoyance, the greedy girl dug through the pile with her plump little fingers, and picked up the tiniest piece of broccoli she could find. It looked just small enough to swallow without chewing, she thought.
With a deep breath, she popped the vegetable in, struggling to swallow it whole but just managing.
"Blech!" She grunted, taking a sip of her drink to try and wash out the awful taste.

"Good girl, Jenny!" Anna smiled proudly, stroking her daughter's hair, "see, I told you it wasn't so bad!"
The chubby girl just pouted cutely, puffing out her already quite round cheeks.
"Now now, you're too old for tantrums," Anna chuckled, "why don't you go change into your pyjamas now?"

With a small nod, followed by a tiny burp, Jennifer, slid off the kitchen chair and slowly waddled out of the kitchen. Anna listened as her ponderous footfalls thudded heavily further and further up the stairs.
11211.title: "It's just routine"

choices: "What's that supposed to mean?"
"Sorry Ms Carroll, it was just a joke."
112112.content:
Jennifer stared belatedly at the neatly folded pile that was her gym kit. Of all her lessons, gym was the one she detested most by far, and it was in this uniform she'd spent dozens of miserable hours huffing and puffing around the hall with the rest of her classmates, trying fruitlessly to keep up. Although there were other chubby kids in her class, she was least fit by far so even they left her behind after a while.
Still, there was no way out of it; she'd tried skipping gym before, by pretending to be unwell or injured, but Ms Carroll always saw straight through her clumsy lies. There was to be no escape...
Reluctantly, Jennifer began to change into the kit, stripping down into her underwear as all the other girls in her class did the same around her. As she squeezed out of her tight school skirt, she glanced around at the other kids in the changing room. Although many of them weren't exactly skinny, none of them were as chubby as her. Jennifer didn't notice that of course; she was just checking she wasn't, as so often happened, getting left behind. Indeed, despite her corpulence Jennifer shared her mom's delusion that she was just a tad pudgy. Even when it was obvious she was the fattest in the room, like now, she was blessed with blissful ignorance.
In any case, she had to put on her kit. She grabbed the top and pulled it on, then tried to adjust it so it was comfortable. That, however, was impossible; it was at several sizes too small, and though the fabric was quite stretchy it was strained to its limit over her swollen belly and developing chest. It was uncomfortably tight no matter how much she tugged or shifted, the thin fabric clinging to each roll and fold of her expansive midriff.
Eventually giving up on trying to get the top comfy, Jennifer turned her attention to the shorts. She tugged them on with some difficulty, for although they were elasticated they were so undersized that the waistband was painfully tight anyway. Sighing, she rubbed at where they were already beginning to chafe, wishing that her kit would just fit for once; all the other kids' were fine, why was hers too small? The top wasn't even big enough to cover her belly, leaving a slice of pale fat visible between the two halves of her kit.
She followed the rest of the girls out of the changing rooms and into the gym hall, feeling her top already beginning to ride up with the movement. She tugged it down again irritably, and looked around. There was a big pile of bright plastic ropes in the centre of the room, all tangled together in a rainbow coloured heap.
"Looks like we're doing jump rope then." Said a glum voice in Jennifer's ear. She turned and saw her friend Katrina standing just behind her.
"That's not too bad." Said Jennifer. "I'm good at jump rope."
Katrina looked surprised.
"Really? I thought you hated all exercise."
"I just hate getting out of breath." She said. "I don't hate exercise on its own."
"But won't jump rope make you out of breath?" Pointed out Katrina, frowning.
Jennifer was stumped.
"I... maybe? I guess so."
"Well, I don't like any exercise, tiring or not." Stated Katrina boldly.
"I can see that, young lady." Without a sound, Ms Carroll had appeared directly behind the dark haired girl, eyes flashing menacingly. Katrina jumped half a foot into the air, then span around to face her teacher.
112112.title: Every Fat Child's Hell

choices: Jennifer and Katrina team up
Jennifer and Katrina are separated
1121122.content:
"S-sorry, Ms Carroll," Katrina stammered, "I was just kidding!" She managed a nervous grin; as brave as she was, she wasn't quite ready to take on a teacher. Especially since she, and her classmates, know full well that an angry Ms Carroll is not fun to watch.

Just like that, Ms Carroll's menacing expression softened as a smile formed. "No need to apologise, so was I!" The teacher chuckled as Katrina's plump cheeks reddened with embarrassment. Even Jennifer couldn't help but giggle; she always thought Ms Carroll was pretty funny.
"Though, you may like today's exercise," she explained to the girls, "get lined up with your friends and I'll explain."

The two watched as their classmates were beginning to assemble along the gym wall, talking quietly amongst each other about this and that. They waddled over to join them, taking a space on the end.
The other pudgy kids had their stomachs jutting out from the line in varying lengths, but Jennifer's stuck out the furthest by far. She attempted to tug her top down over her stomach again, but it simply just rolled back up in seconds. She huffed softly and pinched the side of her shorts' waistband, tugging it a bit to release some of the chafing. And while it did help temporarily, letting go simply caused the strain to return with a vengeance.

"Alright kids, quiet down now," Ms Carroll spoke up, the class slowly going silent and giving her their attention, "Today's class will be nice and simple; I want you all to get into pairs, and take turns to count how many skips you can do in two minutes. One skips and the other counts."
The kids nodded and muttered to each other, understanding so far. Katrina just kept a glum frown.
"I'll be keeping time and telling you when to swap," Ms Carroll continued, "so there won't be any cheating." She added with a joking smirk. "You can pair up with whoever you like, so get into teams and one of you come get a rope."

As the kids scrambled and decided on teams, Jennifer looked over to Katrina with an excited grin.
1121122.title: "Sorry Ms Carroll, it was just a joke."

choices: She's not hurt too much.
The pain!
11211221.content:
"Katrina, let's be partners, please!" Said Jennifer excitedly as she turned to her friend. For a moment the other girl just frowned, but then she nodded her head, sighing.
"Okay. At least with you I might not feel quite so bad." She gave a half smile.
Jennifer didn't quite understand that comment, but she returned the smile anyway before trotting off to get a jump rope. Soon, the two friends had found an empty patch of floor near the middle of the room and Katrina was ready to take the first turn. Jennifer sat cross legged nearby, ready to start counting once Ms Carroll started the timer. Both girls looked expectantly at their teacher.
At the side of the room, Ms Carroll stood looking at her watch, enjoying what few elementary school teachers ever achieved from a class; complete, anticipatory silence. She brushed an imaginary speck of dust off her collar,then looked up at the twelve girls in the gym hall.
"Go!" She shouted suddenly, and a moment later the room was filled with the excited shouting and counting of children as they all threw themselves enthusiastically into the activity with the careless energy only youth can bring.
Well- all of them but one.
"Come on Katty! You're not even trying!" Jennifer yelled over the noise in the room. Katrina glared at her, but the moment she looked up the rope tangled itself around her ankles, causing her to wobble unstably.
"I am trying!" She snapped, kicking her feet free and flicking it back behind her again. "How many am I on?"
"Uh, about four." Jennifer guessed; with all the excitement, she'd forgotten all about counting.
Katrina just groaned and began skipping again, jumping clumsily over the rope twice before tripping yet again. She was breathing hard already, half from unfitness, half from anger.
"Six." Said Jenny, watching her friend close her eyes and breathe deeply, trying to keep her temper.
"Half way," shouted Ms Carroll over the racket, "Only thirty seconds left!"
Katrina opened her eyes again and began skipping again, much better than before now. Impressed, Jennifer watched as her friend passed twenty, then thirty skips.
"And that's time!" Their teacher yelled from the side. "Everyone, swap over."
Immediately, Katrina shoved the rope into Jennifer's hands and collapsed onto the floor in a heap, gasping and wheezing. Her friend looked down at her, worried.
"You okay, Katty?" She asked.
From the floor, Katrina nodded, round face red as a fire truck. Her parents owned a gym, but it was obvious their daughter had never visited.
"Good. Remember to count my skips! You got thirty-two."
She stepped away from the exhausted girl and got ready to begin skipping. She was actually looking forward to this; it had been ages since she'd last tried jump rope, but she remembered being rather good at it. Unbeknownst to her, when she'd last been skipping she'd been carrying about fifteen pounds less fat around her midsection, and had been a lot fitter.
"Off you go!" The call came, and they began again. Jennifer flicked the rope round and jumped over it, feeling her belly rise into the air with her, then come bouncing down on landing. Still, she kept going, her chubby body jiggling like jelly with the motion. After only a few skips, she was starting to feel sick; she'd eaten a large breakfast that morning, and her shorts were cutting painfully into her soft stomach. Worse, she was quickly out of breath, the air feeling arid in her lungs as her heart rate increased past resting for the first time that month.
She began to lose time, and due to her large stomach she couldn't quite see her feet. Suddenly, the rope snagged on her toes and she tripped, almost falling. She sank to her hands and knees, the air rattling in her lungs, head pounding.
"Thirty seconds!" She needed to keep going!
Her shirt had ridden up to just below her flabby chest as she skipped, and now she pulled it back down again, wishing distractedly it would just stay in place. She pushed herself back to her feet, knees and ankles twinging with pain at the unaccustomed abuse they were being put through. She slid a finger beneath her waistband, tugging it and relieving the pain for a second, but then she let it snap back into place. She flicked the rope back behind her again, and began skipping again.
She didn't even remember what happened. Presumably, the rope had caught around her ankles after a late jump. All she knew, however, was that one moment she was jumping rope, and the next minute the ground wasn't where it was meant to be and she was falling. She landed flat on her front, the impact forcing all the air in her lungs out in a great gasp. A millisecond later, her knee cracked down on the wooden tiling with a loud, solid clunk.
"Stop! Stop!" She heard Ms Carroll yell as she lay dazed on the floor. There was a buzzing in her ears, and everything looked a bit out of focus. It all looked a bit like ice cream, it occurred to her stunned mind. She watched as a vanilla ice cream in a dark chocolate cone hurried over to her.
"Jennifer! Are you alright?" Said the dairy product. She blinked twice, and suddenly the ice cream coalesced into the far less appetising form of Ms Carroll. And along with the recognition, like a scruffy guest who turned up uninvited to a dinner party, came the pain.
11211221.title: Clunk.

choices: Next lesson. Nurse said she was okay.
Lunchtime at home. Nurse let her take the rest of the day off.
112112211.content:
Jennifer sat awkwardly on a bench at the side of the hall, eyes still moist from crying. In truth, the fall hadn’t been that bad; her knee hurt quite a lot, but what had been a sharp pain was fading away to an ache by now, and though she had winded herself that wore off quickly.
More embarrassing was the state of her clothing. Apparently, the sudden strain of her falling had been too much for her overtaxed gym shorts, leaving them to split all the way down one side. She hadn’t even noticed until Ms Carroll, with the help of a couple of other girls, had helped her onto the bench and she’d glanced down. For half a second, she’d thought that she was naked besides her gym top; from her point of view, her crotch was hidden beneath her bulging belly, and she couldn’t see her shorts. It was only when sucked her stomach in and leaned forwards that she realised she was indeed still wearing her underwear, and spotted the tattered remains of her shorts around one ankle. Once she’d checked that Jennifer was okay, Ms Carroll had rushed off to find the school nurse, draping her jacket over the injured girl’s legs to preserve some of her modesty. The moment she had left the room, all the other girls had crowded around Jenny.
“Are you okay Jen?” Asked Katrina, concern written across her rounded face. “How’s your knee?”
“It’s alright now.” She said. “What was my score?”
“Uh, eleven.”
“Eleven!” The exclamation came from Kanya, one of the other girls. “C’mon, really?”
“I fell down.” Jennifer defended herself. She didn’t get on well with the Thai girl, often arguing over little things. Still, they were hardly enemies or anything.
“Yeah, but I managed to do forty in that time. We all had to stop when you tripped up like an idiot, remember?”
Jennifer glared at the other girl, but then looked away. She was too tired to be arguing about this right now…
Suddenly the hall doors burst open and Miss Villeneuve, the school nurse, hurried in. She glanced around, spotted Jennifer and came over to her, limping heavily. It was one of the funniest things in the world, at least according to the younger students, that the school nurse had a faulty leg. Occasionally, a student got up the courage to ask what had happened to it, but the answers they got back were always different. One week it had been broken in a car accident, the next she’d had Polio, whatever that was. It was one of the school’s greatest mysteries.
Miss Villeneuve came to a stop before Jennifer, and smiled crookedly.
“Jenny. Hurt yourself again?” It wasn’t the first time the nurse had been called out to see to the chubby girl. She had, in the French woman’s own words “A talent for falling on face”.
“Yes Miss Vill- Villen…”
“Villeneuve,” the nurse corrected her, unzipping her first aid bag. “Now… what appears to be the problem?” She asked, her tone making Jennifer shiver.
“Ah, well I fell down and bumped my knee,” she began, “and then…”
112112211.title: French! Thai! Multiculturalism!

choices: Jenny goes for her check-up
Something else happens?
1121122112.content:
Despite the pain in her leg, Jennifer was pretty happy with how things had gone; she was taken out of gym and to the nurse's office, where she waited for her mother to come pick her up. Which she did, and swiftly.
"Jenny!" She'd cried when she entered the nurse's office, and saw her daughter sitting there, eating a candy Miss Villeneuve offered her. Her leg was propped up on another chair.
Anna knelt down and gave her a tight hug. "My poor baby, what happened to you?!"
"I-I just fell mom," Jennifer gasped, still a little winded from the fall and the squeeze not helping, "I-I'm alright!"

"She had a bit of a bad fall in class, and her gym shorts have been destroyed," Nurse Villeneuve explained, "she may have pulled a muscle in her leg, but other than that she seems to be fine."
"Oh good," Anna sighed with relief, smiling as she stroked her daughter's hair, "c'mon, let's get you home. Easy now."

Slowly, Jennifer lowered her leg from the chair and stood, wincing from the dull pain. Anna let her lean against her for support.
"Thank you nurse," Anna smiled, "Jenny has a check-up later on, so I'll make sure she's nice and rested."
"Alright then," Miss Villeneuve nodded, smiling down at the chubby girl, "I hope it goes well."
The two said their goodbyes to the nurse and made their way out to the car, Jennifer awkwardly waddling while leaning against her mother's side.


Back at home, Jennifer was back on the sofa, this time sitting upright to support her still sore leg. Anna had propped it up with a pillow, and even bought her something from her favourite fast-food place to cheer her up.
As she gleefully tore into a messy burger, her mother walked in and knelt down next to her.

"Jenny, you remember you have a check-up today, right?" She asked. Jenny simply nodded, her chomping and chewing not slowing down. "Now we can't really back out of it, so you think you can be a brave little soldier while we're there?"
Swallowing with a loud gulp, Jennifer gave her mom another nod, her smile stained with sauce. "Uh-huh!"
"That's my girl," Anna smiled, ruffling her daughter's hair and plopping a bowl of ice cream next to her, "there you are, when you're finished with your burger and fries."
"Thanks mom!" The globular girl squealed, and Anna gave her a quick kiss on the forehead before departing upstairs.

Jennifer couldn't really complain; sure her leg was sore, and she had to go to another doctor later, but hey, burgers and ice cream!
Maybe she should hurt herself more often! ...wait no, that's dumb.
1121122112.title: Lunchtime at home

choices: Skip to Dinner
Skip to Bath Time Before Bed Time
11211221121.content:
"Jenny, it's time to go" Anna yelled from downstairs.

"Okay" Jenny called back.

With a grunt she got herself out of bed and waddled downstairs and out the door. After Anna got her daughter buckled in, they set off. On the way there, every time the car would hit a bump, it would cause Jenny's belly to jiggle, which caused her to smile. She really loved her big belly. Mostly because she thought it looked cute. She wondered why everyone didn't have a big round ball of fat on them like hers. She also loved t see it get bigger. The bigger it got, the cuter it looked. She reached down and started to pet her belly. She felt the gurgling of her belly from the big meal she had for lunch and it felt like it was purring like a cat to Jenny.

"Oh, you like that, don't you?" Jenny said quietly to her tummy.

Suddenly Anna spoke and snapped her daughter back to reality.

"Alright Jenny, we're here" Anna said as she turned the car off.

Anna unbuckled her daughter and they both walked inside. They sat down and waited for their name to be called, which didn't take long. Jenny went back to the doctors office and took a seat.

"Well Jenny, what brings you in today?" The female doctor with brown hair in a ponytail asked.

"My mom said that it was just a regular check up" Jenny said.

"Ah, well let's get started then, shall we?" The doctor said.

The doctor started by taking her weight, which she noticed was twenty five pounds heavier than last year. The she took her height, looked into her ears noes and mouth and tested her reflexes. The last procedure to do was an abdominal exam.

Alright Jenny, I'm going to need you to take off your shirt and lie on your back" The doctor said.

Jenny obeyed and when she took her shirt off, her belly bounced free. She then lied down on the table. The doctor started to examine her belly, feeling around for anything out of the ordinary. This caused Jenny to suppress a giggle. She loved it when people played with her belly. Then the doctor started to push on different areas of her belly.

"Okay, now tell me if this hurts" the doctor said as she pushed on Jenny's belly, which caused her to burp.

"*Buurrp*, excuse me" Jenny said with a blush.

"Had a big lunch?" the doctor asked.

Jenny nodded her head sheepishly. The doctor continued to push on her belly until she was finished.

"Okay one last thing, I'm going to listen to your belly and make sure everything's alright in there" the doctor said patting Jenny's belly.

The doctor took out her stethoscope and began listening to her belly. Jenny jumped a little at first by the cold sensation, but quickly relaxed.

"Well I can tell that you had a lot to eat, lots of gurgling going on in there" the doctor said. She took the stethoscope of Jenny's round tummy and put it back around her neck.

"Well Jenny, it looks like you're perfectly healthy. Let's go to the waiting room with your mom. and here is a lolly pop for being such a good patient" the doctor said.

Jenny took the lolly pop and followed the doctor to the waiting room, where Anna was. Anna looked up from the magazine she was reading and noticed the doctor and Jenny walking towards her.

"So doctor, how is she?" Anna asked standing up.

"She's perfectly healthy. Her weight is a little high, but it's nothing to worry about. Just keep her happy" the doctor said.

"Thank you" Anna said to the doctor before she went back to see another patient. "Okay Jenny, let's go home."

Jenny waddled over to her mother and walked back to the car and drove home.
11211221121.title: Jenny goes for her check-up

choices: Jenny begins to dream...
The next morning...
112112211212.content:
Anna, relieved that her daughter was perfectly healthy, was in a good enough mood that she decided to reward her little girl tonight for being so good at the doctor's. Once they got home, Jenny was given her favourite dinner; cheese pizza and garlic bread. However, with Anna not feeling worried about her daughter's size, she was treated to a larger sized pizza and a whole baguette! And of course, a larger glass of orange Fanta to wash it all down.

Squealing her thanks, the greedy girl began to dig into her meal. One pudgy hand held a slice of pizza, the other a slice of garlic bread, and she alternated between the two by biting one after the other. Anna couldn't help but smile at how happy her daughter looked; her round puffy little face bore a wide smile as she chewed and swallowed her carb-heavy dinner. The way to this girl's heart was certainly through her stomach, and with the doctor declaring her healthy, Anna's internal conflicts about her growth and 'healthy' appetite were calmed.


Once she had finished up her dinner, and followed it up with a dessert of as many slices of chocolate cake as she could manage (which was nearly the entire thing!), Jenny slumped back in her chair with a content grin. Her face was totally dirtied with pizza sauce, garlic butter and cake crumbs, with her hands covered in chocolatey goop and her shirt discoloured with food debris.

"Wow, somebody enjoyed their dinner tonight, hm?" Anna teased, smiling warmly at her daughter, who just responded with a small burp and a hiccup, "Pardon you. C'mon, let's run you a bath."

Anna carefully hoisted her stuffed little girl onto her feet, and assisted her in waddling awkwardly up the stairs as Jenny cradled her full belly, as well as picking bits of food off herself to lick off her fingers.

Once Anna had the bath running, she helped Jenny to undress. Her shirt, tightened from her distended stomach, took a bit of effort to get off, and undoing her pants required Anna to lift her daughter's overhanging middle to reach the button.

Eventually, the chubby child was inside the bath, and let out a soft sigh of comfort in the warm white suds. Knowing how sleepy she got after a big meal, Anna assisted in cleaning her up. The water began to recolour as the mishmash of food debris was scrubbed off Jenny's face and hands, and Anna had decided to wash her daughter's hair for good measure. She couldn't help but feel good at how comfortable Jenny looked, with a big grin on her puffy face.

Once she was washed and dried, Jenny let out a yawn and rubbing her eyes with a pudgy hand as she put on her pyjamas in her room. Though she was too sleepy to notice, she would have to get new ones soon; her pink vest refused to cover her rounded stomach all the way, and her purple shorts seemed to dig into her a little bit.

Once she was set, her mother came in with the last few slices of chocolate cake left behind from earlier, covered in a plastic see-through dome with a handle on the top.
"If you get the urge to midnight snack, just have one of these, alright sweetie?" She smiled setting the plate on her bedside table before helping her greedy little girl get snuggled into bed. "And if your leg is still too sore I'll let you stay home tomorrow."

"Thanks mom," she yawned, receiving a kiss on her soft cheek, and the two said their goodnights before Anna quietly left the room.

Once she was gone, Jenny's eyes shot open and glared right at the plate of cake. Right away, she reached over and lifted the dome, grabbing a slice and gobbling it up with a quick newfound hunger. The new tiny hole in her stomach filled, Jenny settled back down into bed with a grin, thinking of what she might have for breakfast. Or if she could stay home, what she could eat all day.

It was beginning to seem that, unbeknownst to Jenny, her love for food was developing into an addiction, and it wouldn't be long before it evolved into an obsession...
112112211212.title: Skip to Bath Time Before Bed Time

choices: She wakes up.
The dream continues...
1121122112121.content:
Jennifer was wandering through her school, past the wooden doors and down the bland corridors. There was no-one else around, not even a janitor or cleaner, and everything was silent except for a distant, constant munching sound.
She tried walking towards the sound but she was suddenly aware how strange she felt. Glancing down, she jumped in surprise as an unfamiliar body met her eyes; instead of her usual swollen belly and budding breasts, she could see all the way down to her bare feet and the carpeted floor. She marvelled for a second, wondering just whose body this was, before realising; it was hers, just considerably smaller.
She began to run through the corridors, faster than she could ever have imagined. For the first time she could remember there was no uncomfortable bouncing sensation from her gut, no burning pain in her legs, no gasping rattle from her lungs. She was free as the birds she sometimes watched out the window, too fast and too agile for anything to catch or trap.
Finally, she stopped at a great set of double doors. These would usually lead into the main hall but instead of the chattering and screaming of countless children, the only sound was the munching she had heard earlier, noe louder than ever. Suddenly hesitant, she reached out with one skinny arm and cracked open the doors.
Within, upon a great pile of junk food and sweets, was a huge girl. She looked about Jenny's age but she was far bigger, almost as wide as she was tall; her body was swollen and bulging, naked but for the discarded chocolate wrappers and fast food cartons that buried her up to her crotch. Jennifer couldn't tell if she was sitting or standing in the pile, but even as she watched the girl devoured a large container of French fries and dropped it to join the rest. She'd obviously been eating there a while.
Suddenly, she caught sight of the figure's face and she gasped; the face was hers, just a bit rounder! At the noise, the bloated girl turned, catching sight of Jenny peering through the door. However, she just smiled a familiar smile and wordlessly beckoned the smaller girl inside before returning to her food.
Almost against her will, Jenny slipped inside and trotted over. Before she could say anything however, the other girl -the other Jennifer?- had shoved a burger into her hands. She wasn't particularly hungry but she began eating it anyway, habit taking over. Before she knew it the burger had gone and her hands were already grabbing some pizza from the pile, stuffing it into her mouth faster than she thought possible. Soon it had also vanished into her newly-slim stomach, though for how long it would remain that way was uncertain as she began gorging herself unreservedly on the vast mound of food. The other Jenny nodded appreciatively as the slimmer girl ate, chins wobbling furiously as her jaw worked to chew handfuls of shredded chicken.
As she ate, Jennifer began to feel her body change. Her clothes started getting tighter, and she began to feel the familiar uncomfortable sensation around her waist as her shorts dug in. Glancing down, she saw that her belly had once more become round and soft, straining her shirt. Soon, her feet had disappeared from view, obscured both by the wrappers amassing around her feet and by her expanding belly. She tried to stop eating, tried to drop the fries, but her hands wouldn't respond. There was a sound of popping stitches as she continued to eat, and a moment later her shirt ripped down the front, exposing her pale midriff. A second later she felt the waistband of her shorts snap, though she had lost sight of it long ago.
All too soon, the heap of discarded cardboard and foil had risen to nearly her waist, and she barely had to stand anymore as it began to support her weight. Her belly was huge, only matched by the rest of her body which was now grossly swollen. Her upper arms jiggled as she brought yet another handful of food to her voracious mouth, and her body was now little more than a mass of pale flesh.
Glancing over, she saw that the other girl had been engulfed entirely by the pile of wrappers. The idea of being buried alive like that finally jolted Jennifer out of her food-based paralysis. She dropped slice of cake she'd been about to eat and, with a great effort, burst free of the pile and ran - or rather, waddled - towards the double doors. Her bare body jiggled and shook as she moved, barely faster than a walk, but she eventually reached the doors, still slightly ajar from when she'd slipped inside. She grabbed the handles and tried to pull them open, but they were stuck in place! Giving up, she began slamming her considerable weight into the doors, trying to force them to move, but all that happened was she bruised her shoulder. Tears now running down her food-smeared face, she tried to squeeze through the gap she left. She managed to get one shoulder and her head back into the corridor, but her midsection jammed into the narrow space and wouldn't move. She sucked her belly as best she could and jiggled around as much as possible, but she was trapped between the frozen doors. Twisting her head round, she saw a great wave of cartons and containers and wrappers all rise up like a tsunami, before coming crashing down on top of her, filling her mouth and quashing her frantic screams.
1121122112121.title: Prophecy

choices: The cake holds her till morning...
It's not enough; she needs more...
11211221121211.content:
Jennifer bolted upright with a small yelp, the sheer shock from her nightmare catapulting her into consciousness. Panting heavily, she wiped sweat off her forehead with her arm and looked around. She was in her darkened room, still in her comfy bed, still in her plump little body.

It was just a dream, the girl concluded internally, letting out a sigh of relief that caused her belly to jut out. It had shrunk a bit in her sleep, but it had certainly grown after all her binging just hours before. It had obtained another inch or so, two at the most. But of course Jenny would never notice such a thing; she wasn't worried the calories being put into her body, rather the food being put into it.

And speaking of food, the nightmare began to replay itself in her mind. Her eyebrow cocked as she remembered how tiny and thin she looked, and then meeting her obese doppelgänger. I wonder what that was all about...

As the mental images of that mountainous pile of junk food flashed, Jenny allowed a grin to creep onto her face. Her confusion about whatever her subconscious could have been telling her was slowly being replaced by a growing urge to snack. She could almost taste all that pizza, those burgers, those chocolates and cakes...

Grrrrnnnn...

A familiar sound arose from Jenny's massive middle, and she instinctively put a thick little hand on it for a rub. It was still dark out, probably a good few hours before sunrise, and she was creeping into her slowly-becoming-constant mood; the mood for food.

Her desire for a midnight snack caused her mother's voice to speak up in her mind; "If you get the urge to midnight snack, just have one of these."
She turned and saw she still had some cake left beneath the plastic dome, she somehow hadn't touched it during her dream. She adjusted herself on her bed, the frame and springs squeaking and creaking beneath her generous bulk, and lifted another slice of cake to gobble it up.

Licking her fingers clean, she saw she had two slices left, and so she decided, in a mix of carefulness and greed, to eat up the rest of them just in case.

Cleaning the crumbs and goop from her fingers and mouth, the gluttonous girl settled back down in her bed, wearing a grin of content as her eyes slowly closed.
11211221121211.title: The need to feed

choices: Eat all the food she could manage.
Have a bath with loads of bubbles
112112211212111.content:
Jenny awoke once again, but this time far more pleasantly. She opened her eyes and squinted up, her mom slowly coming into focus as her eyes grew accustomed to the light filtering in through her bedroom window.
"Morning, Jenny. Time to get up."
She yawned widely, and blinked up at the shape looming over her.
"I'm still tired though." She mumbled.
"Come on Jennifer, get up. How's your leg?"
"Fine." Jenny grumbled, then froze. "Uh, actually it still really hurts, mom. I'm not sure if I can walk on it."
"Really?" Her mom frowned, pulling aside the covers to get a better look at her daughter's leg. She prodded it dubiously.
"Uh- ow!" said Jenny, half a second late. Luckily, her mom didn't seem to notice the error.
"Oh dear." She sighed. "I suppose you'll have to stay home from school."
"Oh no..." Jennifer agreed, trying to hide her grin.
"Ah well, I suppose I'll phone you in sick. Do you want to stay in bed a while longer?"
"Yeah!" Jenny said happily; this was going better than she'd hoped.
"Okay then, try to rest. Call me if you need help coming downstairs."
"I will." She smiled at her mom, who ruffled her hair affectionately.
"I'll even make you some breakfast if you like. What do you want? I think we've got pancakes."
"Make them!" Exclaimed the chubby girl, almost squealing with delight. Her mom laughed.
"Sure. I'll go make you some pancakes."

Once her mom had left the room, Jennifer slid out of bed without even a twinge from her leg. She was feeling rather pleased with herself; missing a day of school, and having pancakes made for her. Plus, the doctor had said she was perfectly healthy! All in all, things were looking good.
She took a step, and for a moment her smile faded. She remembered her dream. It had been a lot of fun being able to run around without getting tired. Maybe... maybe she should-
The smell of cooking pancakes interrupted her thoughts, and she forgot what she was thinking about. Shaking her head, she went to get dressed before it was time for breakfast. Pulling off her night clothes, she hurried to her wardrobe and looked for something nice to wear on her day off school. Hmm... Lots of shirts, skirts, shorts... Ah! Her favourite dress was tucked in at the back behind an unworn pair of sweatpants. She pulled it out and examined it; though she hadn't worn it for months it was as pretty as ever. She pulled it on, slipping it over her head and then squeezing the rest of her body into it. It was tight around her belly, which was round and large even though she hadn't eaten yet.
Reaching behind her, she tried to zip up the back of the dress but her young arms were just too short. Growling irritably, she set off stumping down the stairs, the wood creaking with every one of her heavy steps. She soon trotted into the kitchen where her mom was cooking pancakes.
"Oh, you got down the stairs all right?" She said. "Your breakfast's almost ready."
"Can you help me with my dress?" The plump girl asked. She turned around to display the zipper.
"Sure." Said Anna. She left her cooking and came over, kneeling down behind her daughter and taking hold of the zipper to try to pull it up, but it wouldn't budge; the dress was too tight. "Could you suck your tummy in for me, Jen? It's a little stiff."
Jennifer obliged, making her prodigious middle as small as possible. There was a brief pause, then she heard her mother puff with effort and finally the zipper slid up, grinding slightly as it went. She gasped at the sudden pressure.
"There you go." Said Anna. "Now, I need to get those pancakes before they burn."
As her mom moved back to the grill, Jenny let her belly swell back out to full size, hearing the fabric of her dress creak with the strain. With a slight frown, she tugged at the dress, trying to loosen the unyielding material that squeezed her chest and belly. She felt a bit like an overstuffed sausage, squeezed into a space too small for her. Breathing shallowly, she moved over to the table and sat down.
A minute later, her mom brought over a stack of pancakes and the golden syrup, the two of which Jenny soon combined in considerable amounts. Now, with a perfect breakfast in front of her and clothing trouble forgotten, she dug in.

It took her nearly twenty minutes to finish up the whole stack of pancakes but finish them she did, leaving just a smear of syrup on the plate. A moment later, that too was gone, scraped up by a thick finger and deposited into her mouth as she sat back contentedly in her chair, other hand on her swollen belly. She was breathing heavily, worn out by a combination of the restrictive dress and eating so fast she didn't have time to breath. She tugged again at the dress, trying to ease the pressure that had gotten even worse as she’d eaten. She huffed irritably; it was obviously not going to get any looser.
“Mom?” She called. Anna looked up from where she was emptying the dishwasher.
“What is it sweety?” She was happy to see her daughter so relaxed and comfortable.
“My dress is really tight.” She gestured to the straining fabric over her midsection, pouting.
“Is it?” Anna thought, trying to remember if it had shrunk in the wash. “Did you put it on wrong or something?”
“Maybe? I don’t think so.” Jennifer looked down at the dress doubtfully.
“I’ll have a look.” Anna left the dishes and hurried over to Jenny. “Can you stand up?”
“Why wouldn't I be able to?”
“You’re leg still hurts, doesn’t it?”
“Huh? Oh yeah, it does. Ouch.” She said unconvincingly, climbing laboriously to her feet. Anna didn’t seem suspect anything though, as she knelt down to Jenny’s level and had a look at the dress. She took a quick look at the zipper, then at the straining stitches down the side. Eventually, she stood back up.
“Sorry Jen, it looks like you’ve just outgrown it.” She said sympathetically.
“But it fit me fine a few months ago.” She said petulantly.
“I’m afraid that’s just how it is. We can go shopping for a new dress soon, okay?”
Before Jennifer could answer, however, the phone rang.
“Sorry, I’m gonna have to get this.” Her mom hurried off as Jenny looked mournfully at her outgrown dress. It wasn’t too bad, she supposed. It wasn’t as if she couldn’t wear it or anything; it was just a bit tight around the middle. Well – a bit tight around everything, if she was being honest.
A raised voice in the hall made her perk up her ears.
“- come on!” She heard her mom say, then a pause. “Is there absolutely no-one else? Okay… okay… Fine, I’ll do it.” She heard a sigh as the phone was returned to its mount, then her mom came back in.
“Sorry Jenny, two other people are off sick at work and they’ll have to close if I don’t go in. Are you alright on your own?”
Jenny nodded.
“You’re a sweety.” Anna gave her a quick kiss, before hurrying back into the hall to grab her bag. “I’ll be back in a few hours, be good!” A moment later, she heard the door slam.
Jenny bit her lip excitedly. She was almost never left alone in the house; she could have some fun. She could…
112112211212111.title: Pancakes

choices: Jenny falls asleep...
Anna returns...
1121122112121111.content:
With her mother gone, Jenny had full reign of the house. Which of course meant the kitchen and everything in it! Licking her lips in greedy anticipation, she waddled over to the pantry and opened it up, revealing the bounty of chocolate, cakes, candy and all kinds of sugary delights. Just the sight of this collection of calories made a sliver of drool slide out the corner of her mouth.

Jenny glanced from shelf to shelf, trying to decide what she'd have first. Maybe some chocolate bars? Or some doughnuts? Maybe even a cake? She gave her belly a rub as it grumbled with impatience.

...then, a thought came to her. She'd be alone for a few hours, and the morning was the best time for cartoons. So what if...

A wide grin emerging on her puffy face, Jenny grabbed a packaged chocolate cake and took it to the living room couch, leaving it on the seat. She then went back to the kitchen and returned with a box of jam-filled doughnuts. Then a box of chocolate bars. Then a large package of gummy candies...


The greedy girl huffed and puffed with exhaustion as she took a glance at the couch, which was stocked up with all she could fit out of the pantry, which was nearly the entire thing! Chocolates, cakes, chewy candies, pies, puddings, everything! And smack dab in the middle was a wide Jenny-sized space, right in front of the TV.

Pleased with herself, Jenny hoisted her heavy frame up onto the couch, the cushions' sudden depression causing a few of her snacks to collapse into her lap much to her glee. She grabbed the remote in a pudgy hand and flicked on the TV to the cartoon channel, and thus began her feasting.


Becoming lost in her greed, Jenny was subconsciously shoving doughnut after chocolate after gum into her mouth, leaving a decreasing pile of snacks on the sofa and an increasing mountain of empty wrappers and packages on the floor. She hadn't noticed, too busy eating and focusing on the TV. Her face and fingers were stained with chocolate, jelly and sugar, thanks to her neglecting to clean herself.

In fact, she was so submerged that she hadn't heard the stitches from her dress. Her sides were being torn apart by her distending middle, and eventually decided they couldn't take anymore and popped open, allowing pale globs of flesh to bulge out of the spaces left behind.

But she hadn't noticed, and as time went by and snacks were devoured, she continued to be oblivious. She had food and TV, so nothing else was grabbing her attention.
1121122112121111.title: Snacking Spree

choices: An angel
A different part.
11211221121211111.content:
The sharp ringing of the doorbell roused Jenny from her sleep with a start, and before she knew it she'd slipped off the sofa to land heavily on the floor. She groaned in pain, belly aching from both the short fall and the truly incredible amount of food that had been stuffed into it a few hours before. There were so many wrappers on the couch it was difficult to tell what colour it had been originally.
The doorbell sounded again and she hoisted herself upright, then hurriedly set off staggering towards the front door. Every step made her swollen gut jiggle uncomfortably, and as she waddled into the corridor she reflected mournfully that there were downsides to massive overeating.
She eventually reached the door, shivering at the breeze that was chilling her sides for some reason, before looking through the peephole. On the other side, she saw Katrina waiting awkwardly, dark hair blowing wildly in the strong winds.
She reached up high and unbolted the door, then pulled it open to greet her friend.
"Hi Katty!" She said, and was rather alarmed when the other girl jumped back, a look of shock on her round face. "Jen! What the hell happened to you?" She said loudly, staring at her chubby friend.
"What do you mean? Asked Jenny, feeling rather scared.
"Well your face for one, but also your dress..."
Jenny left her friend on the doorstep and ran - well, walked slightly faster than normal - back into the house, going to the nearest mirror she could find. Katrina followed her inside, shutting and bolting the door behind her as she followed the larger girl.
As soon as Jennifer found a mirror, she began giggling; she could see why Kat had been shocked now; her face and chest were a multicoloured mess of food, from smeared chocolate to cake crumbs to bits of potato chip. She looked less like a person and more like a strange cross between a human and the trash bin outside McDonalds. She turned to Katrina, who had followed her into the room.
"I forgot to clean myself up," she giggled, "sorry for giving you a scare."
"No problem." The other girl said. "Your dress is bust too." She said, gesturing to the great rips down the side that Jennifer had thus far failed to notice.
"Oh." She said, voice suddenly quite small. "Now I really can't wear it..." She felt rather sad about the dresses death.
"How did you even end up like this?" Asked Katrina, eying Jenny's massively swollen stomach curiously.
"I, uh, ate some food." She looked back at the mirror and sighed. "I guess I'll need to change clothes and wash my face before mom gets back. Come on, let's go upstairs."
She led Katrina up the stairs. Nowadays, she'd taken to staying on the ground floor whenever she could, and now she was remembering why; climbing stairs was exhausting! Her legs and feet ached, her belly bounced dreadfully, and by the time she reached the top she was puffing and panting like she'd run a marathon. She leant against the wall to get her breath back, watched by a slightly worried Kat.
"Are you really that tired? I mean, I'm not very fit but I'm fine just climbing stairs..."
Jenny shrugged.
"I dunno. My leg still hurts, do that's probably it." She'd told the lie so many times now she was starting to believe it herself. "That's why I wasn't in school today."
"I guess..." Said Katrina, leading the way to the bathroom. "Oh yeah, I needed to tell you something; it's why I came round. Our class is doing the nativity play for the end of term, and we need to know what part you're going to be playing. We didn't know if you'd be in school tomorrow either, so I came to check."
"Ooh, that sounds exciting!" Jenny gushed. "Can I be Mary?"
"Uh, Kanya's gonna be Mary. Actually, the only parts left are a shepherd, a Roman soldier, animals and, uh, the angel."
What should Jenny be?
11211221121211111.title: Nativity?

They go to grab snack.
112112211212111111.content:
Jennifer, who'd been looking rather disheartened at the thought of being a background character for the third year running perked up.
"Can I be an angel?" She asked, eyes shining.
"I'm not so sure that's a good idea." Said the smaller girl. "They're quite a few strings and pulleys involved, and..." But Jenny obviously wasn't listening. Kat sighed. "Fine, I'll put you down as the angel."
"Thanks Katty, you're the best!" Jennifer grabbed her friend and pulled her into a tight hug.
"H-hey! You're covered in crumbs." Kat shoved her away and stepped back, brushing off her top. Her attempt to look annoyed, however, was ruined by the slight blush in her cheeks.
Jennifer grabbed a flannel from the cupboard and wetted it, then began washing the debris of her face. Soon her pale skin was visible once more, and the flannel was stained with food. She washed it off then reached back to undo her dress, growling in annoyance as she remembered she couldn't reach.
"Katty, will you unzip me?" She asked.
"Uh- sure." Katrina unzipped her friend's dress easily, the rips down the side making it far less tight than it had been a few hours ago, then together they pulled the ruined dress off over Jennifer's head. For a moment, she looked at the dress sadly, then she bunched it up and stuffed it into the bin. She turned to Katrina, who was awkwardly looking in the other direction.
"Let's go to my room and grab some new clothes." She said, before frowning. She followed her friend's gaze, but saw nothing but the blank wall. "Are you okay Katty?" She asked, concerned.
"You're not wearing anything." Mumbled the dark-haired girl, cheeks flushed bright red.
"Hmm?" Jenny looked down. "I am wearing panties, I think." From her point of view, her crotch was hidden beneath rolls of flabby midsection. She lifted her gut out the way and leant forwards, briefly catching sight of the polka-dot fabric. "Yeah, I am."
"Yeah, but you're not wearing anything else!" Said Katrina, still looking resolutely at the tiled wall.
Jenny giggled.
"Come on, silly. We're both girls." She grabbed the other girl's arm and led her through to her own room, and sat her down on the bed. The pyjamas from that morning were still lying discarded on the floor, as were various candy wrappers and other clothes. Katrina eyed the plate on Jennifer's bedside table, cake crumbs revealing what had once been on it.
"Your room's almost as messy as mine." She said, still feeling quite awkward. She glanced at her friend who was now bent over rummaging through a drawer, wide rear jiggling. She looked away again hurriedly, wishing she could stop herself blushing.
"It's normally messier than this." Jenny said straightening up, shorts in hand. "I think mom just cleaned it." She hurried over to the wardrobe and began looking through that.
"Oh, right..."
A moment later the bigger girl walked back over to the bed, outfit in hand.
"What d'you think?" She asked, holding it up for Kat to see.
"Looks, uh, good to me." She said. Jenny frowned.
"Are you sure you're okay?" She asked, leaning towards the girl on the bed. "You're being a bit weird."
"I'm f-f-fine." She'd thought she'd got over the stuttering years ago - apparently it wasn't quite as gone as she'd hoped.
"Hmmph. Okay." She stepped away and began getting dressed, pulling on a tight pair of shorts with some difficulty. Meanwhile Katrina breathed deeply, once, twice, three times. She was in control. Looking up, she saw Jenny putting on her top, an undersized thing that didn't quite cover her lowest flab roll.
"Don't you wear a vest?" Asked Katrina, expression resolutely calm, though her cheeks were still a bit red.
"What? No. Why would I wear a vest?" She'd never worn vests as far as she could remember.
"Well, uh, most girls start wearing them around now. Especially girls like you." Kat gestured awkwardly at her friend's chest; although she was far from developed, her flabby chest was hardly flat.
Jennifer looked down and shrugged.
"No, my chest never seems to get cold." She said, missing the point so completely that Katrina would've suspected a joke, had she not known just how dim her friend could be about her body. She shook her head.
"Never mind."

Jenny tells Katty about her bizarre dream

"Hey Katty, wanna go grab a snack?" Jenny suggested with a grin. Her stomach hadn't growled, but the urge to eat had made itself known inside her, despite her recent snack attack.

"Uh, sure," Katrina muttered, with a hint of concern in her voice. She wanted to point out that her fatter friend had indeed been stuffing herself earlier, but she knew there would be no swaying her. Besides, being a big girl herself, she also had trouble denying food when it was offered.

Jenny's smile widened, squishing up her bloated cheeks, and she began waddling out of her room and down to the kitchen. Katrina followed, taking a mental note of how tight her friend's shorts looked on her; her thick thighs squished ever so slightly out of the fabric.

As the pair reached the kitchen, Jenny made a beeline for the pantry, the door still wide open and whatever there was left on display for her. She instinctively grabbed as much as she could carry, while Katrina grabbed the rest for herself. The shelves were totally bare now, thanks to the two of them.

Jenny led her friend into the living room, with the TV still on and the floor still littered with empty wrappers and packages.
Katrina's eyes widened. "Woah, you ate all of this yourself?!"

"Yup!" Jenny giggled, sounding a bit too proud of herself, as she dumped her armfuls of treats on the far cushion and hoisted herself up next to them. Katrina followed suit on the opposite side, providing just enough space for the two of them, although it was a bit packed and the two were rather close together.

"Wow, how can you eat all this and still be hun-" The smaller girl started, but her friend was already stuffing chocolate into her face, so there was no point in trying to question her further. Shrugging, she flipped open a box of sugar-frosted doughnuts and began gobbling them up herself.
1121122112121111112.title: Ballooning Buddies

choices: Go upstairs and have a rest
Go grab a snack
11211221121211111121.content:
The couch that sat in Jennifer's sitting room had seen a lot of abuse in its eight years. Bought on the day of their first child's birth, the new mother and father had spared no expense on a piece of furniture that was to last as long as possible, and it was beautiful and sturdy to match what they'd paid.
In its time it had seen the entire family squeezed together on its plush exterior, watching TV or just talking. Later it had been jumped on for games, tipped over as part of a fort, even flipped upsidedown at one point to provide a semi-convincing mountain ledge. After that, however, things had settled down for the most part; with the father's new job, the family rarely sat on it as one anymore, and a lone child, however heavy she might be becoming, was no strain on it.
Today, however, it was feeling its age. Today, not one but two oversized youngsters were resting upon its width, wide rears making it creak slightly with the strain. That in itself wouldn't have been a bother however; it was tougher than that. No, the problem only arose when they started jumping!

Sitting upon said couch, Katrina was beginning to feel rather sick. She'd just eaten a huge amount of candy and chocolate, more than she'd normally eat in a week, and now Jenny, normally slothful and lazy, was practically hyperactive. Perhaps it was the 8000 calories the young girl had eaten that day but she was buzzing with sugar-fuelled energy, and with that much energy came silly games. With only a giggle as warning, Jenny leapt on the smaller girl and begun an impromptu wrestling match, forgetting any discomfort from overeating in her childish glee. Katrina gasped as all the wind was knocked out of her at the unexpected attack, setting her scrabbling desperately beneath her friend's bulk, trying to dislodge the weight that had knocked her flat. Face trapped beneath a bulge of flab she struggled to breath, and for a few seconds the two floundered and fought, until with a final heave Katrina managed to throw the bigger girl off.
The couch groaned as Jenny's weight came down hard on one end, but it survived. What it couldn't survive, however, was when Katrina leapt onto her friend in pursuit of revenge, putting both girls' considerable combined weight onto its dodgy right leg.
Crack!
For the second time that day Jenny was deposited suddenly onto the carpet as the couch tipped unexpectedly. A moment later Katrina lost her balance and slipped, landing directly on her friend's packed belly. Jennifer cried out at the sudden pain, chubby face red, then all was completely quiet. For half a minute, both girls lay in a silent heap, then with a pained heave Kat climbed off her friend and stood up. Hands on wide hips, she surveyed the damage.
The couches front-right leg had snapped halfway up its length, which is what had tipped them onto the floor. Now, with their weights gone, it stood fine on the other three. However, if anyone sat near the front it would tip them off. She shook her head in dismay, and turned to Jennifer.
"Holy cow, Jen. We broke your couch pretty good." She turned to look at the other girl was still lying on the floor, clutching her midsection. There was a look of pained distress on her round face. "Hey, you okay Jen?" Asked Katrina nervously.
She knelt down beside her friend, starting to feel worried at the expression on Jenny's face.
"What's wrong? Shall I get help?" She was panicking slightly, and she saw with alarm that the bigger girl's face was getting increasingly red. "Jen! Come on, say something. Does your belly hurt?"
Jennifer's face was now the colour of a ripe tomato, and suddenly her eyes rolled back in her head, showing only the whites. For a second, Katrina honestly thought her friend had died, and her mind flashed forwards to an imaginary funeral where she was putting flowers by a grave while Anna sobbed nearby.
And then, Jennifer's lips parted wide, and she gave the longest, loudest belch Katrina had ever heard. The dark-haired girl jumped back in shock, falling over a box of chocolates and landing on her butt as the burp just kept going, on and on, until finally it petered out with a squeak. A moment later, Jenny sat up and looked around.
"Wow, that felt good. What happened, did the couch fall over?" She glanced over at the broken leg. "Oh no!"
Katrina swore, loudly, prompting to Jenny to look back at her in surprise.
"Hey! Mommy says don't say that word."
Kat shook her head frustratedly, colour returning to her cheeks.
"Don't scare me like that, Jen! I mean... damn, I thought you were dead!"
Jenny shrugged.
"Nah, the doctor said I'm good." She said, missing the point once again.
"Well... never mind that now. We need to fix your couch before your mom gets home, Jen."
"Oh yeah." She looked back at the couch. "Maybe if we use duct tape?" She suggested, having seen it advertised on TV one time.
"I don't know, it's your house! Look, I'll deal with the food mess, you try and fix the couch and maybe your mom won't kill us when she gets back, okay?"
For the next twenty minutes, the two girls worked hard at their tasks. Katrina trotted to and fro to the kitchen, stuffing cartons and wrappers into the bin, and Jennifer did her best to fix the couch leg using Pritt Stick and masking tape. Eventually, jobs done, the two stood in the centre of the room. All in all, they thought they'd done a decent job; The floor was clear, and the couch was reasonably stable, though it was basically just balancing on the broken leg. Still, to the two girls it seemed acceptable.
11211221121211111121.title: The two eat and eat...

choices: Anna's back
Someone else's at the door
112112211212111111211.content:
Without a word, they traipsed back upstairs and sat back down on Jennifer's bed, tired out. Katrina was feeling quite sick now; physical effort was uncommon for her, especially after eating, and she'd just spent 20 minutes running from room to room to clean.
She lay flat out on the bed with a sigh; upsettingly, if she lay back like this it was her belly that thrust highest into the air, sticking up higher than her nose or toes. Katrina wasn't like Jennifer; she knew she was chubby, and she hated every pound of extra weight. Though she was quite small compared to Jenny, she was a big girl for her age with most of her weight around her hips and butt. Most pants for 8 year olds wouldn't even fit over her plump rear, and the ones that could only did so with at least ten minutes hard tugging and wiggling, leaving them straining at the seams.
In fact, it was Katrina's size that had drawn her to Jenny in the first place. On her first day at school, her pants had ripped as she'd sat down for roll call and the whole class had laughed at her, all except Jennifer. She'd just looked a bit confused as to what was funny, and it was then that Kat realised; if she was always standing next to Jenny, she'd look veritably skinny on comparison. Thus had bloomed a lengthy friendship.
Katrina had gained over the years since then; enough flab had collected around her waist to form a small potbelly, her hips had gotten steadily wider, and her butt had grown even more round. Luckily for her, however, Jenny had gained too, and at a much faster rate. Despite the advantage, however, she was beginning to worry about her fatter friend; Jenny's size and diet were scarily excessive, and she wondered if she should say anything. She glanced sideways at where Jennifer lay beside her on the bed, eyes closed; she had dropped off into a peaceful sleep. She saw how Jenny's stomach rose up far higher than her own, revealed in its entirety by the shirt she was wearing, which had ridden up to just below her chest. It wasn't like her belly was the only oversized thing, either. Her upper arms were thick and flabby, devoid of muscle. Similarly, her thighs bulged within her straining shorts; Katrina had witnessed first-hand how weak they were, as each time they'd climbed the stairs they'd had to stop at the top for Jenny to get her breath back.
Speaking of breathing, in the quiet of the house she could hear Jenny's quite clearly, loud and slightly uneven beneath the weight of that huge gut pressing down on her as she lay.
The doctor had said she was alright, hadn't they? And doctors couldn't be wrong, that was fact. She pushed aside her worries for her friend, and instead thought about herself again. She really wished that she'd eaten less earlier, but she hadn't been able to stop once she'd started. Now she felt quite sick, and she had bellyache from eating so much. Although her clothes fit better than Jenny's did - knowing ones own size has its advantages - her binging had left her shirt tighter than normal, and a thin wedge of pasty flab was visible between it and her pants. She rubbed her achingly full stomach with one hand, wishing her fingers didn't sink in as much as they did. She imagined what it would be like to find a perfectly flat, toned waist there one day, and bit her lip sadly. Maybe when she was older she'd go on a diet or something.
Suddenly the doorbell rang, interrupting her thoughts. Was Anna back already?
112112211212111111211.title: Character development

choices: Jenny wakes up, and is hungry
Katrina tells Anna why she came over
1121122112121111112111.content:
"Uh, Jenny?" Katrina muttered, poking her larger friend in her doughy stomach and sending a ripple through it. "Jenny, someone's at the door. It might be your mom."

Jennifer didn't stir an inch, her chainsaw-like snoring carrying on undisturbed. Katrina forgot for a second how much of a heavy sleeper she was, especially after a meal, which she demonstrated at many a sleepover and slumber party. Katrina half-joked internally that she might wake up if she held some chocolate over her nose.

With a sigh, the smaller girl heaved herself off the bed and stumbled out the door, cradling her overfilled stomach as she carefully plodded down the stairs. Once she'd reached the bottom, the sound of a key clicking into the door sounded, and she heard the door open. For a split second she felt relieved that she didn't have to reach for the lock herself.

Sure enough, She watched Anna walk into the main hall, and be taken aback slightly by the girl's presence.
"Oh, hi Katrina," she smiled warmly, being well acquainted with her daughter's friend, "I didn't know you were here!"

"Oh uh, I just got here a little while ago," she explained, then swallowed a nervous lump in her throat before continuing, "u-uh, your sofa broke a little bit, but me and Jenny fixed it...kinda."

"Oh, that old thing?" The woman chuckled, thumbing in the direction of the living room, "Don't worry about it, I've been meaning to get that thing patched up anyway." Her smile quickly dissolved. "No one was hurt? Where's Jenny?"

"Oh no, we're both fine," Katrina nodded, then pointed upward, "Jenny's in her room, napping."

"Oh, good," Anna sighed with relief, her smile returning as she walked into the kitchen, "...oh, I see you two were busy!" she chuckled from the doorway.

Katrina's round face burned bright red once again, this time out of embarrassment. "U-um, sorry..."

"Oh don't apologise, I've been meaning to do shopping soon anyway," the older woman re-emerged, handbag missing from her shoulder, "just means I'll have to do it sooner, is all."

"O-oh, alright then," Katrina nodded, grinning in relief. She liked coming over to Jenny's, her mother was always so nice. No wonder where her friend got it from.
1121122112121111112111.title: Anna's back

choices: Um, okay.
I need to go home.
11211221121211111121112.content:
"So why're you here today?" Asked Anna as she headed back into the kitchen and began taking inventory. "Come to see if Jenny's okay?"
"Uh, yeah, that as well. But I needed to find out what part she wants to be in the nativity play, in case she's not in school tomorrow." Katrina followed her into the kitchen, standing awkwardly off to the side as Anna checked through countless empty cupboards. They really hadn't left much food...
"Oh, you're putting on a play?" Asked Anna, interested. "Is Jennifer taking part?" Although unworried about her daughter's health, she would like the young girl to spend less time sprawled on the couch and more time doing something constructive.
"Yeah, she's going to be an, uh, angel."
Anna turned, eyes sparkling with joy.
"My little angel's going to be an actual angel!" She cried. "Oh, I can see in the outfit now. She's going to be perfect!"
Katrina nodded uncomfortably.
"Well, I guess..."
Anna returned to rummaging around in drawers, moment of motherly pride over.
"I'm surprised no-one else wanted that part. You'd think it would be quickest to go." She said, as she finally found a solitary bag of cookies underneath some tins of fruit salad. She placed the packet carefully on the counter, then returned to her search.
"Everyone was sort of afraid to go up on the crane." Admitted Katrina. "But I'm not sure Jenny knows about that."
Most parent would have started worrying about now, especially considering Jenny's rather generous size. However, Anna was not most parents.
"Sounds fine to me." She shrugged. "When is the play?"
"A couple of weeks from now. We'll be rehearsing after school most days, if that's okay with you."
"Sounds fine to me." With that, Anna stood up with hands on hips. "All we've got left is cans of fruit salad and powdered milk, and god knows you can't make a meal out of them. I guess I'll call a takeaway." She turned to Katrina. "You can stay to eat if you want. I think I'll order pizza."
11211221121211111121112.title: Angel

choices: Jenny's still out like a light
Jenny wakes up...just about
112112211212111111211121.content:
Just as Katrina opened her mouth to politely decline the offer, she froze and noticed her stomach ache, or more accurately a lack thereof. The junk food crammed into her gut had been digesting, rather quickly as well, leaving much more room and relieving her of her pains.
Plus, she did like pizza. And having a nice big one all to herself did not sound like a bad idea, despite still feeling a bit of fullness. She half-joked internally that her best friend's appetite might be rubbing off on her.

"U-um, okay, if you don't mind," she decided, managing a sheepish grin, "I-I need to let my mom know..."
"Oh I'll take care of that," Anna smiled, her eyes widening slightly as an idea popped into her head, "in fact, you're more than welcome to sleep over, if you like! We have some spare blankets and pillows."

"O-oh, sure!" The chubby girl grinned, liking the sound of that, "Thanks!"
"No problem at all," the doting mother grinned back, "Oh, what kind of pizza do you like?"
"Pepperoni," she answered quickly, grinning at the thought.

"Alright, I'll order it soon," Anna smiled, "why don't you head back up and play with Jenny for a bit? Don't be afraid to ask if you need something."
"S-sure," Katrina nodded, smiling gratefully before turning to waddle back up the stairs. She loved sleeping over at Jenny's; they always had loads of fun, watching movies, playing games and snacking.

She started wondering if Jenny was still asleep all this time. Knowing her best friend, it was almost a certainty.
112112211212111111211121.title: Staying for Dinner

choices: Try and burst the button.
Ask Kat for help.
1121122112121111112111211.content:
Katrina climbed back upstairs and walked back into Jennifer's bedroom, loud snoring revealing that her friend still hadn't woken up. Indeed, the chubby girl still lay sleeping on the bed, ample belly rising and falling with each breath. Katrina suddenly yawned; watching her friend sleep so heavily was making her tired now! She bit her lip, considering for a moment, then climbed into the bed to join her friend. Sliding under the covers, she felt the warm softness of the much larger girl next to her, like an terrifyingly oversized kitten, and she smiled in genuine happiness for the first time in days. Truth be told, she wasn't a very happy person; she was pessimistic to a fault, and her conflict with her parents and body issues rarely left her feeling anything but inadequate. It was only when she was with Jenny, a girl who was simultaneously too nice and too naïve to judge others, that she felt properly happy.
Oh yeah, and when she was eating. That was good too.

Twenty minutes later, the pizza had arrived. Although there were only three of them, and two of them weren't even nine yet, Anna had bought two large pepperonis and some garlic bread, as well as a large Coke for Jennifer and a large Diet Coke for Katrina. She'd remembered from previous outings with the dark haired girl preferred to drink diet sodas, though Anna couldn't think why.
Soon, all three were sitting around the dining room table, the two girls eating at breakneck speed, the woman much more slowly. Jennifer especially was choking down slices like her life depended on it, soiling another shirt as tomato sauce and topping escaped her hungry maw and dropped onto her chest. Soon, the white fabric was stained blood red, and Jenny had eaten almost an entire large pizza in under ten minutes, as well as a large drink.
A moment later shepushed her chair away from the table and leant back in it, breathing heavily. Although her stomach was stretched far larger than most kids' her age, that day she'd eaten a truly vast amount, and now she was feeling the consequences as her stomach churned and growled its displeasure. Reaching down with pudgy fingers she scrabbled for the top button on her shorts, trying to ease their constricting embrace, but they were incredibly tight and her belly sagged over the waistband, confounding her clumsy effort.
1121122112121111112111211.title: Pizza and Prejudice

choices: Yeah, why not.
No, sorry Kat.
11211221121211111121112112.content:
"Uhhh." She moaned belatedly. "Katty, can you help me?"
"What's that?" Asked Katrina, looking up from her third slice of pizza. The dark-haired girl hadn't eaten as much as Jenny, but she was still bloated from earlier and was equally stuffed.
"Help me undo this button?" She asked, gesturing at her shorts. Katrina coloured.
"Um, sure."
