With a glance at Anna, who seemed to have zoned out entirely, the dark haired girl heaved herself to her feet and tottered around the table to her friend, cradling her bulging belly as she did so. She couldn't remember ever being this stuffed before, not even that time when she'd eaten twelve packets of Mars bars in a row and nearly thrown up.
She knelt down in front of Jenny's chair, between the other girl's thick legs. She squinted at the shorts.
"Can you, uh, lift your belly up please?" She asked awkwardly. Jenny just nodded, lifting the flab roll out the way with both hands and letting Katrina's slightly more nimble fingers get to work on the button.
It was a difficult job; the shorts were seam-strainingly tight, making the button almost impossible to slip free and denying Kat success. Her fingers were slippy with tomato sauce, leaving red fingerprints across the waistband as she tried fruitlessly to ease her friend's discomfort.
Just as she was about to give up, however, Jennifer shifted slightly in her seat and a bit more pressure was put on the button. Without warning, there was a slight popping sound and the little piece of metal span free, firing like a bullet straight into Katrina's nose. As Jennifer's belly bulged forwards into the new space, Kat fell backwards in shock and mild pain, disappearing under the table.
Anna blinked.
"Katrina? Are you okay?" She asked, frowning. A moment later, the chubby girl clambered back out from under the table, nose and cheeks both bright red, but for different reasons. She mumbled an affirmative, returning hurriedly to her seat. Anna still looked slightly concerned, but Jennifer interrupted.
"Mommy, I need some new clothes." She said, frowning down at the second item of clothing she'd ruined that day. "Can we go shopping tomorrow?"
Anna looked at her daughter.
"Of course, dear. We can go right after school if you want." Her smile faltered as she remembered something. "Oh, bother. I need to go food shopping as well."
Suddenly, Kat saw an opportunity.
"Uh, why don't I come too? I need to buy some new clothes too, so you can drop me and Jen off at the clothing shop, go food shopping, then come back and pick us up once you're done." Seeing the uncertain look on Anna's face, she pressed on. "It's a really safe shop too, cos only kids go there to buy things. We could pick the clothes ourselves, and I'll help Jenny choose sensible things. It'll be much quicker, as well."
She looked hopefully at her best friend's mom.
11211221121211111121112112.title: Pop!

choices: The two sleep peacefully...
Someone can't get to sleep...
112112211212111111211121121.content:
"Well, alright then," Anna nodded, "just as long as you stay at the shop until I come get you."
"We will!" The girls chirped, grinning at the thought of spending some extra time together.
"Good, I'll let your mom know," she smiled at them, getting onto her feet, "why don't you two get washed up while I get Katrina some pillows and blankets?"

Jenny awkwardly slid off her chair, cradling her stomach in her messy little hands as she and Katrina trudged back up the stairs. Jenny took even longer getting up each step, feeling rather drowsy from her huge dinner, but Katrina wasn't faring much better with her stomach ache returning.

As Katrina watched her friend wash up her face and hands in the bathroom sink, she had to wonder just why she was so casual about needing new clothes like this. Was it because her mother was so lax about her size? Did she not care how big she was, or was she just totally oblivious to it? Though, knowing how...well, ditzy she can be, it was probably the latter.
Not that Katrina minded, after all Jenny was her best friend and one of the sweetest people she'd ever met, and her moments of naivety were rather amusing.

Once the two girls had cleaned up and brushed their teeth, they headed into Jenny's bedroom. The larger girl discarded her ruined clothes, dumping them carelessly on the floor. Once again, Katrina felt obliged to look away as her friend changed into her night clothes. Though she managed to get a glance of her polka-dot panties, and she could swear they were smaller than before.

Jenny's nightshirt fit even worse on her, not even bothering to cover her stuffed middle and just deciding on the chest. Her pants were quite snug on the thighs and backside, but she managed to pull them up with some effort. The exertion caused her face to redden and she panted a bit, but she succeeded.

As Katrina decided it was safe to turn back around, a realisation slammed right into her thoughts.
"Oh no, I don't have any pyjamas with me!"

"Oh, it's alright," Jenny grinned, plodding over to her drawer and bending into it. The dark-haired girl had to look away as her friend's shirt slid up, revealing some bare back. She re-emerged with a nightshirt and pants and held them out to her friend. "Use mine!"

"O-oh, um, thanks," Katrina managed a smile, taking the pyjamas and turning herself around to change. She had a feeling Jenny might be looking, causing her own face to turn red, but figured that she probably thought nothing of it.
These night clothes had probably been in Jenny's possession for a long time, they really didn't seem like they'd fit the growing girl. But Katrina seemed to fit into them fine, minus a bit of tightness in the pants and a sliver of her stuffed stomach on show.

"There, all better," Jenny chirped, her cheeks dimpling from her smile. Katrina couldn't help but return it.

Just then, Anna emerged from the hallway, a sleeping bag and pillow in her hands. "Here we are, Katrina!" She had to clear some space on the messy bedroom floor, but there was plenty of room for it.
"Thanks," Katrina smiled gratefully, settling herself down into the covers as Anna helped Jenny get all comfortable in her own bed.
"Is there anything else you need?" She asked with a smile.
"Um, no thanks," the dark-haired girl shook her head. Jenny simply let out a long yawn.

"Alright, don't stay up too late now," Anna grinned, exiting back out, "night girls!"
112112211212111111211121121.title: Yeah, why not.

choices: The two of them get ready for school.
Later, at school...
1121122112121111112111211211.content:
The following morning the weak winter sun woke Katrina early, shining through the window and onto her face. She opened her eyes, squinting against the brightness, and sat up, checking the time with bleary eyes. The pink clock on the wall showed half six, far too early for any respectable person to be getting up. Still, she was awake now, and she wouldn't be able to fall asleep again now.
Reluctantly, she slipped out of the sleeping bag and got to her feet, swaying slightly as her body woke up. Jennifer was still deep in slumber, her loud snores making it obvious without even turning to check. Rubbing her eyes, Katrina plodded through to the bathroom to go splash water on her face and get cleaned up, leaving Jenny to sleep a while longer. Once she was done, she headed back into her friend's room.
There was nothing to eat around, so she couldn't go have breakfast; maybe they'd get something on the way to school or something. Her rounded stomach was growling hungrily, already forgetting how much it had eaten yesterday, earning it and angry glare; if it wasn't for her tummy's constant complaints, she could be as skinny as the other girls at school. It was smaller than it had been last night, and no longer peeked out from under her borrowed pyjamas, but was still noticeably round and soft. It bulged gently outwards like she'd hidden a cushion under her shirt, slightly stretching the fabric with its abundant girth.
Irritably, she tore the top off and flung it to the floor, annoyed by its selfishly modest size. She should just get dressed now, while Jenny was still asleep; it'd save her doing it later. She pulled off the pyjama bottoms and grabbed her clothes from yesterday, quickly starting to dress for school. The shirt slipped on fine, but as always the pants were a struggle as they got stuck first on her thick thighs, then beneath her butt. It was at times like now, as she hopped up and down in the middle of the room, dragging pants over her plump cheeks, that she half-wished to have a shape more like Jenny's. The vast majority of the bigger girl's weight was around her waist, forming flabby rolls and love handles. By comparison, Kat looked like an exaggerated pear; her hips were wider than her shoulders, her butt was round and soft, and her thighs rubbed together with every step. Then again, she'd hate to have a belly with fat rolls all the time; it was bad enough getting them when she sat down!
Finally, with a great burst of effort, she managed to get the pants on and buttoned. It had taken nearly ten minutes, but that was better than some mornings she'd had. Once or twice, she'd even been late for school because she was busy trying to squeeze into an especially stubborn pair of jeans.
She turned to check on Jenny, and felt her heart skip a beat or five as she suddenly spotted two wide eyes staring right at her. Slowly, the apparently-awake Jennifer heaved herself into a sitting position.
"Hi." She said simply, and Katrina blushed yet again as she wondered how long the bigger girl been watching. However, a second later her question was answered as Jenny pointed at her pants with one chunky finger. "You're meant to put your panties on first, you know." She said, and giggled.
1121122112121111112111211211.title: Pants problems

choices: Anna stops for breakfast on the way to school
The girls go straight to school
11211221121211111121112112111.content:
Katrina sighed, shaking her head at herself as all tension left her. She was honestly worried about Jennifer?
"W-well, we'd better get dressed," she explained, tugging her clothes to adjust them, "we've got school soon, y'know."

"Mmhm," Jenny nodded, then put a plump hand to her belly as a rather loud growl emerged from it, "breakfast too!"
"Yeah, that too," the smaller girl nodded, looking down at her own modest middle. She heard Jenny's bed creak with relief as its large occupant slid off it onto her feet and slowly toddled toward the door. Then something clicked. "Hey Jenny, you're not limping."

"Huh?" The larger girl grunted, then Katrina assumed she was trying to look down at her feet but she could see nothing but her own jutting tummy, "Oh, yeah, my leg's all better."
"Good, that's great," the dark-haired girl smiled, watching her friend return to her journey to the bathroom. Truth be told, she missed Jenny at school yesterday, and was actually happy to see she'd be there.

Once Jenny eventually returned, face cleaned and more awake looking, she began slowly tugging off her night clothes. Katrina, once again, politely turned and waited.
Jenny had also shrunk since last night, but it wasn't exactly noticeable, especially not by herself. She grabbed a large looking shirt and some sweatpants out of her drawer, assuming they'd hold her until the two girls went shopping later. The shirt, looking more like a nightgown on a smaller girl, managed to just barely fit over her large tummy, and the sweatpants just about fit around her waist, despite a bit of a tight squeeze. She'd let her mom help with her shoes later.

"All ready," Jenny announced brightly, another impatient grumble emerging from her tummy.
"Okay," her friend nodded, turning back around to face her, "time for breakfast?"
"Uh-huh!" Jenny rubbed a thick hand on her middle, "I hope mom made pancakes again!"

As Katrina followed her big lumbering best friend out to the stairs, she had to wonder if she remembered she cleaned out the kitchen almost entirely yesterday...
11211221121211111121112112111.title: The two of them get ready for school.

choices: First period
Later, at lunchtime.
112112211212111111211121121111.content:
Jennifer had not been at all pleased to discover that all they had for breakfast was tinned fruit salad, but Anna had stepped in with promises of a stop at McDonald's on the way to school and a crisis had been averted. Presently, Anna led the two girls out the house and locked the door behind them, and Katrina set off down the road to school.
"Where are you going?" Asked Jenny curiously. Katrina turned.
"To school, where else?" She said, confused.
"But why are you going down the road?" She queried. "The car's right here."
Kat looked bemused.
"Haha, very funny. Come on, or we won't have time to get breakfast." She said impatiently.
Anna walked over to the car and unlocked it, opening the door for Jenny then turning to her daughter's friend.
"Aren't you coming in the car, Katrina?" She asked.
The dark haired girl was stunned; she'd heard of laziness, and often practised its arts herself, but never had she seen it on this scale.
"But the school's right there!" She said, glancing down the road. Indeed, their school was just at the end, only a few hundred metres away.
"Yeah, but Jenny doesn't much like walking." Anna said mildly. "You may as well get in."
Almost reluctantly, the eight year old walked over and got into the car, strapping herself into the backseat next to Jenny. The bigger girl smiled at her.
"Cars are much better than legs, you know Katty." She said as if it was obvious. The slimmer girl just nodded, stunned at just how lazy her best friend was. Although they'd been on loads of sleepovers together, she'd never come on a school night before and thus hadn't realised how far the fat girl would go to avoid exercise.
Shortly, they pulled into the drive-thru of McDonald's, and Anna ordered them a large egg roll each. She then pulled up outside the school so they could finish before they went in. A few minutes later, once they'd finished their unhealthy breakfasts, both girls climbed from the car.
"Thanks Miss Wattson. I had a lot of fun." Katrina said honestly.
"It was my pleasure." Said Anna, equally genuinely. "Remember, you can come over any day, we're always happy to have you."
She went to put up the window, then slid it down again, remembering something important.
"Oh yeah, I'll pick you both up here after school to go shopping, okay? Love you Jen, have fun!"
And with that, she drove away.
112112211212111111211121121111.title: Breakfast

choices: Class begins, and Jenny's tummy isn't satisfied...
School carries on...
1121122112121111112111211211111.content:
The two girls waddled through the school gates and into the playground, Jenny licking residue of egg roll off her fingers and wiping them off on her trousers. Since they were dark ones no one would tell there were any stains. Katrina simply kept to her side, feeling a sense of security next to her larger companion.

A few girls from their class spotted them and flocked over, wearing looks of concern as they greeted the two. Of course most, if not all of them, were on various levels of fatness.
"How're you feeling, Jenny?" One asked.
"Is your leg all better?" Another enquired.

"Oh, yeah, it's all fine now," Jenny grinned, slightly lifting up the large leg in question. In all honesty, amongst her binging and Katrina staying over, she'd totally forgotten about faking her healed injury until it was brought up earlier.

"Good," the first smiled, then turned her attention to the dark-haired girl, "did you tell her about the play?"
Katrina nodded. "Yup, she knows. She wants to be an angel."
"Yup!" Jenny giggled.

Understandable looks of concern spread amongst the group of girls. All aside from Jenny, who kept her trademark cheek-dimpling grin. They weren't worried about Jenny screwing up the play; she was quite a dedicated worker when she had motivation, and she seemed pretty pumped to do this. Their concern was directed toward the use of cables and ropes, and the possibility of her breaking a leg. And a few more things.

Nonetheless, they kept their worries secret. Jenny was incredibly nice and they all considered her a friend.
"Sure, that sounds good," The girl managed a grin.

A little while later the bell sounded, and the girls marched off toward the school building, and inside to their classroom. Jenny and Katrina took their seats next to each other, the larger girl letting out a sigh of relief as she relaxed into the too-small chair, her backside spilling over the sides and squishing out from under the backrest, and her stomach sticking into the desk.

A few minutes passed and their teacher, a young woman named Miss Johnson, walked in with a smile on her face. She really enjoyed working with the kids.
"Good morning class," she greeted the class, who returned the favour in mostly bright voices, "now before we start, if you haven't chosen what you want to do for the nativity play yet you'll have till the end of the day to decide. Before you leave for home, I'll be giving out forms for your parents to sign, with information about rehearsals and such. Alright?"

The kids all nodded, some mumbling a yes.

Miss Johnson nodded back, smile unwavering. "Good, now then..."
1121122112121111112111211211111.title: First period

choices: Go to Her Next Class
Skip to Lunch
11211221121211111121112112111111.content:
A few minutes into Miss Johnson's lesson, a small, almost inaudible growl escaped Jenny's large belly. She looked down at it with mild surprise before giving it a quick rub.

"How could you still be hungry, you just ate!" Jenny thought before an even louder growl escaped.

Jenny began to blush as every few minutes a growl would be released, each one louder than the last. Eventually, the desperate pleas for nourishment was picked up by Katrina's ears.

Katrina leaned over towards Jenny as another hungry growl was released from the depths of her large pot belly.

"Jenny, is that your belly?" Katrina whispered.

"Yeah, I'm super hungry and I don't know why. I just ate and look how big my belly is" Jenny said. To emphasis her point, she gave her belly a quick bounce before it growled again.

Jenny thought that her belly was this big because she stuffed it with food. In reality, her belly was bigger than she was used to because of her binging over the weekend. She got fatter and her stomach stretched out. Now with the little bit of food she had for breakfast, her belly wasn't happy. Her belly gave another growl as if to confirm this.

"Jeez, Jenny, you need to calm that belly of yours down" Katrina commented.

"I know. But I think food is the only way, and Miss Johnson doesn't let us eat in class" Jenny said as a very loud drawn out growl was released from her fleshy insides.

Jenny reapplied her hands to her growling belly and began to rub it in futile attempts to calm it down. As the lesson continued the growls turned to roars and became much longer and louder. The students began to glance at her every time her stomach growled and Jenny was sure the teacher was able to hear it too, but continued to ignore her hunger. Jenny just continued to blush and rub her belly as it became louder and louder. By now, Jenny could see and feel her belly quake as the powerful growls twisted through her insides and into the outside world. She sat there and listened to the monotonous roaring of her belly until the bell finally rang, signaling the end of the class.

"Now class, don't forget to sign up for the play before the end of the day" Miss Johnson reminded as the students filed out.

Jenny held her belly as a very powerful growl ripped through her belly and sighed.
11211221121211111121112112111111.title: Class begins, and Jenny's tummy isn't s...

choices: Lunch carries on...
After school...
112112211212111111211121121111112.content:
Jenny was more than a little relieved when the lunch bell finally rang. She hurried toward the playground with as much speed as she could muster, which wasn't exactly saying much due to being slowed by her immense size and weakened by her ravenous hunger.
Two long classes had passed, and although a chocolate bar (or a few) from the vending machine had satiated her during the quick between-class break, it merely delayed the inevitable.

Katrina followed after her friend, keeping a steady pace behind her. Although she was much smaller than Jenny, the previous day's activities had done quite a number on her as well, and she found herself huffing and puffing along with the larger girl once they'd found a spot outside.

The two girls sat with one another on a bench, usually large enough to hold three people, four in a pinch, but the combined rears of the greedy girls filled it up completely.
"Phew," Katrina sighed in relief, happy she could take a rest, "why were you, huff, in such a hurry, Jen?"
"Because," Jenny wheezed, her much rounder face pink from the taxing effort, "I'm so, hungry!"

Indeed, her large stomach, barely contained in her shirt, let out another demanding snarl, leading its owner to affectionately rub it before reaching into her backpack. Katrina followed suit, and the two girls fished out matching brown paper bags. Jenny's mother cleverly purchased some extra McDonalds meals for the girls' lunches, though she wasn't sure what Katrina would like so hers contained a standard quarter pounder and fries, as well as a cup of cola. Jenny's, however, had a few quarter pounders, a couple of tubs of fries, and a litre bottle of Fanta.

As she tore into the unhealthy lunch, Jenny giggled with greedy delight, unaware that her friend was staring with total shock at how huge her meal was. She was used to her best friend being such a huge eater, but sometimes the sheer amount she would stuff into her at once totally amazed her. How could she have such an immense appetite?

But nonetheless, as she reminded herself, that's who Jenny was, and she was her best friend and one of the sweetest, and possibly the dimmest, girls she's ever met. So she paid it no more mind and dug into her own lunch.
112112211212111111211121121111112.title: Skip to Lunch

choices: Later, in class...
Jenny needs more lunch! To the cafeteria!
1121122112121111112111211211111121.content:
Katrina thoughtfully munched her way through her hamburger. Cold though it was, it still had plenty of calories, as did the mildly wilted fries. And, truth be told, the meal didn't taste that bad. It was, at the very least, better than eating carrot sticks. At the rate Jenny was eating, though, she doubted that her larger friend could even taste the food. She was very nearly inhaling it. Katrina was a bit more of a methodical eater, trying to savor what flavors there were in a McDonalds hamburger. All around her, the playground sprung to life as kids tossed their lunchboxes aside and sprang into action, tossing balls, running around, and generally screaming their heads off. She looked, swallowed a bite of burger, then glanced at Jenny- and she suddenly wondered, Is that who I'm going to be?

Katrina knew how much trouble her best friend had with a lot of things. She couldn't tie her shoes, she got tired from walking, well, anywhere- and that was all because of food. And Katrina was no stranger to food. She pulled the Quarter Pounder away from her face and eyed it suspiciously. Are you gonna make me like that? And she thought further. What if Jenny gets even bigger? What if I get even bigger? A cartoonish image of her and Jenny as huge round blobs floated through her mind. And she was gripped, for a moment, with a strong desire to leave Jenny behind, to run and dance and scream with the other kids. To cast away her friend for the group, to become assimilated. And she nearly did, too. She shifted her ponderous weight forward, bent forward to put her feet on the ground-

-and the seam at one side of her jeans split. It was a small split, nothing anybody else would notice, but it brought her back to reality. If she went and ran now, it would only get worse. And then she thought about it again. She looked again at the other kids, and realized that, though they went through the motions of having fun, none of them looked really happy. Most of them actually looked angry- shouting, pushing, shoving the smaller children out of the way in their haste to get the basketball. And then she glanced again at Jenny- and she was struck by something amazing. Jenny radiated contentment. She was on her last hamburger, her face and shirt were stained with ketchup and soda, and she looked like the happiest girl in the world. The cartoonish blobs floated through her head again. Katrina smiled, leaned back, kicked her chubby legs, and decided that if that was to be her future, she wouldn't especially mind.
1121122112121111112111211211111121.title: Lunch carries on...

choices: In the cafeteria, Jenny orders as much as she can.
They don't make it in time for the bell! Jenny will starve...
11211221121211111121112112111111212.content:
Her reverie was shattered, however, by Jenny's greasy fingers scraping uselessly at the bottom of her last carton of french fries. "They're all gone?" Jenny asked, confusedly. "I thought these were supposed to be extra large!" Katrina shook her head, a smile spreading across her face at the extreme dimness of her bigger friend. "They were, Jenny, you just ate them all." Jenny stared at the carton, a look of monumental confusion evident on her fat face. "But how can that be? I'm still starving!"

Katrina's eyes nearly bulged out of her head at that. Four burgers, three extra large fries, a bottle of soda... and she's still hungry? To be fair, Katrina could also go for a little more food- her own stomach, though tiny in comparison to Jenny's, was still large- but she wasn't about to tell herself that. Jenny, meanwhile, was whining and rubbing as much of her big gut as she could reach. "In fact, I'm starving! How will I survive the day?" Melodramatic much? thought Katrina with a smirk. To her friend, however, she said, "Well, why don't we just go get something from the cafeteria?" Jenny looked at her, amazed beyond belief. "Katrina, you're a GENIUS! Why didn't I think of that?" Katrina was about to respond with a snippy remark but was soon enveloped in a very fleshy hug. "Come on, then! We've got to get more food!" cried Jenny, taking off at a rather fast clip for a girl on the cusp of 300 pounds. "Fine, I'm on my way!" said Katrina, wobbling along just behind. She hoped they would get there before the bell rang.
11211221121211111121112112111111212.title: Jenny needs more lunch! To the cafeteria!

choices: Focusing on not-food is harder than it seems...
She just barely makes it to the end of the day!
112112211212111111211121121111112122.content:
The massive girls waddled their way toward the school building, in hopes that they would make it in time for Jenny - and perhaps Katrina too - to grab a second helping of lunch before class began.
Both girls were used to moving at a leisurely snail's pace, so anything as much as a powerwalk's speed would leave them sweaty and breathless in minutes.

They entered the doors to the main building, with the cafeteria doorway just in sight. They paused to huff and pant, cheeks red and brows sweaty as they regained their breath.
"Almost...there..." Katrina panted, she and her friend taking another few steps toward the door.

Drrrrrrriiiiiiing!

Halfway through the main hall, though, the bell went off, signifying the end of lunchtime.

"Oh no..." Jenny whined, clutching her enormous middle, "Not yet...I'm gonna starve...!"
"No, it'll be okay," Katrina huffed, trying to assure her friend while regaining her breath from the exerting walk, "Just...try not to think of food until school's over?"
"But, that's hours away!" Jenny complained, looking down at her tummy as it gave an impatient growl of hunger.
"I know," her smaller friend sighed, "But it'll help, trust me!" Katrina knew she could last the next few hours without a snack, but Jenny wasn't used to going more than an hour without a huge snack. Or two.

Jenny sighed and nodded, before the two girls waddled to their classroom. Clearing her mind of food would not be easy, given it was nearly all that ran through her mind all day long.

The two girls made it to their desks and sat down with heavy thuds, happy for the rest.

Both girls prayed that Jenny would make it...
112112211212111111211121121111112122.title: The Final Stretch

choices: Luckily, Katrina is able to sneak off on a snack-finding mission.
The teacher calls her out- how embarrassing!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221.content:
It had been just under five minutes, but Jenny's belly was already growling. There was little she could do to hide it- the top of her belly pressed up against the underside of her desk, which only served to magnify the sound. She leaned forward a little bit, but then it was in danger of falling out of her shirt, and she didn't need that in the middle of class. She attempted focusing on the lesson to distract herself. It was only math, there shouldn't be much of a problem there, right?

"...alright, class, if John cuts three cakes into six pieces each, how many does he have?"

Drat, thought the ponderous girl.

And so it was throughout the lesson. Every time she tried to focus, some thing or other would always bring her back to her main vice and current distraction, food. Worst made her think of wurst, pi made her think of pie, and so on and so forth until it was just unbearable. After two hours, her belly was growling nearly constantly, and no amount of rubs or quiet words of encouragement could silence it. A few of her classmates had started to snicker at her. Jenny blushed.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221.title: Focusing on not-food is harder than it seems...

choices: They hold her till class ends!
It's not enough! Or she gets caught! Or whatever you want!
11211221121211111121112112111111212211.content:
Katrina looked over to her large friend with a frown. Not only was she being distracted by Jenny's gonstantly grumbling belly, but it was hard to see her in such discomfort, especially with the other kids giggling about it.

A particularly sharp growl caused Jenny to wince and clutch her poor enormous middle. "Oooh...!"

She couldn't keep watching like this - she had to do something.

She adjusted herself in her chair, hearing a soft jingle in her pocket. Change! Of course! She had money for spare snacks if she wanted them.

Though, it seemed like Jenny needed them right now.
It was time for a plan.

Katrina raised her hand. "Can I go to the bathroom, please?"
The teacher nodded. "Go on, be quick."

She nodded and headed out of the classroom... and eyed up the vending machine down the hall.

With a few plunks, coins disappeared into it, and out came chocolate bars, bags of chips, soda cans, the whole deal.

It look every coin in her pockets, but she got a sizeable mid-class snack for Jenny ready. She stuffed them in her pockets and returned to class, trying to remain inconspicuous.

Once attention was off her, she slipped the candy from her pockets and sneaked them to her friend. "Here..."

Jenny whispered a rather grateful thank-you and quietly, but excitedly, dug into her snacks.
11211221121211111121112112111111212211.title: Luckily, Katrina is able to sneak off on a snac...

choices: In Detention, Jenny's belly is just a constant growl and Katrina's is too
After School in a Snackless House
112112211212111111211121121111112122112.content:
As Jenny just started to indulge in her snack, the teacher turned around and saw the hungry girl with a snack in her hand.

"Jennifer!" the Teacher said sternly, making the poor hungry girl jump and cause her shirt to ride up on her tummy a bit.

"What have I told you about eating in class?" the Teacher asked her.

"That I can't..." Jenny said as she looked down at her belly.

Katrina just face palmed. For someone so hungry, you think they'd eat faster than that.

"Exactly and you Katrina will be joining your friend here in detention after school for lying and sneaking out of class to get her food, which you know is against the rules.

"Yes," She said looking down.

"Good, now where were we? Ah yes" the Teacher started back up again.

"I can't believe your belly put us in detention!" Katrina said as she put her head down on her desk.

"I'm sorry" Jenny said as he belly absolutely exploded with a monstrous growl that shook her belly and lifted her shirt all the way up.

Today was just not their day!
112112211212111111211121121111112122112.title: It's not enough! Or she gets caught! Or wha...

choices: Fast Food for Fat Girls!
Something else?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Later on, the final bell of the day had rung, and boys and girls poured out of the school doors, excited to get home after a long and likely dull day.

Aside from Jennifer and Katrina, anyway. Thanks to the former's careless snacking during class and the latter's sneaking out to encourage said snacking, the two chubby girls had landed themselves in detention.

Their teacher was at her desk checking classwork, and Katrina had decided to make a start on her homework. Jennifer, on the other hand, was occupying herself with doodles of chocolate bars, cakes, pizzas, burgers, ice cream... all the things occupying her thoughts. Her belly, not pleased with being deprived of said treats, voiced its displeasure with yet another grumble. One that shook the wobbly dome of flab that was squished against the desk.

"C'mon Jenny," Katrina whispered, trying to sound encouraging, "do some work, it'll take your mind off food."
The larger girl sighed and drummed her plump fingers on top of her empty middle. "But I'm too hungry to work..."

Katrina rolled her eyes, silently wondering why she expected any different. Jennifer was always rather dim, but she wasn't an idiot - she could work really well when her mind was set on it. The problem was that her mind was almost always set on food, and her being hungry all throughout the school day didn't make that much better.
Though, that's not to say she was immune to such plights. Being a rather chubby girl herself, Katrina just managed to catch her train of thought before it drove into Candyland. An impatient growl sounded from her own belly, not nearly as bad as Jennifer's but enough to remind her that this was the time of day she'd stop in the candy store for a snack on the way home.

Both girls felt hunger gnawing at them, and needed a way out fast...

About ten minutes into detention, both girls perked up as a knock came at the classroom door.
"Come in," the teacher called, and who should walk in but Jennifer's mother! Both plump girls' faces lit up with a mix of surprise and relief.
"Hi there," the woman smiled, which turned into a quizzical frown to see her daughter and her friend still sitting at their desks, "I just came to pick up Jennifer and Katrina, and noticed they weren't outside."
"Oh, yes," the teacher said, and got up to approach her. The girls watched curiously.

"I caught Jennifer snacking in class, again," the teacher continued in a hushed voice, "and Katrina had sneaked out of class to encourage it."

Jennifer's mother shook her head a bit, knowing this had to be either the fourth or fifth time her daughter was caught snacking during classtime. Though, this time she had an excuse, she thought.
"That's more my fault," she admitted, "I meant to do some grocery shopping after picking them up, since there's almost nothing in the house. So I had to send Jenny in rather... underfed."

The teacher blinked. 'Underfed' wasn't exactly a word she'd use to describe the overweight girl, not that she'd admit that out loud.
"I see," she said after a moment, "well, it has been a while since the last time, and she has been working hard in class lately... I suppose I can let it slide this one time."
"Thank you," she smiled warmly, "it won't happen again."
"You're picking up Katrina as well?"
"Yes, her parents won't be out of work till later on."

The teacher nodded and turned to address the girls. "I've decided to cut you girls' detentions short... provided this doesn't happen again."
Both girls' chubby faces lit up even more, and they nodded vigorously. "We promise!" They chirped, though as much as they meant it, there was no guaranteeing their bellies were in agreement.
Their teacher looked satisfied. "Okay, off you go then."

Jenny got up and followed her mother, with Katrina right behind her.
"Are you girls okay?" The older woman asked, voice laced with concern.
"We're starving, mom!" Jenny complained, her belly proving it with yet another flab-shaking grumble that made her tug her shirt down again. Katrina just nodded, sharing her best friend's suffering.

"Well, how about we stop for a little something before we go shopping?" Her mother suggested, smirking as she knew what their answer would be.
The girls, knowing full well what 'a little something' meant, grinned widely. "Yes please!"
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Lucky Escape

choices: The two girls, hungry despite themselves, hunt for snacks.
The two girls decide to go play outside for a bit.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
What Jenny's mother referred to as "a little something" was only "little" if you considered tigers weak and Einstien stupid- which is to say, it was very, very large. First on the list for the two starving girls was Burger King- seeing as they had had McDonalds for lunch already, a slightly different shade of hamburger would be a welcome change of pace. When they arrived at the drive-in, Jenny requested five hamburgers, eight McNuggets, and a large fries, all to be washed down with a large Fanta. Katrina, wishing to be slightly more prudent, ordered only two hamburgers, a Filet O'Fish, but gave in to a large fries and a large Sprite. The girls recieved their food- plus a medium fries for Mom- and dug in eagerly, getting salt and sauce everywhere in their haste to consume.

Boy, thought Jenny's mother, I hope that's enough food to hold them until we reach Taco Bell.

Fortunately, it was, and the order at Taco Bell was somewhat less extravagent- a plate of nachos and two burritos for Jenny, and just two tacos for Katrina, who was feeling rather full. Again, the backseat was transformed into a scene of flying food bits, and Jenny's mother, satisfied with the two girl's mid-afternoon snacks, drove home. It certainly looked like the girls would be sated until dinner arrived, but, as she eyed Jenny's bloated belly sticking out from under her sauce-stained shirt, she wasn't so sure.

Once they got home...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Fast Food for Fat Girls!

choices: Another game?
After a while, Jenny gets hungry again...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
The girls had finished their mid-afternoon snack just about five minutes before Jenny's mom pulled into the driveway. She took another glance at the girls in the back - Katrina was already unbuckled, and decided to help Jenny out of her seatbelt since the larger girl was lazily fumbling with the latch.

Once everyone was inside, the first thing on Jenny's mind was what she was having for dinner. Even after all that fast food, she still had eating on the brain. Her next thought, hinted by a small yawn, was having a nice nap to rest off her snack until dinnertime.

"Why don't you girls go play outside?" Her mother suggested, nodding to the sliding screen door in the kitchen leading to the back yard. "I'll let you know when dinner's ready."

"Outside...?" Jenny mumbled, not exactly looking fond of the idea.
Katrina, however, looked much more enthused. It'd be good to work off all that food, and remembering her concerns about Jenny from yesterday, a bit of exercise might do her fatter friend some good. Though she'd never admit it out loud.
"C'mon, Jenny," she insisted, taking her friend's plump hand and walking toward the door, "it'll pass the time!"
Jenny, too sleepy to work up a counterargument, just waddled outside after her best friend. "O-okay..."

The sun was starting to set outside, but it was still a nice climate. Warm enough to play, but cool enough so the large Jenny wouldn't break into a heavy sweat just from being exposed to natural light.

"What do you wanna play?" Katrina asked, deciding to let her friend choose. It was her house, after all.
Jenny smacked her lips as she tried to think of a game that didn't require food or a controller. And considering how gluttonous and lazy she was, this was a challenge in itself!

"...hide and seek?" She decided.
Katrina nodded, satisfied with that. It was a proper game, at least. "Okay, you can hide first, if you like."
Jenny nodded, and looked around for a place to hide while Katrina turned around and started counting out loud.

Right away, Jenny decided on the tree in the corner of the yard, by the fence. She waddled over to it and pressed her back up to it, facing the fence and away from Katrina.

"Ready or not, here I come!" She heard Katrina call.

Deciding she had some time to relax, Jenny slid onto her backside, leaning against the tree and getting nice and comfortable. Her full belly, the warm sun and the gentle breeze made for a heavenly combination. So much so that her eyes began to flutter shut...

Grrrrrrrrgle...
Her belly let out a gurgle, signalling its beginning to digest, now that its owner was all relaxed.
"Urp!" A burrito-smelling burp erupted from her mouth, lessening the pressure inside.

"Found you!" Katrina's cheerful voice jolted Jenny back awake, emitting a startled burp.
"How'd you...find me...?" Jenny mumbled, rubbing her eyes with her plump fists.
"Your tummy gave you away," her friend giggled, "I could hear it from way over there!"

After giving Jenny a hand to stand up, which took plenty of effort, Katrina inhaled to catch her breath.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Hefty Hide & Seek

choices: Dinner is still a long way off/ skip to talent show auditions
Go to the Store first. Jenny really needs new clothes.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
The two girls spent the rest of the afternoon playing outside, which was something Jenny seldom did, as her physique demonstrated quite clearly. The game of hide and seek was rather one sided as Jenny's stomach would gurgle loudly every time she was hiding. This time how ever, it made a different sound.

*Grooaaaarrrrlll* went Jenny's large belly. The beastly rumble was so strong that large visible vibrations shook her belly hard enough to raise her shirt all the way up it's vast expanse. Before Jenny could even blush and rub her tummy, Kristina appeared, with a victorious smile.

"Ha! I found you again! You're making this too easy...Uh Jenny why is your shirt up?" Kristina asked.

"It's no my fault, my tummy growls against my will. It's like it has a mind of its own. And as for my shirt..." Jenny started before an even more powerful growl emerged from the depths of her gut. One so powerful, it popped the button clear off her pants and sent it into the neighbor's yard. "That's why" she finished as she held her tummy trying to keep it from wobbling too much.

Kristina just stood in awe at the display she had just witnessed. She had never seen a belly do that before.

"Wow Jenny, you must be starving if your belly can do that. It's almost talented actually." She said.

"Talented?" Jenny said. She never considered her large appetite to be a talent but none the less she accepted the complement.

"Yeah and in fact the School Talent show is coming up, you should try out for it with your belly!" Kristina suggested.

As weird as it sounded that might actually not be a bad idea. Actually it could be kinda fun. The more she thought about, the more she liked the idea.

"You know what? Why not! I'll give it a shot!" Jenny said.

Her belly then gave another deep growl that jiggled her belly.

"First though, I need to eat!"
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: After a while, Jenny gets hungry again...

choices: The talent show arrives- what will Jenny do?
Katrina attempts to convince Jenny to not participate in the show.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
And eat Jenny did, consuming her way through meal after bigger, more frequent meal as time wore on. By the time the Talent Show arrived, a month and a half later, Jenny had managed to balloon up to an even larger size than anybody had ever though possible, and now was having real trouble fitting into anything other than stretchy pants and very large shirts, desks, and even, in some cases, doors. She was now getting winded with even simple exertions like walking to class, and in some cases after especially strenuous exercise (e.g. gym class, where she would sometimes be forced to walk around the gymnasium upwards of twice) would need Katrina's help to waddle around. That was the other new thing- Jenny's enormous size had caused her to develop a very pronounced waddle. Of course, she had always waddled to some extent, but now she was so large that it was very difficult to do anything like walking normally. Luckily for her, though, she always had her faithful friend Katrina by her side.

Katrina, though, had blimped up quite a bit herself. Though nowhere near the extent of Jenny, her large friend's extensive eating habits had rubbed off on her somewhat. Her clothes, which she stubbornly refused to replace, had grown quite tight on her- though she refused to acknowledge it, all of her shirts left quite a bit of her pudgy belly on display for all to see, and her pants were not much better. Still, though, next to Jenny an elephant would look skinny, so her fattened frame went largely unnoticed.

At present, it was the day before the talent show, and Jenny and Katrina were weathering their way through the final class of said day. Jenny was, surprisingly, faring somewhat better than Katrina was- after a few more incidents involving food in class, Jenny's mother had had words with the principal and any administrator she could find, the result of which being that Jenny could eat snacks wherever and whenever she wanted. This was very good for her, as she could at least attempt to sate her cavernous stomach throughout the day, but it also meant that she couldn't focus very well- the opening and consumption of packets of food used up a large portion of her already dim brain. Katrina, however, was not so lucky, having been granted no exemption from the rules. Her smaller-yet-still-large belly was grumbling quietly at her, demanding more to eat. The fact that Jenny was rather messily eating Cheetohs was not helping matters.

The teacher droned on, and on, and on, and soon Katrina found her mind wandering to the talent show tomorrow. To tell the truth, her suggestion to Jenny to use her belly as talent had been nothing more than a joke. However, her friend, with characteristic dimness, had latched onto the idea, and had treated all the food she had inhaled as "training" for the show. At first, Katrina had cheered her on, a little amused at her friend's antics, but as the date of the show drew closer and Jenny showed no signs of slowing down she began to get a bit worried. Is she actually going to it? she wondered, imagining the ridiculousness of the scene. She could feel her insides turning over themselves as she imagined Jenny on the stage, belly rumbling away, and the crowd of students laughing wildly. As the seconds ticked by, this image seemed more and more likely, and more and more terrifying. Could it really happen?

Katrina was rather suddenly startled out of her reverie by the rustle of fingers on plastic. She looked over at her fat friend to see that Jenny had polished off yet another huge mound of snack food- usually enough to hold her through one class. However, a quick glance at the clock revealed that the class was not even halfway over.

"Katrina," whispered Jenny extremely loudly, "I'm out of snacks."

Katrina sighed, and prepared to heave her sizeable body out of the seat to get more, but Jenny interrupted her.

More specifically, Jenny's belly interrupted her, letting out an extremely loud, desk-rattling growl that sent a tremor through the floor.

And, as if it couldn't get any worse, her chair finally succumbed to the eight-year-old bulk sitting upon it, collapsing to the floor with a mighty screech.

Jenny, rather than being embarrassed, simply patted her massive belly, so large that it was sticking out between a shirt and pants that together contained enough fabric to make a parachute, looked at Katrina, smiled, and said, "I'm ready."

Katrina cringed.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Jenny's Got Talent?

choices: The Students Love Her
The Students Laugh at Her
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Today was the day of reckoning for Jenny. Katrina's joke had been lost on Jenny and now she was going to actually go through with this. Despite Katrina trying to convince Jenny that this was a bad idea, Jenny was going to do this. At present, Jenny was behind stage, her great hungry belly laying out before her. By sheer luck she was put down as one of the last students to go. That meant poor Jenny had to wait with a terribly hungry tummy. But for her that wasn't a bad thing.

*GRRROOOOWWWRR* went her belly as the dome of flab shook uncontrollably. She smiled and patted the large dome of flab. This was the one time she didn't mind being hungry. In fact, it was better this way. The hungrier she was, the better her act would be.

In the audience meanwhile, Katrina was in a state of dread. Her best friend was going to make a complete fool of herself in front of the entire school and it was all her fault. She wasn't sure if she could muster the strength to even watch the display that she was going to do. She just slumped back in her seat and waited for her act to happen.

Back behind stage, Jenny's belly's growls continued to increase in volume and frequency until her name was finally called. Walking out onto the stage she waved at the applauding students and smiled.

"Hi, I'm Jenny" she started as the applause died down. "And as most of you know, I get really hungry a lot. So for my act, I thought I would use that. When I get hungry, my belly growls really loudly. And thanks to Katrina," she said as she looked at her. Katrina just slumped in her chair more. "I was made aware that it was a talent I possessed. So without further a do, the act shall begin" She said as she placed the mic right by her belly button. She began to think of all sorts of delicious food. That's when her belly began it's mega growls of insatiable hunger.

*Ru...Ru...RU...RUUURRRGGGRRRRLLLLL* her belly screamed and writhed ferociously and rippled the entire surface visibly. The sound echoed throughout the entire room at an almost deafening level. The growls continued to poor out from her before her belly settled down enough for her to speak.

"Thank you" she said to a stunned crowd.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: The talent show arrives- what will Jenny do?

choices: Jenny's mom thinks nothing of how fat her daughter's gotten
Jenny's mom is getting concerned about her daughter's size
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
After Katrina helped Jenny back to her feet and into a new chair, the smaller friend bit her lip as she made her decision. She would have to talk Jenny out of participating and embarrassing herself.

For a moment, she wondered if her best friend's dim head could even comprehend embarrassment, considering she almost looked proud of herself for crushing a chair with her weight.
Then she shook the thought away. That was her friend she was thinking about, she couldn't be that way!

As another rumble emanated from Jenny's enormous middle, Katrina blinked and raised her eyebrows as an idea came to her. She could save her best friend's already shaky reputation in school for sure!

-

Later on, after class had ended, Katrina helped Jenny out from the classroom and into the hallway. As she saw her best friend's great bulk wobble and bounce from waddling along, she swallowed and put her plan into action.

"Jenny," she spoke up, "maybe entering the talent show isn't such a good idea...?"
Jenny paused and turned her head to face her, blinking curiously. "How come? It was your idea."
"I know," she sighed, regretting making such a joke to her rather literal friend, "but...you know why your belly rumbles, right?"
Jenny blinked again, and nodded. "It means it's empty."
"Right," Katrina nodded, "and there's probably gonna be a lot of kids participating. What if you get put lower down on the list?"
Jenny tilted her head, obviously not following. Katrina managed to suppress a frustrated sigh, and put her hands on the fatter girl's shoulders.
"It means you'd have to keep your tummy rumbling for a long time!" She suddenly yelped, voice full of distress. "You'd go so long without food! Not even the tiniest snack! They'll keep you hungry for ages!"

After a few moments of staring into her eyes, Katrina could almost hear the cogs starting to turn in Jenny's head as realisation dawned on her. A gasp escaped her, and even her tummy's next rumble sounded rather surprised.
"Wow, you're right!" She agreed, putting her pudgy hands over her tummy. "Gosh, I never thought about that. Thanks, Katrina!"

The fat friends exchanged a tight hug - as tight as their bellies squishing together would allow - and Katrina had a smile on her plump face. Not only because her plan had worked, but because she had saved her innocent best friend from potential humiliation and starvation. Besides, what would her mother think, hearing about her daughter in such a way?

The two broke the hug after a while, and Jenny rubbed her hands on her massive belly with an innocent grin on her face. Katrina knew that look - the thought of training for the talent show was totally pushed out of her head. All she wanted was to get home, relax, and have a nice snack. Or two. Or three.
"C'mon," Katrina smiled and nodded to the front door, "let's find your mom."

Jenny nodded and happily waddled toward the doors, albeit slowly and with her friend's help.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Convinced

choices: Clothes shopping for Jenny- can she find anything to fit?
Another day, another broken chair- what will the school do about it?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Jenny's mother drummed her fingers somewhat impatiently on the steering wheel. For one thing, her daughter seemed to be taking longer and longer to get out of school every day, for some reason, and for another her and Katrina's first round of after-school snacks were getting cold, and she didn't want forty dollar's worth of McDonald's to go to waste. And, on top of that, she had left dinner cooking on the stove so it would be done sooner- she knew Jenny didn't like to wait for dinner, after all. All the same, though, it was really inexplicable why she was taking so long to get out of school. And, as any proper mother would do, she started to worry a little bit. Perhaps she's feeling lethargic...She's always asking for food, could it be... A sudden, very worrisome thought struck her. Could it be that I'm not giving her enough food?

Clearly, Jenny had inherited her incredible dimness from somewhere.

Finally, after what seemed like quite a wait, the door to the school swung open and Jenny and Katrina, the former leaning heavily on the latter for support down the stairs, making their ponderous way to the car. A wave of relief flooded over Anne as she saw that they were alright.

Soon after that, the two girls heaved their way into the car, panting and wheezing heavily, and almost immediately tore into the bags of fast food sitting in the backseat. "How was your day?" asked Anne over the sounds of chewing.
"Grrf," said Jenny, mouth full of hamburger.
"Mmm," agreed Katrina, mouth similarly full of fries.
"Great!" said Anne, and they drove off for home.

Later, when they arrived home, the girls wasted no time in extracting themselves from the confines of Anne's minivan and hurrying as fast as two fat girls could into the house to watch some television. Anne watched them head in, noting a few small tears in Jenny's pants as she did so- clearly, they needed to go shopping again. Katrina's clothes seemed equally ill-fitting, although that wasn't exactly her place to determine- Katrina, as much time as she spent at her house with Jenny, wasn't her daughter. Even so, as she set about cleaning up the detrius of the girl's first of many afternoon snacks, the only feeling in her head was pride.

Her little girl was growing up!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Jenny's mom thinks nothing of how fat her d...

choices: It fits! ...just barely
No good...she might have to be measured for a special order!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
The rest of the afternoon went rather normal. Jenny and Katrina helped themselves to some more snacks while watching TV, and Katrina's parents came to pick her up in the evening. Just after dinner, of course.

At the kitchen table the next morning, Jenny was sat enjoying her regular breakfast; two bowls of chocolate cereal, four sausages, two scrambled eggs, poptarts - three of each flavour - and a glass of orange juice.
Anne, sitting across from her. simply had a bowl of cereal and a cup of coffee.

Jenny was about to chomp into her fourth poptart, when a thought occurred to her. She was sure this wasn't Saturday, but her mom didn't get her up for school so she had a nice sleep-in. She was even still in her PJs!
"Hey, mom?" She spoke up. "Don't I have school today?"
"Oh, I'm going to take you clothes shopping today," Anne smiled and stroked her daughter's soft hair, "so no school for you today, honey."
"Yay!" Jenny chirped, taking a large bite of her poptart. "Is Katrina coming?"
"I'm afraid not, sweetie," Anne admitted with a shake of her head, "but you can show her your new outfit tomorrow!"
"Oh...okay!" Jenny grinned, and returned to gobbling up her breakfast.

-

Later on, just past noon, Anne and Jenny were travelling through the mall. The store Anne got her daughter's clothes had a branch here, and they specialised in clothes for...fluffier kids. And by some sort of irony, it was situated just across from the food court, where Jenny always got a nice snack after getting her new outfits.

As if on queue, Jenny's huge belly, which peeked out from beneath her top, grumbled and shook her shirt higher up, revealing her belly button.
"Mom, can we get something to eat?" She asked, using her free hand to tug her shirt back down. "Tummy says it's lunchtime!"
"I know, cupcake," Anne smiled, and led Jenny on to the store, "you can have whatever you want as soon as we're done, okay?"
"Okay," Jenny sighed quietly, her appetite not wanting to wait for later. This was a conversation that transpired every time they came to get Jenny new clothes, and the outcome was always the same. Her mom putting cupcakes into her head didn't help the matter at all.

Jenny's tummy let out another unhappy growl, and all its owner could think was how grateful she was for Katrina talking her out of entering the talent show. She could never take being so hungry for so long!

Inside the store, Anne led Jenny through to the girls' section, which was full of cute, brightly coloured outfits. T-shirts, jeans, shorts, coats and all other types, made to fit more husky children. Big&Tall stores were already quite successful, and providing one for kids proved to be no different, with other kids differing in age and chubbiness picking out clothes with their parents.

Jenny waddled ponderously behind her mom, getting rather red in the face from tiredness, and halted as she spotted something - a pink t-shirt with a cute blue dinosaur on it was hanging on a rack, with a pair of flower-styled shorts beneath it. Her round face lit up with approval.
"Mom!" She panted, and pointed a sausage-like finger to the outfit. "Can I have that shirt and those shorts?"
Anne smiled and led her over. "Of course you can, sweetheart. Just need to try them on."

Anne reached deep and pulled out the largest sizes of shirt and shorts. She had no worries about the clothes being too big for her daughter - her own mother always said that it's always best to have clothes too loose than too tight.

Clothes draped over her arm, she led her gluttonous daughter over to the changing rooms and got into a booth with her. She was always happy to help her dress, knowing Jenny always had a little trouble getting it done herself.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Shopping Trip

choices: Over lunch, Anne fumes and Jenny consumes.
Anne is having none of it- she demands the store tailor new clothes immediately!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
"Alright, Jenny! Lift those arms!"

With a sad wheeze and a similarly depressed-sounding grumble from her cavernous belly, Jenny did so, slowly raising her fat-laden arms into a position somewhat above her head. Anne cheerfully plopped the god-knows-how-many-X's on over them and pulled it down. "Alright, now on with the shorts..."

Jenny, groaning disappointingly, put her hands on the wall for support, squishing her great stomach up against it as she did, and slowly leaned to one side, lifting one foot off the ground. Her mother quickly put one leg of the vast-seeming shorts around Jenny's fat leg, and, when she leaned the other way, did the same to the other foot. She pulled the shorts up as high as they would go, then stepped back to survey her daughter's new look.

"Mommy," said Jenny, shifting uncomfortably from the effort of standing up unsupported, "I think it might be too small." For little Jenny, this was something of a record- not only had she outgrown the largest size in the largest-people-serving store in town, she had also come to this realization very quickly- under a minute, so it seemed.

Anne clucked sadly. "Seems so, Jen-Jen- looks like we'll need to look somewhere else."

Really, any person with more processing power than a Chiclet could have seen that these clothes were woefully unequipped to handle the enormous quantities of flab that comprised most of Jenny. The shirt pinched her quite noticeably under the arms and left quite a lot of pale belly on display for all to see. The shorts, meanwhile, hadn't even made it halfway up Jenny's colossal thighs- although, in reality, Anne could barely tell the shorts were even on, so massive was Jenny's big belly. She had to check about three times to make certain she did. "Well, these clothes certainly won't fit- better take them off now."

Taking clothes off of somebody as large as Jenny was just as much of a process as putting them on, just in reverse, Soon, though, Jenny was re-clothed in what she arrived in, though none the worse for wear- all the walking she had done to get to the store and all the standing she was doing in the dressing room was taking quite a lot out of her. "Can we go get lunch now?" she whined, another gurgle signalling that she was quite hungry indeed.

"Of course, dear," said Anne, ushering her forward, but stopped short of actually leaving the room, so struck was she by an incredible realization.

Jenny, noticing her mother stopping, stopped as well. "Mom? Mom, what's wrong?"

But Anne didn't notice, so deep in thought was she. The clothes she had just tried on Jenny were the largest the store had, and they didn't fit at all. But the clothes Jenny was wearing now did fit- at least somewhat- and they were a size or two smaller! Clearly, the store was cheating her!

Of course, the actual explanation was most likely that Jenny's having worn the clothes for a while stretched them out to better fit her size, even though she had most certainly outgrown the number printed on them, but logic was a bit too complicated for either of them. So, steaming with rage, Anne just pushed her excessively large daughter onwards.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: No good...she might have to be measured for a s...

choices: Anne calms down and takes Jenny back in to ask for some tailored clothes...
Of course! Just get Jenny some adult clothes and alter them!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
"Thank you," Anne nearly barked at the poor McDonalds cashier, startled as the irate mother lifted her order. The plastic tray was covered with burgers, boxes of fries and chicken nuggets piled onto it.

That was Anne's last stop in the food court, after visiting the Burger King, KFC and Subway with some large orders from each. By the time Anne had arrived at her table and set the tray down, it was teeming with bags and boxes filled with burgers, fries, sandwiches, cookies and milkshakes. All of which were being shovelled into Jenny's greedy mouth with gusto!

Any onlookers watching the portly girl, either with surprise, concern or just plain curiosity, went unnoticed by the two of them.

"There you go, my princess," Anne managed a smile and stroked her daughter's hair, before sitting down to her own burger. Her first bite was aggressive, fuelled by her outrage from the store.

This is ridiculous! How dare that store try to rip off my poor little girl like that! I swear, all this 'size zero' nonsense is everywhere!

"Mom?" Jenny's little voice broke Anne out of her mental rant, and she focused on her daughter. "Are you okay...?"
Anne noticed that there was concern and fear in Jenny's eyes. Had she been glaring her way this whole time?
"Oh, I'm fine, honey," she sighed, forcing a smile, "I just need to think of where to find you new clothes."

As doting as ever, Anne grabbed a napkin and started dabbing stains of sauce and cookie crumbs off her daughter's pink, chubby cheeks. Her anger began to subside as she tended to her 'little' girl - how could she stay mad when looking at that cute little face?

Though, there was indeed still the matter of her new clothes...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Huffing and Stuffing

choices: Anne's idea is a good one- clothes are soon found.
No luck here either- does Jenny need a plus-size ADULT store?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Mother and daughter ate together, the latter much more than the former. But they differed in more ways than simple age and appetite. Though they both were rather dim compared to the general public, this dimness manifested itself in rather different ways- Jenny was actually a reasonably creative and intelligent thinker, just very, very slow. Anne, on the other hand, was fairly fast, but generally misinterpreted the world around her and preferred to have orders given to her rather than think of something alone.

Thus, when, mid-burger, she had a good idea on her own, it was much like watching a cruise ship crash into a small island- slow, and with great drama. So deep in thought was she that her greasy hamburger slipped through her fingers and landed on the tray with a mushy platch.

Jenny looked up, confused, mouth still full of her third burrito, and asked, "Mom, what's wrong?"

Anne took a minute to answer, still processing her brilliant plan, but finally managed to say, "Jen-Jen, we can still get you clothes!"

Jenny, by now on to her fifth hamburger, asked, "Really? Where?"

Anne, somewhat flustered, reached for her own hamburger and said, "Don't worry about it, sweetie-pie. When you finish up I'll show you."

___________________________________________

"Wow!" said Jenny, huffing slightly from the walk from the food court, "I've never been in here before!"

The local Kohl's was really nothing to be impressed with- it was merely a clothing store, after that, and even then not a terribly outstanding one. Still, it was the first time Jenny had ever had occasion to visit it- and, to her rather dim brain, it was most certainly something to be in awe of.

Anne led her onward, passing the jewelry, the men's clothing, the changing rooms and, to her surprise, the kid's section.

"Mommy, don't I need to get clothes there?" she asked, raising her arm with some effort and pointing a fat finger at the kid's section.

Anne smiled. "No, dear, you've become much too...grown-up for things like that! Just come on, we'll be there soon."

But, to the very lardy Jenny, going just that little bit farther to the women's section felt like ages. As soon as she saw a bench she heaved herself upon it, wheezing heavily, ignoring the rather ominous creak from the wood below her. Anne patted her lightly on her sweaty head and went off in search of clothes.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Of course! Just get Jenny some adult clothes an...

choices: All this trying on clothes is working up Jenny's appetite...
They visit another store?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Anne walked around the women's section, in search of clothes. She wasn't worried about leaving Jenny sitting on the bench - her poor little girl was exhausted, and needed a nice long sit after all that lunch and walking.
She kept her eye out for more bright, kid-like clothes. This may have been the adult area, but Jenny didn't need to dress like one just yet.

Though, as luck would have it, something caught her eye. A pink shirt with a blue, cartoon horse on it. Just across from that were bottoms - most notably, a pair of flowery, aqua-blue shorts. Eerily similar to the outfit from the other store, but since that was the outfit Jenny wanted, no doubt she'd be happy with her mother's decision.

Anne grabbed the larger sizes of each from near the back of the rails, the shirt stopping short of looking like a dress on the slightly tubby woman. She headed back to her daughter, who had gotten most of her breath back, and held up the outfit.
"How does this look, dear?" She asked with a smile.
Jenny's sweaty, reddened face lit up with wonder as she beheld the clothes. "Wow, I like them! But, do I have to try them on?" She added, a hint of reluctance in her voice.
Her mother nodded sadly. "It's the only way to know we've got the right size, honeybun. C'mon."

Draping the clothes over her shoulder, she held out her hand for Jenny to take. Her daughter lifted a plump hand and grabbed it as she, with some help, hoisted her heavyset frame off the bench and waddled toward the changing rooms.

-

"Okay, Jen-Jen, arms up again!" Anne smiled.

With another tired wheeze, Jenny hauled her flabby arms up again, just barely over her head. Anne slipped her old shirt off, allowing her titanic belly to bounce free once more, and slipped the new one on, tugging it down over her middle.

"Okay, now for the shorts." She smiled.

Jenny practically flopped against the wall, hands pushed and stomach squished up against it, and just barely tilted to lift a fat-laden leg. Anne slipped one leg of the shorts past her daughter's plump foot, and did the same when she tilted the other way before pulling them up. Luckily, the waistband was stretchy elastic, so no button required!

Anne took a step back. "Okay, sweetie-pie, let me see how you look."

With some effort, Jenny pushed herself off the wall to stand upright, and turned herself to let her mother have a look. Her new shirt fit perfectly, albeit a little snug around the tummy. There was a bit of pinch around her flabby upper arms, but not nearly as much as the shirt from earlier.
The shorts were also faring much better. They made it up past her thunderthighs, and despite being a little tight around the rear, the waistband wrapped neatly and comfortably around her. Her legs were a little squished by the shorts legs, but she didn't seem bothered by it, judging by the lack of adjusting herself.

"That looks much better," Anne chirped, grinning happily, "how does it feel?"
"Comfier," Jenny huffed, totally honest despite her exhaustion and hint of frustration, "can we get them, mommy?"
"Of course we can, cupcake," Anne nodded, and gently lifted her daughter's flabby arms, "now, let's get these off so we can pay for them."

Jenny just heaved another tired sigh. This shopping trip was the most exercise she had gotten all week!

Jenny waddled unhappily after her mother as she selected a few more outfits of the same size and checked out. She had really done quite a lot today, lots of standing and lots of walking, made especially worse without Katrina's support- Jenny had really grown quite used to having somebody to lean on as she lumbered around, and not having that made all the lumbering quite a bit more difficult. Jenny would have jumped for joy, had she been able to jump.
