Both families go on vacation together!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
As soon as Anne got home, she got right to work. She grabbed her phone and called up the number of Katrina's mother's phone while starting to wash the many, many dishes that held Jenny's breakfast that morning.

After a few minutes, a woman's voice spoke up on the phone. "Hey, Anne! How are you?"
"Hi, Suzie," Anne smiled as she cleaned, "I'm fine thanks, how are you?"
"Can't complain," Suzie responded.

Anne and Suzie were about as close as their daughters were. Not long after Jenny and Katrina met, their parents decided to meet up and get to know one another. The moms really hit it off, and they often met up to chat and gossip about goings on. It helped that Suzie absolutely adored Jenny, and treated her like a second daughter whenever she saw her. The feeling was mutual for Anne and Katrina.

"Well, summer vacation for the girls is coming up, so I was just wondering earlier if Katrina would like to spend it here with Jenny? Like a long sleepover?"
"Oh, really?" Suzie sounded rather up for it. "You sure you can handle her?" She joked.
"I've done fine so far," Anne chuckled, "I'm only around the corner, so if something happens you can come over right away."
"True," Suzie muttered, "and me and Patrick could always do with a little alone time."

Anne couldn't help but smile. She was on board! "So, what do you think?"
"I'm certainly for it," Suzie agreed, "but I'll have to ask Katrina first, of course. Though, I think I already know what she'll say."
"Oh, definitely," Anne snickered, "let me know what she says right away."
"Will do. Still up for meeting up while the girls are at school tomorrow?"
"Naturally, see you then."
"Yeah, bye!"

Both mothers hung up with smiles on their faces.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Making Arrangements

choices: The next day, the girls discuss summer plans.
Skip to the summer- fun galore, but no beach bods for these two...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
"Mom, I'm home!" Katrina called, tossing her backpack onto the couch. "Is dinner ready?"

"Of course, Katrina," replied Suzie from the kitchen, "but didn't Jenny's mom give you something?"

Katrina thought over the absolutely massive meal she and Jenny- well, mostly Jenny- had demolished together, and answered, "No, just a little snack."
________________________

"So, Katrina," Suzie said, watching Katrina work her way through a rather hefty second helping, "how was it with Jenny?"

"Oh, it was fine," Katrina answered, in between bites of chicken. "We didn't do too much, but we had fun doing it."

"Would you be up for a whole summer with her?"

Katrina stopped mid-chew and stared at her mother with wide eyes. "Wait- really? You mean it?"

Suzie smiled warmly. "Of course I mean it. Jenny's mom called today and suggested the whole thing!"

Katrina's whole face broke out in joy. "Can I really do that? Oh, Mom, you're the BEST!" And, stuffing one final bit of chicken in her mouth, she went over to envelop her mother in a- for Suzie, anyway- rather squishy hug. Clearly, Jenny's rubbing off on her...
_________________________

A few streets away, a similar scene was taking place, save that both the meal and the consumer of said meal were quite a bit larger. Jenny, having consumed her dinner roughly three hours ago, at 5, was now busily engaged in eating her supper. Anne rationalized giving her this meal as being better than waking up for a midnight snack, which Jenny had had to do a few times before. Of course, eating twice in one evening would certainly add pounds to Jenny's already pound-laden frame, but Anne would prefer not to consider that thought, preferring to pay attention to the present and little else. At present, though, was the issue of summer.

"Jenny," Anne said, sipping from a mug of tea as her daughter devoured some potatoes, "you don't have any plans in particular for the summer, do you?"

"No," Jenny grunted, her mouth full, "nothing really."

"Then you'll be pleased to know that I've invited Katrina to come stay with us!"

Jenny stopped eating- a rarity for the large girl- and looked at her mother, very surprised. "Really?"

Anne sipped her tea again. "Why, yes- I figured it would be more fun than sitting around here all by our lonesomes."

"Oh, Mom, you're AMAZING!" Jenny's chubby face broke out into a wide grin, and she stood to give her mother a hug. Or tried, anyway- her fattened frame was rather too large for her to hoist off her two chairs by herself. Anne got the message, though, and was soon enveloped in an incredibly flabby hug. Hopefully, Katrina will be able to help out a little...or a lot...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: A whole summer with her best friend? How could ...

choices: After school, the girls let their parents know what they decided!
Something makes them change their mind...?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
The next day, as soon as Jenny and Katrina saw each other, all they could was squeal and gush to each other about spending the entire summer together. Anne had the widest smile on her face as she pulled away from the school.

"What about the beach?" Katrina suggested, standing at Jenny's desk while the larger girl was getting a much needed sit down.
"Isn't that really far?" Jenny huffed, a small bead of sweat on her brow.
"Not if we take your mom's car," Katrina pointed out, "plus, we can get a nice swim to fight the heat."
"Oh, and there's ice cream!" Jenny realised, greedily licking her lips, "And ice lollies and barbecues!"
Katrina rolled her eyes and smiled. Typical Jenny. "Yup, those too."

At lunch, Katrina attempted to continue the conversation, but nothing was going to keep her best friend from stuffing her face.
"We could always go to that waterpark out of town?" She suggested, hoping her friend was at least listening, "Or maybe there's that carnival coming in a few weeks?" She grinned.
Jenny noisily chewed and slurped at her oversized - though regular to herself - lunch. "Uh-huh." She mumbled.

Katrina rolled her eyes once again, wondering why she expected different. Though, talking about summer vacation and seeing Jenny stuffing her face reminded her of the summer a number of years back, when she overheard her dad saying something about 'fat camp' and mentioning her name. Thankfully, nothing else came of it.

"The carnival sounds fun though," Jenny burped, which surprised Katrina - she had been listening! "But what about the beach?"
"We can go to the beach any other time," Katrina pointed out, "besides, remember the last time we went? All the rides and the petting zoo?"
"Yeah!" Jenny grinned, licking her face clean of stains and crumbs, "And the corndogs and burgers and stuff!"

Katrina nodded, accepting the answer, and held out her hand. "Carnival?"
Jenny slapped her plump, food-stained hand on top. "Carnival!"
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Big Girls with Big Plans!

choices: Summer looms, but the school year just drags on and on...
The carnival arrives- but is Jenny mobile enough to go?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
"Hello, girls!" Anne said cheerily as Jenny and Katrina piled into the back. "How was your day?"

"Good!" huffed Katrina, who Anne noted was now absolutely bulging out of her clothes. "We decided what we wanted to do!"

"Oh, that's wonderful!" Anne said, setting the car in gear. "What is it?"

"We...wanna...go to the....carnival," wheezed Jenny, still trying to catch her breath from the short walk to the car.

"Yeah!" added Katrina, eager to help her much fatter friend. "There are lots of rides, and booths..."

"and hamburgers...and hot dogs...and fries..." huffed Jenny, starving despite having just cleaned out the vending machine. Her enormous, nearly-on-the-floor swell of belly growled in concert with the thoughts from her food-addled brain.

Katrina's own smallish belly, rather out of character, growled too. She clutched at it nervously. "Um...where are our snacks?"

Anne, reminded of her forgetfulness, smacked herself in the forehead. "Oh my goodness, I completely forgot! I'll get you two something as soon as possible, alright?"

And, swearing under her breath, she kicked the van into a much higher gear. Jenny's belly, displeased with this change in its rather set eating schedule, growled again. Anne swore lightly under her breath and hit the gas.

_________________

"Oh no oh no oh NO! Damn!" Anne shouted, not bothering to keep her swear words under her breath any longer.

"What's wrong?" Jenny said, sitting her fat self up with difficulty. Katrina, too, sat up and stared out the window.

Anne slammed her hands on the steering wheel in disgust. "They're doing construction! We're stuck in traffic!"

Jenny's fat face took on a look of sheer panic. "W-What? Does that mean I won't get food?"

Anne, fed up with the traffic and unhappy with her daughter's rather stupid question, nearly blew up, but luckily Katrina stepped in just in time. "Don't worry, Katrina! I saved some of my lunch, do you want to have it?"

And, in front of Jenny's hungry eyes, Katrina rummaged around in her bag and produced a largeish tin lunchbox, from which emerged a sandwich, a small bag of chips, an apple, and a few assorted chocolate bars. "I know it isn't much, but I hope it'll help!"

"Thank you so much, Katrina! You're the best friend ever!" Jenny cried, tucking into the sandwich. Katrina smiled broadly.

Yes, thank you Katrina, Anne thought, staring at the construction ahead. Katrina had single-handedly saved the situation, both staving off Jenny's hunger and keeping Anne from losing it. She marveled at the girl's incredible self-control- she was certainly large enough to have eaten that rather meager lunch, but had held off for Jenny's sake. It was truly a marvel.

However, as the cars before her barely budged, Anne wasn't sure if, even with the lunch, they could make it there. She could only hope.

___________________

"SERIOUSLY? What the HELL is going on today?"

Jenny's distressed belly growled again, causing the fat girl attached to it no small measure of discomfort. "What is it now, Mom? Are we here yet?"

"Well, yes, but look! The place is closed!"

Jenny looked out the window again. A large CLOSED BY ORDER OF THE HEALTH DEPARTMENT sign looked back, denying her all hope of eating. Jenny leaned back, setting her enormous belly flopping, and closed her eyes. "Mom, what are we gonna do? I'm starving to death!"

Again, Anne was on the verge of blowing up, but again, Katrina saved her.

"Jenny, look! Have you ever seen an Alaska license plate before?" Katrina asked, pointing eagerly out the window.

With difficulty, Jenny leaned her fat self over to look. "No..."

"And look! There's one from Alabama!"

"Oh...Hey! I see one from New Jersey!"

"You big silly, those are everywhere! Look for something interesting!"

"...Connecticut?"

Katrina sighed. "I suppose...Whoa, California! That's pretty far away!"

And, as the two girls managed to distract themselves from food, Anne thanked her lucky stars that Jenny had a friend like Katrina. She certainly wouldn't mind having her for the summer. Not one bit.

__________________________

"Ahh, finally," grunted Jenny through a mouthful of greasy hamburger. "I was so hungry!"

"Me too." Katrina replied, mouth similarly full. "But we made it!"

"Yeah!" Jenny said, swallowing. "Together!"

"Together!" replied Katrina cheerfully. The two girls were silent for a moment as they stuffed themselves further. Finally, Jenny broke the silence.

"Katrina?"

"Yeah?"

"You're a great friend."

"...you too, Jenny."

"I can't wait for summer."

"Me neither."

Anne smiled.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Off to the Carnival!

choices: Summer vacation finally starts!
Something affects the girls' plans for the summer...?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Summer was a matter of weeks away, and Jenny and Katrina couldn't wait for their vacation to arrive. The main topic of conversation for the two girls was the carnival, and what they would do there.
On Katrina's mind was going on the rides, visiting the petting zoo and seeing the attractions, while Jenny was focused on the hamburgers, fries, corndogs, ice cream, and all other kinds of unhealthy carnival food for her to chow down on.

But what they were most excited for was the vacation-long sleepover at Jenny's house. The two best friends would be together all day every day! They could go shopping, snack, watch TV, eat, play games, get fast food, everything!

But, they still had weeks of class, lunchtime, emptying vending machines and avoiding gym class to do. And the more excited the girls got, the longer classes seemed to take.

That's not all that was affected. Jenny found herself eating more than her usual supply of snacks in the morning and afternoon, her appetite seeming to have gotten bigger from being excited for the carnival food.
Even Katrina had gotten in on snacking. It was as if her best friend's sheer gluttony was rubbing off on her even more!

The weeks went by, and the girls ate and fought boredom every hour of the way...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Time Goes By So Slowly...

choices: After a bit more waiting, the carnival arrives!
A problem with the plan?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Finally, after what seemed like eons, epochs, and millennia all rolled into a few weeks, the last day of school reared its ugly-yet-welcoming head on every schoolchild's calendar. Every classroom was humming with excitement, buzzing with idle chatter, and grumbling with hunger.

Alright, perhaps that last one was just Jenny's classroom. For, as expected, Jenny was hungry. Although, in truth, Jenny was never not hungry these days.

With the thought of greasy carnival food weighing heavily on her mind, Jenny had been tearing her way through everything edible she could find, and it most certainly showed on her very encumbered frame. Her enormous belly had, naturally, gained the bulk of this weight, now actually touching the floor of Anne's minivan and growing inexorably closer to touching the floor from standard chair height. As such, whatever pants she wore were nearly always incapable of holding her, and, without fail, rode down constantly, even as her shirt rode up. For that reason, Jenny's belly was often let free from its pant-based prison, free to jiggle its pale mass in the open whenever possible.

Even without her great belly to deal with, her pants were still often rather strained by her enormous butt, now well overflowing two chairs and, if not checked, most likely soon needing a third. (Of course, her growth, considering her present size, was very unlikely to ever be checked.) Her chest, too, was growing quite a bit, and, as she was still rather too young for a bra, could often be very clearly seen beneath her enormous-yet-tight shirts. Above all that, her multiple-chinned face had grown somewhat as well, her cheeks only growing fatter in her body's search for places to store fat.

With all this fat came significantly decreased mobility-yes, even farther than it already was. It sometimes took Katrina upwards of half an hour to help Jenny to the van after school. Katrina had not tested this, as she didn't wish to strain Jenny unduly, but she was rather sure that her big friend couldn't walk a single step without her. This was worrying, especially considering Katrina's own rapid outward expansion.

She really had taken after Jenny, in more ways than she would like to think. Katrina had done her best to ignore her own gain, but when ever single pair of pants she owned ripped open after being pulled over her sizable rear she was forced to confront it and upgrade her sizes. Still, her own doughy belly jiggled significantly with the slightest movement, a constant reminder of its existence. It sat heavily in her lap, and hung quite a ways over her waistband when she stood. Her rear hung similarly over the sides of her single chair, jiggling often as well. Luckily for her, though, she always had Jenny to make her look the picture of thinness.

Katrina looked at Jenny now, unable to focus on the teacher's final drone of the year. Her fat friend was sweating, panting somewhat with the exertion of sitting still. She honestly wondered whether Jenny could make it to the carnival. She was, after all, so very large...

No! Katrina thought to herself. I can't give up on her. They were, after all, best friends, and Katrina intended to make sure her friend was happy. They would make it to the carnival. That was indisputable.

School next year, though...

"...alright, boys and girls, that's it for you. Have a great summer!" said Miss Forsythe cheerfully, and the final bell of the year rung in tandem with the student's cheers. Katrina grabbed Jenny's fat-bloated hand.

"You ready?"

Jenny smiled.

"You bet."
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Summer vacation finally starts!

choices: Look for some rides!
Time for some carnival food at last!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
The annual carnival was only a day's wait away, since it was held on the first weekend after the start of summer vacation. Jenny and Katrina were nothing less than excited the whole morning, wiggling in their seats and gushing over the things they would do and see.

Katrina squealed about the different rides they'd go on, like the roller coaster and bumper cars. Jenny practically drooled over the thought of how many hamburgers, fries and corndogs she could get herself. But both of them agreed that the petting zoo would be the best part, given their shared love for animals.
Anne just watched with a loving smile from the front seat as she drove her daughter and her best friend to the huge field outside the city, where the carnival took place every year.

Though, Anne and Katrina shared a similar worry about Jenny, specifically about her mobility. She had become a lot more lethargic lately, and a lot more dependant on help to move around. Would she be okay spending an entire day outside...?

Though, the noise of the carnival penetrating the car filled the girls with new excitement, and they just grinned widely at each other while Jenny's mom looked for a parking space.

Thankfully, it didn't take long for Anne to get parked, and it was a pleasantly sunny day with a cool breeze meaning it wasn't too hot or cold. She and Katrina got out of the car and flocked over to Jenny's side, and she wrapped her arms around her daughter's immense middle. Her fingertips barely touched from how wide she had gotten. Katrina had her hands up, ready to support her large friend's descent.

"Ready, girls?" She asked.
"Uh-huh," Katrina said. Jenny simply gave a slow nod.
"Okay," Anne whispered, and steeled herself, "one, two, three!"

In a combined effort, Anne and Katrina safely lowered Jenny to the ground, leaving all three of them huffing and panting from the effort. Jenny just adjusting herself and being lifted down tuckered her out for the moment.

After about ten minutes of everyone (mainly Jenny) getting their breath back, Anne led the girls over to the entrance to pay for the admission. Katrina, of course, helped her friend slowly lumber every heavy step of the way.

Once inside the fairgrounds, both girls' faces lit up as they looked around the loud, bustling carnival. What ever could they do first!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Carnival Time!

choices: Jenny spies an advertisement for an eating contest and is keen to enter.
Jenny is approached by a boy- a nice one, no less.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
"Okay," said Anne, stowing her wallet safely in her purse, "where to?"

Jenny, red-faced and drenched in sweat already from the short walk from the car, was, naturally, starving, and the intoxicating smell of fried foods was not helping matters. "Mmm...let's go get-"

"Jenny, LOOK!" interrupted Katrina, pointing off into the distance with one chubby finger. "Have you ever seen such a big roller coaster?"

Jenny glumly turned her many-chinned face in the direction her friend was pointing. "No, but-"

"Come on!" Katrina interrupted again, too overwhelmed with joy to realize how hungry her best friend was. "Let's go check it out!"

There was nothing Jenny wanted less than to go check this roller coaster out, but, dependent on Katrina as she was for movement, was forced to lumber along beside her thinner friend. Hopefully, the bigger girl thought to herself, we can get a snack on the way. Her constantly-starving leg-enveloping sheet of fat stomach growled in agreement.

________________

"Uh-oh..." Katrina said, studying the sign at the gate of the roller coaster intently, "it looks like you can't go on! See," Katrina pointed at the height indicator, "you're not tall enough."

Jenny could only wheeze. The walk across the fairground had tuckered her out even more than the walk from the car, especially since she hadn't eaten in over half an hour. Anne was, unfortunately, not around to provide anything for her; in the interest of being a "cool mom," she had left the two girls to their own devices. Which, it seemed, were for Katrina to ride the roller coaster while Jenny sat on a far-overburdened bench and starve- and that with gusto.

The bench creaked beneath Jenny's great weight. She looked wistfully at a taco stand a few feet away- it was so, so close, yet there was no way for her to reach it alone. Her belly flopped out of the vast, sweat-drenched dress her mother had placed her in today and brushed gently against the grassy ground below. Yet, despite all of that, Jenny was content.

She had a friend, a loyal, excellent friend who helped her with every single task she needed to do. She had a mother, a loving, doting mother who provided her with all the food she could possibly eat. She had everything she could ever need.

Although, as her growling belly was keen to remind her, she could use a little more.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Look for some rides!

choices: Katrina isn't so sure that's a good idea...
Well, Jenny IS hungry, and there's a great prize for the winner...why not!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Jenny smacked her lips helplessly as she continued to stare at the taco stand. She could really use a double taco supreme, with extra cheese. Or maybe two? Or three...?

Another pleading grumble from her poor empty belly caused her to pry her eyes away. The stand was so far away, at least for such a barely mobile mass of ten year-old girl, and it was just taunting her now.

Though, this caused her to lay her gaze on an intriguing sight. On the side of one of the stalls was a large poster advertising an eating contest! It was right in the carnival that day, and according to the time, sign-ups for the kids' division were still open!

She hadn't read on about what the prize was, because that wasn't what grabbed her attention.

'Eating contest'. The two words danced around Jenny's head, specifically the first word. One of her favourite words. After all, the only thing that could rival hanging out with Katrina in terms of Jenny's favourite thing to do was eating!

Another growl sounded from her belly, though this one sounded...determined.

"You thinking what I'm thinking?" She muttered under her breath, and giggled as she rubbed her great ground-kissing dome of stomach.

She couldn't wait to pitch the idea to Katrina when she got back!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Weaponized Gluttony

choices: They've reached the contest- and just in time, too.
The two girls run into Anne on the way- and they forgot to ask permission...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
"That...was...AWESOME!" Katrina shouted, face flush with the exertion of excitement. "Oh man, if you had been able to go on that roller coaster you would have had such a good time. It was SO COOL!"

Jenny giggled. "Katrina, you're silly...but look at this!" She pointed at the advertisement with one flabby arm.

"Hmm?" Katrina walked closer to it, giving it a careful once-over. "EATING CONTEST," it read in large, cartoony letters across the top. Katrina turned to Jenny in mild astonishment. "Wow, really? That's awesome!"

"Yeah, yeah, just keep going!" Jenny said, rubbing her ravenous belly uncomfortably. It was encroaching on 45 minutes since she last ate, and she was really starting to feel it. Katrina shook her head and read on.

"We want YOU!" she read aloud, for Jenny's benefit. "The 33rd Annual Burton's Corporation Eating Contest is happening TODAY, and we need YOUR participation! Be at Firth Field by 11:30 sharp for all you can eat hamburgers, pizzas, fries and pies! Whoever consumes the most of all three categories will take home our GRAND PRIZE! A $500 check..." Katrina turned to Jenny again, mouth opened wide with shock. "and a lifetime supply of Burton's Brand Doughnuts!"

Neither of the girls noticed the irony in a hospital-sponsored eating contest, but both of them noticed the riches promised them. Both girls squealed with glee.

"So many doughnuts! I can't...I can't wait!" Jenny said, face filled with joy. "What time is it?"

Katrina looked at a nearby wall clock and swore rather loudly. "Jenny, it's almost 11! We've got to get a move on!"

But, as Katrina prepared to hoist her meatier friend to her flabby feet, Jenny cried out "Wait!"

"What is it?" Katrina asked, standing back a few inches.

"Can we get some tacos before we go? I'm hungry..."

"But- But we're about to go to an eating contest! Why would you want to eat more?" Katrina asked her friend in exasperation.

"Well...I need energy to walk all the way over there..." Jenny frowned, ruefully eyeing the distance from her bench to the field in question. Katrina sighed deeply.

"Fine, but you'll have to eat it while walking. We only have half an hour to get there!"

Really, it should only take ten, but with Jenny's slow waddle they needed the time. So, as Jenny slurped taco into her mouth and Katrina moved her fat friend forward, they set off, into a new world of competitive eating. Into all the doughnuts they could ever eat...or just a nasty stomachache.

They both hoped for the former.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Well, Jenny IS hungry, and there's a great ...

choices: Starting off easy - mountains of fries!
The girls sit down and look at the competition.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Firth Field was indeed only an easy ten minute walk away from the fairground. But Jenny's pace was anything but normal; heck, she didn't even have a walk. What would have been an easy jog for a smaller ten year-old girl was a sluggish, almost slow-motion waddle that took about twenty five minutes to get to.

And for Jenny, it was a nightmare. Her thunder thighs gave her a wide, awkward gait, and her sheer four-hundred-plus pound frame weighing her down meant she was nearly drenched in sweat and beet red in the cheeks by the time Katrina had helped her there. The sheer effort of hauling her best friend underneath the hot sun meant Katrina wasn't faring much better either.

Though, the sight that laid before them made it all worth it. Two enormous tables were set up across the field, all hosting platters of fries, pizzas, burgers and pies, just as the poster had promised. And there were a lot of each! Kids sat at one table, adults on the other, all either talking amongst themselves or mentally preparing for the contest.

As well as sweat, another liquid dripped down Jenny's chubby face - drool. Her ravenous belly practically snarled at the sight of the delicious meals before it, and if Jenny wasn't so heavy, she'd be waddling her way over right now to get a 'head start'.

"See? We made it," Katrina huffed, rather tired from hauling Jenny so far, "now we just need to sign up."
Jenny, too exhausted to move her lips, simply grunted with a small nod.

The two girls lumbered over to the small foldout desk between the two tables, and the man and woman behind it blinked with disbelief as the chubby girl and...what seemed to be a girl-like blob approached quite sluggishly.
"Are...the signups still open...?" Katrina panted.
The women blinked again, before composing herself with a nod. "Yes, the kids division still has places, and you're just in time. Can I get your names?"
"Katrina Maxwell," the smaller girl said.
The woman nodded and wrote it down, before forcing a smile to Jenny. "And yours?"
Jenny took a wheezing breath before attempting to answer between gasps for air. "J-Je-...Jen..."
"Jennifer Bradley," Katrina answered for her.
The woman nodded, concern coating her face as she wrote the name. "If you two would like to take a seat at the table there, we'll be starting shortly." She pointed her pen toward the kids' table.

"Thanks," Katrina smiled, before hauling her large friend that direction, "c'mon, Jen, let's get you sat down."

The man and woman just stared as they walked off, likely both thinking the same thing about Jenny...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Signing Up

choices: The second round goes much like the first- Jenny wins easily again.
Something goes wrong- a surprise new challenger? Or Jenny feels ill?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
"Alright, alright," the loudspeaker barked as Jenny and Katrina made their ponderous way to the nearest seats. "Ladies and Gentlemen, contestants and customers, welcome one and all to the 33rd Annual Burton's Corporation Eating Contest! Before your very eyes contestants of all shapes and sizes will compete to eat the most plates of food within the time limit and win this year's Grand Prize! Five hundred dollars..." the announcer paused for effect, "...and a lifetime's supply of Burton's Brand Doughnuts!"

Jenny, by now settled across three groaning chairs, drooled even more than before. Despite the fact that food was everywhere in front of her, the thought of even more never failed to stimulate her flab-choked brain. She kicked her tubby legs anxiously against her rumbling, ground-length belly.

"For our first round," the announcer continued, "we will be serving locally-sourced, homemade, free-range French Fries, generously provided by Fannie's Diner! Thank you, Fannie!" He paused for the crowd to cheer. "We will now start passing out the food! Remember, kids, don't start eating until we give the signal! Anybody who does will be disqualified!"

Katrina looked nervously at Jenny, then at the fries moving around the table. She knew that her large friend had very little in the way of self-control, and, as she was slowly discovering, she didn't have much for herself either; her own thigh-spreading belly was growling angrily for her to take a handful for herself. She attempted to distract herself by looking at the other contestants. At first glance, there were quite a few big kids, many significantly larger than her- however, none of them even came close to approaching the ludicrous size of Jenny. Satisfied, Katrina leaned back, sure that they would win. Nothing could possibly stop Jenny when confronted with food.

"Alright, kids, on your marks! Three..."

Katrina sat forward again, ready to grab whatever fries came within her grasp.

"Two..."

Jenny attempted to wipe the drool from her mouth, without much success, and readied herself for what might be an actually satisfying meal.

"One..."

Anne, who had found her way into the crowd, stared excitedly at her enormous daughter. Winning seemed a sure thing for her and her massive stomach.

"GO! DIG IN!"

And, with that, the contest was begun. Fry after fry disappeared to hungry maw after hungry maw. Thousands of potatoes sacrificed, millions of calories collectively consumed.

Katrina was actually keeping up rather well with the hectic pace of eating. Before too long had passed, she had cleared her first plate, and, licking her fingers of the salt, was on to the second. All told, she racked up three-and-three-quarters platefuls of fries by the time the buzzer rsng out. She leaned back, salty hands on her bloated tummy, to find, with great satisfaction, that a whole lot of people had dropped out of the contest already. And, to boot, she wasn't doing half bad- she seemed to be about in the middle for consumption. Though Jenny was certainly messing with the average.

For Jenny, within the three minutes given, had eaten an absolutely ridiculous nine plates of fries, and was begging for more, licking the grease of each and every plate as she waited for the results to be tallied. Her dress, clean and fresh that morning, was now hopelessly stained with salt and grease. Her enormous belly looked quite a bit fuller, but Katrina was sure her friend wasn't even close to satisfied. She wondered if she ever would be.

"Alright, we're back!" said the announcer after a few minutes. "A big thank you to those who dropped out, and a hearty congratulations to those who stayed in! The winner of our first round is..." The announcer paused for effect. "...Jennifer Bradley!"

Katrina cheered, as did Anne up in the stands. Jenny huffed.

"Our second round will now begin! This time- hamburgers!"
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: French Fried Fatteners

choices: Next round is pizza - another easy win for Jenny!
Something's strange about the food? A new competitor? Jenny gets ill? Anything!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Katrina gulped at the next platter set before her - a pyramid of hamburgers, with sauce and dressing and seemingly soaked in grease, the way the burgers glistened. There had to be just over a dozen there!

Jenny, however, looked ecstatic, and was flexing her thick fingers at her own stack.

"For this round," the announcer called, "you have five minutes to clear out your plate of burgers. The winner will be whoever has eaten the most, or whoever cleans off their plate first!"

Jenny's tongue greedily slid across her lips. If there was one thing she was good at, it was cleaning her plate.

"All ready, kids? Three...two...one...GO!"

Round two had begun. Burgers began to slowly disappear into greasy, greedy mouths. Whichever fast food restaurant provided them will likely be making plenty of cash back today.

Katrina was taking her time, chewing at a quick but leisurely pace. She wasn't that concerned about winning the contest - after all, she had a friend to win it in case she didn't.

As if on cue, at the three and a half minute mark, the buzzer went off. Far too early for the round, but Katrina just had to look next to her to see what the cause was.

Jenny was leaned back in her chair, letting out a contented burp and licking grease and sauce from her fat fingers. The platter right in front of her was licked clean, like nothing had been put on them at all!

"It seems we have a winner already," the announcer called, "and once again, the round goes to Jennifer Bradley!"

Katrina and Anne cheered once again, as did a few amazed spectators and competitors. All Jenny could muster was a lick of the lips and a whisper to Katrina of, "Are you finishing those?"
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Burger-Ballooned Bellies

choices: The Championship...does Jenny stack up to the competition?
Not so fast! Technically speaking, Jenny hasn't eaten lunch...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
"Okay, everybody, settle down," the announcer blared, "we're moving on to Round 3- Pizza! For this round, each contestant will be given one Super-Extra-Mega-Large Double-Deep-Dish Pizza Extravaganza, with every topping known to man! Whoever finishes it first will be elegible to enter our final round, where the winners from each division will face off for our GRAND PRIZE!"

This pronouncement elicited a cheer from the crowd, but made Katrina rather nervous. She hadn't considered that Jenny would have to face any adults; she was most definitely the largest kid in a wide radius, but could probably-near-or-over-500 pounds of girl stack up to adults that may weigh even more than that? For the sake of the prize, Katrina certainly hoped so.

Jenny, on the other hand, merely hoped to eat the pizza. It sounded goooooood.

"On your marks...get set...GO!"

Katrina lunged for a slice. Even with all the toppings that made it heavy, juicy, and goopy, it smelled amazing. Barely halfway through that slice, though, the buzzer sounded. Katrina looked at Jenny in shock.

The big girl, plate cleared of pizza, burped with satisfaction.

"My god! Ladies and gentlemen, in a contest record, Jennifer Bradley has finished the pizza round in..." the announcer paused for effect, "...thirty-five seconds!"

Anne leaped out of her seat and cheered as loud as she could. Her daughter, her sweet, super-smart daughter, had, instead of going slice-by-slice, simply rolled the pizza up like a burrito and chowed down. For an encore, Jenny did the same with Katrina's barely-touched pizza.

"Ladies and Gentlemen, the winner of the children's division...Jennifer Bradley!"

The crowd clapped approvingly. A woman bearing a small box came round and placed a medal around Jenny's fat neck. Katrina cheered and punched her lightly in one enormous arm.

"Yes, Jennifer Bradley blew the children's division out of the water, but can she beat the other winners and win the GRAND PRIZE? Find out more in the championship round...Here at 2:00 PM in Firth Field!"

Katrina gulped. Jenny wheezed. Anne cheered.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Next round is pizza - another easy win for Jenny!

choices: Jenny's ready for the Championship! Who is she facing?
Uh-oh, Jenny's had a little too much! Is she ready for the Championship?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
"Wow Jenny, that was great!" Katrina cheered, putting her arms around her larger friend's shoulders, "I never would've thought of eating pizza like that!"

Anne had also come down to meet her daughter. planting a kiss on her doughy cheek. "You were spectacular, sweetie! Those burgers and fries were no match for you!"

Even the other competitors, child and adult alike, had come to congratulate her on her landslide victory. Despite being a little disappointed in losing so easily, they had to admire the massive girl's great appetite and clever strategy.

Jenny smiled at all the praise and wheezed or burped her thanks, though there was only one thing running through her mind. In fact, the only thing about her that could run anymore were her thoughts.

"Mom," she muttered, and licked her lips. "what's for lunch?"

Everyone in ear point widened their eyes in surprise. After all that eating, she still wanted to eat more?!

"Lunch?!" Katrina repeated, jaw nearly unhinging, "But you just ate a dozen burgers, tons of fries and two whole pizzas!"
"For the contest," Jenny pointed out matter-of-factly, "those were contest food, not lunch food."
Katrina just kept quiet, knowing better than to argue her friend's logic when it came to eating.

"That's a good point, honeybun," Anne agreed, deciding to go with it as well, "and you've earned a nice treat. I'll be right back!" And with that, she got up and walked back toward the fairground.

Katrina looked down at her belly, which had greatly distended from how much food she had stuffed into it. A tiny burp escaped her, making her blush.
I hope mom won't be mad...

Within minutes, Anne had returned with handfuls of baggies filled with burgers, fries, hotdogs and corndogs. A greasy victory feast for her daughter, who squealed a thank-you before tearing into it. This would be a great warmup for her championship eating.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Warming Up

choices: Jenny keeps pace and soon pulls ahead.
Catastrophe! Jenny, exhausted from walking, falls asleep again!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
After having eaten roughly enough food to feed a smallish town and a batallion combined, Jenny was more then ready to have a nap. Unfortunately, though, the other divisions also needed to compete at Firth Field, so Jenny was forced- for the third time that day- to move her enormous bulk.

Which, considering the fact that she had just eaten about 25 pounds of food, was very, very difficult.

All told, it took Anne and Katrina, working together, fifteen minutes to move Jenny the few feet necessary to make it to the bleachers, then a further seven to get her up the single step necessary to make it to a seat. Naturally, as soon as Jenny's monumental butt touched the bench, she, exhausted from her slight movement and reasonably full, fell asleep almost immediately, dropl dripping onto her chins which in turn flopped onto her chest. Katrina, after a few minutes rest, did the same, pressing her own chubby body deep into Jenny's fat side. Anne looked at the two of them, then at her daughter's belly, pooling on the ground well past her fat feet, and figured her homeschool plan couldn't be very far off.

Certainly, she thought, somewhat guiltily, she won't be able to go back to school after all of this.

Or even out of her bed.
______________

"Jenny, Jenny, wake up!"

"Ngh...huh?" Jenny groaned, raising one impossibly fat hand to rub her eyes. She was not accustomed, especially not in the summertime, to being so rudely prodded awake.

"Jenny, we've got to go! It's time for the championship!" Katrina shouted in one sleepy ear. At that, Jenny shot awake. The promise of more food was always enough to stimulate her.

"Alright, darling, up you get!" Anne said, placing both hands underneath one of Jenny's incredibly soft arms. Katrina did the same on the other side. "Ready? One...two...THREE!"

Slowly, but surely, Jenny was lifted to her fat feet, and the three began the long trek back to her triple-chaired seat. Sweat dripped down her whole form as she was resettled back into place.

"LADIES AND GENTLEMEN!" an announcer cried out, a different one this time. "It is my honor to welcome you to the Burton's Brand 33rd Annual Eating Contest's CHAMPIONSHIP ROUND!"

The crowd, much larger this time, erupted in a series of loud cheers, which Katrina and Anne heartily joined in.

"Prepare yourself for the highest-stakes eating action you'll see yet! This is a clash of titans, a battle of bulges, a meeting of minds-and mouths-sort of-"

He cleared his throat.

"In any case! These contestants have proven themselves in each of our four divisional contests! They have demonstrated great eating ability, great stamina, and great effort throughout! First up, a surprise challenger yet landslide winner of the Children's Division, we have Jennifer Bradley!"

The crowd cheered. Anne and Katrina screamed with delight. Jenny weakly raised one fat fist.

"Second, from the Teenaged Division, your friendly neighborhood Rasta girl, Felicia Kinsey!"

Katrina watched, confused, as a fairly chubby yet not oversized girl smiled very widely and took a bite of what seemed to be a normal brownie. Anne cursed to herself and muttered something about weeds.

"Third, from the Young Adult division, three-time winner and professional eater extraordinaire, Michael Bornesly!"

A large man with a very round belly waved lightly at the crowd. Anne cursed again.

"And finally, from the Slightly Older Adult Division, we have the largest person in the state if not the country, Dennis Dupin!"

A man so fat he had to sit on a truck trailer attempted to wave. Katrina cursed this time, unsure if her admittedly extremely fat friend could stand up to someone larger than her- even if it was probably only a few hundred pounds.

"This round," continued the announcer, "will be special! There is no time limit, no food limit...only YOUR limits! That's right: ELIMINATION!"

The crowd stared as several burly deliverymen wherled out stack after stack of cardboard boxes.

"Inside those boxes are stack upon stack of delicious, delectable cupcakes! Whoever can eat cupcakes for the longest amount of time will be declared the winner! Now, everybody get ready!"

The contestants leaned forward as best they could.

"Get set!"

Anne and Katrina tensed up, holding their breath.

"GO!"
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Jenny's ready for the Championship! Who is ...

choices: Jenny gets closer and closer to the lead!
She has too much? The others are just too good to out-eat? Anything?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Jenny's only problem with cupcakes was how small they were. If they were for dessert, they always had to be at least a dozen at a time.

But now that she was surrounded by boxes upon boxes of the little treats, she couldn't be happier. One by one, cupcakes vanished into the gaping gluttonous maw of her mouth. Her enormous, heavy arms were moving at a speed she had never shown before - in fact, most of the time she didn't even move them if food wasn't there. It really said a lot about her sheer greed.
Katrina and Anne, along with a few more supporters, cheered her on as she stuffed herself silly.

Though, the competition was tough. Felicia, Michael and Dennis were not slouching in their eating one bit.

However, Felicia was showing signs of discomfort after about five minutes, while Michael and Dennis ate and ate like older, male Jenny's.

The chubby teenager eventually could take no more - with a loud, wet burp, she sat back in her chair, looking totally dazed with a cupcake wrapper hanging off her mouth.

An official walked over and muttered to her, to which she nodded. The official signalled to the announce table.

"Ladies and gentlemen, we have our first elimination," the announcer called, "give Felicia Kinsey a round of applause for her efforts!"

Katrina and Anne felt hope as the first elimination happened, and Jenny was still eating at her normal speed. She might actually have a chance!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Final Round! Eat!

choices: Jenny wins! Against all odds, Jenny wins!
Her chairs give! She falls to the ground and can't reach the food...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
"Three contestants left! Who'll be next off the field?" The announcer asked, riling up the crowd. They cheered in response.

It was most certainly going to be a tough contest. Unlike the teenaged girl who had just left, the three remaining contestants were all extremely good at the process of consumption. For several minutes, nothing changed but the number of cupcakes on the field- which were dwindling very fast.

But finally, something had to give. And a rather surprising something it was.

Dennis, the largest person in a very wide radius, was, to the great surprise of the crowd, the next contestant to give. Ironically, it was his few-hundred-pound lead over Jenny that did him in. He had more than enough room for the contest, but his heavy arms couldn't keep up with the pace of unwrapping and eating needed to win. So, after trying, and failing, to lift yet another cupcake all the way to his mouth, he dropped his arm, gasping, and declared himself out.

"And Dennis Dupin drops out! Ladies and gentlemen, you are witnessing something unprecedented!" the announcer screamed into his microphone. "Give him a big round of applause! And, not only to him, but to our two remaining contestants! In all my years as announcer of every event under the sun, I have never seen such a spectacle!"

And a spectacle it was. Both Jenny and her older rival were entirely surrounded by wrappers and coated in crumbs. So many cupcakes, on top of so much other food from that day, were forcing Jenny's massive belly into a shape it had not been for some time- round.

Yet she did not stop eating, and neither did Michael. It was now a battle of skill against capacity, experience in contests versus experiences in gorging. And it looked, at least to Anne and Katrina, like capacity may be winning.

It was to be a tough fight, that's for sure. Jenny may not have realized that, dim and focused on eating as she was, but her competitor certainly knew it. Michael Bornesly had won eating contests throughout the land. He knew every trick in the book, on pacing, on training, on timing. In a regular, timed contest, there was no match for him.

But in elimination, against a girl so fat she could barely move, a girl who lived solely to consume, he was flagging. And he knew it.

Yet he pressed on, hoping against hope that the fat girl would get full, would give up, would somehow be stopped. Maybe, he thought to himself, watching her stomach distend further and further between cupcakes, maybe she is getting full.

Jenny was in fact getting full; in fact, she was the closest she'd been to actually full for a long time. She knew, even in her impossibly dim brain, that soon she would reach her limit.

But, as her nearly immobilizing belly would attest to, she had eaten herself well beyond her limits before. She wasn't worried.

However, it wasn't just her that had a limit. Her three wooden chairs, over capacity and weakened with age, creaked ominously.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Victory Looms

choices: The fair day continues!
Summer continues, and Jenny and Katrina have some doughnuts to eat...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
The home stretch had come, and Jenny and Michael were each down to their last box of cupcakes. The crowd was going crazy with how neck-and-neck the contest had become. A trained eater vs a girl who lived to eat.

But both competitors were feeling the strain. All the food they had eaten that day was piling up inside them, and their rounded bellies meant it wouldn't be long before one of them gave out.

The question on everyone's mind was "Who?"

The ominous creaking and bending of the old wooden chairs beneath Jenny's backside went unnoticed as the gluttonous girl ate and ate and ate.

And finally, both were down to their last cupcake.

Jenny and Michael raised theirs to their mouths, hesitating as they eyed them up. The crowd went completely silent, watching intently. Even Anne and Katrina stopped their cheering to watch with bated breath.

Michael was feeling dangerously overfilled, and if he had a single crumb more, he would either burst or vomit.

Jenny was simply so full the urge to take a nap was sapping whatever strength she had left.

And then a gasp carried around the audience. Michael put his cupcake down!

And Jenny...?

The silence was broken by a lone chomping noise. Jenny stuffed the treat into her mouth whole and swallowed!

The crowd kept silent for a few moments, before erupting into roaring applause. Anne and Katrina nearly lost it with how elated they were.

"Ladies and gentlemen, history has been made!" The announcer practically screamed into the mic. "Michael Bornesly has dropped out! Jennifer Bradley has out-eaten the three time champion!"

A wheezing burp escaped the overstuffed girl, who had become surrounded by audience members and former competitors to congratulate her. Even the other finalists had come to say well done. Anne and Katrina gave her tight hugs, causing her to burp some more. One of the officials came over to place another, larger medal around her even fatter neck.

"Please give a round of applause to our finalists," the announcer called, "and of course to our winner, Jennifer Bradley!"

The crowd erupted into more applause, which masked the sound of wood cracking beneath Jenny.

The old wooden chairs finally had enough, and in the blink of an eye, the enormous girl was on the ground, pinned to her back by her enormously rounded tummy.

"Hehe..." she giggled lazily, seemingly unfazed or even oblivious to what just happened, "I won...!"
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Winner!

choices: Jenny soon finds herself immobile.
Katrina attempts to convince her enormous friend to go on one more trip.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Though Jenny had triumphed, the fair day was pretty much over for her, stuffed as she was. Too full to be taken all the way to the car, Dennis had very nicely given her a ride home on his trailer. Anne, following closely behind in her van, could only think of how soon it would be that Jenny would need a trailer of her own...

Since then, a few weeks have passed, and the Burton's Corporation was beginning to notice that this particular lifetime supply was quite a bit larger than the usual. In fact, Jenny and Katrina were eating enough doughnuts, along with every other food item under the sun, that the company was having to send out a new truckload every week! Though this caused some consternation in the office, for the recipients, all was bliss.

Since the fair, the two flabby friends had done nothing more strenuous than sit on the couch, watch television, and stuff themselves silly. In fact, Katrina was almost certain that Jenny hadn't left the couch since then- how she went to the restroom, Katrina preferred not to consider. She herself needed help to stand up now, so round had her belly become. Hers was not wide and flabby, like Jenny's ridiculous blanket of fat, but rather quite round and doughy- she could almost be mistaken for pregnant, if one looked quickly. As always, though, she always had Jenny to make her look skinny.

And Jenny could make a blue whale look skinny. If two weeks of constant glutting had damaged Katrina's figure, it had absolutely ruined Jenny's. Her floor-length sheet of flab now was big enough to actually start spreading out across the floor, rather than merely touching it. Her butt was also wide enough to take up two-and-a-half of the couch's three cushions, ensuring that Katrina's own rapidly widening butt was always touching some part of her friend- not that she minded. Jenny was incredibly soft and always made something nice to lean on, even if she was a bit sweaty. Which, with the temperature and the effort required to keep such a large body running, was to be expected.

From the kitchen, Anne watched the two girls watch television with a wide, weary smile on her face. She spent most of her time here nowadays, busy as she was with ensuring the two growing girls had plenty to eat. The doughnuts helped, of course, but nobody could just eat one thing forever. So Anne would cook chicken, cakes and cutlets, not that she minded. Rather, she enjoyed it. Jenny needed to be homeschooled, after all, and the less resistant she was...

Anne shook her head. No, I can't think like that! she thought angrily to herself, stirring the soup she was working on. Jenny needs to make her own decisions!

Though, as she stole another glance into the living room, at her daughter's enormous body threatening to overwhelm a couch, she was sure her decision would be the right one.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Fat Girls Fatten Faster with Free Fattening Food

choices: Beach day comes, and Jenny can still move!
Beach day comes, but Jenny has eaten herself immobile!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Jenny and Katrina were practically vegetated into the couch, watching a cartoon on TV. It seemed to be set on a beach this time.

The thought of being at the beach gave Katrina an idea. It was set to be a hot summer, and since the fair, they hadn't really gone outside at all.
Maybe just one more trip wouldn't hurt?

"Say, Jenny," she spoke up to her friend, who paused her stuffing her face with chips to listen, "how would you like to go to the beach soon?"
"The beach...?" Jenny mumbled, trying to picture being there in her head. Believe it or not, picturing a beach was harder than it sounded - her head was as stuffed with food as her mouth always was.

Katrina rolled her eyes. Her gluttonous best friend would need some convincing, the only way she knew how.

"There's loads of ice cream there," she added with a smirk, "and soda, and ice lollies..."

That got Jenny's attention. Her eyes widened and a grin crossed her flabby face. "Ooo, yeah! That sounds great! I love the beach!"

More like the beach food, Katrina thought cheekily, but she was happy to hear her friend was up for it. No doubt Anne would be too!
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: One More Trip?

choices: Jenny is apathetic. Anne insists they stay. Katrina is very, very suspicious.
Jenny is despondent. Anne is forced to find a way to transport her to the beach.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
That night, Katrina and Jenny suggested the idea to Anne over dinner. Or, rather, Katrina suggested it. Jenny merely shoveled food into her always-hungry mouth and nodded a few times when it seemed appropriate. Nevertheless, Anne was pleased with the idea, and suggested a date of next Wednesday for the girl's final excursion of the summer. And, most likely, Jenny's final excursion of all.

The week in between was spent much like the others for the girls- namely, eating, watching television, eating, sleeping, eating and, of course, eating. Anne, naturally, was kept as busy as a bee, only this week was slightly busier as she, in addition to food shopping, had to purchase some bathing suits and a few sundry beach items. For Katrina, she picked out the largest size the children's section had to offer; for Jenny, the largest the plus-size store had in stock. As an afterthought, she also picked up a sewing kit for alterations- she had no idea, after all, whether her daughter would fit or not.

Finally, though, Wednesday rolled around, and Anne was up early loading the car. Chairs, bags, and, of course, pounds and pounds of en-route snacks had to be loaded, stored, and secured before she could even think of waking the girls for first breakfast- especially since it was so early. Anne couldn't remember the last time either of them were awake earlier then eleven, and it was only just turning eight. Nevertheless, they would need that time to reach the beach, so she trudged back inside and started cooking.

Katrina woke up first, the sounds and smells of sizzling bacon drawing her out of her sleepy-time stupor. She yawned, stretched, rubbed her eyes with two chubby hands, and idly scratched at her fully-exposed doughball of belly before realizing that Jenny was still asleep and giving her a light poke, which only succeeded in rippling a few of the vastly bigger girl's innumerable folds. With a sigh, Katrina instead delivered a light kick to the side of her flabby friend's belly.

That did it. Jenny slowly blinked awake with a confused groan of "Hwah?"

"Breakfast, silly," Katrina said.

"Oh good! I'm-" an enormous growl from her big belly interrupted the moment "-hungry."

Katrina giggled lightly. "Me too. But aren't you the least bit excited?"

"About what?"

"About- About the beach, you big silly!" Katrina responded indignantly. "You remember? Sand? Swimming? Ice lollies?"

At the final words, Jenny's many-chinned face lit up. "Oh yeah! I can't wait! Mom, when are we leaving?"

"As soon as you two eat your breakfast!" Anne replied, whisking into the living room with two food-filled plates. "Now go on, dig in!"

______________________

After several plates of messily-eaten breakfast, the girls were finally ready to get going. Katrina, after a few moments' digestion, managed to scoot herself to the edge of the couch and heave her chubby body into a standing position. Unfortunately for her sense of balance, her time on the couch had resulted in quite a few unwanted pounds getting added to her frame, and she was pulled right back down. Soon, though, she was back on, and she could truly appreciate how much her size had changed. Her rather round belly now stuck out almost a foot in front of her, and it would have most certainly pulled her forwards had she not had a very significant rear to balance her out. Her new weight pressed heavily on her chubby feet. For a moment, she felt rather self-conscious.

"Katrina! I need your help with Jenny!"

Then, of course, she didn't feel self-conscious in the slightest.

Katrina took her place on Jenny's left arm, and, with all their might, Anne and Katrina heaved and hove at Jenny's massively fattened frame. Unfortunately, though, they were barely able to budge her an inch, and, soon enough, they gave up, gasping and panting with the unexpected effort. Anne, seeing that this was exactly what she wanted, nearly called it quits, but Katrina called out, "Wait! I've got an idea!"

Anne and Jenny turned towards her, intrigued. "If we tip the couch forwards, Jenny should be able to slide off and get her footing!"

Mother and daughter exchanged glances, and Katrina took up a position on the right corner. "Ready?"

"Yep," sighed Anne, and started pushing.

Miraculously, they were able to raise the couch a few inches off the ground, and, even more miraculously, Jenny began to slide. Then, with a great thump, many, many hundreds of pounds of girl touched the floor. Katrina's plan had worked.

To an extent.

"Wow, Jenny! You're belly's touching the ground!"

Indeed it was. Jenny had grown so fat that her enormous swell of belly now rested firmly on the floor, engulfing her feet even more than her enormous ankles already did. The big girl huffed in surprise and looked down curiously. Unfortunately, her chest and chins prevented her from seeing anything of her massive stomach.

"Alright," Anne said somewhat disappointedly, "let's get going, shall we?"

"Sure thing!" said Katrina eagerly, and took her place under Jenny's arm. "Let's go, Jenny!"

Jenny's answer was hard to hear through her wheezing, but eventually she was able to burst out, "Can't...walk..."

"Huh?" Katrina said, looking at Jenny in surprise. Anne cheered silently to herself.

"Can't...move...feet..." Jenny wheezed, sweat streaming down her enormous face. "Too...tired..."

"Well, sit down then! Can't have you using up all your energy!" Anne said, a bit too quickly, and together she and Katrina lowered Jenny back onto the couch. After a moment, Katrina, too, sat back down, a frown crossing her chubby features.

"Wait right here! I'll bring lunch!" Anne said, again, very quickly, and raced out of the room.

Jenny wheezed. Katrina's frown deepened.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Beach day comes, but Jenny has eaten herself im...

choices: A wheelchair perhaps? Or a scooter?
She sees a conveniently timed ad for something she needs?
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Anne returned as quickly as she left, toting fast food drive thru bags that she had bought in advance. A couple went to Katrina, a good half a dozen to Jenny.

Though, as ecstatic as she was that Jenny was absolutely just too big to move, even with help, she couldn't help but note the frown on her fat face. Even her gluttonous smile while she stuffed her face didn't seem as big as usual.

God, what am I doing? She chided herself. The girls want to go to the beach, but how do I get Jenny there...?

Driving her there would be easy, the minivan was reinforced enough to carry her. But how to get her to the van? And how to move her on the beach...?

She left the girls to stuff their faces, and she walked to the kitchen, tapping her forehead as she searched her brain for ideas...
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.title: Moving the Miniature Miss Mammoth

choices: They manage to make it to the beach without incident
The van can't take the extreme weight after all, and breaks down along the way.
1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Anne wandered around the house, wracking her brain for any idea that might help her get her immobile daughter into her van. She hadn’t accounted for this. How had Jenny become immobile so fast? Not that Anne minded; she was ecstatic, in fact. But she had promised the girls this trip, and at the rate Jenny was growing, it would only get harder to move her from now on. Maybe she could find her a mobility scooter, but it would take weeks for it to get here, and there was a strong chance she’d outgrow it before it came.
Anne looked back at the two girls. The simple effort of standing for just a few seconds had driven Jenny’s appetite wild: she now had a fried chicken sandwich in each hand and was scarfing them both down almost faster than she could chew. Katrina also had two sandwiches in each hand: one which she was cramming as quickly as possible into her own mouth, the other she was shoving into Jenny’s mouth in between bites of her other two sandwiches. The poor girl was so hungry she didn’t have enough hands to hold all the food she needed.
It took all her willpower to keep from joining in and helping the two girls gorge to their satisfaction. There would be time for that later, but for now, she had a problem to solve, and the longer it took her to solve it, the heavier Jenny’s stomach would be when it was time to move her.
As she thought about it, she realized that was exactly what the problem was. Jenny was heavy everywhere, but nowhere more than her stomach. It hung all the way to the floor, after all, and not by a little bit, either. Jenny hadn’t been weighed in a while, but considering how much of the couch and the floor her fat was taking up, she must be close to half a ton by now, if not past it. Her belly alone was probably about 600 pounds; there was no way her tiny eight-year-old body could possibly heave a belly around that weighed as much as a small horse. Not without help…
As Anne’s mind wandered, her eye caught an ad on the tv. It was some non-descript ad for weedkiller or something of the like, but as she watched a short clip of someone hauling dead weeds around the lawn in a wheelbarrow, it gave her a flash of inspiration. A wheelbarrow!
“You two keep eating. I’ve got an idea!” The two girls merely nodded, moaning in gluttonous hunger as they started on another round of sandwiches. Anne hurried outside the house, opened up the toolshed, and tossed a few heavy bags of fertilizer out of the large wheelbarrow that sat there. Dusting it clear of dirt and cobwebs, she pushed it out of the shed and into the back door of her house. Wheeling it into her living room, she spread out her arms and grinned. “Ta-daa! This is how we’ll get you into the car, honey. Katrina, will you help me get her belly into the wheelbarrow?”
“Great idea!” Katrina said, barely discernable around her huge mouthful of food. She stuffed the rest of her sandwich into her mouth and got down on her knees, her own belly now pressing against the floor from her new position. She pushed both her arms underneath Jenny’s huge belly as far as they could go, while Anne did the same from the other side. Their fingers couldn’t even touch beneath the huge mound of fat. With all their strength, they managed to heave the enormous gut off the floor, over the edge of the wheelbarrow, and let it fall in with a heavy plop and a series of dramatic ripples.
With many grunts and groans and false starts, they finally managed to drag Jenny to her feet. Her belly pooled into the wheelbarrow and overflowed the sides, hanging over the edges so much her lovehandles nearly covered the handles. Fortunately, there was just enough room for her to reach the handles with her tubby fingers, and with a slow trudging gate, she was able to begin walking.
Her belly surged and rolled with every ponderous step. Anne was afraid a couple of times the wheelbarrow might break underneath her, but it managed to stand strong atop its one creaking wheel. It took almost fifteen minutes to get to the van, and probably would have taken even longer if Katrina hadn’t fed her five more fast-food meals along the way to encourage her. But finally, they made it.
Jenny could only fit in the cargo section of the van with the back seats down. Her butt and side rolls pressed on both walls of the van, and it took a great deal of pushing to get the back door closed. As Anne walked around to the driver’s side door to get in, she noticed with surprise that the front two wheels of the van where a couple of inches off the ground.
“Wow…maybe we really did overdo it?” She noticed Katrina standing off to the side, rapidly consuming her third 20-piece box of chicken nuggets, her beachball-sized belly jutting out proudly ahead of her. “Katrina, why don’t you sit next to me, okay?”
Katrina smiled. “Okay!” She climbed into the front passenger seat and the van’s front end thumped back down to the ground. She had to adjust her seat a little to keep her own swollen belly from pushing against the dashboard.
Anne hopped into the drivers’ seat, buckled in, and put her key in the ignition. “Alright girls. We’re on our way!”

1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
The van groaned and chugged as it limped along the highway, engine screaming almost as loudly as the suspension as the overloaded vehicle struggled along. Much like Jenny herself, it was carrying far, far more than it was ever built to handle – and, also like Jenny, it was wheezing, puffing and struggling to move as a result.

With the colossal young girl occupying the back seats and the cargo section, the vehicle’s balance was thrown way backwards. Katrina in the front seat was doing her unwitting best to counterbalance her colossal friend – she was now far heavier than Jenny had been at the start of all this, so she was no small burden herself – but in comparison to Jenny now she might as well have been made out of fluff and feathers. It was incredible; when viewed on her own, Katrina was clearly hugely overweight, every part of her body bulging and wobbling with thick, heavy pads of fat. Her gut stuck out in front of her, sagging shapelessly over her jeans to brush against thighs that were each easily thicker than an average girl’s waist, and her hips and backside were astonishingly plump for a girl her age. However, next to the mountain of flab that Jenny had become, even Katrina appeared almost emaciated. What was a belly that brushed against her thighs compared to a belly that spilled down to the floor? A rump that overflowed jeans designed for an overweight teenager didn’t seem so bad compared to one that had outgrown the largest jeans in the adult plus-size store, that filled up the entire back half of the van with its bulk.

Anne glanced anxiously in the rear view mirror, taking in the shapeless mountain of flushed flab that had buried her daughter this past year. She hoped the journey wasn’t too uncomfortable for Jenny – she’d grown a lot since she last got out of the house, and certainly since she’d last ridden in the van. It was hard to believe that not so long ago she’d been an active, mostly normal girl. She’d been chunky, sure, a little plumper and lazier than most of her classmates, but ultimately fairly normal. There were girls like that in every school in the country at this point.

There were no girls like Jenny was now.


Katrina had twisted around in her seat to pass Jenny another sandwich, and so she missed the first sight of the beach emerging on the horizon. Jenny, for her part, was too distracted by the sight of said sandwich, and, more importantly, the very pleasant idea of getting it inside her achingly empty stomach as soon as possible. Or perhaps her stomach was achingly full; she couldn’t really tell the difference anymore.
And so, it was Anne that first saw the beach.
“There it is, girls! We’ve made it!”
Katrina turned back around hastily, gasping with excited, childish glee at the sight of the shining blue waters. Even Jenny managed to look up from her food a moment, letting out a cheer through a mouth full of food.
“It’s… it’s very pretty,” she managed to huff after a moment, struggling to catch her breath after the cheer, “It’s been ages since… since we’ve been to the beach.”
“I haven’t been in years either!” Katrina chimed in, “This is going to be really cool!”

Anne pulled the chugging van into a parking space, and quickly jumped out to help her mountainous daughter from the van. Katrina followed her lead a little more slowly, heaving her own overgrown rump from the tight confines of the front seat and trotting around to lend a hand with her friend.
Getting Jenny out of the van again was just as difficult as wedging her in in the first place. Getting any firm hold on her sweaty, slippery folds of flab was almost impossible, and the sedentary, out-of-shape Katrina wasn’t much help, quickly becoming out of breath and exhausted as they levered the enormous mass of Jenny from the van. However tired Katrina was, however, it was nothing compared to how Jenny felt; the poor girl was trying her best to help, but at her size she was little better than a prisoner buried in the sheer bulk of her own body. Before long she was wheezing and puffing like she was going to burst, child-size heart and lungs ailing as they were expected to somehow supply the impossible demands of her hugely overgrown body. Sweat poured from her in rivulets, trickling through the ravines and caverns of her obesity and dripping onto the tarmac of the parking space.

Eventually though, somehow, Anne and Katrina managed to get Jenny out of the back of the van. She stood there wheezing in the sun, vision blurry with the strain of standing, looking around vaguely at the sand and the sea. For a moment she tried to step forwards, to trot out into the sand dunes and have an explore, but immediately her immense weight bore down on her again and she wobbled, suddenly remembering that she couldn’t walk any more. She could feel the sun-warmed tarmac against her underbelly, and could even feel her toes buried somewhere beneath that monolithic gut, tickling the sensitive skin their slightly as they flexed with her instinctive attempt at a step forwards.

Suddenly, looking around at her massive friend, Katrina blinked.
“Oh, I just realised; we didn’t bring the wheelbarrow. There wasn’t room in the van for it. How are we going to get Jenny down onto the sand?”
Anne cocked her head. She hadn’t thought about that…
