1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Ann mentally kicked herself. She had meant to bring the wheelbarrow, but she'd completely forgotten it at home. Thinking about it now, it probably wouldn't have even fit in the van anyway: her daughter was so immensely fat now that she'd filled more than half of it with her body. It probably wouldn't have worked on the sand anyway; that wheel would have sunk in all the way under the impossible bulk of Jenny's belly, and would have been impossible to steer even if it hadn't. But the wheelbarrow had been the only thing she could think of to give her corpulent daughter even the illusion of mobility. What could she do now?

"Mommy?" Jenny mumbled around her mouthful of four entire chicken tenders. "My tummy's getting hot."

Ann's brow knit together in an expression of concern. Her poor baby...the asphalt of the parking lot was indeed very hot under the summer sun. It had to be getting very painful on the bare skin of Jenny's blubbery underbelly.

"Don't worry, honey, I'll help you stay cool. Katrina, can you help me with this towel?"

The two quickly struggled to slide a large beach blanket beneath Jenny's gut, giving it a slight protective barrier against the hot asphalt. It was hard to heft Jenny's huge belly off the ground even for just the handful of seconds it took to get the towel beneath it, not only because of its weight, but because of the countless rivulets of sweat rolling down her body. The hot sun and the extreme effort of standing were both taking a heavy toll on Jenny's overtaxed body. She could not keep this up much longer, and if she sat down, they'd have even bigger problems.

"Katrina, I've got an idea. Grab your side of the towel and I'll grab mine, and we'll lift her belly up with it together, okay?"

Katrina crammed the rest of the triple bacon cheeseburger she'd been eating into her mouth to free up both hands, and nodded at Ann. The two
did as Ann instructed, grabbing the corners of the beach blanket beneath Jenny's gut and attempting to lift it.

They may as well have been trying to lift a boulder.

Ann had begun to build up some surprising upper body strength lately, just from having to assist the girls in carrying their own weight around the past few weeks (and for the several dozen bags of groceries she had to haul into the house from her car every day), but she was still barely able to budge Jenny's belly before losing her grip on the towel. Katrina had far less luck than that, as she was starting to have a genuinely difficult time standing up from a kneeling position due to her own weight alone. The two tried as they might, but Jenny couldn't be moved.

By now, the spectacle of this half-ton child and her mother's desparate attempts to move her had gathered quite a bit of attention. Beachgoers stopped in their tracks on the way to and from their cars, keeping a distance and trying not to be too obvious as the gawked at the display. Most if not all of them had never seen or even heard of a human being anywhere near Jenny's size, much less one of her age. They muttered among themselves almost as if they were critiquing a museum exhibit.

"How did she get so big?"

"My god, they had to put the seats down just to get her into that van!"

"How can she still be eating? She's had four burgers in the past five minutes!"

"Is it just me, or does it look like that bathing suit is made out of shower curtains?"

Katrina and Ann tried again and again to try and heave Jenny's belly off the ground, but to no avail. After a good ten minutes, they stopped trying. Katrina plopped onto her ample rear, beads of sweat glistening all over her own flabby body. She stripped down to her own bathing suit to stay cool; a maternity bikini Anne had found to replace the bathing suit she'd outgrown on Wednesday. Stomach growling from ten whole minutes without eating, Katrina tore into another family cheeseburger meal, noticing with fear that only a few unopened takeout bags remained in the van.

Jenny's elephantine legs trembled, causing her entire bulk to jiggle from the strain of supporting itself. Tears welled in her eyes as she looked up at her mother. "Mommy, I need to sit down."

"Not yet, sweetheart. Please hold on a little longer. I won't be able to get you back up if you sit down now." Tears were beginning to form in Ann's eyes as well. Her poor daughter was suffering right now. This trip to the beach had been such a mistake. They should have all stayed home so the girls could eat and be happy. Now they were just getting sore, hungry, and miserable, and she couldn't do anything about it.

Ann looked up at the crowd of onlookers at the edge of the parking lot, lip trembling. "Please...can someone please help me? I promised to take my daughter to the beach today, but we just can't move her."

Most of the bystanders averted their gazes in shame. They'd been watching the spectacle out of pure morbid curiosity. Most of them had been looking at the corpulent mass of flesh with a mixture of shock and disgust. But this desparate plea from Ann forced them to see past the enormous mass of blubber before them. In spite of appearances, this was not just a bag of fat. This was a little girl, and here was a loving mother trying to help her see the ocean.

A muscled teen with bleached blonde hair rested his surfboard on the ground and stepped forward. "I'll help you out, ma'am."

A shapely lifeguard in a red one-piece bathing suit stepped forward as well "Let me help too."

Three teens that looked like they'd just come from the beach vollyball court stepped forward as well. A 30 year-old mother handed her infant son to her daughter and stepped forward to help as well. The six of them went up to the massive, blubbery form of Jenny and lined up three on each side, each of them grabbing a firm hold on the beach blanket and hoisting up Jenny's massive belly with all their strength. Her tears turned to ones of joy, Ann moved to her daughter's side, placing a supporting arm around as much of her back as she could reach.

Katrina heaved herself off the ground and followed on Jenny's other side, giving her friend encouragement and feeding her the rest of the food to keep up her strength as they continued their ponderous journey to the beach.

It took nearly a half hour to get Jenny from the parking lot to the beach, and there were quite a few close calls along the way as her gut-bearers struggled to control the massive ungainly bulk of her belly. But at last, at long last, they made it. They brought Jenny all the way down to the water's edge, lowering her gently into it and allowing the water to lift the enormous weight of her body off her tiny frame for the first time in as long as she could remember. She sat there in the water, bouyant and free; an absurd raft of pure fat, rolling and rippling in time with every wave that supported her.

1121122112121111112111211211111121221121.content:
Anne profusely thanked everyone who helped drag her daughter all the way to the daughter, and they awkwardly accepted her thanks before returning to what they'd been doing. It certainly felt like they'd done a good deed just then, but it was still undeniably the strangest thing any of them had ever had to do, and they were all eager for their lives to regain some kind of normalcy.

Jenny giggled as she felt her mass of blubber roll and surge with every wave beneath her. It felt nice to have the weight off her lower body for a change. She could actually walk pretty well under the water. Her belly floated, so the only resistance came from the simple bulk of the fat on her legs. She felt much less fat in the water than she was, which was ironic, because she looked even fatter now. With all her fat spread out across the surface of the water, she truly resembled a blob more than a person.

Jenny's enjoyment of her buoyancy was interrupted after only a few minutes by a rumble from her belly. Predictably, she was hungry again. The amount of food she'd eaten already today was pretty excessive even by her own standards, but so was the number of calories she'd burned. She hadn't exerted herself like that in months, and now she was utterly ravenous again.

She was going to say something about it, but Katrina beat her to it. "Ms. Bradley, can we get some more food? I'm still really hungry." Her own belly was getting quite distended: it stuck out almost as far ahead of her as her arms could reach. Addled by hunger though her mind was, Jenny still couldn't help but be surprised that her friend was still so hungry. Katrina hadn't eaten half what Jenny had, but she'd still eaten quite a bit more than was normal for her. Of course, she had also spent most of the past few weeks effectively as immobilized on the couch as Jenny had been, so she'd also exerted herself much more than usual today, especially with all those attempts to lift and move Jenny.

"Of course! You two stay right there and play. I'll go bring you some food."

And so they did. Katrina played in the water with Jenny for a while, laughing and enjoying herself. They both had fun, yet the second Ann came back with several heavy backs of food from the concessions stand, Katrina heaved herself out of the water and started eating without a second of hesitation. Jenny stayed right where she was (not that she had much choice), but dove into her food just as ravenously as soon as Anne brought it to her.

Ann wasn't sure how she expected this day to go. She knew eating would be involved, but she assumed the girls would do at least a little playing. That was not to be the case, however. The novelty of being at the beach seemed to wear off immediately. After the initial excitement of arrival, both girls lost interest in everything but food. Ann was particularly surprised at Katrina; this whole trip had been her idea after all, and she'd generally been at least a little bit less food-focused than her daughter. Yet now she was nearly keeping pace with Jenny's consumption, and wasn't showing much of any interest in doing anything but eat.

Well...I guess we won't have to do this again, then, Ann thought, with a fair bit of relief.

The two girls lay there, Jenny in the water and Katrina on the beach, for hours. Ann made a total of thirteen trips to the food stand, only stopping when the man told her he was closing down for the day. Both girls gorged themselves into a stupor, eating all but nonstop until the sun began to set. Ann had a hard time finding enough people willing to help get Jenny back to the van at the end of the day, not only because fewer people were left at the beach, but because six people didn't seem to be enough to support the weight of her incredibly full belly by the end of the day. It took eight people to get her back to the van and stuffed back into it, the back door barely closing over its overstuffed payload.

Ann was surprised to find that Katrina couldn't even stand on her own by the end of the day; she simply lay in the sand, her bloated belly rising almost three feet above her in an almost perfect sphere. She had to help support the growing bulk of her daughter's friend all the way back to the car, and had to set the passenger seat all the way back just to fit her hugely swollen belly into the car.

Both girls quickly dozed off as soon as their fat bodies had been stuffed into the agonized van. Hopping into the driver's seat, Ann began the van's slow and arduous crawl back home, avoiding every crack and pothole for fear of a total structural collapse. There was no doubt about it: this had been the girl's last outing. Ann wasn't sure how the two would take that, but there was just no other way around it that she could see.

1123.content:
Tonight's dinner was Jenny's favourite; cheese pizza with garlic bread and Fanta. Anna had given her daughter half a normal size pizza, a few slices of garlic baguette and a small glass of Fanta; a suitable meal for a normal girl Jenny's age.
But Jenny isn't a normal girl. She's a black hole for food.
"Thanks mum!" Jenny cried. Licking her little lips, she grabbed a slice in each of her pudgy hands and greedily stuffed them into her awaiting mouth, gobbling them up with gusto.
Anna sighed, her daughter had no patience at all when it comes to food. Of course she was polite and grateful and always asked nicely for food like she was raised to do, but it seemed like she almost never had enough. She'd gobble up a day's worth of food for a girl her age in an hour or two, then take a nap to sleep it off, and wake up hungry as ever. A never-ending cycle.
What also bugged her is how Jennifer was growing out faster than she was growing up. She needed new clothes nearly every month (or every few weeks if she'd been growing exceptionally quickly), and she was nearly too heavy to lift.
"Berp! 'Scuze me." Jennifer giggled, wiping the ring of pizza sauce off her lips with the back of her hand and licking it off like a kitten. A very fat kitten.
"All finished, Jenny?" Anna asked, hopeful that it was enough to fill her up.
"Uh-huh," Jenny nodded with a grin, "...still hungry though."
Anna sighed. So much for that. She got up and brought the other half of the cooked pizza to her daughter, the rest of the garlic baguette, and refilling her glass with more Fanta. Jenny giggled happily and dug in once again.


Within minutes, Jennifer was finished. Her plate littered with sauce and bread-crumbs, her mouth ringed with tomato and garlic sauce and the litre bottle of Fanta emptied. Not to mention a slight bloating in her middle section.
"Now are you full?" Anna asked hopefully.
Jenny went to nod, then stopped, thinking. "Well..."
Anna swore in her head. What now?!
Jennifer stared hopefully at the freezer above the fridge. "Ice cream?"
Anna sighed softly, lifting herself back to her feet and opening the freezer, getting a tub of chocolate ice cream and plopping a few scoops into a bowl, squirting some chocolate sauce over the top of them.
A little strange, chocolate sauce on chocolate ice cream, but it was Jenny's favourite dessert. She was a bit of a chocolate addict.
Jenny gleefully squeaked a 'thank-you' to her mother before stuffing spoonful after spoonful of ice cream into her greedy mouth.


Within a few minutes, Jenny had finished her bowl of ice cream, and gave a quiet high-pitched yawn.
Anna smiled gently. Jennifer always got sleepy when she was nice and full.
Taking her hand, Anna led her tubby toddler up the stairs and to her bedroom, helping her out of her food-stained clothes and into her already-too-small pyjamas. The waist on the pants was tight, and the shirt didn't want to cover Jennifer's greedy tummy the whole way, so her little bellybutton was on show. With some help, Jennifer got herself into bed and tucked in.
"Night-night sweetheart," Anna said softly, giving her daughter a gentle kiss on the forehead.
"Night-night mummy," Jenny yawned sweetly, snuggling into her bed to sleep.
Anna smiled and quietly made her leave.

11231.content:
Jenny loved dreaming because in her dreams she could eat and eat and never have to stop because of a lack of food.

In this dream she was lying on the top of an enormous chocolate cake one hundred feet high. Licking her lips she scooped out a chunk of cake with her hands and shoved it into her greedy mouth. It tasted like chocolate heaven.

She the began rapidly devouring the rest of the cake shoveling handful after handful into her mouth. As she continued to gorge she could feel her belly growing beneath her and lifting her up.

She kept eating and eating her face covered in chocolate and her mind buzzing with a sugar high and the delectible tase to chocolate.

Eventually she ate every bit of cake within reach. Taking a moment she looked over herself and saw a belly bigger than she was right beneath her. She giggle in ackowledgement that it was her own belly upon which she was resting.

Satisfied with the results so far she rolled over onto the next tier of the cake and resumed her feasting.

Bit by bit the cake disappeared and added it's mass to Jenny's mountainous girth, eventually become large and stretchy enough that Jenny was able to be more flexible and more easily reach the food.

Finally she was down to the last chunk of cake. She simply layed there and stared at it. She was lying on her front but not on her belly. Her belly started at her abdomen and continued on between her legs until it reached the massive moutain of fleshy fat behind her. Her belly has become so large and maleably that it was now more like an attatchement.

She stared at the chunk. It was about the size of her head and comprised of delicious gooey chocolate. She licked her lips having savored the moment and shoved the entire chunk into her mouth. She liked her lips once more in satisfaction and then rolled over to look at her mountainous belly.

It was the size of a small building, and it was part of her. The notion of having such a large malleable gut was intoxicating. It was her dream.

112311.content:
After morning rolled around, Jenny comfortably awoke from her delicious dream. She gave a long squeaky yawn as she stretched her arms up, making her already too small shirt ride up her round tummy some more. She rolled off her bed and got on the floor slowly, slowly waddling her way towards her mirror. Thanks to her still being a bit groggy, she failed to notice that she had grown. Well, outwards, of course. Her big dinner the night before had allowed her already round tummy to grow even rounder, and since she was so young it caused her to get a bit wider as well, her sides starting to show with her protruding paunch. But Jenny didn't notice, she was too busy rubbing her eyes and thinking about what she'd have for breakfast. Food was always on her mind, all day long. She pretty much always thought with her stomach, which was always grumbling and growling, telling her to feed it. And thanks to her love of food, she was always happy to obey its command
Without even brushing her hair, Jenny waddled her way downstairs to the kitchen, where Anne was already awake and making *some* kind of food. She looked down at her daughter and smiled softly at her. "Morning, sweetie!"
"Morning," Jenny mumbled, waddling to the table and climbing onto a chair, rubbing her grumbling tummy, "what's for breakfast?"
"I thought I'd make you some pancakes this morning," her mother replied, bringing over a little stack of pancakes and setting them in front of her daughter. Jenny took a whiff of them; delicious! Perfectly cooked, with lots of syrup and a little block of butter on the top. Jenny didn't hesitate for a second as she dug into the stack with gusto, getting syrup all over the face and pajamas.
Within minutes, she had finished, plate completely empty, since Jenny had greedily licked up any remaining puddles of syrup. She looked over at her mother and grinned innocently.
"Could I have some more, please?"

As Jenny waddled off to the living room to settle herself for a nap on the sofa, Anne cleaned away the dishes, still in awe of what she had just witnessed. It should've been impossible for her, or any girl her age, to have eaten THAT much at once! But there she did it, sat there eating stack after stack of pancakes, taking what felt like half an hour to eat!
Anne couldn't shake that image at the end; her daughter's pajama shirt popped and her belly twice as big as before. She started to worry. How long would it be before she's that size to begin with? Or bigger?!

Anne smirked to herself. There's no way this could fail!

1123111212112.content:
Anna, concerned by the comments she heard about her daughter's size, made her rethink her promise from earlier. More cookies would mean her round little princess would be that little bit fatter. Knowing her eating habits, she'd start tearing that new dress within a week or two at least! She had to find a way to stop her constant growth, without disappointing her little girl.
"Hmm, I'm not sure Jenny," she admitted, looking down at her daughter softly.
"Huh?" Jenny muttered, looking mortified, "B-but you said..."
"I know, I know," Anna sighed, kneeling down to Jenny's eye level and stroking her hair, "but you're getting a bit...big for your age. You really like that dress don't you?"
Jenny looked down at her outfit, grinning a bit. "Well, yeah."
"Well if you grow too much too quickly," Anna explained as softly as she could, "you'll get too small for it in no time!"
Jenny frowned again, staring at her big round tummy that grumbled even louder, making her wince a bit. She stared up at her mother, eyes widened and watery. "B-but..."
"Alright, I'll get you them this time, because I promised," Anna sighed, defeated, "but I want you to promise you'll at least try to cut down on your snacking, okay?"
Jenny beamed, giving a big nod. "Okay mommy!"
"Good girl," Anna smiled, giving her daughter a big hug and a kiss on her puffy cheek, then led her by her pudgy hand to the convenience store in the mall, where she picked up a few boxes of her daughter's favourite cookies; double chocolate rainbow chip. Jenny squeaked and smiled as widely as she could as she watched her mother buy the cookies, and spent the walk to the car rubbing her grumbling tummy.

Jenny climbed into the back seat of the car, panting a bit but happy to finally get off her tired feet. Trips to the mall were becoming increasingly difficult for her but she could never imagine why. It was more than obvious for her mother though.
At this point her tummy had stopped grumbling; with the thought that her precious chocolate rainbow chip cookies were in the car with her, her tummy was outright roaring. She winced and moaned softly as she tried rubbing it to calm it down, but the hunger pains didn't move a bit. "Mooommyyyy...!" The poor girl cried pathetically, on the verge of tears.
Anna nearly panicked and reached for a box of cookies, shoving it into her daughter's pudgy hands. Jenny sniffled and managed to smile at her mother.
"Th-thank you mommy," she squeaked, opening up the box and greedily tucking in to her treats like she hadn't eaten in weeks. Although she felt like she hadn't.
Anna sighed in relief and stroked her daughter's hair, then got into the car and began to drive home.
On the way, Anna looked through the mirror and saw her daughter shovelling cookie after cookie into her greedy little mouth. She let out a small sigh, thinking it was time to crack down on her plan; lower Jenny's amount at dinner more and more, so she'd start to get smaller. Maybe try and get her outside and playing at some point, join a sports club or something. But she'd worry about that part later.
By the time Anna'd pulled the car into the driveway, Jenny had discarded the empty box of cookies to the seat beside her, using her thick arm to wipe off any crumbs on her chubby face.
"Mmm, yummy in my tummy," Jenny giggled, rubbing her slightly-filled belly in satisfaction, "can I have another box please mommy?"
Anna rolled her eyes to herself as she got out of the car and opened the back passenger door, hoisting her heavy daughter to the ground. "I'm gonna make you something special tonight sweetie. Think you can be a brave little girl and wait for dinnertime?"
Jenny's eyes widened. She always got excited when her mommy said she was having 'something special' for dinner. It was always delicious!
She gave a big nod, beaming. "Okay mommy!"

Jenny knew for a fact that her mother always kept the sweetest goodies in the fridge, where they'd stay nice and cool and wouldn't melt. The chubby child rubbed her grumbling stomach as she waddled toward the white metal behemoth, pulling open the vacuum door and revealing a collection of packaged vegetables and fruits.

"Blech," Jenny mumbled, pulling a face as she peered further into the fridge. Her gut was telling her something delicious was hidden amongst all that icky healthy stuff. Her gut was also telling her to gobble up the lot, but she'd cross that bridge when she waddled to it.

A little gasp passed her lips as Jenny found her sugary prize. Right in the back sat a rather large chocolate fudge cake, in a clear plastic casing. Just the sight of it was causing the greedy girl to work up a drool. She reached her thick little arms into the fridge and pulled out the delicious dessert, gently setting it on the kitchen table and carefully removing the plastic cover. She then opened a drawer and pulled out the biggest spoon she could find that wasn't wooden, then heaved her heavy frame onto a chair.

Letting out a tiny giggle of naughty glee, Jenny dunked the spoon into the cake and pulled out the biggest piece she could manage, which was a rather large chunk already. Her greedy mouth took the piece, leaving a chocolate mark behind on the spoon. The gooey fudge and luscious chocolate batter caused an enormous smile to break onto her round little face as she slowly chewed and savoured the sweet taste before swallowing.

Kicking her dangling legs happily, the greedy little girl began to get lost in her sugary euphoria and shovelled spoonful after spoonful of cake into her awaiting mouth, eventually abandoning the spoon and using her own thick little hands to gobble up her succulent midnight snack.
Her already-tight pyjamas were getting even tighter; she didn't even notice one of her buttons popping off and tapping across the kitchen tiles. They also got even messier; their wearer's carefree eating causing globs of batter and fudge goo to spill onto her top, not to mention cover her entire mouth and hands.

Eventually, all that was left of the cake were some crumbs on the plastic plate it came on; crumbs that the always-greedy Jenny was plucking off with her dirty chocolate-covered hands.
"Aaahhh," she sighed happily, sucking cake and fudge off her fingers and drumming her fingers on her larger middle. "All better..."

"Alright Kathy, that's enough for now!"
"Aww, just a few more, mommy? Pretty pretty please?"
"Well, alright, two more."
"Yay!"

Julie sighed softly, smiling warmly at her daughter Kathy, who was happily nibbling on the contents of a bag of milk-chocolate cookies. The adorable little six-year-old was rather chubby; her rounded belly stuck out quite a bit, her thick little thighs squished out on the sofa, rounded arms, and her pudgy hands holding onto the cookie she crunched into her chubby little cheeks. Her long ginger hair reached down her back, with a little fringe on her forehead, showing her full round freckly face. Her wide blue eyes were fixed on her cookie as she nibbled it up with a little grin. Kathy loved cookies, but she'd never tried these ones before. They were really really yummy!
Julie, a slim young woman whom Kathy had adopted her hair and features from, was sat next to her daughter, stroking her hair slowly and softly as she ate. She'd noticed Kathy had put on a few pounds in the last year or so, which wasn't helped by her rapidly developing sweet tooth and fondness for pizza loaded with cheese, her favourite dinner. She was also getting into a habit of snacking between meals, and all this was showing. Julie had bought Kathy those pink cotton pyjamas about two or three months ago, and they fit on her nice and loosely, but now, albeit still rather loose, little gaps were forming between the buttons and letting her daughter's growing tummy peek out. Julie was starting to get concerned about Kathy's growth, and needed to find a way to make her lose weight without forcing her onto a diet or to do a lot of exercise.

Lucky she did.

"Okay Kathy, that's two," Julie said gently, lifting the cookie bag from Kathy's lap, "Don't want the witch to get you, do you?"
"Uh-uh!" Kathy giggled, shaking her head and sliding off the sofa onto the floor, making her tummy bounce a tiny bit, "I didn't have too much! She won't notice!"
"That's a good girl," Julie smiled, brushing crumbs off her daughter's top, "c'mon, time for bed."

Julie and Kathy lived in a nice house on a small neighbourhood in the country, and their house was situated next to the entrance of a large forest. Julie used this to her advantage and, a month ago, finally thought of a way to suppress her daughter's growing habit of overeating. She'd made up a story that a witch lived deep in the forest, who would lure greedy little children to her home in the night, with a lovely smell of food guiding them to her house. Once there, the witch would serve the child an enormous meal of delicious sweets and junk food for them to gobble up. If the child refused to eat, the witch would hypnotise them into eating. Once the child was stuffed full, the witch would return them home. If the child continued to be greedy, the witch would continue to lure them to her home. What the child doesn't know is, the witch's favourite meal is greedy little children, and so she wants to bloat them up like a Christmas turkey. Once the child is fattened up to the witch's satisfaction, she would gobble the child right up!
With this idea planted in her over-imaginative mind, Kathy promised to stop eating whenever her mother told her to. And although she'd only lost a pound or two since hearing the story, it was still progress.

Julie took her daughter's pudgy hand and led her upstairs to the bathroom to brush her teeth, then to her bedroom to help her into bed and tuck her in.
"Goodnight honey," Julie whispered, giving Kathy a gentle kiss on her chubby cheek.
"Nightnight mommy," Kathy whispered back with a little smile. She watched as her mother turned on her softly lit nightlight and left the door open a crack, and listened as she heard her footsteps go down the hall, then the click of a door. She'd recognised this as mommy going to bed too.
Kathy snuggled down and closed her eyes...but didn't feel sleepy at all. For some reason, her mind was racing about the milk-chocolate cookies. They were just, so yummy!
She rolled over as she pulled her kitten plushy close and cuddled it tight. She started engaging her strong imagination...yes, she's having a tea party with her kitten, and the tea is warm and sweet. The kitten pulls a basket close to it, saying it brought some food to eat. Kathy wondered what it could be. Sandwiches, maybe?
The kitten pulls out a milk-chocolate cookie. Kathy politely refuses, but the kitten keeps insisting, and the cookie gets yummier...
Kathy's eyes opened back up. She still hadn't slept, and all she was thinking about was cookies.
She removed her duvet and sneaked to her door, opening it up for her to sneak out and tiptoe downstairs to the kitchen. She flicked on the kitchen light and there it was, on the table. The bag with the remaining milk-chocolate cookies she'd been craving. She grinned and climbed onto the chair, pulling the bag close and opening it. She counted only one cookie left. She lifted it out and opened her mouth.
Then suddenly, she hesitated. What about the witch? She might catch me!
Kathy pondered this for about a minute or so, then eventually came to a conclusion.
It's only one cookie, I'm sure she won't notice.
With that, Kathy gleefully nibbled up the cookie, then sneaked to the pantry. She opened it up and reached into another open bag of cookies; regular chocolate chip. She cleverly lifted one out and placed it into the empty bag, putting it back on the table. That way mommy won't notice!
...she couldn't help but take another chocolate chip cookie just for herself, nibbling it quietly as she tiptoed to her room.

Climbing into bed and snuggling up with her kitten plushy, Kathy, mind at ease, settled down to sleep...

13.content:
This story begins in the Barrows residence. A rather big dwelling in the well-off side of the suburbs, belonging to a family of two parents, and their daughters.

Angelica, or Angie to her friends, was one of those daughters. At seven years old, she was considered the middle daughter. Being rather shy, she was a bit of a shut-in, but she still enjoyed going outside, whether it be for family days out or just to explore the neighbourhood. She also enjoyed playing with her friends, and was an avid live-action roleplayer. Larping, as she called it.

When she was inside, however, what she did was all but social. Video games, anime, comic books and the internet had free reign of her indoor time. She would spend hours on end in her room, partaking in her library of games, manga or dvds that would make many a nerd jealous, or browsing the internet to relieve boredom.

This wasn't all she'd do of course; she also snacked! Having, what her mother would playfully tease her for, a row of sweet teeth, she had an affinity for sweets and junk food. And of course, she got as much as she wanted; the pantry was almost always stuffed to the brim with greasy, sugary treats just for her.

But she was a regular girl for her age, with long brunette hair and amber eyes. All except for one obvious detail.

Her sedentary lifestyle and unhealthy diet of course had its tolls on her. She was incredibly overweight, often considered obese! Her attire for this particular day consisted of a pink t-shirt of her favourite anime at the moment, with the pale love handles and overhang of her round tummy peeking out of it and covering the buttons of her jean-shorts. She already had the beginnings of flabby, saggy breasts pushing against her shirt, and her face sported a pair of pink, round cheeks and a prominent double-chin. In the house, she wore nothing on her feet so her tubby toes were free, albeit invisible to her thanks to her protruding abdomen.

However, every doctor visit she had was met with the same result; "She's incredibly overweight, but her physical health is in peak condition!" Everyone who was told was completely baffled.
She was a round butterball of a girl, and was the complete opposite of fit, but she got good grades in school and was always sweet and friendly, if a little naive.

On this one day, a weekend, she was slumped in her computer chair, browsing the internet for something amusing to do, while she sipped a litre bottle of cola and dunked her hand into a family-sized bag of chips.

141.content:
The way to someone's heart was always through their stomach.

That was the philosophy Randall Coombs had been following since he was a very young man. He was not a professional cook, nor even an amateur- actually, he worked in the upper echelon of a large claims department- but, in his free time, he researched recipes and crafted items of food that made everyone who tasted them glad to be alive. It was with a spinach-artichoke dip at an office party that he had met Annette; it was over spaghetti bolognese that he had proposed to her; it was over an expertly frosted wedding cake that he had married her; and it was after eleven years of bland, limp salads that he had, at long last, divorced her. He had saved himself and his 9-year-old daughter Susan from the machinations of a bitchy, self-obsessed mother who cared little about anything outside of her figure. The courts, seeing this, had granted him full custody, and he was planning to make the most of it. Annette had denied Susan a lot of things; Randall planned to give those back in spades. Starting, of course, with some quality food.

___________

Susan Coombs was not expecting the smell emanating from the kitchen. Her dad was cooking something- what, he wouldn't say- and she at first had remained uninterested, preferring to lounge her lithe body on the couch and watch cartoons. For the past week since moving in, just like usual, she had eaten nothing but bland, dressingless salad; her father hadn't wanted to shock her, and she, being a generally agreeable girl, hadn't complained. As such, the smell came as a complete and utter surprise.

To her father, mixing sauce and crushing garlic, it smelled like a perfectly ordinary bowl of pasta. To Susan, who, due to her controlling mother, had never had anything like it, it smelled like Heaven itself.

Entranced, she got off the couch and wandered to the kitchen, rapt with wonder. With every step, it only smelled better. The rich tomato sauce, the parmesan cheese, the garlic...all of it blended together into a marvelous tapestry of pure scent. Still entranced, Susan sat down numbly at the counter, gazing wistfully into the kitchen. Her father must have noticed her entrance, because he turned around then, holding aloft a large bowl filled with penne pasta.

"Here you go, Susan" he said, laying the bowl in front of her. "I haven't had a chance to flex my cooking muscles in a while, so I hope you like it!"

Susan didn't answer. She merely grabbed the fork, eyes locked on the food, and slowly, ever so slowly, speared a noodle, lifted it up to her mouth, and ate it.

Randall smiled.

1412.content:
Susan had no doubt in her mind that this was the greatest thing she'd ever tasted in her life, and she seemed to not care if it made her sick or not - she wanted every last bite.
She had no idea her dad was so good at cooking. Why had he never done this before? She'd had to eat nothing but awful, plain salads all her life. This, a normal bowl of everyday pasta to her father, was like reaching nirvana. She had to enjoy as much of it as she could.

Randall had to be thinking the same thing, because he wasn't that surprised when he saw his daughter smiling ear to ear and nearly moaning with delight at the pasta.

In fact, it didn't take long for her to make quick work of the food, and she let her fork clang in the empty bowl and she rested a hand on her distended belly.

"How'd you like it, sweetie?" Randall asked quietly. His daughter could only respond with a cute little burp.

She had never felt like this before. So much good food, all for her. What had she been missing all her short life?

She had never felt so full before, or so happy. She wanted more of this. Much more.

"Would you like more food like this all the time, hun?" Her father asked, as if he was reading her mind.
A moment passed before she nodded slowly. "Yeah...I never knew you were so good at this, dad..."
Randall blushed a little - compliments like that felt different when they came from your loved ones. "Well, like I said, didn't get to flex my cooking muscles in a while."
"Can...you do it more?" She asked, looking at him with wide, pleading eyes.
Randall's heart simply melted from the face she fixed him with. "Of course, honey. You'll be getting much better meals from now on, I can promise you that."

That put Susan into an even better mood for the rest of the night, spending it resting her stuffed, rounded belly until bedtime.

Susan tossed and turned in her bed for a bit before being woken up. She sat up in her bed and looked around the room, noticing that it was still encased in darkness.

"What time is it?" she thought to herself before glancing at the clock on her night stand.

The clock read 3:00 am. That was very strange to her. She'd never woken up this early before, unless she had a bad dream or was sick. But she felt fine and couldn't remember any bad dream she had. The only dream she did have was filled with tons of sweets and other junk food. She sighed happily and licked her lips as she thought back to that dream, before a sound broke her trance.

*grrrrllll*

She looked around the room for the source of the sound, but for some reason she was unable to pinpoint its location. She waited to see if it would happen again, but after a few minutes without hearing anything, she decided to try to fall back asleep. Just as her head hit the pillow, the sound was heard again, this time much louder.

*Gurrllll*

It sounded like a deep hollow growl from some sort of monster. This time the sound was accompanied by a very hollow feeling in her tummy. She pulled the covers off of her and looked down at her stomach. It was still fairly round from the stuffing she did, but it seemed to have a bit of softness to it now. She gave it a little rub to see if that would help ease the hollow feeling away. As she was doing this, the growling was heard a third time.

*GNAAARRRLLL*

She also felt a vibration in her tummy that accompanied the noise. She finally put two and two together.

"Oh so it's you! You're the one making that sound, aren't you girl?" she asked her tummy.

*Guuuuuurrrrggle....Growlgle* her tummy replied as she felt it squirm beneath her palm like some alien monster.

"Alright then, let's see if we can get you something to eat!" She whispered as she got up and slowly made her way to the kitchen, he stomach growling the whole way.

She managed to keep her tummy quiet enough that she didn't wake her dad. She got to the pantry and saw a package of cookies. She grabbed it and poured herself a glass of milk. She proceeded to go to town on those cookies and ended up finishing the whole package. She then chugged the milk and finished with a satisfied sigh.

"There you happy now?" Susan asked her tum.

141231.content:
The unfamiliar feeling of a full belly once again attained, Susan headed back to bed - and almost immediately, to sleep. For her, life was looking up. Her father had booked her a years worth of sessions with the school councilor, who was to help her with the 'emotional stresses of experiencing a familial break-up' - but she barely felt she needed them. She loved her mom, of course, but she'd always been much closer to her dad, and if the usual meals of salad were going to be broken up by food as divine as that she'd eaten yesterday; well, she felt she could probably forget about her mom sooner rather than later. That night, she slept with a wide smile on her face.


The following morning was a school day, a Monday, and with her previous night's expedition completely forgotten, she jumped out of bed at 6:30 sharp and began to get ready for school. It was strange though - for once she felt energetic, rejuvenated. She was almost bouncing as she hurried around her room, grabbing the components of her school uniform from their neatly pressed and folded piles and then tugging them onto her body.
She was a small for her age, a tad shorter than most of her peers and almost dangerously slight; a particularly assertive breeze could shove straight past her, and would probably knock her over as it passed. Still, today she felt enthusiastic and lively, so with a hop and a skip she ran down the stairs in a rush and headed into the kitchen - where she was stopped as dead as if she'd run into a wall by a truly heavenly smell - that of a full fry-up breakfast.

She teetered further into the room, licking her lips excitedly, to see her father cooking at the stove. He looked around as she approached.
"Oh, you're up early. I made us breakfast."
Her eyes widened at the sight - and smell - of all the cooking food.
"H-how come I never knew you're such a good cook, daddy?" Susan asked, stammering slightly in amazement.
He shrugged.
"Well, your mother never really let me cook anything since we got married. But now she's, uh, gone, I can cook as much as I like," he grinned down at her and ruffled her hair with his hand, "We're gonna be eating a lot more good food from now on, Susie. A lot more good food..."


Susie couldn't believe how much breakfast she managed to eat - indeed, she only stopped because she checked her watch, and realised with a start that if she wasn't careful she was going to be late for school for the first time in her nine years. After finishing her mouthful - and thanking her dad extensively - she hurried off to brush her teeth and pack her bag.
Before long she was back, hugging her dad goodbye at the front door. She was just about to leave when he slipped a Tupperware container into her bag.
"For your lunch!" he winked, "Now go, or you'll miss the bus!"
And she trotted off down the road, deeply curious as to what her father had prepared for her.

14123121.content:
To her delight, her father had prepared a snack for her while she was at school - home-baked cookies, several of which she was more than happy to demolish the moment she got into the house. Randall, her father, was just happy to see her enjoying food for the first time he could remember - any thoughts of limitation were far from his mind.

So inevitably, Susan fell quickly into new habits. Over the next few weeks she was more than happy to eat a proper cooked breakfast every morning, the lunch her father sent her to school with, then regular snacks once she got home followed by a big dinner to round out the day - and of course, soon the day wasn't the only thing being rounded out by large meals. The effects of such a radical increase in consumption should have been obvious, but Randall never even considered the idea that all this rich, fatty foods he was making (and, more relevantly, feeding to his daughter in fairly large quantities) would cause weight gain. As per usual though, it is the ideas that one never considers that are the most dangerous, and before long Susan was visibly not the slight, waifish creature she was before.

It took around two months for the changes to become truly apparent. By the time her school uniforms were starting to be visibly ill-fitting, however, that was exactly what they were. She was still a way away from what one might call 'fat'; however, 'chubby' now seemed fairly appropriate - and for a girl who had been called 'underweight' by her doctor only half a year ago, that was no small change. Her belly had crept secretly forwards beneath her shirts, slowly swamping her ribs and hiding them beneath a layer of chub for the first time in half a decade - and it wasn't about to stop there, sneaking stealthily further outwards every day.
Elsewhere her butt was growing wider, rounder and softer, becoming actually noticeable in a way it never had before, filling out her school uniform skirt in a way that was becoming quite immodest. Higher up, the very faintest of precursors to a double chin slipped into existence, and her facial features, following the lead set by the rest of her body, softened slightly.

And with her newfound chunkiness came an appetite; an appetite that demanded more, more! Eventually, things came to a head on an overcast Wednesday afternoon, just after lunch. She'd eaten the sandwiches her father had prepared, but today they'd been nowhere near enough, and so she sat in Math, belly grumbling loudly, desperate to get something else to eat...
14123121.title: Timeskip, or we're gonna be here forever.

choices: She heads back to class, nicely satisfied.
She loses track of time while happily stuffing her face!
141231212.content:
As she rubbed her gurgling belly hungrily, Susan suddenly remembered something - her father always left her some change for a snack in school should she ever need one. And the vending machines in the hall were always ripe with the yummiest chocolate bars and chips of all flavours.
And the best part was, since she had been left nicely full for the longest time thanks to her dad's lovingly prepared lunches, her purse was getting as plump as she was with how much money she had saved.

Her tongue quickly slid across her lips at the thought. Her emergency funds were right there for her to use...but how?

Her hand shot up. "Miss, can I use the bathroom?"
Her teacher nodded. "Go ahead.

Susan grinned and tried not to make too much of a hurry leaving the classroom, keeping her purse hidden in her fist. Luckily the vending machines were just past the girls' bathroom.

Once she got there, she eyed up the many snacks in the machine's window. She could almost hear them speaking to her.

Eat us, Susie!

And she was happy to oblige. She popped a coin into the machine and pushed the button for a chocolate bar, which she happily enjoyed.

As she tossed the wrapper in the bin, she eyed up the machine again, and figured she could go for some barbeque chips. And so she did, and then decided on a different brand of chocolate bar...
141231212.title: Sneaky Snack Break

choices: One of the girls asks the other if they want to come over for dinner.
Susan goes home to find a surprise waiting.
1412312122.content:
Before she knew it, the bell to signal the end of the school was ringing, making her jump. After several chocolate bars and a couple of packets of chips she felt distinctly over-full - her belly looked more rounded than ever, all the food she'd just eaten combined with the thickening layer of flab clinging to her midsection making her look almost pregnant. Shaking her head in surprise at how easily she'd lost track of time, she grabbed her lightened purse and set off to collect her bag from her math class.

She'd only taken a few steps, however, before she bumped into someone - a large, dark-skinned girl carrying two school bags.
"Oh, hey Manyara," Susan greeted her friend.
"Hey, I brought you your bag," Manyara said, handing it over, "Are you alright? Miss Tender was worried you were ill or something, you never came back to math class."
"I'm alright, thanks" Susie said, cheeks going slightly red. She didn't really want to admit she'd just been stuffing her face this whole time... "I was just, uh, feeling a bit queasy. I'm better now though."
"Well that's alright then, I guess," Manyara shrugged, then she spotted the vending machines just behind Susan and her eyes lit up, "Y'know, my mom always used to say that nothing heals sickness better than a Mars bar."

"...Oh?" Susan mumbled, following reluctantly as her friend lead her back over to the machines. Manyara stood in front of the glass-faced box, gazing in at the arrayed snacks.
"Yeah, she said the sugar killed germs," Manyara continued, "She always made me eat one a day when I was younger, to keep the doctor away."
"Right..." Susan nodded cautiously. She wasn't entirely sure where Manyara's mom had acquired her medical knowledge - even with her own limited understanding, that idea seemed more than a little dubious. She did, however, now understand why her friend had been overweight since before she'd even started kindergarten.
"They're seriously great," Manyara was dropping money into the machine, and a moment later two Mars bars dropped down. She bent down to pick them up, leaving Susan to stare at her rather enormous backside - and wonder precisely how much of it was due to her apparent candy-bar diet when she was younger.

Manyara straightened up again with a little puff of exertion, and thrust one of the bars unexpectedly into Susan's hands, keeping the other for herself.
"Huh? I'm alright, thanks," Susan said, trying to pass the Mars bar back to her friend. She was already feeling kinda stuffed; right then, another candy bar seemed less than appealing. Manyara was having none of it though.
"Nah, eat it. It'll fix you up, guarun... garren... well, it'll fix you up for sure," she said with a generous smile.
Susan went to object, but gave it up. She knew her friend well enough to know she wasn't going to take no for an answer.
She peeled the wrapper off as the bigger girl lead the way to the school exit, and began nibbling on her Mars bar once they got outside into the cool air. Before they'd reached the bus stop it was gone, and she was brushing the chocolate crumbs from the corners of her mouth.
"There you are, told you you'd feel better," Manyara said, self-satisfied. She'd long since finished her own snack.
"Yeah... much better," Susan tried not to grimace. Ironically enough, her lie about being ill had now left her feeling actually sick.
The bus pulled up before them, and the two girls climbed aboard.
1412312122.title: Karma

choices: She attempts to rest her belly before dinner...
Despite her fullness, she can't help but crave a little something...
14123121221.content:
Susan was grateful to have a sit down on the bus, deciding to take the window seat with Manyara next to her. The larger girl took up more space on their seat, causing their sides to touch constantly.
She put a hand to her rounded belly, which was still rather stuffed. She felt like she'd burst if she ate one more bite...

...and then, something occurred to her. She had told Manyara about her dad's surprise cooking skill, but she hadn't tried it for herself. Maybe she should?

"Hey," she spoke up, "wanna come over for dinner tonight?"
The larger girl turned her head, grinning. "Dinner? As in, made by your amazing chef dad?" Susan nodded. "Sure! Your lunch looks amazing lately, I gotta try this."
Susan grinned back. "Cool! Six-thirty sound good?"
"No problem," Manyara nodded, "I want as much of that stuff I can get! There's dessert too, right?"

A snicker escaped Susan. Manyara always seemed to love eating - even in kindergarten she got a candy bar and a pretty hefty serving of milk from her mother. Dessert seemed to be her favourite meal of the day.

The two girls got off once the bus was at their stop on the street. Manyara only lived a few houses away, so they weren't far apart.
Susan headed inside her house, grateful to be home.
14123121221.title: Quality Dinner

choices: They go to wait in the living room.
Seeing Manyara's dress prompts Susan to go change before they eat.
141231212211.content:
Her father wasn't back yet when Susan got home - and for the first time, she was kind of relieved. She knew he'd offer her some delicious, fragrant treat, and she wasn't at all sure she trusted herself to turn him down no matter how much her stomach ached.

Still feeling vaguely sick, she dropped her bag by the door and wandered into the living room, where she promptly collapsed onto the couch. She'd been doing that a lot recently - the surge of energy that had come when she'd started eating her dad's food for the first time had been quickly diminished, soon vanishing into nothing as her body became heavier and put more strain on her muscles. If anything she was lazier than ever nowadays, spending most of her spare time sprawled over the couch or her bed, whiling away time on her phone.

After an indeterminate period of time, Susan heard her father arrive home. She felt a little better now, or at least well enough to roll off the couch to go and greet him.
"Hello, daddy. Did you have a good day?" they hugged briefly, then Susan remembered what she'd gotten up off the couch to say. "Oh yeah, I told Manyara she could come for dinner, is that alright?"
Randall nodded, more than happy for the excuse to cook for more people.
"Sure thing, Sue. Who's Manyara, again? The little blonde girl?" he asked, trying to remember. He'd seen a lot of Susan's friends over the years, and he had never been very good with names.
"No, that's Jasmine. Manyara's black and she's got lots of dark hair. You must remember her, she used to come over all the time!" Susan said, pouting slightly.

"Oh, I do remember her!" his memory sparked at last, "Very, uh, large girl, I recall. Annette always used to insist she only got half a serving of salad, said it'd be good for her," he looked vaguely disturbed that he'd allowed such a thing in the past, resolving quickly to make up for his past sins this evening, "She's not a vegetarian or anything, is she?"
Susan shook her head.
"No. And she's coming at half six - and she said she was expecting dessert, too."
"Well, I think that can be arranged!" Randall chuckled lightly, "Well then, if you'll excuse me, it seems I need to get started cooking right away."

Susan returned to the couch. She could barely concentrate on what she was doing though, as ever more delicious smells wafted through from the kitchen as the hour grew later. Eventually, after at least a dozen hours of waiting, it was half past six and the doorbell's shrill ring echoed through the house.
"I'll get it!" Susan called through to the kitchen, jumping off the couch once again and hurrying through the house to the front door. Pulling it open, she smiled happily to see Manyara waiting just outside.
"Hi! Come in, come in," she stood aside and let her friend make her way into the house. Manyara looked a little out of breath from the walk over, but she seemed to immediately forget about that as she caught her first whiff of Randall's cooking.
"Wow, that smells great!" she exclaimed, more than a little excited, "When are we eating?"
"Pretty soon, I think," Susan said, taking her friend's coat and hanging it up, "We can just go wait in the living room."

Unlike Susan, Manyara had actually gotten around to changing out of her school uniform since they parted. The other girl was now wearing a slightly cheap-looking blue dress, the material of which seemed to be acting rather more clingy (and the design more immodest) than had been originally intended due to the body which had been stuffed inside it. Now, Susan wasn't an expert in fashion by any means - however, she was fairly sure that one's dress wasn't suppose to be so short that it didn't even make it all the way past the buttocks.
As a result, as the other girl bent only slightly to take off her shoes, Susan was met by an amusing and very obvious observation - Manyara still wore Hello Kitty panties.
141231212211.title: Prelude

choices: The girls entertain themselves till dinner.
Skip to dinner!
1412312122112.content:
Manyara let out a little puff of exertion as she stood upright, sliding her shoes off. Susan blinked as she looked down at herself, and realised she was still in her uniform.

"You head on in," she said to her friend, "I'm gonna get changed."
"Sure," the larger girl said, and plodded into the living room. As Susan started the climb up the stairs, she heard a fwumph of the couch and a sigh of relief.

Lately, the trek upstairs was starting to leave Susan with a bit of an ache in her legs, due to the weight she was carrying around and not having the right amount of strength to carry it.

She trudged into the living room, panting a tiny bit, and started to undress. She seemed oblivious to how her tummy had started protruding, her thighs were meatier, and her backside was more rounded out. Her face was also chubbier as well.

She wasted no time in putting on a pair of comfy track pants and a My Little Pony t-shirt which, once very loose on her, was starting to feel a little snug around the middle. She deduced it had just shrunk in the wash.

She plodded back downstairs and joined Manyara on the couch.
1412312122112.title: Quick Change

choices: They manage to eat it all - but only just!
They can't eat it all, no matter how they try.
14123121221121.content:
The two girls gossiped a while about school as they waited - however, neither really had their mind on the conversation, the delicious aromas wafting through from the kitchen thoroughly distracting them both. Eventually, after an excruciatingly long wait, Randall called through from the kitchen.
"Girls! Come and eat, it's ready."

The two leaped to their feet faster than one would believe possible and all but sprinted through to the dining room. By the time they got to their seats they were both a little out of breath - though Manyara noticeably more so than her slimmer (if rapidly growing) friend. They both settled into their seats, Manyara's oversized butt spreading out impressively as she did so to cover her entire chair and a little more besides. There was a big decanter of cola in the middle of the table, and Susan politely poured them each a big glass.
Once they were both settled, Randall stepped to the head of the table carrying a large dish.

"For starters," he declared, "Spicy pork skewers!" he placed it down on the table and barely had enough time to withdraw his arm before the two girls attacked the platter like wild dogs, grabbing a skewer in each hand and alternating bites. He smiled happily at the sight of food he'd cooked being enjoyed - he'd missed this feeling, he'd missed it a lot.
It didn't take long before all the skewers had been picked clean and the girls were sitting back, appetites not at all quenched by the first course - if anything they burned brighter than ever. Fortunately, Randall had more.

"For the main course! Deep fried beef with fries, roast vegetables, homemade onion rings and salad."
With an exaggerated gesture he placed an oversized plate of food in front of each of them, and then stepped away to let them help themselves. He himself would eat later - for now, he just wanted to savour the sight of the two girls adoring his lovingly crafted food.
And adore it they did. They both ate like starved children, stuffing fatty food into their faces so fast that he was astonished they could even taste it. Sauce spattered their chins (3.5 in total - two for Manyara, one and a half for Susan) and their clothes, forcing down the food without a care in the world.

Inevitably, Susan began to slow before Manyara did. She had, after all, only been truly eating and overeating for the last couple of months - Manyara had been at it her entire life, and her gut had stretched to compensate. So, as Susan was struggling to finish her first portion, Manyara was already half way through her second, and even managed to finish it just as the smaller girl was finishing up her first and only plate.
They both leaned back in their chairs, wiping their mouths - Susan with a napkin, Manyara with the back of her hand - and licking clean their fingers. Both were blatantly bloated, stomachs protruding and more rounded than ever. Neither had a belt, but if they had, they certainly would have been loosening it a notch or three.

"God, that was good," Manyara said with a belch, "You've gotta let me come back here again some time, Susan. I wanna come over as much as I can, this food is, like, the best ever!"
Manyara was less obviously bloated than Susan, the extra pounds of fat that buried her gut disguising the effect a little. Still, even she looked like she'd swallowed a basketball, the seams of her dress barely holding together down her flabby sides as she tried to settle more comfortable in her chair.
"Sure, that'd be great," Susan said, massaging her stomach to try and ease the pressing discomfort as she spoke, "I think dad'd be really happy to have you pretty much any time."

They were shortly cut off, however, by something they had both somehow forgotten - the promised dessert! A great chocolate fudge cake, complete with ice cream, whipped cream, double cream and clotted cream, all topped off with a cherry. Both girls eyes widened as it was unveiled before them, simultaneously awed and somewhat afraid.
14123121221121.title: Overeating is Magic

choices: Manyara stays a while before going home...
Manyara's much too full and sleepy to go home - she'll have to stay the night!
141231212211211.content:
Susan was definitely a lot more afraid than her large friend. That was an awful lot of cake - she doubted even Manyara could finish this one off, even with her appetite.

The bigger and greedier Manyara, however, stared wide-eyed at the cake, like she had fallen in love with the giant dessert. Smacking her lips, she wasted no time in grabbing a slice in her hands and cramming it into her mouth.
"Mmm~!" She mumbled blissfully, getting crumbs and cream all over herself.

Susan watched the display with mild surprise. She didn't think her friend would still be so hungry...she likely underestimated her. She even dared to take a slice of cake herself and nibble at it. Its sheer delicious creaminess was enough to encourage larger bites.

Randall watched the girls lovingly as they devoured the dessert he'd made, eating with as much love as he'd put into making it. He'd definitely love to have Manyara coming back over often again.

Eventually, the cake was nothing but crumbs and stains of cake on a platter, and both girls sat back in differing levels of fullness. Susan looked rather nauseous, rubbing her taut, dome-like belly with care, while Manyara let out another belch while patting her massive middle with both plump hands.

"Thanks for the-BURP!-dessert," she muttered, a wide smile on her face, "and the dinner t-HIC!-oo."
Susan had to agree, despite how stuffed silly she was, everything was delicious. "Thanks daddy...BERP!"

Randall could only smile warmly. "You're welcome, girls. My pleasure."
141231212211211.title: Belly Buster!

choices: The bell rings - it's time to go do some exercise...
She resolves to pretend to be ill so she doesn't have to do gym.
1412312122112112.content:
Both girls managed, barely, to stumble back to the couch and collapse onto in a tangle of bloated bodies and chunky limbs, exhausted by the scale of the challenge they had just faced. Almost at once they both fell into sleep, bellies grumbling loudly as their bodies melted down their massive meals. Randall stood in the doorway, looking at the two happily. He'd been afraid to divorce Annette for so long, but now he'd done it he felt better than ever - and from the looks of it, Susan and her friend were more than happy as well. Treading lightly, he crept over and pulled a blanket over the two sleepers, then left the two overfed girls to their digestion.


And just like that, over the next few months a new routine was formed. Once a week at first, then two or three times a week later, Manyara would come over for dinner and Randall would happily serve enough food to stuff them into unconsciousness - and neither girl was anywhere near strong enough to resist their gluttony. Before long, Susan was managing two servings of everything, and Manyara sometimes three.
Susan had talked to her dad about often feeling hungry at school after lunch, and he had been more than happy to oblige her; she now had a large container of pasta to dig into every midday, boosting her daily consumption higher than ever. She didn't know it of course, but before long she was eating easily twice what a girl her age should be - and it was showing more and more on her body each day.

The once skinny girl could now accurately be described as fat; her every aspect now was softened, expanded or weakened by her rocketing weight, making her almost unrecognisable. Her midsection now bulged forwards from her body, a rolling, rounded belly that stretched out her clothes and sagged into her lap whenever she sat down. Where once one could count her every rib, now one could only count the single oversized thickness that was her stomach.
Her butt had expanded too, widening again and becoming softer than ever. Completely devoid of muscle, it spread out beneath her to fill any chair when she sat, and jiggled slightly with every step as she walked (though that was an activity that was becoming more and more rare). Her thighs too were thicker now, their chunky girth tending to rub together in a way that got quite uncomfortable - just another factor that put her off the slightest hint of exercise.
They weren't the only things to have changed though - her face had softened even further, becoming more rounded as she put on more and more pounds, and her cheeks took on a perpetual rosiness. The slight promise of chub at her throat had quickly bloomed into a full-on double chin, her once-sharp jawline thoroughly obliterated.
Even her upper arms were meatier, thick with flab despite her complete lack of muscle. The sleeves of her tops now pinched uncomfortably around the armpit, but she would just shrug and presume she was growing - which indeed she was, just in the thoroughly wrong direction.
Finally, her chest had also seen changes - in part due to her age, mostly due to her gain. It had become chunky and swollen, flabby mounds pressing against the thin fabric of her shirts in away that became quickly immodest - and still her obliviousness was impenetrable, ignoring the every sign of how rapidly her body was changing.

It was now some three months after the first time Manyara had come for dinner and Susan was at school eating her lunch in the canteen, feeling irritable. Their gym teacher had been away from school the entire year due to a freak bullfighting accident, but now he was back - and the layabout replacement gym teacher who'd never made them do any actual gym was gone again. They hadn't done any real gym all year, and Susan was not at all looking forward to that afternoon when she'd have to actually do exercise for the first time in ages...
1412312122112112.title: Rolling Ever Forwards

choices: Gym continues...
The girls try to get out of it...
14123121221121121.content:
Susan's heart sank as the bell rang, signalling the end of lunch. She and Manyara looked at each other with dread - the larger girl, who had actually grown even bigger thanks to a lot of Randall's dinners and desserts, had never been good at gym, and she was enjoying the break away from it just as much as Susan was.

"Maybe it won't be so bad...?" Susan muttered as the two girls waddled to the changing room.
"Susie, it's gym," Manyara reminded her, "nothing good comes from gym."

Once the two girls were in the changing room, they started getting ready. Susan was oblivious to how her larger belly bounced free once she had removed the top of her uniform, and how she had to wriggle her plump backside into her shorts, which squeezed her thighs almost uncomfortably. She had to keep tugging her shirt over her belly to keep it hidden, and after a few times of it riding back up, she managed it.

Soon, they were in a line next to the fitter girls, standing in front of the old gym teacher.
"Okay girls," he began, clapping his hands to get their attention, "I don't know how the substitute teacher was doing while I was gone, but we'll be getting back to the regular system now."

He was teaching us far better actually, Susan thought grimly.

"Of course, we'll start with some warmups," he continued, "some stretches to begin. Okay, ready?"

Susan bit her lip, but complied and followed the instructions. Stretching was much harder after a year of slacking off - raising her arms took significantly more effort, but that was due to the flab accumulating on them and the muscles being underused for so long.
Trying to touch her toes was also a failure, since she couldn't even see them anymore, let alone touch them. Her every attempt caused her tummy to bunch up and press against her, getting her plump fingers nowhere close to her feet.

She panted and puffed, already red in the face. Though, taking a look to Manyara and seeing how she was faring no better - in fact, she was doing marginally worse - Susan couldn't help but be grateful she at least wasn't alone.
14123121221121121.title: Woeful Warmups

choices: They could eat their way to the medical exemption!
They could forge an exemption! Susan's dad would aurely help out...
141231212211211212.content:
"Alright, good job on the warmups, class!" their teacher said, walking eagerly around the room. Apparently his bullfighting accident had not diminished his enthusiasm for the class. "Now for some pushups! Everybody ready?"

Manyara desperately shook her head no, sending her second chin jiggling. Susan was inclined to agree- she was already breaking out into a sweat, and she didn't think that either her or her larger friend could handle 45 more minutes of this torture. So, in a bid to escape, she called out, "Mr. Mantequilla, can me and Manyara please go to the nurse?"

Their teacher, who had been busy calibrating his stopwatch, turned to the two girls in confusion. "Hm?"

Susan tried again. "Mr. Mantequilla, Manyara and I aren't feeling very well. Can we please go to the nurse?"

"Oh no!" He jogged over to them nervously, bending over to inspect Susan once he arrived. "What's bothering you?"

Susan hadn't actually planned that far ahead. "Well, sir, we- uh- well, you see-"

Manyara, sensing her difficulty, interjected with "We're too tired to do this, sir!"

Susan loved Manyara more than anyone else in the world, but at that moment she could have strangled her. Mr. Mantequilla, heretofore understanding, grinned sadistically.

"Oh, I know why you girls are so tired! It's because you've turned into two little gorditas! And that's precisely the problem this class is supposed to combat, si? Unless you can get me a proper medical exemption, you're not going anywhere! Now let's get moving!"

A few minutes later, Susan, dripping with sweat, strained mightily to hold up her fattened form on weakened limbs. Thus far, she'd only managed one pushup, and already she was absolutely exhausted. On the teacher's command, she dropped, only to fall ungraciously all the way down, belly squishing beneath her.

"Sorry!" Manyara whispered from her left side. Susan's sole consolation was that her bigger friend had fallen before her.

"It's okay," Susan whispered back, struggling to regain her breath. "If only we actually had that exemption..."

And, just like that, a lightbulb went off in her little brain.
141231212211211212.title: Escape?

choices: Susan and Manyara's parents start to give them a lot more food for them.
Manyara is a little uneasy about this whole plan, But that won't stop Susan.
1412312122112112121.content:
Susan thought of how she and Manyara could get doctor's notes to get out of gym class, but she couldn't think of anything. After gym class ended, Susan and Manyara, now completely out of breath from gym, tried to think of a plan together. "Maybe we could intentionally get incredibly sick or injured so that we wouldn't be able to go," Manyara said.

"Well, first, I don't really want to try and break anything just to get out of gym, and second, injuries and illness heal, and we'll just be right back where we started," Susan answered," We need a way that won't just fix itself over time. Why was that the first thing you thought of anyway Manyara?"

"I know, and I'm sorry Susie, I'm just a little tired and out of breath from gym," Manyara said looking down at her big belly and rubbing it, "We are pretty big you know."

"Yeah, we are," Susan said, "hey wait, I got an idea, what if we got even bigger, like we both eat more and get so big that it would be impossible for either of us to do anything gym ever again."

"That does sound good," Manyara said in agreement, "but what should we tell our parents regarding it?"

"We'll just ask them if they could give us more food when we eat, that shouldn't be a problem," Susan answered.
1412312122112112121.title: Eating our way to freedom

choices: The girls recover enough to join in - at least throwing and catching is easy...
They're too exhausted to even get up any time soon!
1412312122112112122.content:
Susan could just get her dad to write her an exemption letter - she was sure he'd be happy to do that - and maybe he could even get hold of one for Manyara too. Then they'd both be free of this uncomfortable, sweaty work forever!
Then her heart sank again as she realised that she'd still have to struggle through the whole rest of the gym class first - and even though they'd only been at it less than a quarter of an hour, she was already thoroughly exhausted. Her weak, flabby muscles were burning with the unaccustomed use, all the bouncing up and down and stretching was making her overfed stomach ache, and she was completely drenched in sweat. With a distinctly unladylike grunt she rolled over onto her back to take some pressure off her middle, the wooden flooring of the gym hall hard against her back.

She wasn't really used to discomfort nowadays - she'd become rather pampered in the last few months as her dad doted excessively over her, delighted just to be allowed to parent as he'd always wanted. All that, however, just meant that the few times that she did have to do something uncomfortable she felt all the worse.
"Come on, you lazy cows! Get it together!" Mr. Mantequilla was shouting from the front, evidently very much frustrated by what had happened to his class while he was absent, "Now, sit-ups! I want at least twenty out of each of you or you're staying here after school tomorrow so I can beat you into shape!"

Groaning, Susan and Manyara complied. Hands behind their heads, they struggled agonisingly to pull themselves into a sitting position using only their horribly neglected abdominal muscles. Susan's shirt had long since ridden up exposing her plump, pale belly, the excess flesh bunching up into flabby rolls as she dragged herself painfully upright.
Once she was there, a grand one-twentieth of the way towards her goal, she looked over at Manyara beside her. The other girl was somehow being even less successful than Susan, barely able to even lift her upper body off the floor. With a great effort, the other girl made it to perhaps a fifty degree angle - then her body failed her and she collapsed backwards, soft back fat cushioning the landing. She looked over at Susan, despair in her eyes.
"I'm never gonna manage even one!" she whined, clutching her aching belly and looking close to tears. Although the difference between them had narrowed radically in the last few months, Manyara was still a fair bit bigger than Susan - due in no small part to her own weight gain since she'd starting eating masses of Randall's food every week.
Susan let herself fall back into a lying position, equally despairing. She wasn't at all sure she could manage more than one or two more sit-ups either, but having to come back after school to do extra exercise sounded like her worst nightmares come true.
"C'mon Manyara, we can do it. See if you can use your arms to help out without Mr M. noticing," she said, trying not to acknowledge just how hopeless the situation was.

Grunting and wheezing, the two turned all their efforts towards making it closer to twenty. Sweat dripped from their bodies, soaking their clothes and making the floor slick as they each levered themselves upright, using their arms to help whenever Mr. Mantequilla looked away. After what felt like hours, Manyara was at two and Susan at nine - and both were utterly, completely exhausted. They lay uselessly on the floor, gaping and shuddering like stranded fish - or perhaps more appropriately, beached whales. Their chubby chests rose and fell as they desperately tried to suck in enough air to carry on, but they were both far too unfit to even hope to succeed, even cheating as they had been.

The next thing they knew, Mr. Mantequilla was standing over them, shaking his head despairingly.
"Looks like you two are coming back here tomorrow after school; that was a shameful display," he looked down at the two of them, looking genuinely disappointed in the overweight girls, "I expected better from you especially," he said to Susan, a grim expression on his face as he looked upon her heaving form.
The two girls were two exhausted to speak - they could just gasp and wheeze and look up at him apologetically, hearts beating so fast their pulses were just a continuous roar echoing in their heads, almost drowning out the gym teacher's comments.

He turned away and addressed the class once again.
"Alright! Seeing as most of you seem to have completely forgotten what exercise even is while I was gone, it's time for something a little less arduous. Pair up and practice throwing and catching. I think all of you can manage that!"
1412312122112112122.title: Sit-up Suffering

choices: Gym continues...
After gym...
14123121221121121221.content:
Susan was a little relieved that their next exercise would be something much easier than stretching. Manyara didn't exactly look as relieved, as she was still gasping and wheezing for air.

Susan managed to get herself up, and after giving her larger friend some help standing, she received a ball from Mr Mantequilla. On the way back, she saw that a lot of the other girls weren't faring that much better than her or Manyara. Had everyone really gotten so lazy in the last year?

Then again, it was comforting to know that it wasn't just her.

Manyara was stood there, her legs shaking and her face looking like she was ready to throw up or pass out. But nonetheless, in an attempt to get the teacher off their backs, she raised her meaty arms, ready to catch.
