Susan tossed the ball to her, thankful to see her exhausted friend catch it with some ease. She tossed it back, but with not nearly as much vigour. It actually bounced on the ground before Susan caught it.

Both girls soon discovered that, despite this exercise being so easy, it was still taking a toll on them. Their arms, still aching from the situps and stretches, were practically screaming for a rest, and the girls wished they could oblige.

But the teacher was still watching, and so they kept throwing and catching with as much energy as they could muster. Which was not a lot...
14123121221121121221.title: Catching and Throwing (Up)

choices: Manyara wants to get changed too - they try to find something to fit her.
Susan gets changed, then they wait for dinner.
141231212211211212212.content:
Gym had to end eventually, even if an hour did feel like an eternity to the two overfed, out of shape girls, and so at last the bell rang for the end of the lesson. The girls all filed back into the changing rooms where Manyara and Susan just collapsed onto benches, too exhausted to even bother changing back into their school uniforms. Both of them felt like hell, their muscles burning from the unaccustomed use and their heads pounding. Before they could rest too much though it was time to follow the rest of their class to math.

Fortunately, math didn't feel anywhere near as long as gym had. Neither of them actually contributed to the lesson in any meaningful way, but at least the sit down let their abused bodies recover somewhat. By the time they were heading outside towards the school bus, they had both mostly recovered from their ordeal.

They settled into their regular seats on the bus, sides pressed closely together due to their newfound bulk - the school bus had always been a little squashed, but with both girls now heavily overweight there was even less space than ever, leaving their chunky bodies squashed up tightly against one another.
After a while, Susan's mind kicked into gear.
"Hey, are you coming over this evening? We can get my dad to write us an exemption from gym after school tomorrow," she asked, twisting awkwardly to address the girl pressed up beside her.

Susan felt Manyara shrug.
"I dunno... I feel kinda actually ill. All that gym stuff was horrible..." Manyara admitted, rubbing her stomach miserably, "I might just go home."
"Oh, come on, Manya," Susan protested, "Dad said he was cooking lasagna again and you love that!"
The other girl looked undecided, biting her lip.
"Maybe... I just don't wanna have to go home then walk all the way to your house as soon as I've started relaxing..." she confessed.
"Well, just come straight to mine then," Susan suggested, "C'mon Manyara, you love dad's food. Plus we even have a big family pack of Mars Bars if you still feel ill when we get there."
That made up Manyara's mind.
"Okay, I'll come," she said, pleased by Susan's enthusiasm, "I guess your dad's food is a lot better than takeaway anyway."


After a while the bus drew to a stop, and Manyara and Susan walked the short distance along the road to Susan's house. Susan pulled the door handle and found it open - her dad must already been home. They headed inside, dropping their bags carelessly by the doorway, and wandered through to the kitchen, where they found Randall already at work cooking.

"Hey dad. We're home," Susan announced them, and he turned from where he was chopping garlic on the counter.
"Oh, hello girls," he smiled. After quickly rinsing his hands clean he stepped forwards to hug Susan - and his nose wrinkled at the distinct smell of sweat that surrounded her, "I, uh, think you need to change your clothes, Susie," he suggested politely.
She looked down, the sight of her gym kit reminding her of what she'd been meaning to ask.
"Yeah yeah, I'll do that later, I need to ask you something though - can you write me and Manyara medical exemption letters for gym?"
Randall's brow furrowed.
"Why is that? Are you both ill?" he asked, bemused.
"No, no," Susan laughed, "It's just really tiring and we don't wanna do it. Today was awful; the gym teacher made us do twenty sit-ups or we'd have to go back tomorrow for extra gym, and neither me or Manyara got close so we both have to go back after school. Like, what kind of crazy sports-person can just go and do twenty sit-ups in a row?"

Randall's frown deepened. He was not a particularly aware person, tending to drift through life until something prompted him to pay attention. That was how he'd let his daughter grow from medically underweight to obese in less than a year, after all. However, even he couldn't ignore everything.
"Ah, a lot of people can do twenty sit-ups, Susan. It's not that much at all," he pointed out, vaguely alarmed. He looked down upon his daughter’s rounded form, wondering for the first time if all the massive, unhealthy meals he’d been feeding her the last few months weren’t having some sort of effect. She- she did look a lot heavier than he remembered, now that he thought about it - especially with her soft body bursting out of her gym kit in every direction.

Susan pouted. This wasn’t how she’d expected him to react at all!
“No they can’t. Me and Manyara couldn’t anyway, and we’re as fit as anybody,” she whined, stomping her foot like a brat. Randall watched her thick thigh jiggle from the impact, biting his lip. Maybe he had gotten a little carried away with feeding her all his cooking… even the other girl, Manyara, looked bigger than he remembered – and that was saying something!

“I don’t know, Susie… maybe all this food isn’t doing you much good,” he said, the words catching in his throat, “You’re at a delicate age. Maybe laying off on some of my cooking would be for the best if twenty sit-ups are too much for you.”
Susan’s looked devastated and angry in equal measure.
“What’re you talking about?” she demanded, “I’m fine! You- you sound just like mom!”

That last comment broke Randall’s resolve. What had been the point of tearing his family apart if he was just going to behave like Annette anyway? Susie was at that age when a lot of girls put on a little weight for their growth spurts – he was definitely just making mountains out of molehills.
“I’m- I’m sorry, Susie. I just overreacted for a moment there. It’s been a long day at work, sorry,” he went to hug her apologetically but she stepped away, scowling.
“Good. You were being silly there,” she sniffed, “Just finish making dinner. Come with me Manyara, I’m going to go and get changed.”
She marched from the room with Manyara in tow and Randall watched her plump buttocks jiggle away, soft flab barely contained by her straining shorts.
Sighing, he shook his head and returned reluctantly to cooking.
141231212211211212212.title: Confrontation

choices: At dinner, Manyara attempts to encourage Susie's eating- with favorable results.
Some more time passes, and the two girls are getting closer and closer in weight
1412312122112112122121.content:
By the time the two girls reached the top of the stairs they were sweaty all over again. The effort of climbing stairs, already difficult for young ladies of their size, was made even more difficult by the trials of the day that had passed before, so it was with great relief that the two of them, huffing and puffing, collapsed onto Susan's bed, box springs screaming out in protest of their weight.

"Huff... I can't wait to get out of these clothes!" Susan cried disdainfully, clutching a corner of her sopping shirt in one chunky fist. "I'm going to live in my pajamas all weekend!"

Manyara was a bit quieter than Susan, as the larger girl was still trying to catch her breath, but no less enthusiastic. "I...hff...agree..." she wheezed, trying to smooth her too-small gym shirt over a wide band of exposed brown flesh. "I wish I had...hff...something to wear..."

Susan waved her hands exasperatedly. "Oh, don't be silly! You can wear something of mine! Just hang on a minute, I need to have a look first..."

And with that, the smaller of the two large girls stood up, with some difficulty, and began lumbering around the room looking for clothes. Drawers were opened, shelves examined, closets checked, but, to her chagrin, nothing of hers could be made to fit Manyara. With a mild expletive, she stepped into the bathroom to put on her own pajamas- which, in and of themselves, could only be said to "fit" with a very generous definition of the word- and set off to find something to wear.

Unfortunately, as the only girl remaining in the house, clothing options were limited. Her father's shirts, despite being large in their own way, were made to fit his lanky figure, not Manyara's plush one, so they couldn't work. The few boxes remaining of her mother's were also, very obviously, out of the question. With palpable frustration, Susan combed through a few more boxes sitting in the basement until, finally, she came across something of use.

_____________________
"Manyara! Check this out!" Susan said triumphantly, returning, red-faced, up the stairs with a largish suitcase in her hands.

"Ooh, what is it?" answered the larger girl, who had remained sitting so as not to tire herself unduly.

"Clothes! And in your size, too!" Susan replied, opening the case with the air of a sideshow barker. "Shirts, pants, dresses...there's even a bit of jewelry in here!"

"Oh, wow!" Manyara exclaimed, eyes wide. "These are really nice!"

"Yeah, I'm a little jealous! Here, try this on," Susan agreed, passing over a black silk dress.

Manyara wasted no time, disrobing unabashedly and pulling the dress over her head. "This is awesome, Susie, thank you! What do you think?"

Susan smiled. "You look adorable! It goes with your hair and everything!"

Manyara smiled back. "Aww, thank you! I wish I could keep it..."

"Oh, of course you can! Take the rest of them too, I probably won't need them anyway..."

The insult, even if accidental, didn't miss Manyara. At that rate... she thought to herself spitefully, before dismissing it. No, she's your friend! Take the clothes!
To distract herself, she asked "Where did these come from, anyway?"

"Oh, they were my Aunt Bertha's," Susan answered distractedly. "Mom didn't fit into them, of course, but she said they were good motivation. Apparently Aunt Bertha was a real whale!"

Manyara, even with her forgiving nature, couldn't ignore that one. A whale, huh? Says you... "Oh, how about that," she answered aloud, through gritted teeth. Luckily, she was saved from more anger by Randall's impassioned shout of "Dinner's ready!"

_______

Unfortunately, the anger returned in force when Susan, hurrying towards food, took the stairs two at a time, reaching the table well before Manyara's waddle- necessary, as she couldn't see the stairs beyond her gut- took her down even halfway. I'll show you who's a whale, she thought, a ghastly smile creasing her flabby face.
1412312122112112122121.title: Manyara wants to get changed too - they try to ...

choices: Why don't they and Manyara's family go out to dinner?
Why don't Susan and Manyara have a sleepover on the weekend?
14123121221121121221212.content:
Days passed, then turned into weeks. And in those weeks, Susan and Manyara continued to eat and eat and eat...

To say Susan was fat would be an understatement - by now, she was practically the size Manyara was at the start of this whole deal. She had to wiggle her prodigious hips to get her comfy sweatpants past her massive rear. Though, the only sweating she'd do was if she had to take one too many trips up and down the stairs.
She was convinced that the only reason her shirts stopped covering her belly was because they were shrinking in the wash, and as much as Randall knew that wasn't the case, he decided to go along with his daughter's delusion and get her some new, bigger clothes. He even made sure to swap the brand of washing detergent he used, at least for a while.

She was slowly starting to match Manyara in size, but her best friend was still noticeably larger thanks to frequent dinners at her house. Her belly sagged down quite a bit, and any skirts or dresses clung close to her wide form. Her larger rump made her panties rather snug, and easy to see if she ever had to bend over.
She had quickly forgiven Susan's accidental insults from weeks prior, knowing her best friend would never mean to hurt her. Plus, she let her finish her dessert when she was too full, which helped improve her mood.



One morning, Susan waddled herself into the kitchen, and grinned as she saw her loving father was cooking at the oven.
"Morning, daddy," she chirped, giving him a hug.
"Good morning, sweetie," Randall smiled and put his arm around her, using his other hand to keep cooking...what smelled like sausages to Susan, "breakfast's nearly ready."
"Great!" The large daughter giggled and sat herself at the table, her chair creaking ever so slightly. Her being spoiled and stuffed stupid for a matter of months had made her into a bit of a daddy's girl.

Randall set down a plate in front of Susan, holding a generous helping of sausages, scrambled egg, poptarts and toast topped with chocolate spread. He smiled lovingly as she thanked him before digging in, savouring every huge bite of her big breakfast.

In fact, the sight of his daughter enjoying her food so much gave him an idea...
14123121221121121221212.title: Blubbery Besties

choices: The girls go to the restaurant in school uniform
The girls go to the restaurant in different clothes
141231212211211212212121.content:
Randall had always been the one cooking for his daughter these past several months, and had never given himself a proper break. Seeing the joy and satisfaction on Susan's face when she ate his meals was always enough motivation for him to not slack off in cooking them. It was also enough motivation for him to put his brief revelation about Susan's unfitness into the past and forget about it almost completely.

He deserved a break. "Hey, Susie," he said to her while he sat down in front of the much smaller, leaner breakfast he prepared for himself. "It's Friday, so how about we go to the Texas for dinner tonight?"

Susan's jaw dropped at the mention of the famous restaurant, hurriedly closing it to keep her breakfast from falling out of her full mouth. She swallowed without finishing her chewing. "For real!?" she exclaimed. She had never been there, since her late mother absolutely forbid it and and after her food revolution began her father had cooked every one of her meals. She heard the praises sang by her classmates about it and had dreamed of going since her new love of food emerged. A surprise like this was only one step below being told that Father Christmas himself was coming to bring presents to her tonight in addition to Christmas morning.

The Big Texas Ranch was a locally-owned restaurant specializing in American and Mexican-American cuisine. It was renowned for the food being as delicious as the portions were large. "Texas-sized" was the buzzword commonly used by the wait staff and the multitude of impressed customers. "American-sized" was large enough, but it's a common saying that "everything's bigger in Texas," and the owners of the establishment certainly took those words to heart.

"Can I invite Manyara?" she was quick to add. An opportunity like this needed to be shared with her best friend who had now solidly become an eating buddy.

Her father chuckled a bit at her response. He should have expected this reaction. This would be even more of a treat for her than it was for him. "Go ahead." He paused his fork in its track as an idea struck him. "Ask her if her mother wants to come too. We live so close but I haven't seen her in a year."

"Okay," Susan said, and returned to eating with newfound excitement. She wolfed down her rich breakfast in record time, all without choking. She wriggled her cushioned butt from the seat and stood up. The thick, meaty ball of her belly always expanded farther after every meal, and while she was sitting, pushed her pajama tee up so that it no longer covered any of its expanse and bunched up below the pair of slowly-growing fat bulges on her chest. Now standing, she tugged on the hem of the tee and forced it to the level of her navel. It's inflexible fabric cut into her plush flesh, but that tension held it in place, as long as it wasn't jarred with any exertion from the tubby girl.

Walking upstairs to her room was more of a chore than ever, and her top found its way back to its previous position. The strength of her muscles had no significant increase since the start of eating filling meals, and they protested when tasked to lift the new and increasing layers of fat. Her stance was forced to be wider as she stepped upon the stairs so that her thick pillow thighs wouldn't squeeze and rub together so much. Every part of her body jiggled as she landed each step, from the aforementioned thighs to her ponderous belly, love handles that could never be covered by any shirt she owned at the same time as her gut, buttocks that threatened to tear the weak pink fabric of her pajama pants, arms that looked like sausages but felt like marshmallows, thick chipmunk cheeks that already looked stuffed with treats, and even her extra chin. Although her skin and outfit was covered with a thin sheen of sweat by the time she got there, she made it to the top of the stairs without stopping once.

In her room, Susan fussed her body and its rolls out of her pajamas and dressed into her school uniform. The skirt had long ago refused to fit around her waist and barely fit around her hips. The shirt no longer tucked in neatly to the waistband and only buttoned when Susan sucked in her belly fat (as best as she could with her weak muscles) and squeezed it with her hands. It did not cover her middle completely and left covered less than half of each love handle, as well as left a triangle of pale flesh visible below the last button, as framed by the two front shirttails. Both articles were the largest size offered by the school, and Randall's new fabric softener had the rare property of stretching out most materials instead of shrinking them. It did not, however, loosen any part of the skirt except for the waistband, and anyone Susan's height or shorter would be able to see flashes of strained panties if they walked behind her lumbering form. Socks and shoes were a challenge, as they required the obese girl to squish a meaty thigh into a round doughy middle. Ordeals such as dressing herself required her to wake up significantly earlier than what used to be usual, but this did not bother Susan as she usually went straight to bed after her post-dinner snack.

She verified with a glance in the mirror that she was dressed mostly-appropriately for school. The sweat she accumulated from her trial with the stairs had evaporated from the time each inch of her skin spent nude during the extended dressing session. She wiped her face clean with a wet cloth and proceeded to walk back downstairs. Her legs were relieved that they did not have to lift her body up so far this time, and therefore she did not sweat on her descent, but she could still feel every pound and ounce wobble and jiggle just as it had before.

She gathered up her backpack, waved goodbye to her father, and walked onto the street to the waiting bus. She and Manyara had (through constant badgering) persuaded the school bus driver to stop in front of each of their houses to pick them up and drop them off, instead of the traditional method of waiting for both girls by the corner.

The door of the bus was much narrower than any in her house, and Susan could feel her hips brushing against the sides of it as she climbed the last four steps she would need to that morning. She plopped herself down in the front seat, near the window, and a minute later watched as Manyara worked and struggled to positively squeeze her enormous, skirted rear through the door and onto the bus. Unlike Susan's father, Manyara's mother had spent the money to get her daughter clothes not offered by the school catalog. They were manufactured by a different brand and therefore technically did not meet the dress code, but except for size there was very little difference. Susan could see that not all of Manyara's sweat had evaporated like hers had and glistened gently on her face when she heaved herself onto the seat next to her. Now that both of their buttocks and thighs were fully spread from the weight of their bodies pressing down on them, Susan felt squished against the wall of the bus on one side and her friend on the other, and only about half of Manyara was truly on the seat.

As soon as her friend was settled, Susan burst into speech. "Hey, my dad said you and your mom should come with us to the Texas for dinner tonight!" she exclaimed.

"I'd love to go," Manyara answered, her eyes suddenly brightening at the news. "I'm sure my mom would too. I'll tell her as soon as we get back home. Have you ever been there?"

"No," Susan answered, "but I've heard so much about it!"

Manyara's response began with a grin. "You'll love it, I'm sure. It's not much like how your dad cooks, but I still know you'll love it."

Susan tried to wiggle in her seat from excess excitement and ended up shaking Manyara's body just as much as her own.

The school day passed as usual, with the two tubby grade-schoolers doing their best to stay focused on the teacher despite their anticipation, and of course, their recurring hunger. Mr. Mantequilla had quit his job in frustration at the incompetence of not just Manyara and Susan, but the softening of the student body as a whole that took place under the substitute teacher. The school administration was doing their best to get him back, but for now the substitute was back in charge, and his laziness was beaten only by that of the two fattest girls in class.

The two girls loaded themselves back onto the bus at day's end and unloaded themselves in front of their respective houses. Susan waddled in through the door, calling out, "Hi Dad!" to announce her arrival.

"Hi Susie," he called back. He was in the kitchen, as usual, just about to start baking some sweets and treats for his ever-hungry daughter who consumed a surprising amount of them between every meal.

Susan's stomach growled with an accompanying ache the moment she set her backpack down. This was normally the time when she ate her post-school snack, which filled her up and would tide her over until dinner came. She trotted slowly over to her father. "Dad, can we go to the Texas soon?"

"Now?" he asked, confused. The clock on the wall showed that it was not even three-thirty yet. Susan opened her mouth to speak but was interrupted by an even louder groan and moan from her belly. Randall heard it and made a sound that combined a giggle and a sigh. "Alright, I'll call Lou Anne and Manyara. You go get yourself ready."
141231212211211212212121.title: Excited for Texas

choices: The parents take some time to catch up.
Their daughters insist they get inside and start eating!
1412312122112112122121212.content:
Susan wasted no time in getting herself ready. After another arduous trek up the stairs and building up a new sweat, she lumbered into her room and started changing. She pulled off her shoes with her feet and kicked them neatly next to the wall, electing to keep her socks on to avoid anymore effort.
Her shirt and skirt were more than happy to come off, her rounded form bouncing out the moment it was released from the strain of waistbands and buttons. And Susan was more than happy to discard them onto her bed before deciding what to wear for dinner.

She decided on a pair of jean-shorts first, needing to wiggle her bulbous backside to get the waistband past it. She sucked in, which took quite a bit of effort, and quickly fastened the button before exhaling. The fabric stuck into her, giving her some strain on the rear, and her thick thighs were a little squeezed in the legs.
Next was to find a top. She decided on a t-shirt with a logo with one of her favourite video games on it. With her great ball of belly sticking out and overhanging her waist, the shirt was quite a tight fit. Her thick lovehandles made the fabric really snug on her wide form, causing her to have to tug it down over her flabby front. If she didn't have to go through any tough physical strain later, she should be okay.
Her shoes, a pair of sneakers, were the easiest. With the laces already tied, all she had to do was slip them on her feet.

Before she could do anything else, the smell of fresh baking from downstairs hit her nose. Her tongue quickly slid across her lips as her belly let out another aching grumble. Wasting no more time, she lumbered downstairs and into the kitchen to see a pile of chocolate chip cookies on a plate at the table.
"I just thought you could use a little snack to tide you over till we get to the Texas," Randall said with a smile, and ruffled his daughter's hair, "Lou Anne and Manyara will meet us there, so we'll leave in about half an hour, okay?"
Susan grinned from the petting, and nodded. "Thanks dad!" She chirped before digging into the cookies. With the amount there were on the plate, and how big Susan's appetite had grown along with her body, she shouldn't be hungry again until they get to the restaurant.

-------

Sure enough, just as Randall pulled the car into a parking spot near the Big Texas Ranch, a hungry growl sounded from next to him. He smiled at his daughter sitting in the passenger seat, who was staring longingly at the restaurant.
"Here we are," he chuckled, "ready?"
"You know I am," Susan giggled, quickly undoing her seatbelt and sliding out of the passenger car door, landing on the ground with a heavy thud.

The two walked toward the front doors, where a familiar duo were waiting anxiously. Not out of meeting their contacts, but excitement to get inside and devour.
Manyara spotted her best friend, and waddled up to greet her. She was wearing one of the dresses Susan gave her from her Aunt Bertha, and even it was looking rather strained on her spherical form.
"Hey!" She chirped.
"Hi," Susan smiled, "this place is big, huh?"
"Yeah!" Manyara grinned, causing her huge plump cheeks to squint her eyes even more than normal, "So you've never been here, huh?" Susan shook her head in response. "You're gonna love it!"

Meanwhile, the two adults greeted each other with a hug. Lou Ann was clear evidence where Manyara got her size and appetite from - the woman was rather massive in her own right, sporting a figure not unlike her daughter's. Her jeans and shirt looked almost skin-tight on her round form, her prodigious backside straining the rear of her pants.
"Thanks for being so nice to Manyara, Randy," she said, then added with a smirk, "Really nice, huh?"
Randall blushed with a shy smile, knowing she was obviously referring to how her daughter was ballooning lately. "What can I say, she has a healthy appetite."
Lou Ann let out a belly-wobbling chuckle. "Don't I know it. Girl just loves stuffing her face, but hey, it's good for her right?"
The father nodded. "Agreed. I'm really glad I could start giving Susan some real food."
"Yeah, I thought she looked different," Lou Ann said, craning her neck to see the formerly skinny girl, "she used to be such a twig, didn't look healthy at all."
Randall could just nod in agreement.
1412312122112112122121212.title: Double Daughter Dinner

choices: Everyone orders and the adults talk about their daughters
Everyone orders and an "incident" happens
14123121221121121221212122.content:
"Come ON, Mom!" Manyara whined, tugging on her mother's hand with both of hers. "We're hungry and you can flirt inside." This elicited a blush from both Lou Ann and Randall, and the two thought it best to concede to their hungry daughters and head inside the restaurant.

The inside of the Big Texas Ranch was decorated with a heavily rustic style. Pillars stretched to the ceiling made of bare wood with the rough texture approximately that of railroad ties. The walls were covered in horse whips, wagon wheels, pieces of saddles, and other iconic artifacts from the Old West. The air inside was cozily warm and country music bounced through it.

A hostess showed the two families to their seats. Many restaurants would be closed at this time of the afternoon but the Texas understood its own popularity. Even now about a half-dozen tables were occupied.

All four of the new arrivals looked through the menu, which was thick enough to better resemble a catalog. Burgers, sandwiches, seafood, steak, pasta dishes, tacos and burritos- Randal and Susan looked at the impressive selection with eyes like orbs. There were even American specialties having nothing to do with Texas at all, such as Chicago dish pizza and Louisiana Cajun crawfish.

A waitress came by just a few minutes later, when Randall and Susan hadn't even finished exploring the expansive, diverse menu. She looked to be in her late teens, with round, blush cheeks, a cute button nose, well-trimmed eyebrows, and a thick body ripe with generous curves. She giggled at the sight of the three female bodies that her own sympathized with. "Hey, y'all, my names Christina and I'll be your server today. What can I get'cha for your first order?" Randall was the only one to notice that she said "first" order to imply that making a second or perhaps third order was standard. He was also the only one to notice that her accent fit better in a bad cowboy movie than any place in Texas.

"Do you know what you want, Susie?" he asked his daughter.
14123121221121121221212122.title: A Big Texas Welcome

choices: An opportunity! Manyara surreptitiously tries to encourage Susie to eat more.
Soon enough, the plates are cleared...is more on the table?
141231212211211212212121222.content:
"Do you know what you want, sweetie?" Randall asked his daughter, slightly worried about what she may order. The over-greased dinners they served here, though delicious, were rather an affront to his budding-chef sensibilities.

"Yeah, I'll have the...the Triple Texan Burger, please?" Susie asked, still pursuing the menu.

"Yes you can, sugar-plum!" Christina smiled, laying the accent on thick. "Now what would y'all like as a side?"

"Umm...can I have cheesy fries? The ones with everything on them?" Susie added, laying her menu down on the table.

"The Loaded Rodeo Fries? Sure thing, honey!" Christina scribbled on her pad, then turned towards Manyara. "And for you, sweetie?"

"I'll have the same thing as her!" Manyara beamed, her smile creasing her chubby cheeks.

"All-righty! Y'all are a nice easy table," Christina giggled. "And for you in the back?"

"Yeah, I'll have a...uh...just a salad?" Randall asked, feeling slightly self-conscious.

Christina cocked an eyebrow. "A salad? At the Big Texas Ranch? Whatever you say, pardner." She scribbled something on her pad. Randall couldn't help but notice that the accent slipped just a little.

"And how about you, ma'am?" she asked, turning towards Lou Ann.

Lou Ann smiled politely. "I guess I'll just have a salad too."

Randall was rather surprised at that, considering the roundness of both her and her ever-growing daughter, but was even more surprised when the waitress' face switched into an outright scowl.

"Right then, I'll have your orders out soon." Christina hissed, all traces of Texas gone. In its place was a very clear Cockney accent.

The girls didn't appear to notice, though- they were too busy enjoying each other's company, laughing and giggling about school and such. Randall wished he could be so carefree; alas, everything in life seemed to be weighing on him lately. Work seemed endless, his coworkers were catty and rude, and, to top it off, he wasn't sure he was doing such a good job as a parent. Susie had absolutely blown up over the past couple of months, and showed no signs of stopping in the future. That was probably a bad thing...right?

He looked over at Lou Ann happily gazing into the distance. She must not have a worry in the world, he thought sadly.

__________________

On the contrary, Lou Ann was very much worried about her little Manyara. Only one meal? Gosh, I hope she's feeling alright! Oh god, what if...

what if she has anorexia?

__________________

Susie looked around the restaurant, idly scratching at an exposed portion of her chubby belly. It had seemed like hours since she had put her order in, and she was really starting to get hungry. I should have ordered an appetizer, she grumbled to herself. Then again, it's probably a good thing I didn't.

I don't want to get fat...

______________________

Across the table, Manyara, ignoring her own hunger pangs, glared across at her distracted friend. Truthfully, though she had forgiven Susie for the unintentional slight, she had not forgotten it. Now, though, she was regretting ever entertaining forgiveness.

Stupid Susie, going out like that... she's so skinny she thinks it's okay to have her belly out all over the place? I wear these uncomfortable dresses all the time, and she gets to wear shorts?

Manyara sighed out loud by accident, and Susie turned slightly, distracted. The larger Thai girl plastered a fake grin on her face and Susie turned away once more. Once Susie was safely occupied, the glare returned stronger than before.

Maybe I'm tired of being the fat one...
_________________

"All-right, everybody! Y'all's dinners're out and piping hot!"

Randall's head snapped towards the waitress, startled into paying attention. He had inadvertently been staring at Lou Anne, and he hoped she hadn't noticed. "Uh, salad here, please."

Christina's eyes narrowed. "Ah know, Mister. No need to tell me how to do my job."

Randall received his salad in silence, thoroughly chastised.

Lou Ann took her own and smiled comfortingly across the table. To tell the truth, she didn't really want this salad; she just didn't want to look fat in front of Randall. Unfortunately, she was sure to go hungry later- in her family, it was usually Manyara finishing her dinner.

"And for you girls...two Super Deluxe Texas Platters, just as you ordered."

"Um, we ordered the..." Susie started, but trailed off quickly after the chubby waitress plonked two absolutely enormous plates in front of the two moderately enormous girls. They both stared, wide-eyed, as Christina absent-mindedly rattled off the contents.

"Cheese fries, onion rings, hamburgers, hot dogs, cole slaw, corn fritters, mashed potatoes...yep, all there! You girls enjoy now!"

And before anyone could protest, she was off, moving at a rather fast clip for someone pushing 250 pounds. The girls, on the other hand, were more distracted by the food in front of them.

Randall cleared his throat. "Well, uh...dig in, I guess."
141231212211211212212121222.title: This Ain't Her First Rodeo

choices: Manyara continues to enable Susie's eating
Susie gets anxious about her weight
1412312122112112122121212221.content:
Susie was nearly overwhelmed by the unexpectedly-expansive platter set before her, and started by taking only a bit of each thing. In her mind it was to sample everything and decide which was her favorite, but her father took it as a different kind of hesitation. "Uh, Susie," Randall commented, "we can ask the waitress to take it back and bring you what you ordered."

Manyara interrupted before Susie could give her answer. "No, this is great! This looks much better than just the burgers!" Like Susie, she took bites of everything before coming to a decision. "Here, Susie, you can have my fries, I don't really like that kind of cheese," she said as she passed the paper tray to her friend.

"What are you talking about?" Lou Anne asked her daughter. "You had no problem with the cheese fries the last time we came here."

"I don't know... they're... different this time?" Manyara didn't mean to make it a question, but she wasn't used to lying to her mother. Fortunately for her, her mother wasn't used to being lied to and for the most part accepted that answer albeit with a staccato hum of disapproval. It was another irregularity for Lou Anne to add to the list of things she noticed in her daughter tonight.

Susan accepted the gift from her friend. "Oh, thanks," she said modestly. The cheese fries weren't her favorite on the platter, but she did still feel guilty about hurting her best friend and wanted to be as agreeable as possible to help make amends. If Manyara was kind enough to give her an offer, she would be kind enough to accept.

"Oh, this too," Manyara added, passing her Coney Island hot dog over. The sausage itself was completely obscured by all of the meaty sauce, mustard, and onions piled on top of it.

"When did you become such a fussy eater?" Lou Anne remarked with a scowl.

"No, Mom, it's fine," Manyara protested. "I can have seconds here, remember?" Even if Susan hadn't noticed until just now when her friend pointed it out, Manyara knew through personal experience that the waitress would come back around and ask if she would like to order something else too.

"Fine," she said, maintaining her scowl. "Just make sure you won't get hungry before bed." Lou Anne knew her daughter and her daughter's stomach well, and knew precisely how much food she needed to avoid being hungry too soon. She also knew (but wouldn't admit) that if Manyara did say she was hungry tonight that Lou Anne would feed her whatever she wanted.

"Is there anything of mine that you want?" Susan asked Manyara.

Manyara looked over her friend's expanded platter. "Nope," she lied. While extra fried onion rings sounded delicious, she knew that they could wait until her second order. Susie needed them more than she did, after all, if she was going to fatten up like Manyara wanted her to.

Lou Anne leaned over to Randall and talked to him in a half-whisper. "Does your daughter do this yet?" she asked pointing at Manyara.

"No," he answered with a small shake of his head. "She eats whatever I put down, and sometimes asks for more. I think she's just happy to be free of her mother's cooking." Lou Anne took a glum bite of her salad. "Maybe though," he continued as an idea came to him, "she's so used to your own cooking that coming here isn't good enough."

Lou Anne stared at her salad for a moment as she thought, "Maybe," she said finally, "but she seems more than happy eating dinner at your house."

"Well, I... don't know what to say." He was a bit embarrassed. This emotion fled from his face when he noticed that under the first layer of greens in his salad there lay an abundance of chicken in an oily dressing. The girls seemed to be happy trading their food, so... "Hey, want some of my chicken?" he asked the woman across from him.

"Oh-yes-please!" Lou Anne responded all too fast. She had only ordered the salad because having the same thing as Randall seemed like an attractive idea at the time, but she soon realized that just a salad was a mistake to her pampered stomach that no amount of grilled chicken or dressing could fix on its own. A bit of a relaxed smile touched the corners of her mouth as the man used his fork to scrape more than half of his meat onto her plate.

In the meantime Susie had her hands full with eating both her own food and what Manyara had given her. As much as she knew she didn't want to get fat (in her own mind she was merely "chubby" or "plump" although nearly anyone would disagree), eating quickly sent her mind into a daze and she lost all self-control. Before she knew it, almost twenty minutes had passed which left her platter empty and her belly full. Being distracted by gleefully watching her friend-she-was-jealous-of stuffing her face, Manyara finished her smaller platter at about the same time. Lou Anne had finished her salad with extra chicken a long time ago and spent the time not spent conversing with Randall looking forlornly at her empty plate. Her and her daughter's faces both brightened up when Christina came back to the table.

"Hey, y'all, anything else I can get for you?"

Manyara piped up, "Yeah, we didn't get our Triple Texan Burgers or our Rodeo Fries."

Christina's hand flew to her open mouth. "Oh dearie me! I must have given you the wrong order. I'll go get those right away for you. Randall was suspicious of the waitress and wondered if the "mistake" was made on purpose. Her reaction now certainly seemed like it might be an act.

His train of thought, however, was interrupted by Lou Anne. " Actually," she said to Christina, "I'd like an order of those too."

"Now we're talkin'!" she said with some good humor returning as she scribbled on her pad. After she was done, she turned to Randall and said with a wave of her hand that ended on her breast, "Oh, don't worry about the extra platters. It was my mistake: it's on the house." She correctly assumed that Randall didn't want to order anything else and promptly left.

Less than three minutes later, Christina returned with two Triple Texan Burgers and matching Rodeo Fries, almost as if they had been waiting in the kitchen the whole time. "Yours will be just another few minutes," she reassured Lou Anne as she set the new plates before the two girls and took back the empty platters. The burgers had no less than three quarter-pound beef patties with thick slices of American cheese between them as well as caramelized onions, tomato slices, and sweet sauce. Similarly, the fries were coated in yellow cheese, barbecue sauce, and who knows what else.

Manyara grasped her burger without a second thought and took huge bites from it. She had practically starved herself before with the amount of food she had given to Susie. Susie, however, was already full, but still ate her burger and fries so as to appease her friend and not make her gifts go to waste, as rationalized in her own childish logic. It was a struggle to finish this second course and by the end of it her tee shirt tugged itself upwards at the slightest provocation and the button of her jean shorts dug tightly into her soft waist. Lou Anne soon got her own burger and fries and just as quickly as her daughter found them gone from her plate. Randall merely sipped his glass of water while watching the other three scarf down their greasy seconds.

Christina found herself back at the table almost as soon as all three females were done and asked, "How 'bout some dessert?"

I really don't think-" Randall began.

"Yes please!" interrupted Manyara and Lou Anne simultaneously.

"Chocolate mousse cake for us," Manyara ordered as she pointed to herself and Susie.

"The same for us too," Lou Anne ordered, obviously referring to Randall.

Being a cold dessert and one prepared beforehand, the twin cakes were deftly brought to the table by Christina's hands and pleased face. Randall and Susan had expected a slice of cake, not a whole one, and so stared wide-eyed at the spectacle before them. Manyara took the provided knife and cut her cake cleanly in half to share between herself and Susie. Randall cut only a single slice for himself and left the rest to be devoured by Lou Anne, whose two-course meal was rather meager in her own opinion.

Susan was thoroughly panting at this point as she pushed each forkful of rich cake into her mouth. She was full to the point of hurting, but this was truly delicious- even more than her dad's usual desserts. At this point, anything less than making the effort to push her belly outwards caused near-unbearable tightness in her stomach. She popped the button open on her jean shorts to relieve their pressure on her body and hoped in vain that her shirt would cover it. After this, she realized that all of the cake was gone. Susan didn't know whether to be disappointed that she couldn't taste more of it, or relieved that her tummy didn't have to hold anything else

Christina came back to the table with the bill. "Here y'all go," she said with a grin. She appeared to be in better spirits now after seeing three of her four guests stuffed to her satisfaction as opposed to when she was taking their first orders. Randall looked over the bill with Lou Anne and was surprised to see it was less than he expected. Primarily this was due to the two Deluxe Texas Platters not being present (as Christina promised) but also because apparently the Big Texas Ranch didn't think too much of salads. After a minute of polite arguing with Lou Anne the two decided to split the bill evenly; each parent-daughter pair ordered the exact same thing after all.

After the bill was paid, the parents and children each said their goodbyes and returned to their cars. From the moment she stood up from the table until even after she sat down in the rear car seat, Susie pulled the front side of her shirt down over her bloated middle to cover it. Not realizing how much she had eaten until after the fact was a bad habit of hers. "I hope I don't get too fat from this," she thought to herself.
1412312122112112122121212221.title: Opportunities to Stuff Girls

choices: She checks the bathroom scales before breakfast...
Breakfast is ready! She can worry about this later...much later...
14123121221121121221212122212.content:
A few weeks passed since the restaurant incident, and Susie showed no signs of halting her eating habits. Randall, despite his doubts, continued to cook delicious rich meals for his daughter, who happily and gratefully gobbled each and every one up.

Manyara wasn't exactly helping when it came to healthy eating. Despite her anger at the restaurant subsiding and her desired change of wardrobe coming when she just asked her mother about it, she continued to encourage her best friend's snacking habits. Not out of malice, but out of sharing her love of (or addiction to) junk food with her BFF.

This meant Susie was gobbling up fried breakfasts, full lunches, rich dinners and sweet desserts every day, combined with constant snacking between meals. And it really began to show...

One Saturday morning, the girl huffed and grunted as she tried to pull one of her favourite t-shirts over her belly, but it just kept riding back up in the mirror. Unlike at the restaurant when she was stuffed to the point of almost bursting, Susie hadn't eaten a thing yet that day - in fact, she could hear the sizzling of eggs and sausages on the grill downstairs. No doubt dad was cooking up another yummy breakfast.
Her belly was a sagging dome of pale flab, hanging over her waistband and covering the front of her panties, which felt rather tight around her bulbous backside. Her thighs were like small tree trunks that jiggled with each step, and had forced her to recently start developing a waddle to her walk. Her underdeveloped chest pushed against the top of her t-shirt, Her upper arms were squeezed in the sleeves of her shirt, bulging out at the ends, and her hands were getting rather pudgy with some cutely fat little fingers. Her cheeks were shaped like tennis balls with a perpetual blush, giving her the tiniest squint in her eyes, and her once-small double chin was now fully visible.

Once she wiggled her shorts up past her large rump, and settled rather snugly around her widened waist, she continued to look at herself in the mirror. The sound of breakfast cooking downstairs made her think of all she had been eating recently - specifically, was it too much?

Was she getting too fat?
14123121221121121221212122212.title: Softening Susie

choices: Susie goes shopping with Manyara and her dad
Susie goes shopping with Manyara and Lou Anne
141231212211211212212121222122.content:
Being fat wouldn't be such a huge problem if she had clothes that fit. Susan had only gone on one serious clothes shopping trip since her mother left; the majority of her clothes were from far slimmer days. The only reason she could still fit into her shirts, shorts, and underwear at all was because her body had permanently stretched them out. As they stood now, the limits of their elasticity had been reached.

Her school skirt and buttoned shirt were giving her different problems. She was already wearing the largest size the school offered, and her growth over the past few weeks gave her issues. Both articles of clothing severely constricted her belly and waist now and as the school day progressed, uncomfortable, red pressure marks appeared on her soft skin. Susan spent every short break between classes hidden in a bathroom stall where she could unbutton everything and enjoy some relief. If she were to grow any wider, she would have to order a special uniform like Manyara did.

"It's time for shopping," she thought as she planted her fists on her squishy hips. This pose accentuated just how little of her belly her current shirt covered. She pressed her palms to her chest and gave a squeeze. "I should also probably get a training bra."

She jiggled her way downstairs before her stomach could growl in protest of being empty and sat down at the table. Her father soon placed her plate of breakfast before her. She scooped up a fried egg and put it between two slices of toast and added some jelly. The eggs were fried in some of the grease from the sausage for added flavor. There were also some apple and cinnamon pancakes being cooked over the stove.

"Dad, can I have some money to go clothes shopping?" she asked her busy father between bites.

Randall looked over his shoulder at Susie. Her belly was in full view even though breakfast had just begun. He agreed that she could get some better-fitting clothes. "Sure," he said nonchalantly. He didn't really want his daughter to get fat, but now that she was he would have to make the best of it. "You're going with Manyara, right?"

"Yeah. I'll call her after breakfast." Manyara had decent fashion sense most of the time, and as much as Susie hated to admit it, would be the local expert on what looks good on a fat schoolgirl.

"Luckily I'm pretty free today," Randall commented. "I can drive you if you want, or Manyara's mom might be able to." "If you want some girl time," he added mentally.
141231212211211212212121222122.title: A More Pressing Issue

choices: The two snack while Lou Ann gets ready!
The three head into town...
1412312122112112122121212221222.content:
After breakfast, Susan made the call to Manyara, asking if she wanted to go shopping. As chance would have it, she and her mom were planning to do just that, and she was promptly invited along. Naturally, she could never turn down such an offer.

Randall had mixed feelings about learning about it. On one hand, he loved spending time with his girl and he'd be left alone in the house, but Susie pointed out that he could have some time to himself while she was gone. He couldn't help but think he could use some time to relax after doing so much cooking lately, and he knew Lou Anne would look after her. Plus, it was sweet of her to think of his needs.

After cleaning herself up and receiving a healthy wad of cash from Randall for clothes (among other things, the greedy girl thought slyly) she waddled her way down the street to her friend's house. What was normally a minute-long walk was now a five minute waddle that left Susie at Manyara's door with a light bead of sweat on her forehead.
She was allowed a minute to catch her breath before the door opened, and she easily managed a smile as she and her best friend greeted each other with a hug.

Just like Susie the Thai girl had been ballooning quite a lot herself, still noticeably much fatter than her. She had been keeping up her snacking as always, and she still kept coming over to Susie's for a delicious dinner and dessert night. Despite how much more effort it was taking to make the walk over, how could she not try to spend time with her bestie?
Recently, Manyara had decided she wanted a change from wearing dresses all the time - like Susie, she was wearing a pair of shorts that looked rather snug, slightly cutting into her thick thunderthighs and being tight around the backside. She was wearing a rather large video game t-shirt, which was tight around her spherical middle section but loose in the sleeves. It was clearly an adult size.

"Cool shirt!" Susie grinned.
"Right?" Her larger friend chirped, looking down at the graphic that actually wasn't badly stretched for once, "Mom got it for me last week, it's so awesome!"
"Where'd she find it?" Susie asked, "I wanna get one too."
"In town, I think," Manyara shrugged, "she'll probably take us there today. Wanna get a snack before we go? We got some Doritos and Hershey's!"
That alone was enough to make Susie's tongue slide across her lips and forget about her concerns that morning. "Sure!"
1412312122112112122121212221222.title: Some Girl Time

choices: They discuss what clothes they'll get!
Lou Anne is ready, and they go to town!
14123121221121121221212122212221.content:
The girls wasted no time in grabbing a large bag of Doritos each, as well as many Hershey's bars their plump little hands could carry before waddling from Manyara's kitchen to her couch. Susan loved coming over to Manyara's - her couch was much bigger and comfier than hers, even if it was big and comfy enough for her. She was almost tempted to ask her dad to get one for their house.
They flopped their big rumps down on the plush, memory foam cushions and dug into their snacks. One hand for Hershey's, the other for Dorito's. Susan had a large cheese-flavoured bag, while Manyara favoured the spicy flavour. The TV was already on Cartoon Network when they plodded in.

The familiar setting of sitting around in Manyara's living room and snacking while watching cartoons pushed any worries out of Susan's mind. She hadn't even realised that hers and the larger Thai girl's plush hips were touching!

The sounds of the TV mixed with the noise of chomping and crunching from the girls' snacking filled the air.
14123121221121121221212122212221.title: Fuelling Up

choices: Say the suit looks lovely - Manyara will surely appreciate the compliment.
Sometimes the truth must be said.
141231212211211212212121222122211.content:
"So, what you planning to buy in town?" Manyara piped up after a while, words slightly slurred through a mouthful of Doritos. The TV had gone to ads, momentarily freeing her from the dull spell of late-morning television.
"Oh, pretty much everything," Susan admitted, "I've been growing out of a lot of my clothes recently. I guess I'm going through a growth spurt."
"Yeah, me too," Manyara agreed, "Mom says most girls our age get growth spurts, it's natural."

Both girls certainly were going through a growth spurt - just not the kind doctors would consider 'natural'. Theirs was a definitively man-made disaster, a product of poor decisions and poor self-control - the two girls' drastically expanded girths was one thing for which Mother Nature really couldn't be blamed.

"Definitely!" Susan agreed, trying her best to ignore the niggling thought that perhaps the changes her body had been experiencing weren't just the standard rigours of puberty, "It sucks though. I gotta get new tops, new skirts, a nice dress to wear for parties and stuff, a swimsuit, underwear - everything!"
Manyara blinked.
"Wow, you really do need to get a lot of stuff. Mom's got me a couple of things recently and those clothes you gave me a while ago still fit, kinda, so I don't have quite as much. I still need to buy all sorts of stuff, though - I'd love to get a dress that fits, I'm too big for all of my old ones."
She stared into the middle-distance with a look of remorse on her bloated face, remembering just last weekend when her favourite dress had split all the way down one side as she'd bent over to grab a dropped candy. That had been... embarrassing.

Susan nodded glumly.
"I hate having to wear clothes that don't fit," she complained, "It just gets sooo uncomfortable after a while, and you have to spend all your time making sure they're on properly." As though to illustrate the point she chose that moment to tug at her shirt again, trying and failing to persuade it into covering her expansive stomach. Sitting as she was it sat heavily in her lap, pouring over the waistband of her shorts to warm her thighs like a blanket, and decidedly too large in every dimension to be covered by her undersized top.

Before Manyara could reply, however, Lou Ann appeared in the doorway.
"Hey girls, y'ready to head out?" she asked, and the two nodded, "Great. Just before we go, though - Manyara, d'you remember if this fits you?"
She was holding out what looked like a one-piece swimsuit made of rather garish red fabric.
Manyara shrugged.
"I dunno, I haven't worn it for months. I think it was too big for me - Aunty Ceris got it me for Christmas or something."
"Well, try it on. If it don't fit we'll have to get you a new swimming costume as well while we're out," Lou Ann chucked the swimsuit over to her daughter, who sighed.
"Fiiine," she grumbled, "One sec."

She began to strip off, not seeming to care in the slightest that Susan and her mom were still there, so the other girl watched as her friend pulled off her top and shorts - apparently with some difficulty. She was now so fat that just the simple act of undressing was a chore; rolls of flab jostled and nudged and caught on fabric as she slowly disrobed, shifting from foot to foot as she wriggled thick thighs out of her shorts. By the time she was down to her underwear - white polka-dot panties and a straining vest - she even seemed to be slightly out of breath.

The slightly laboured aspect she now had to her breathing betraying just how unfit the bigger girl had become, Manyara kicked aside her top and shorts and began to peel off her underwear - and peel truly was the word that came to mind. Her panties had all but disappeared beneath her belly, the fabric that wasn't buried plastered across her buttocks like it had been painted on. She rolled them off with difficulty, working blind as the sheer bloated mass of her stomach obscured her view of her crotch entirely. Once she'd kicked them too off her feet, it was time for the vest.
That poor garment was perhaps the most abused and overworked of all. Manyara was now quite thoroughly developed for her age, even the painfully tight material of her vest squeezing her flabby breasts as flat as it could failing to disguise the evidence of obesity-fueled development. For a moment she wrestled with the poor thing, struggling as it caught on a roll of back fat, then it was off over her head and Manyara stood naked but for her socks.
After a couple of moments to get her breath back, she grabbed the red one-piece swimsuit from the floor and stepped into it. With a considerable effort (accompanied by a decidedly unladlylike grunt) she pulled the straps up and over her shoulders, then tried to get it comfortable.

It was a fools errand; the swimsuit was far, far too small in every dimension. The straps cut into her shoulders, the material between her legs was far too tight (not to mention alarmingly immodest), the seams were straining, and worst of all brown flesh was bulging out every which way. No matter how much she tugged and shifted and strained, Susan could tell the swimsuit wasn't going to look remotely acceptable.

Lou Ann shrugged. "Hey, it looks pretty good. I can see you wearing that on the beach," she said.
The two girls stared at her, nonplussed. After a moment of dubious silence, Manyara shook her head.
"No way mom, it's really uncomfortable," the obese girl complained, "It digs in, like, everywhere. Can't I get a new one, pleease?"
"I don't know, money doesn't grow on trees y'know," Lou Ann scolded, "It's a lovely suit - and I'm sure it doesn't dig in that badly."
"It really does, mom, seriously," Manyara whined, tugging at the fabric in a vain attempt to loosen it somehow, "I can barely move in this thing, how am I supposed to swim?"
Lou Ann looked scandalised. "Why would you want to swim in it? Swimsuits are for sunbathing! I just think that the red really sets off your eyes, y'know." Without warning, she turned to Susan, "How do you think Manyara looks, Susan?"

Rather taken aback, Susan collected herself as they both looked at her inquiringly. On one hand, she didn't want to hurt Manyara's feelings by saying she didn't look good - on the other, well... she really didn't look good.
141231212211211212212121222122211.title: Gratuitous and Unnecessary Changing Scene

choices: Time for shopping!
Something stalls or stops them from going?
1412312122112112122121212221222111.content:
Susan had to be careful to use the right words. The swimsuit did indeed look uncomfortably tight on Manyara, but she didn't really want to say why. But on the other hand, the colour did compliment her eyes, and almost her chubby cheeks too.

"It looks great," she half-lied, "but it does look pretty uncomfortable...maybe there'll be another size one?"
Lou Anne nodded, but didn't look too convinced. "I don't know, like I said, I'm not made of money."
"Aren't there still sales going on right now?" Susan pointed out.

That got Lou Anne's attention. She blinked, and tapped her thick finger on her chin. Her proper one, not the large mound of blubber beneath it.
"That's a good point," she agreed, "Okay, we'll see if we can find another one then!"

With a sigh of relief, Manyara wasted no time in getting the suffocating swimsuit off of her. Her flabby form sprang and bounced out in every direction as soon as it was released from the snug fabric.
Susan didn't really mind, or think anything of her getting so...revealed in front of her - she had been doing it since they met as toddlers, so it was just a thing she did.

Lou Anne retrieved the swimsuit as Manyara struggled to pull her tight panties and vest back on, and was practically wheezing for air by the time she had to get her shorts and top on. Susan, feeling bad for her friend, decided to lend a plump hand in getting them on.

"Thanks for convincing mom," the tubby Thai girl sighed, "I never really liked that swimsuit - it's so...red."
Susan nodded agreement, puffing as she helped slide the waistband of Manyara's shorts over her protruding backside. "Maybe we can find you a nice purple one?"
Manyara smiled, looking over her broad shoulder. "That'd be awesome!"

By the time Manyara was dressed, both girls were panting, sweating and red hot from all the exertion of putting on clothes.
"Phew, I need a drink," Manyara grunted, taking a pause to gasp for air, "c'mon, I got some soda in the fridge."
Susie didn't need to be told twice. Both girls waddled out to the kitchen, where Manyara opened the fridge and pulled out a couple of regular bottles of orange soda.

Both girls guzzled the carbonated orange-flavoured drink like they'd hadn't had a drop of water in weeks, when it had really just been since breakfast time. Within minutes, both girls had polished off their soda. Susan let out a cute little burp out of nowhere, causing her already pink cheeks to flush pinker as she covered her mouth with her free hand. Manyara snorted a laugh, before letting out a long belch of her own. Both girls stared at each other for a moment before bursting into a fit of giggles.
1412312122112112122121212221222111.title: Careful Wording

choices: None of the other clothes really fit them either - they've outgrown the shop!
They find a select few garments that they can get on, if not very comfortably.
14123121221121121221212122212221111.content:
Once they'd finished their drinks, they trotted out to the car and Lou Ann drove them into town. The two girls giggled and gossiped together in the back seat as they discussed precisely what they were each planning to buy - provided, of course, they could find such items in a size that actually fit, which would be a challenge given that they were now closer to the weights of full grown adults than children their own age.

Before long they had parked and the two girls hopped out of the car, blinking around at their surroundings. Neither girl got out much nowadays, leaving the house for school and very little else; the bustle and noise of the city centre at the weekend surprised them both.
"There's a Target just nearby," Lou Ann said, locking the car with one hand and gesturing vaguely with the other, "Let's start there." The two girls nodded, and let Lou Ann lead them through the crowded street and into the shop.

Once they were inside, Susan turned to Manyara. "Hey, I remember coming here with mom all the time," she said, looking around at the colourful displays, "They used to sell some really nice stuff, this should be good!"
"Good. I hope they sell dresses in my size!" the bigger said, tugging at the waistband of her shorts absentmindedly. It was digging rather uncomfortably into her soft flesh, despite being fastened beneath the bulk of her belly, and she wouldn't at all mind changing into something more comfortable as soon as possible. At least Manyara's shirt fit though, which was more than could be said for Susan - the other girl's top barely reached past her navel, much of her potbelly bulging free over the waistband of her own shorts.

"Girls, I'm going to go do some shopping of my own in the ladies section," Lou Ann announced, "You two go ahead and pick out some clothes, then come and find me there. Make sure they fit in the changing rooms first though!"
And with that she headed off, leaving Manyara and Susan to wander over to the junior's section to browse on their own.


"Hey, how about this?"
Manyara broke the silence after a few minutes of unbroken rifling through clothes rails, picking out a bright floral dress. She held it to her body, and Susan couldn't help but notice it just looked much too, well, narrow, for the big girl. It didn't even look half as wide as Manyara's body, her hips and flabby sides bulging out drastically on either side.
"I dunno, it looks a little small for you. Is there a bigger size maybe?"
Manyara looked slightly upset at the comment. "This is the size for my height from the husky range. I don't think they do anything bigger."
Susan frowned. "Really? That's stupid of them. Well, can't you just wear the sizes for older girls or something?"
"Then it'd just be way too long," Manyara complained, "I'd trip over the hem all the time."
"Well, bring it along anyway," Susan said with a shrug, "I'm much smaller than you, so even if it doesn't fit you it'll fit me."
She didn't see Manyara scowl at her behind her back. 'Not that much smaller...' Manyara thought, looking the other girl up and down, 'Not anymore...
With an effort, she bit back the irritation. She was much more upset at the clothing store than she was with Susan, anyway. The other girl didn't mean to hurt her feelings, she knew that. Shaking her head, she went back to picking out clothes alongside her friend.


Before long, the girls had an armful of clothes each and headed towards the changing booths. Susan, in an act of wild naïveté, had picked almost exclusively from the standard range of sizes, thoroughly unaware that she had left those behind months ago. Even her current clothes, shamefully outgrown as they were, had been picked mostly from the husky range by her realistic father the one time they'd been clothes shopping together since the divorce. The idea that she would still fit into the standard range was at best ignorant, at worst absurd - but Susan wasn't exactly known for her self-awareness.

Manyara headed into a changing booth and Susan moved to go into another, but the bigger girl just rolled her eyes. She reached out and pulled Susan into the same booth.
"C'mon, don't be silly. We can both fit in just this one," she giggled.
"Um, I dunno. Why don't we just use two?" Susan asked, feeling a little shy. Manyara may be comfortable being naked in front of her, but Susan was quite a bit more shy - especially more recently as she began to feel the first faint stirrings of insecurity about her weight.
"Nah, then we'll have to keep passing clothes over the top and stuff," Manyara pointed out. Susan bit her lip.
"Alright, I guess." She stepped fully into the booth and let Manyara pull the door closed - which took some doing. Despite what Manyara had said, there was barely room in the booth for both oversized girls, and with the door closed there wasn't even room for them both to stand without brushing hips and elbows.

Without further ado, Manyara began stripping off, and Susan reluctantly followed her lead - with more than a little difficulty. Undressing was already more effort than it should have been for the pair at the best of times, but cramped together like this it was a genuine challenge. They seemed to bump into each other with every movement, nudging each other into the walls or just generally getting in each other's way. At one point they bent over at the same time to grab something from the floor and their rears collided, knocking them both into a tangled heap of thick limbs and thicker bodies on the floor.
By the time Susan had finished undressing she was overheated, sweaty, and more than a little embarrassed. Manyara just seemed to find every accidental contact amusing, and as such had spent most of the previous few minutes giggling - behaviour that didn't exactly help with Susan's self-consciousness. She had deigned not to remove her panties, though it was a token gesture. They were so tight and undersized on her corpulent body that at a glance one couldn't even tell she was wearing them at all.

The bigger girl still hadn't quite finished stripping off yet, so Susan took the chance to grab one of the skirts she'd picked out earlier and begin trying it on. It was a lovely little striped thing, but she'd barely even got it past her knees before the truth that she should have know all along became undeniable - this was not going to fit her. Even unbuttoned she was struggling to get it up her thighs, and when it eventually encountered her flabby, overgrown buttocks it was obvious there wasn't a chance she could even get it to her waist, never mind fasten it once it got there.

Manyara glanced sidelong at her, eyes flashing. "Too small, huh?" she asked.
"I guess I must have put on a little weight, heh..." Susan laughed nervously, wriggling out of the skirt and checking the label. She was sure she could remember this exact size being too big on her not even a year earlier.
"Maybe all your dad's cooking is a little much," Manyara suggested, smiling rather smugly for a second before remembering in a shower of mournfulness that she hadn't exactly been losing weight herself recently. She wiped the expression off her face.
"Maybe I have, yeah..." Susan dropped the skirt on the floor, trying not to be upset. It was just a little weight, that was all. A lot of girls put on weight at this age, for puberty or some reason like that. She'd just have to lay off some of the snacks for a little while, that was all.

"Well, try some of the clothes I picked out, they're all in husky sizes, they might fit you better," Manyara suggested, gesturing awkwardly in the confined space at her own pile of clothes.
"Thanks."
And so, Susan took a pair of shorts from the pile and Manyara the floral dress from earlier, and with much brushing of hips and and arms and legs, they both began trying to put them on.


Two minutes later, they were both more frustrated and sweaty than ever. The husky size shorts did technically fit, but to Susan's dismay they were as uncomfortably tight as any of the others she owned, and tearing them off she threw them to the floor with a growl of irritation. The undeniable fact that even the clothes designed for heavy kids were too small for her was rather shaking - for once, she couldn't just pretend to herself that they had shrunk in the wash.
While Susan was having a slight mental crisis, Manyara had managed to squeeze her overgrown body into the floral dress - but was inevitably struggling to zip it up at the back.
"Hey, if you're done trying those shorts could you give me a hand with this zipper?" she asked over her shoulder, giving up on doing it herself and letting her fat arms fall back to her sides.
"Uh, sure," Susan said, snapped out of her introspection. She reached out with one plump hand and grabbed a hold of the zipper, and tried to pull it upwards - with no results. Manyara's black flab bulged out from the back of the dress, at once soft and pliable yet thoroughly obstructionary to the progress of the zip. "Hey, could you, like suck in your tummy for a moment? It's really difficult," she asked.
Manyara sucked in, allowing the fabric just a little leeway, and Susan seized the moment - and the zipper - with both hands, pulling upwards with all her meagre strength. There was an audible creak of grinding metal, a grunt of exertion, a short squeak of pain, and then the zipper slid up like a shot and the dress was fastened.

"Oof!" Manyara said, reaching around to rub tenderly at her back, "You pinched me with the zip there a bit," she said reproachfully, seams groaning as she stopped sucking in her gut.
"Sorry. I think that dress is a bit small for you," Susan shrugged. Manyara shook her head.
"No way, this is from the husky range for teenagers, it can't possibly be too small. I think it's just supposed to fit this way."
"I guess so," Susan agreed, too concerned with her own increased size to want to labour the point.

A little snack couldn't hurt- but, with these two, nothing is little...
141231212211211212212121222122211111.content:
Tired and mildly disconsolate, the two big girls stripped themselves of the too-tight trial clothes they had found and, lacking a better option, put them carefully aside to take for later- if, of course, they found nothing better. And, seeing as the sizes they found pinched terribly, they were most certainly hoping to.

Unfortunately, the universe was against them that day.

After browsing up and down the dismally tiny section of the store set aside for large girls of their ilk- that is to say, one single rack of shirts and pants that could best be described in terms of style with an emphatic "eh"- Susan and Manyara were forced to conclude that, even though they had really only gained a terribly small amount of puberty weight, there was not one single item of clothing to be found that would fit them in any way that could be described as "comfortable". Sure, the 4XLs fit okay on Susan, and didn't leave all of Manyara hanging out for the world to see- but it was plain to see that nothing proper could be found in the children's store.

So, with severe huffs of disappointment and the effort of moving their bloated forms, they waddled out, pausing only for breath once they made it out of the store.

"Can you...hff...believe that? Those sizes were ridiculous!" Susan panted, wiping her brow.

Manyara didn't answer right away, as she desperately needed to catch her breath, but when she did it was with an extremely breathy and almost inaudible re-expression of that sentiment.

"What are we gonna do then?" Susan asked, somewhat rhetorically. "If we can't shop here, we'll have to shop at the adult stores...but those'll be too big for us, won't they? Surely."

Manyara, after several more deep gulps of air, responded "Well...it's huff worth a try...right?"

Susan looked uncomfortably at the ground. "I guess...I'll go find out where it is, then."

And, with a mighty heave, she pulled her bloated form to her chubby feet, and wobbled her way over to the nearest map board to find her way to the children's shop.

______________________

"The other side?" Manyara gasped, flab jiggling in surprise.

"Yep," Susan confirmed, looking dismally down the- to them- impossibly long mall hallway. "God, it'll take us years to get there."

"Years" may have been hyperbole, but, at their size, "hours" might not be. The mall was roughly the length of two football fields; considering the fact that the girls had not seen a football field in years, they were very unlikely to make the journey quickly.

Manyara let out a great huff of annoyance. "Well, I guess we'd better get going...help me up?" she asked, extending her flabby arms for assistance.

Susan rolled her eyes, but gave in and helped her larger friend to her feet. "Yeah, we'd better..."
______________________

"Huff Susie...I huff need a rest..." Manyara gasped, sweat streaming down her flabby face and disappearing into her chin.

"Alright...hff that's fine, we can take a break here," Susan agreed, unwilling to admit how much she needed one as well. The two girls leaned up against the wall, taking great gulps of air into their overworked lungs. Finally, after a bit of well-deserved rest, Manyara wheezed out "How...much farther?"

Susan, with another eyeroll, leaned off the wall and took a look both ways down the hall. The distance from them to the store seemed no smaller; the distance from them to their starting point, however, seemed greatly different. In reality, the girls had moved only about fifty feet or so, but to Susan's young, fat-addled brain it seemed like a great distance. "Really far...are you sure you want to keep going?"

"The food court's right here, after all..."

1412312122112112122121212221222111112.content:
The girls stared at the food court, their eyes flickering with unbridled gluttony. The delicious smells of cheap fast food filled their nostrils. Deep growls and gurgles of hunger filled the air, and they both put their plump hands on their oversized bellies, feeling them vibrate.

"We gotta eat something," Manyara wheezed desperately, "We've walked so far...I can't go on without some energy..."
Susan had to agree. The other side was just so far away - she couldn't make it without a bite to eat. Or two. Or three. "Okay, let's have a snack stop, then keep going."

The poor portly girls waddled up to one of the counters, where a teenage girl in a uniform stood on the other side. The girls made an order of two large meals, which meant a large burger, a large box of fries and a huge soda. Of course, that was two large meals for each of them, by Manyara's insistence.
Thankfully, it didn't take long for the girls to receive their oversized orders, and they had even gotten a dozen free cookies from the nice girl, who had taken pity on the poor little fatties.

The girls wasted no time in finding a seat, and dug in to their meals. They split the cookies evenly between them, then started cramming the food into themselves.

Sauce, dressing and crumbs dropped onto their clothes as they ate with wild abandon, pausing only to either catch their breath or to take a hearty gulp of soda. The combination of sitting down and stuffing their faces was already making them feel better.

Soon enough, empty boxes and cups were strewn on the table, with the girls sitting back licking their greasy fingers and looking rather satisfied. They definitely needed this stop. They'd even caught their breath!
