choices: Later the girls return to Lou Ann, each with plenty of clothes.
They're surprised to bump into someone they know browsing the aisles.
14123121221121121221212122212221111121.content:
Once all the food was gone and both girls were satisfactorily full, they didn't really have an excuse to dawdle longer. Levering themselves up from their chairs, they left their rubbish on the table and made their waddling way back out in the main hallway. When they were there though, they could only stand among the bustling crowd, looking left and right down the hall.

"Hey, uh, Sue. D'you remember which way we were going?" Manyara asked after a moment's silence.
Susan shrugged, looking lost.
"I dunno. I could've sworn we went to the town centre anyway, I don't even remember when we came to the mall," she confessed, scratching her head, "Let's just check the map."
She headed towards the nearest map board, but before she could reach it Manyara grabbed her by the arm.
"Wait, how about that!" she exclaimed, pointing. Susan followed her finger, and her eyes came to rest on a small shop sandwiched between a toy shop and a keymakers. The sign above the door proudly announced the shop as 'Madam Pudsie's Shop for Larger Children'.

"Wow, that... actually looks perfect. How lucky!" Susan could only exclaim, staring in amazement, "I didn't even know this was here."
"Neither did I, but I bet they sell proper-sized clothes," said Manyara, hurrying towards with all the speed her flabby, overworked legs could muster, "Come on!"
Susan followed her friend inside, pausing only to read the poster in the window. It read, Madam Pudsie's - the fastest growing clothing chain in America! We believe that children have the right to fashionable, high-quality clothing, no matter their size or shape. Find us online or at a mall near you!
Feeling optimistic once again, she proceeded into the shop.

Once inside, she was confronted by a fairly small, cramped, yet thoroughly vibrant interior. Posters of smiling children, all varying levels of chubby, were plastered on every wall, and everything seemed designed to be as colourful as possible - even the enthusiastic-looking serving girl behind the counter. It was a little overwhelming, but Susan wasn't about to complain; if this shop stocked comfortable clothes, she couldn't care less what the decor was like.
By the time Susan had finished taking in her first impressions, Manyara was already in one of the isles rifling through the clothes rails. Susan trotted over.
"Found anything?" she asked.
"I dunno," Manyara said, squinting at a label, "I can't tell what size anything is. Maybe they're using the European system or something - it's all just numbers."

Before Susan could respond, however, a shop assistant appeared right beside them.
"Anything I can help you with?" she asked, looking down upon the two girls with a wide smile. She knew promising customers when she saw them, and a pair of obese girls in undersized clothes was an almost guaranteed sale.
Manyara jumped at the assistant's sudden appearance. "Oh! Um, well, I don't really understand the sizing here. How does it work?"
"We use our own system," the assistant explained, her smile widening further as she realised that the two were completely new to the store, "If you want, I can measure you right now and save you some time trying on different sizes."

Susan and Manyara exchanged glances. It wasn't like they had other options.
"Sure, that'd be great," Susan said after the cursory deliberation.
"Excellent! If you'll just follow me into the fitting room, then," the shop assistant lead the two girls through the aisles of clothes and into a back room, then turned to Susan, "I'll do you first, dear. Could you strip down to your underwear, please? You'll want an accurate measurement."
Susan coloured slightly, but obeyed. For the second time that day she pulled her shirt off over her head, then wriggled out of her shorts. She threw both garments over to Manyara for safekeeping, then stood shifting uncomfortably from foot to foot in front of the assistant, naked but for her socks and panties.

"Great! Let's get you measured up," the shop assistant produced a large tape measure from her pocket like a magician summoning a comically long ribbon from his sleeve, then knelt down in front of Susan, "Now, do you prefer to fasten your pants over or under your tummy?" she asked, smiling reassuringly at the obese girl.
"I, um... I guess under?" Susan said, uncertainly, "Is that okay?"
"That's perfectly all right, dear," the shop assistant cooed, "If you would just raise your arms out to your sides, I can get the measurement."
Susan did so, and with deft hands the shop assistant looped the tape around the fat girl's waist, slipping it under her bloated belly and around her flabby sides then pulling it snug to check the number. The feeling of cool plastic against her warm skin made Susan shiver, but it was only a moment before the assistant had got the measurement and was letting the tape drop down to Susan's heavily padded hips. Once again she pulled the tape close and checked the value, nodding happily to herself.

"Nearly there, dear," she said to Susan, then turned briefly to Manyara, "Would you mind stripping down to your underwear now? It'll save a little time in a minute."
Manyara nodded, and began for the third time that day the arduous process of pulling off her top and shorts, while the assistant turned back to Susan.
"Just once more now, then we're done," Once again she wrapped the measure around Susan's excessive body, this time around her bust, and the developing girl had to suppress a little squeak of surprise as the cool tape was pulled tight against her sensitive chest.
The assistant nodded, as though in reply to Susan's little noise.
"Yes, yes, a little growing room would be sensible at your age..." she muttered to herself, loosening the tape somewhat before taking the measure. Then she moved back and got to her feet, "Well done, dear. I'll measure your friend, then I can tell you both about our sizing scheme at the same time. Oh, and you can get dressed again now."

Susan did as she was told, pulling back on her poorly fitting shorts and top once again, while the assistant measured Manyara. By the time she had finished redressing, the assistant was done with Manyara, and after punching a few numbers into a calculator she turned to the pair and launched into a plainly memorised speech.
"Now, here at Madam Pudsie's we believe that sizes like Large, Extra Large, 2X and so on only serve to make people feel insecure in their own bodies," she began, "So we do things just a little differently. We use our own numbers-only sizing guide that will never disappoint, upset or confuse any child! Our sizes range from 2 to 20, and are suitable for children of any age!"
She turned to Susan.
"You're a size 4. We stock the most of those sizes, so I'm sure you'll find something you'll love!" her attention turned to Manyara, "And you, dear, are a size 8. We also stock plenty of size 8 clothes, so have fun! Remember, any order exceeding $40 comes with a voucher for two free meals at the mall food court, and loyal customers stand to benefit from a host of other incredible deals as well! Have fun shopping at Madam Pudsie's, and remember that here there's no such thing as a wrong-sized child, only wrong-sized clothes!"

"Thanks!" Manyara said, voice muffled by fabric as she struggled to pull her top back on over her head, "This all sounds fantastic!"
"Yeah, thank you!" Susan agreed, delighted to finally find a place that would sell comfortable clothes, "Come on Manyara, let's go find some stuff to buy!"

The shop assistant watched the two girls leave the fitting room and head back into the shop, feeling thoroughly pleased with herself. Two new customers! And judging by their stretch marks and the ill-fitting clothes they'd come in with, she felt there was a good chance they'd turn out to be loyal, long term customers as that. It was the ones that continued to gain weight that were the most profitable, and even in just the few minutes she'd seen them she could tell that those two were not the kind of girl that stayed the same size for long...

Time passes, and the girls have unknowingly fallen into Madam Pudsie's trap...
141231212211211212212121222122211111211.content:
Susan and Manyara wasted no time, or expense, in Madam Pudsie's. Thanks to these new size measurements, the only issue they had with finding clothes was picking which they liked most!
Susan picked out some brightly coloured t-shirts and some jean-shorts, while Manyara chose a few tops and some comfy track shorts. They went to the counter and paid for their choices together, which came up to $45. Their chubby faces lit up as they split the payment, and were given the food court voucher along with their receipt.

"Can we put on some of our clothes now?" Susan asked.
The woman nodded with a warm smile as she pointed to the changing rooms. "Just head in there, dears."

The two waddled over with their bags, and after about five minutes were changed into their new outfits. Susan decided on a pink My Little Pony t-shirt and jean-shorts, while Manyara had a purple flower-print shirt and track shorts.

"You look great!" Susan chirped, looking her best friend over. It was quite a long time since she had seen her in fitting clothes, but this outfit was actually quite flattering! And it was refreshing to not see her in a dress for once.
"Thanks, you too!" Manyara grinned, looking at how the smaller girl actually fit a t-shirt loosely around her wide frame.

"Thanks for coming, girls!" The woman smiled as she watched the girls waddle out the door. "Come back soon!"

Not that you'll have much choice, she thought mischievously.

The girls ran into Lou Anne not too far outside, holding a few bags herself.
"Hey, nice clothes girls," she smirked at them, "where'd you find those?"
"In there!" Manyara pointed a plump finger at the Madam Pudsie's, "It's so cool! They have really nice clothes!"
"Really?" She said, nodding, "I'll have to remember this place. I'll check it out myself some time."
"And we got a food court voucher," Susan added, "for spending over $40!"
"Wow, you got a real treat then, hm?" The woman chuckled, sending her own large frame wobbling, "How about you go spend it then? We have some time."

The girls needed no more motivation. They happily waddled over to the food court to pick their spoils.

1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.content:
The girls dined well at the food court that day. The fact that it was the second time in as many hours neither deterred nor hindered them in their efforts to consume. And, since the final obstacle in the way of unrestricted gluttony- namely, tight clothes- had been handily removed, nothing remained to deter or hinder them for the foreseeable future.

So nothing did. The girls ate their way through the Christmas holidays, out of winter, and up Madam Pudsie's size chart with a vigor rarely seen in any field. Pounds flocked to the girls' waists just as quickly as they did out of Parliament, helped immensely by a complex combination of Randall's increased cooking output, a general lowering in the price of school lunch, and an extensive rewards program in Madam Pudsie's. The girls became regulars at the mall, frequenting the clothing store almost as much as the food court. The increases in weight were bound to continue.

However, though practically everyone had remained entirely blind to the problem, it couldn't be hidden forever.

___________________

Was it always this far? Susan thought to herself, a concerned frown creasing her fat face. I mean, it's always been far, but...this far?

Up ahead, Manyara, wheezing deeply, planted herself on the wall yet again. Susan sighed, but did the same, glad of rest. "Not...haff...too much farther...hfff...now..."

Manyara nodded, chins creasing with the effort of agreement. They stayed there for a further three minutes, regaining their limited breath, before once more heaving themselves into the crowd and waddling the final few steps into the inviting storefront of Madam Pudsie's.

"Susan! Manyara! Good to see you again!" the shop assistant greeted them, a warm smile stretching across her face. "How are things?"

Susan let out a burst of air that sounded vaguely like Good. Manyara, with surprising speed for a girl of her girth, lunged towards the closest chair and sat her wide butt on it gratefully. The chair, for its part, squeaked painfully.

"Goodness me, you two must be exhausted! Take as much time as you need, I'll get everything ready for your new outfits!" And, with a swish of fabric, the attendant disappeared to grab her measuring tape and sizing notepad. Lord knows the girls would need it- Susan's belly was 90% out of her shirt, and Manyara's leggings were so stretched as to be absolutely transparent.

And to think, the assistant though with some pride, that they just bought those clothes two weeks ago!
________

"Alright, are you two ready now?" the assistant said, bustling back around the corner.

"Yep!" said Susan cheerily, her breath entirely recovered. "D'you wanna go first, Manyara, or should I?"

"Hff...might as well...." agreed Manyara, still not entirely rested from the walk. "Um...could you give me...hff...a hand up?"


"Of course!" the assistant agreed, heart swelling with pride. "Ready...one-two-THREE!"

And, with no small effort, Manyara, panting and sweaty once more, was back on her feet. The assistant, unwilling to force Manyara to remain standing for any longer than necessary, set instantly to work, measuring up legs, along arms, and around Manyara's astronomical middle. After what seemed like forever to Manyara, or five minutes real time, she was finished, and Manyara was free to wobble back to her seat.

"Well, it looks like you're a size 12 now! And, as you know, every multiple of 4 gets a special treat!" The assistant, smiling broadly, reached behind the counter and tossed Manyara a large bag of Reese's Peanut Butter Cups. "Congratulations!"

"Thanks!" wheezed Manyara, before eagerly digging into the bag.

"Now for you, Susan! Do you need a hand up, or do you have it?"

Susan did have it, but she was never one to turn down a kind offer. The assistant's strong hands grabbed her soft ones, and soon she, too, was wobbling uncomfortably about, ready for the tape. The process seemed to tickle more than usual- especially along the very lowest part of her belly, where it was softest- but soon enough that, too, was done. The assistant scribbled furiously on her pad for a moment, then looked up at Susie with no small surprise.

"Susan, guess what! You're a Size 9 now! This is actually the fastest increase we've seen at this location, which qualifies you for..." she squinted at the pad for a moment, then back up at the large girl in front of her, "...Madam Pudsie's Celebratory Extravaganza! All you can eat at the food court, for free!"

Manyara's jaw dropped, letting half a chocolate drop with it. "Holy cow, Susan! That's amazing!"

"Yeah...amazing..." Susan muttered, looking shamefully at the ground. For all her aloofness, she couldn't ignore the plain facts before her- she was now larger than Manyara had been when they first shopped at Madam Pudsie's. She hadn't noticed, but the numbers couldn't lie- it was definitely true.

And, what was more, she had put on weight even faster than Manyara had. She had gained 5 sizes, while Manyara had gained only 4.

Oh god...what if I get fatter than her? Susan thought to herself, panic seizing in her throat. That's it, I have to lose weight!

"Alright, girls," the assistant butted in, returning with an armful of new outfits, "here you go! I know you girls worked very hard getting here, so I decided to make the process a little easier. I hope you don't mind!"

"Thank you very much!" Manyara beamed, accepting her clothes gratefully. Susan nodded dumbly along.

The assistant turned to leave, but stopped short. "Oh, of course! Here's your coupon, Susan. I hope you enjoy."

And, pressing the coupon into Susan's sweaty palm, the assistant took Manyara's money and left to ring them up. Susan stared at the coupon with glassy eyes. On the one hand, she couldn't possibly eat any more- she'd inflate like a blimp. On the other hand....

...it was food...

1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.content:
Susan stared down at the coupon, licking her lips greedily at the implications. All-You-Can-Eat at the food court. She and Melissa had only dreamed of such an opportunity!

But...was it a good idea? She was already suspecting that she was getting...big.

No! No way! Her thoughts demanded, You've gone up five sizes since burgers last time you were fries here! What would your fried chicken dad say if he pizza saw you milkshakes soda cake ice cream!

A lazy grin had crossed the greedy girl's plump face. Her brain had become just too addled with a love (read: addiction) for food to argue against the opportunity to stuff herself silly with greasy and sugary treats.
Once she got her bag of Madam Pudsie's outfits, she waddled for the door, knowing exactly where she was going.

"Let's go make the best out of this coupon!" She declared.

---

And make the best of it, they did. With an all-you-can-eat pass, the food court was at the pudgy pair's mercy. Burgers, fries, pizzas, ice cream, pies, buckets of fried chicken, and all other kinds of unhealthy delights had been claimed by the gluttonous girls.
Shoppers looked with awe and concern at their table as the large little ladies had a table stacked with various brands of boxes, wrappers and buckets.
The girls didn't care, or even notice - they were in heaven. Mouths were ringed with sauce and crumbs, fingers were glistening with grease and cream, shirts were stained with dressing and droplets.

The duo ate and ate and ate and ate, until they both were forced back in their chairs, burping and hiccuping from trapped gas. Wide smiles of pure euphoria were stuck on their plump faces.

"This is the life, huh?" Manyara giggled, loudly slurping an extra-extra-large cup of orange soda.
"Oh yeah," Susan agreed, sighing contentedly as she popped some stray fries and crumbs of cake into her mouth. All these tastes and smells were some of the absolute best, second only to her own father's cooking.

Eventually, the girls hauled their overfilled frames through the mall and into Lou Anne's car for home.

In her bliss, Susan put her hand on the handle to her front door, and halted to ponder a little ponder.

What was I upset about again?
1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.title: Temptation Wins! Fat-ality!

choices: Manyara returns- happier, skinnier, and a princess to boot.
School resumes, and Susan hasn't been clothes shopping...
1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.content:
Susan had resolved in the mall to keep her burgeoning weight in check. She had resolved it with all the willpower a 10-year-old could muster.

That, however, was not very much- especially when much more important things arrived to keep her occupied.

The first, and best, piece of news that reached Susan was a letter from her school, informing the parents that, while performing maintenence on the billboard, the janitors had discovered a large and very elaborate roach infestation; therefore it was regrettable, although necessary, that the school be closed for two to three weeks for fumigation.

The second, and less desirable, news came in the form of a worried phone call from Manyara. Apparently her father, a stockbroker by trade, had, due to a minor kerfuffle involving an enormous bomb and a failed coup, found himself in the odd position of, via his great-grandmother, being the nearest person to assume the position of Rama XI, King of Thailand; as a result, he wanted Manyara to attend his coronation. She would have to be gone for two to three weeks.

That left Susan rather in the lurch. Aside from Manyara, she didn't really have any friends; therefore, there was little for her to do except plant her rapidly-softening rear on the couch and relax.

And eat, of course. One mustn't forget the eating.

And so, for two-and-a-half weeks, Susan did just that. She stayed on that couch, watching TV, playing games, and grazing constantly on snacks, for every waking moment. She only ever got up to use the bathroom, get more snacks, eat dinner, or go to bed- a task which, given its rapidly increasing difficulty, she often forewent, choosing instead to simply sleep on the couch.

Randall didn't mind very much. Susan was clearly happy, so he simply devoted himself to making her happier. He brought her snacks when he was around, cooked her meals- sometimes four a day- and generally was the best dad he could be.

Plus, there was Lou Ann to think about. Manyara's mother was becoming a somewhat regular presence around the house. Susan didn't mind- in fact, she didn't really notice- but Randall certainly noticed.

So, too, did his bed. The poor thing's likely to break one of these days.

Time went on. Susan spread out. All was well.
1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.title: Major Shakeups

choices: Susan meets Manyara at school!
Manyara wasn't in school...
1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.content:
Three weeks had passed, and Randall had received a letter from Susan's school saying the fumigation was complete, and it was safe to return. As happy as Randall was that Susan could return to her education, his daughter...wasn't so happy to hear the news. She had been enjoying a relaxing few weeks of snacking and gaming, and it all passed by so quickly.

But, there was nothing she could do about it. The coming Monday, she was back to school.

Though, there was one small thing she and her father had overlooked - they had neglected shopping for clothes, including a new uniform. The one from weeks before was all Susan had, and so she would have to make do.
Pulling up her skirt was easy enough, but fastening it was the challenge. She took in a deep breath, her face turning pink and forming a beat of sweat as her plump fingers fidgeted to adjust the clasp. Thankfully it fastened after not too long, allowing her to exhale. Somehow, even with an ominous creak, the clasp held.
The shirt was a much harder trial. In the last few weeks, her tummy had ballooned even bigger, and the already-tight buttons were now almost impossible without sucking in that big round gut of hers. Another puff of air, her face turning from pink to a sweaty red as she quickly buttoned up each one, and a gentle exhale the moment she was done. Another ominous creak escaped her shirt, and from her mirror, she could see multiple gaps between the buttons showing off bits of pink flesh.

A thought came to Susan as she pulled her sweater on, tugging it down over her great dome of a tummy.

Wow, these fit a few weeks ago...a lot better anyway. Maybe...maybe I'm getting too-

She halted, as a warm scent wafted into her nostrils from the kitchen.

...poptarts~

With a greedy giggle, she slipped on her socks and shoes and waddled downstairs for another hearty breakfast.
1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.title: A Tight Fit

choices: Susan wants to live like a princess
Manyara decides to come back home
1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.content:
Susan ate the breakfast her father had prepared just as she had for the past three weeks. The result was the same too: she could hardly bear to do more more than laze around on the sofa for the rest of the morning while relaxing her overstuffed tummy. But this was a school day and she couldn't do that now, as much as she wanted. Her skirt had slipped down from her waist to her hips during the course of her huge breakfast, and she knew that it was futile to try to bring it back up, so she shifted the tight garment as well as she could to make it the most comfortable where it sat now.

Getting her shoes tied for school was even more of a struggle than usual, as her belly swelled out further than ever, and Susan had to squeeze her arms into the sides of it in order to reach her feet. Even when she did so, she still could not see them due to the soft, massive dome, and had to tie her shoes blind while she sat down. The feeling of her soft thighs squishing into the bottom of her softer belly when she brought her feet close was not something she could ignore anymore. She was already fat, and probably still getting fatter, and those thought elicited the same, confused reaction as they usually did.

Her father didn't care, as long as she was happy, and she didn't care, as long as her family was happy... or at least that's how it should be. The bigger she got, the more friendship she felt with Manyara, but also the more alien she felt to her classmates, and Susan could not yet decide whether this was an overall positive or negative, or if this was even an important question compared to the first one. She shook her head, and forced herself not to think about it for now. The school bus should be arriving soon.

As soon as that last thought crossed her mind, her familiar school bus appeared in her front window. She forced herself to her feet with a grunt, and waddled with great effort to the door. "Bye, Dad," she called to Randall, while on the verge of being out of breath even after a trek of less than twenty meters.

"Have a good day at school," he called back. "I'll have first dinner ready for you when you're home." "First dinner" had become a tradition for Susie during the last three weeks she spent out of school. She had become accustomed to eating four meals a day during her break, and this one in the afternoon was where the usual extra one took place. A calm, satisfied feeling flooded her nervous system when she thought about coming home from school to first dinner. She did not yet notice that this was a sign of just how far she had fallen into gluttony.

What of her father, though? There once was a time where he was worried about his daughter's rapidly-expanding weight, but for one reason or another that seemed to be gone or forgotten. Had he become ignorant and oblivious to it once again, or did he decide that he'd give his precious girl what she wanted, regardless of the long-term consequences? These questions touched only the edges of Susan's mind and didn't ask themselves directly to her. "Could she walk to the bus?" was a more important question.

She soon found out that she could. A month or so ago she witnessed Manyara's hips squeezing against the sides of the doorway of the vehicle, and now Susan felt the same thing and had some sympathy for her. It took some childish, high-pitched grunting to squeeze herself through the door and up the three steps, and once she got there, she no longer had the strength to walk any further. Susan practically crashed her bottom down on the first seat of the bus, too exhausted to walk any further. A part of her wished that Manyara wouldn't come, so that she wouldn't have to share the too-small seat with her friend's enormous castle of a bottom.

It turns out her halfhearted wish came true; when the bus pulled ahead less than half of a street block to stand in front of Manyara's house, it waited there three whole minutes. She did not stumble or waddle out of the door, and so the bus driver drove off without her. Manyara had hardly missed a school day since Susan had met her years ago, and her absence worried her. She found herself distracted by her missing friend all day and hardly noticed when one of the buttons on her shirt popped after finishing her lunch. Thankfully nobody else noticed either.

Susan tromped her way from the bus to her house with heavy footsteps after class had ended. Her stomach felt ravenous even though it was less than three hours since her last meal. Her body knew it was time for first dinner and was not in the least bit afraid to tell her so. It was too hard for her to shout, "Hi Dad, I'm home," or something of the like these days after making the walk from the street to the door, but from the noise of her footsteps it should be impossible for Randall to miss it. "Hey, Susie," he called from the kitchen after hearing the front door shut. "Come sit down for dinner."

Her hunger for food gave her the strength to walk to the dining room with her shoes still on and to plop her oversized bottom down on the wooden chair. These chairs were a bit tall for her, and were becoming harder to hoist her heavy body on to, but once she was there, her soft cushion of a bottom made them more comfortable than ever to sit on.

Randall brought a freshly-prepared tray of lasagna and set it at Susan's place at the table. There was only one plate and set of silverware: hers. All of this was hers. Susan's sense of smell had become more acute the more she gorged herself, and the scent of the mixed meats and cheeses under the flat, starchy noodles made her feel a bit giddy.

She dug her fork and knife into the tray, for the most part ignoring her dinner plate. Randall fussed around in the kitchen for a few minutes- Susan didn't pay much attention to what he was doing when there was food to be eaten. After her belly was no longer groaning at her, she thought to mention to him, "Manyara wasn't in school today."

"Oh, yeah," he said with a touch of realization. "Lou Ann told me yesterday, but I forgot to tell you: She wants to stay with her father in Thailand for at least a little bit longer. I guess I shouldn't be surprised: she hasn't seen him in years, and now he's a king and she's a princess."

"Mmm," Susan grunted in acknowledgement through a forkful of rich lasagna. In fifteen more minutes the entire tray was gone, and her belly felt stretched and sore as usual. She forced herself to take deep breaths to alleviate the discomfort while she sat in the dining chair.

Suddenly the phone rang. Randall answered. "Oh, it's Manyara," he said to Susan, and passed the phone to his stuffed, bloated daughter.

"Hey, Susie," a familiar voice said into her ear.

"Hey, Manyara," Susan said. She panted, but not from exhaustion, really.

"Sorry I didn't call you before," the girl on the phone said. "It's just been really busy here with... meals."

"No, it's okay," Susan reassured her friend. "I had fun here during the break." It would have been more fun to be lazy together with Manyara, but it wasn't a lie: she did enjoy it.

"Things are amazing here!" Manyara went on. "I can have anything I want, as long as my dad says it's okay. He was like, tenth in line to be king and no one had ever heard of him before, but now that he's the king now, everyone seems to love him instantly. I even have a tutor now and don't have to really go to school. He studied in England and he's really nice to me. And- oh there's so much I could show you! I really wish you were here!" Manyara sounded ecstatic. No wonder she wasn't eager to return to her old school.

"Hey," Manyara said purposefully, breaking out of her euphoria. "My dad could buy tickets for you and your dad to come visit me in the palace. What do you say?"
1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.title: Susan the Friend, Manyara the Princess

choices: Manyara's there to greet them- and she's fatter than ever!
Susan arrives...but Manyara's thin???
1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.content:
"Uh...yeah! That sounds awesome!" Susan said, very surprised. "When?"

"Umm..." Manyara paused for a moment, "hang on." A rustle of static and then a loud click signaled that the phone had been put down. Susan was about to be intimately acquainted with being on hold- which, despite itself, gave her plenty of time to think over this sudden development.

Go to Thailand? she thought to herself, still barely able to believe it. I've never even looked into it much...I wonder if there are elephants? Would Manyara know?'

An amusing image of Manyara riding an elephant inserted itself into her thought process. But how could that be? Manyara's probably the same size as one now!, a particularly cruel part of her brain fired back.

Against her better wishes, Susan laughed, and just then the phone clicked back into action.

"Susan, are you still there? What's so funny?"

"Um...nothing, just a stupid cartoon," Susan answered, slightly embarrassed. "What'd you find out?"

"Well, dad's in a meeting- something about a...coop dey etat and Vietnamese terrorists? I don't know, I wasn't really paying attention..."

Susan rolled her eyes. "Did you get to talk to him at all?"

"Well, only a little, but he said two weeks from now should be fine." Manyara replied. "How does that work for you?"

Two weeks? Susan thought nervously to herself. Aloud, she said "Yeah, that should be fine. Let me just ask Dad."

"Alright, awesome! I can't wait- you're really going to love it here!"

Susan frowned, though she didn't quite know why. "Yeah, I bet...see you soon!"

"See you soon!" Manyara replied, and then the phone clicked off.

Two weeks, Susan thought once more. Two weeks.

________________

Susan spent those next two weeks dealing with her unsure feelings in typical Susan fashion- by gorging herself sick on everything under the sun. By the time came to leave, not even her newest round of Size 11 clothes from Madam Pudsie's fit properly. It was a particularly ill-fittedSusan that looked out at the tarmac, hand tugging her shirt down for another fruitless time.

Thailand awaited.

1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.content:
After a long plane trip - made all the more uncomfortable thanks to her seat being 'too small' - Susan and her dad arrived in Thailand. Once she slowly plodded down the stairs out of the aircraft, 2 feelings were obvious to her.

Hotness and hunger.

The poor girl's belly rumbled, the meagre in-flight meal barely making a dent in the gluttonous girl's voracious appetite. Even with her dad sneaking snacks onto the plane for her, heads turned her way as other passengers got quite an eyeful of the blushing butterball rubbing her titanic tummy with both pudgy hands.

Plus, Thailand was incredibly hot! The poor girl was bright red in her fat round face and her skin shone and her clothes dampened with sweat. She had far too much padding for this climate.

Thankfully the airport building was air-conditioned, and once her dad got their luggage he led his poor, overheated and starving daughter toward the exit.

But once they were outside, they noticed a rather fancy car parked near the door, and an incredibly obese, and very familiar looking girl was holding a little card with Susan's last name on it. Behind her was a sharply dressed older man

Of course, both girls recognised each other right away. Even if they had both gained a good hundred pounds or so between them, there was no mistaken two best friends.

But Susan was rather shocked, because Manyara was...well, she was enormous! She had always felt like Manyara was living it up in her new royalty, but...she girl had to be wider than she was tall! The fancy dress she was wearing looked rather snug around her belly that had to be sticking out a couple of feet, and the only thing shinier than her sweaty forehead was the cute, jewel-coated tiara on her head.

Both girls embraced in a literally big hug, their massive bellies squishing together in their embrace that, despite the shared body heat and sweat, lasted for at least a minute or two.

"I'm so happy to see you again!" The princess squealed like the piglet she was.
"You too!" Susan huffed, her belly rumbling a little louder this time.

Manyara giggled and began a slow, awkward waddle to the car, with the help of the well dressed man. Likely her helper.
"Let's get in the car," she puffed, "with the air conditioning. We can talk in there, I brought snacks too! Wait till you try Taiwanese chocolate!"

Susan needed little more encouragement, and she and her dad piled into the car while the chauffeur got their bags into the trunk.

1412312122112112122121212221222111112112.content:
"Whoa..." said Susan, wide eyes bulging out of her already bulging face. "This is amazing!"

"I know, right?" Manyara replied through a mouthful of cookie. "I love kanom dok jok!"

Susan blinked. "No, I meant the ca...alright, I'll bite. What's kanom dok jok?"

"Thai flower cookie. Try some!"

"Okay, sure!" Susan said, accepting the proffered cookie. Warily, she nibbled at one corner; then, as the flavor hit her, she stuffed the rest of it in her mouth, chewing noisily and happily. "Dish ish great!"

"Don't worry, there's plenty more!" cut in Rama XI, sitting on the side of the car and smiling broadly.

Susan stopped chewing in surprise. In her haste to see Manyara she had totally forgotten to acknowledge Manyara's dad. No compliments on his accession, no friendly wave, not even so much as a hello. Now, he was looking at her, clad in a dress uniform so sharp one could cut their fingers on the creases, while she was wearing only a sweatshirt stained with airline food and blotted with cookie crumbs and a pair of leggings so tight as to allow all of her thighs to be displayed to the world. This was, in two words, horrifically embarrassing.

With great effort, Susan swallowed her cookie, lurched forwards - no small task with a belly as enormous as hers - and performed a little half-bow, squishing a fair bit of said belly out of the bottom of her straining sweatshirt. "Th-Thank you for your hospitality, O Most Great High...uh...King Of Thailand. May the sun...er...shine ever on the house of Rama!"

For a long moment, nothing stirred, swaddled in the humid air of Bangkok. Manyara even stopped chewing. Susan wondered, in terror, if she had somehow offended everyone and would be summarily kicked out of the car and the country.

Then, Manyara snorted, and the whole car devolved into laughter. Susan sat up, greatly surprised.

"O Most...Great High..." the King said, between chuckles, before knocking on the front window. "Hey, Aat...you're not gonna believe this. เธอเรียกฉันว่า "พระมหากษัตริย์!" คุณสามารถเชื่อได้หรือไม่?"

The driver, presumably Aat, laughed so hard he nearly swerved the royal limousine into a sunglasses stand. Manyara wiped a tear from her eye and wheezed happily into Susan's squishy shoulder.

"Susie, that's my dad! He used to push you on the swings, remember? You don't need to go crazy!"

"Don't....don't worry, Susan. I appreciate the honor, I really do," Manyara's dad answered, straightening his jacket, "but you needn't stand on formality while you're here. I run a very open court, ask anyone. Just enjoy yourself! While you're here, you'll be treated like a princess."

"And, as Princess, I'll make sure of it!" Manyara proclaimed, attempting to look intimidating. Unfortunately, a girl of her size - rapidly bearing down on 500 pounds, to be vaguely precise - very rarely looks anything other than very, very soft. It was now Manyara's turn to be the subject of the car's laughter.

"I'm so happy to see you again, Manyara," Susan said, wiping her eyes and letting forth a final chuckle.

141231212211211212212121222122211112.content:
Susan, in a small window of desperation, decided to dig through the selection Manyara had picked up from the teenagers' husky range. As she did, her introspection continued.
Had she truly outgrown clothes built for larger kids her age? Was she...that big? Despite the startling realisation, her head still kept searching for excuses to say that she wasn't too big.

And then she remembered something from school. One of the science books in the library explained how everyone grew differently in size; height and weight. No one was built the same shape.
Maybe that was the case with her? Maybe she was just...a little bigger than most girls? Something completely natural, wasn't it?

That thought seemed to relax her. She wasn't too fat, she was just built differently.

She picked up a t-shirt from the pile - a blue one with some cats on it. Taking a breath, she attempted to slip it on. It felt a little snug on her plump arms, and she had to tug it down over her belly, but despite how closely it clung to her...it covered her belly. It fit!
"Hey, that looks good," Manyara complimented with a smile, then awkwardly gestured to some darker blue shorts, "try those with it."
Susan nodded and reached for the shorts, slowly sliding them up her thick thighs and protruding backside. The fabric clung tightly to her frame, and she had to suck in her poor belly to button it up properly, but it fit too! She actually found some fitting clothes!

"See?" Manyara grinned, "Looks awesome, right?"
Susan nodded, but tugged at the shirt. "They're kinda tight though..."
"Eh, they're probably made for those super skinny teenagers," the darker girl pointed out, "y'know, the reeeeally thin ones?"

Susan blinked slowly. After all her doubting, she had never thought of that. "That makes sense...but we managed to get them on, didn't we?"
"Yeah we did," Manyara smirked, "man, I hope I don't turn out like that. They look like they just gave up eating. I could never give up candy!"
Susan giggled at the thought of Manyara trying in vain to fight the urge to snack on a Mars bar, and couldn't help but agree with her. "I know!"

Satisfied, the girls gathered up some clothes in similar sizes and waddled out of the changing room, pleased with their choices. Susan was feeling much better in her new frame of mind. She was just differently built, and these clothes were made for really skinny teens. That's all.

A deep growl filled the air, and Susan watched Manyara put a plump hand to her tummy, which was clinging tight to the fabric of her dress.
"All that trying on clothes makes you hungry, huh?" She grinned, "Let's get some snacks, mom'll be cool with it."
Susan responded with a hungry gurgle from her own tummy. She had no idea trying on clothes could work up such an appetite. "Sure!"

143.content:
Annie woke up with a stretch and a yawn, her straight brown hair coming down to just past her shoulders. She rubbed the sleep out of her brown eyes and threw the covers off of her body. When she became fully awake, she looked down at her body and smiled. Her body was unusual. Her arms and legs were fairly thin as was the rest of her body with one exception, her belly. The mound of fat rested on her thighs, grown throughout her nine years of life to it's current size. If she was older, she would have been mistaken for being pregnant. Almost all of her weight gathered on her belly with very little going anywhere else. Her pajama top strained as it tried to contain her massive orb of a tummy. The fabric between the buttons showed off diamonds of tummy flesh. She gave her tummy a loving pat as it rippled slightly. She didn't know why, but she loved her big belly. Her friends liked it too. They were always fascinated by its size and shape. They were always playing with it when they had the chance. Annie didn't mind, in fact, she liked the attention. She was snapped out of her thoughts by her belly giving a large rumble.

"Oh, you're so demanding" she chided to her tummy as she jumped out of bed with surprising ease for someone of her size.

Her belly seemed to defy gravity as it stuck out from her body like a large ball. She leaned back slightly as she walked over to her dresser, to compensate for her large belly. She looked at herself in the mirror and noticed that her belly looked even bigger than yesterday. She smiled and patted her tummy before changing out of her pajamas. She got dressed in a pair of jean shorts that had no chance of buttoning over her belly, so she buttoned the underneath. She then put on a small tank top that showed off all of her tummy as her belly roared in hunger. This was something she was used to. She was almost always hungry, so her belly growled a lot and loudly too. Her friends would always poke some fun at her tummy when it growled, saying how they thought there was a dinosaur in there.

"I'm going okay" she said with a rub of her tummy.

She heard some commotion coming from the kitchen which sounded like her mother. She hopped she was making breakfast. She ran out of her room and down the stairs as fast as she could to see what was going on.

Annie, quickly tired out from the sudden exercise, huffed into the kitchen to see what the commotion was all about. She spotted her mother, Julie, rushing back and forth, collecting things like her purse and phone.

"Mom?" The girl spoke up, wearing a look of concern. "What's wrong?"

"Can I come with you instead?!" The daughter suddenly squeaked up, knowing there was a fast food restaurant on the way to the store, and her nagging hunger getting the best of her.
"Oh, well, sure you can," Julie nodded, a little surprised her daughter actually wanted to get out of the house on the weekend, "I suppose we can get you some breakfast on the way."

14331.content:
Soon, Annie and Julie were sitting together in the Burger King on the way to the shops. Theirs was only a small town, a little array of houses and stores with only a couple of thousand residents and one small school, but there was an impressive choice of fast food places. This was their favourite burger joint though.
"Where's Madison?" Asked Annie, finishing up her burger and leaning back in her chair. She licked the grease off her fingers as she waited for her mom to finish her mouthful. A moment later, Julie replied.
"Your sister went for a run; she's a crazy kid." Julie rolled her eyes; voluntary exercise was a foreign notion to her, and indeed to almost every resident of the little town. There wasn't a single treadmill or dumbbell for 50 miles around, and despite how close together everything was you'd never see someone walking. There weren't even sidewalks on most of the roads.
"Weirdo." Annie muttered. Madison was four years older than her at thirteen, and was the only person she knew who ate salad voluntarily. Annie hated salad; she thought it boring and insubstantial at best, actively disgusting at worst. She really didn't understand her sister at all.
Soon, the two climbed back into the car and drove the thirty metres down the road to the shop, where they got out again and went entered. Annie grabbed a basket and started loading it with all sorts of cookies and chips and other unhealthy treats (though she ate that sort of thing so often it was hardly a treat anymore), while Julie began grabbing the more mundane things like bread and milk (full fat, of course; they didn't even sell skimmed anywhere in town). In no time at all they'd finished and paid, and the two climbed back into the car for the short journey home.
When they got back, the door was unlocked and a pair of sneakers sat next to the converse worn by the rest of the family.
"I guess Madison's home." Said Annie, bending down and undoing her laces, stomach gurgling with the sudden movement as it struggled to digest her breakfast.
"Uh-huh." Nodded Julie inattentively, having considerably more difficulty getting her own shoes off. Although only twenty-eight she was extremely large, and had a similar body shape to her daughter; as a result her midsection had dimensions akin to an overinflated beach ball, making shoelaces quite an ordeal. Eventually she just sighed and straightened up, rubbing her aching back. "Annie, get my shoes for me will ya?"
"Sure thing mom." The nine year old knelt down again, movement awkward because of her own oversized belly, and undid the knots with nimble fingers.
"Thanks." Julie said, kicking off the irritating footwear and following her daughter into the kitchen. Annie was a good kid, always helpful and hungry. If only she could say so much good about Madison; that girl just wasn't right in the head. She was incredibly thin, at least compared to the other kids around town, and did exercise for fun! Sighing, she went into the kitchen, bags of shopping in hand. Sometimes she despaired of her older daughter, she really did...
14331.title: Annie gets a huge breakfast!

choices: The girls get straight to 'playing'
Something else?
143312.content:
As Annie helped her mom pack the groceries away in the kitchen, a soft knock came from the front door.
"I'll get the rest of this, Annie," Julie said, nodding toward the main hall, "could you go get the door?"
"Sure, mom," her daughter nodded, and plodded out of the kitchen toward the front door.

Normally, Annie would peek through the letterbox to check for who was there before answering the door, but not this time; she recognised the gentle knocks.
She went straight for the handle and pulled the door open, revealing the visitor.

Standing at her porch was a girl her age and height, plus a few months and minus an inch or two. Her sandy brown hair was tied back in a ponytail. She wasn't Annie's size though.

She was bigger!

While Annie's extra weight went into her stomach, this girl's went everywhere. Her round, apple-like middle was held up by a pair of thick thighs and legs, with two slab-like arms at her side. Her middle didn't protrude as far as Annie's, but it was certainly larger in width. The adorable pink t-shirt she had on obviously fit her a few pounds ago; her arms squished out of the sleeves like muffins, and the overhang of her belly peeked ever so slightly from underneath. The purple pants she had on looked a little confined around her thighs and backside too.
Her chubby face sported a pair of puffy cheeks, pinked from constant blush, and a thick double-chin proudly showing itself beneath her mouth, which was covered in crumbs. No doubt from a snack she had before coming over.

"Oh, hey Cindy!" Annie grinned, greeting her next-door neighbour and best friend.
"Hi Annie," the larger girl greeted back, her smile dimpling her cheeks and squinting her eyes a bit, "wanna play?"
"Sure!" Annie nodded, standing aside to let her friend waddle through the door. Of course, their idea of 'playing' was mostly, if not always, vegetating on the couch, eating snacks and watching TV. The playing part came from Annie's video games, of course.
143312.title: A friend comes round.

choices: It's about their town
Madison's on TV
1433121.content:
"Can we grab some snacks first?" Asked Cindy. "I'm starving." She rubbed her blubbery belly for emphasis, hand sinking into the soft flesh.
"Sure thing." Annie headed back into the kitchen, Cindy waddling along behind her, and quickly gathered up a few thousand calories in sugary food. Then, the two of the headed upstairs to Annie's room. Climbing the stairs was the most exercise either girl did in the average day, and by the time they reached the top both were exhausted. They both collapsed on Annie's bed, gasping for breath - Cindy was especially wiped out. For a ten year old she had a massive amount of extra weight, and her fitness was simply dire. As a result, by the time she reached the top her was face bright red and her lungs felt fit to burst.
After a couple of minutes lying on the bed, Annie recovered enough to grab the TV remote from the side table and click on the flat screen mounted by the foot, rousing Cindy from her exercise-induced daze.
"Uhh. I hate your - puff - stairs Annie. Too long - puff - by half."
Annie shrugged in response.
"I hate them as much as you, Cin. I wish I lived at your house."
Cindy's house had a few features better that made it, in Annie's opinion, the best house ever; no stairs for a start, which meant no early-morning exercise, and an open-plan living room/kitchen combo which meant the distance between couch and fridge was three steps.
Then again, her own room had its advantages. Lying on her belly on her bed, she reached down and opened the cooler by the wall and took out a couple of cans of pop. She passed the first one to Cindy, who looked like she needed it, then cracked open her own and began gulping down the sugary liquid.
"Thanks Annie." Said the fatter girl, after taking a long draught of Coke. "What's on TV today?"
They flicked through the channels, but nothing caught Annie's eye. Sighing, she opened a pack of cookies and began eating them, already forgetting her large breakfast.
"Nothing, look like. She flicked past the news, then froze. " Wait a minute..." She turned Fox News back on and looked at the headline, amused.
1433121.title: National News!

choices: Another friend's arrived
Annie's mom is going out somewhere
14331211.content:
"Hey, Annie, isn't that our town?" Cindy asked, leaning back on the bed to get a better look. Indeed, the story did seem to be about Collford NC, where the two girls lived. A slim reporter was speaking to a man they recognised as the local mayor.
"So, they're saying Collford is, ah 'the fattest town in America'." Said the woman, her accent northeastern. "How do you feel about that, Mayor Saunders?"
The big man squinted angrily into the camera, hat low over his wide brow.
"I think it's none of their God-darned business what goes on around here. We keep ourselves to ourselves, and we don't want no city-folk pestering us about nothing. Now, if you'll kindly move away from my office, maybe I can do my job!"
He disappeared into a building Annie recognised as being situated just down the road from her house. She thought about going to the window to see if she could see the news crews, but then Cindy spoke.
"Pff. What's that even supposed to mean? I'm sure that's not right, 'cos my mama says that I'm perfectly normal, and all the other kids at school are the same size as me." She muted the TV, but Annie watched the little statistics scroll along the bottom. Apparently, 70% of the adult population was overweight or obese, as well as 94% of kids. She remembered being told about 'obese' at school one time, by a teacher from out of town, but she didn't really know what it meant. Probably nothing interesting.
Suddenly she sat bolt upright, staring at the screen.
"Put the sound back on!" She ordered Cindy, who confusedly obeyed. She leant forwards; on screen, the reporter was interviewing Madison, her sister!
"So, Miss Hunt- or can I call you Madison?" Said the news lady.
"Um, Madison's fine." Annie's sister was looking rather shy, peering out from beneath her messy black hair.
"Thank you. So, Madison; how do you feel about being one of the only 'normal weight' kids in town? It must be strange."
"I- I suppose. I've sort of gotten used to it."
"Really? And how do you manage to stay so slim in a town of overweight children?" The reporter asked, scribbling on a notepad. Madison licked her lips nervously.
"I just go for a run a few times a day and don't eat all that much. I've never really had a problem with it- though some of the other kids do."
"What do you mean by that?"
"Well, uh- it's never good to stand out too much... y'know?"
"I'm afraid that's all we have time for right now, but thanks a lot for your time, Miss Hunt." The reporter finished suddenly. Annie flicked the TV off as it cut back to the presenter.
She turned to Cindy, who had got bored and started eating Haribo part way through the broadcast.
"What d'you think of that then?" Asked Annie, grabbing a pack of chips and tearing it open, then crawling up the bed to sit against the headboard. Cindy finished her mouthful, then followed her example. The bed was just about wide enough for the two of them to sit side by side if they squashed together, but the two good friends didn't mind that.
"I don't think it it'll come to anything." Said Cindy sagely. "Nothing ever happens around here, its probably just all being exaggerated."
"I guess..." Replied Annie, glancing down at the great bulge of her belly. It sat comfortably in her lap, its warmth reassuringly heavy. The waistband of her jean shorts was tight underneath, so she absentmindedly reached down and unbuttoned them. Ah... that was better.
Suddenly the door opened and her mom peered in, red-faced from the climb up the stairs.
"Hey, kids..." She began.
14331211.title: Fattest town in all the states

choices: Time for a big dinner.
Time for a big dinner, but Madison's there too.
143312111.content:
"Abeera has just arrived. Shall I send her up?"
Annie and Cindy glanced at each other, grinning - Abeera was their friend from school, and it was always fun when the three of them got together.
"Yeah, of course." Annie said. Her mom's face disappeared from the door, and they heard her call down the stairs.
"Come on up, they're in the bedroom."
Half a minute later, their friend appeared in the doorway.
"Hi Annie, Cin." The ten year old's voice was bubbly and energetic despite the climb up the stairs.
"Hi Abeera." The two chorused as she shut the door behind her and came over to the bed. "Why're you here?"
Abeera grimaced, pulling off her hijab and hanging it over the back of a chair. She was from the only Muslim family in the town, and stood out distinctly against all the white kids at school.
"Mom and dad are fighting again. Do you mind if I hang out here?"
"Nah, not at all." Annie smiled.
"Great!" Abeera spotted the pile of food on the bedside table and helped herself, grabbing a Mars bar before perching herself on the bed with a creak of strained springs.
The Muslim girl was at least as big as Cindy, but considerably more bottom-heavy; whereas the others girl's weight was spread pretty evenly over her body, Abeera's was mostly around her hips and butt, giving her a distinctive, exaggerated pear shape. She truly was incredibly wide, each of her buttocks twice as broad as normal for her age, each thigh as thick as a slim kid's waist.
She wore a dress which was probably loose and flowing thirty pounds ago, but was now so tight it clung to every roll and bulge of her dumpy body, stretched so thin as to be almost transparent. The pattern of brown and grey flowers that had once adorned the garment was distorted beyond recognition, twisted into indistinguishable blobs of colour. The dress was even tight around her thighs it was so outgrown, and though it had originally been knee-length it slid up far higher whenever she moved or sat down.
Of course, none of the girls so much as noticed any of that; in a town where obese was average, ill-fitting clothes were common.
Abeera pulled one leg up onto the bed and began massaging the ankle, stubby fingers rubbing at the joint. Annie looked on curiously.
"D'your ankles hurt, Abby?" She asked eventually
"Yeah. I had to walk all the way here!" She exclaimed, and the other two girls shook their heads sympathetically. Abeera's house was five down from theirs; having to walk in this hot weather would just be torture of the worst kind, at least as far as they were concerned. Indeed, the unfit girl still looked rather hot and sweaty, hair tousled and breathing unsteady.
For the next hour and a half, the three girls just chatted together, mouths filled with candy or cookies whenever they weren't talking. Soon, Cindy had followed Annie's lead in unbuttoning her pants as their stomachs steadily filled, and before they knew it the sun had set outside and Annie's mom was calling them for dinner.
Abeera began looking worried, but Annie grabbed her arm.
"Don't worry, mom'll of made food for you too. You can probably stay overnight if you want." It was common for Abeera to stay over at either Annie or Cindy's houses whenever her parents argued, so it was hardly a problem
"Thanks." The big girl looked grateful, but Cindy was already urging them out the door and down the stairs.
143312111.title: Apples and Pears

choices: Madison's interview is brought up
Dinner carries on...and on...
1433121112.content:
The girls stomped down the stairs, wearing grins of anticipation. As the smell of a delicious dinner hit heir noses, a chorus of growls emanated from their stomachs as they totally forgot about their snacking spree and looked forward to stuffing their fat little faces.

The three waddled into the dining room, staring wide-eyed at the humongous spread of delicious, greasy, and no doubt fattening foods awaiting them. Pizza, burgers, pasta, fries, chicken, and litres upon litres of cola! Even cakes, puddings and ice cream sat out amongst the feast. Annie's mom had a firm belief that large healthy appetite meant a long happy life, and since the desserts were going to be eaten anyway, what was the point in waiting for them?

Speaking of which, Julie had just sat down once the girls had walked in, with Madison sitting near the end. True to form, her plate only held a healthy-sized chicken salad with some fruit juice.

"Hi Maddy," Annie greeted, smiling as she sat with Abeera and Cindy at her sides. She could feel Abeera's wide thigh just brushing against hers as it squished up.
"Hey Annie," her sister replied softly, seemingly still a bit shaken from her interview just earlier.

As soon as the girls were sat down, the free-for-all feast began. Annie grabbed a burger, some large slices of pizza and fries; Abeera got a large helping of pasta and fries; and Cindy helped herself to a few slices of pizza, a plentiful helping of chicken and even a slice of chocolate cake. The three of them filled their tall glasses with as much cola as they could hold.

Julie, her own plate piled high, encouraged Madison to have a bit more, saying that her daughter's meal would hardly feed a rabbit. Madison politely refused and ate quietly, as a her big little sister and her friends loudly stuffed their faces like little piglets.
1433121112.title: Time for a big dinner, but Madison's there ...

choices: In the not too distant future... (timeskip)
Later, that night...
14331211122.content:
The dining room was warm and stuffy, the smell of fries and burgers nearly overwhelming. Wood creaked softly as the girls shifted on their chairs, providing the only noise except for a constant munching, chewing sound, and soon the diners had sunk into a veritable trance in the heat. They ate fast, often eschewing cutlery for the sake of speed, and messily.
At some point Madison left, slipping neatly from her chair and disappearing with a slam of the door, but no-one even stirred. They were all too engrossed in the vast feast before them, and by the delicious flavours it provided, to even bother looking up. Stomachs swelled as they were filled by masses of fatty food, clothing strained at the seams. By the time the table was nearing being cleared, everyone had unbuttoned their pants but Abeera, whose dress seemed close to giving up its endless struggle against the bulging body it contained. Annie's own tank top had ridden up to reveal her belly in its entirety, cream-coloured under the yellow lights, the skin tight and strained. Along either side, stretch marks marred the smooth skin, angrily red against the pale flesh.
It was exceedingly warm, the heat of the past day combined with their flabby insulation causing everyone to overheat. Even Abeera looked red-faced, light brown skin notably darker than normal. Her dress was dark with sweat under her arms and where the fabric was caught between fat rolls, the thin fabric more translucent then ever where it was damp.
Cindy meanwhile, with inches of blubber around her middle, was especially affected, her face and chest flushed brightly. She wore a thin chain around her thick neck, the decorative yellow beads like setting suns against the crimson sky of her skin.
Eventually, when every morsel of food had been devoured, every crumb dabbed up and every drop of drink drunk, the meal ended. The girls, still somewhat conscious, managed to drag their stuffed bodies through to the next room, leaving Julie snoring in her chair. It took them nearly three minutes to stagger the eight steps through to the living room, where they collapsed in a heap on the couch and lay still. Occasionally someone would let a burp, or groan as their stomach ached particularly badly, but no one said a word.
Somehow, Annie had ended up in the middle of the couch, squashed between her two larger friends. She could feel the warmth practically radiating off them, the damp sweatiness that clung to their clothes like a visible thing to her addled mind. Confusedly, she tried to shift into a more comfortable position, but her bursting stomach stabbed with pain so she gave up, letting her head loll sleepily against the cushions. Through the dull filter of exhaustion, she felt the soft curve that was Abeera's hip on one side, the jelly-like roll of Cindy's belly on the other, and her own gut sticking out furthest in front. Despite the pain in her overstuffed stomach, the squashed environment and the heat that made her sweat like a pig, she smiled happily to herself.
As far as her young mind was concerned, this was the best life any nine year old could live.


From the doorway, a slight figure watched the three flabby children on the couch, considering. Madison's mind, unsullied by lethargy, was planning and scheming - behind her eyes, dark designs were born and cultivated. She hated their little town, and the lazy people who lived in it. She'd heard bitter mockery every day of her life, from kids so fat a walk up the stairs was hard work, but soon her time would come. Without a sound, she turned and disappeared into the unlit hall, the soft opening and closing of the front door unheard by all but the flies who had come to claim the leftover food.
14331211122.title: Fat kids, fatty food, finale.

choices: Abeera and Cindy arrive early to help set up
Annie sets up the party on her own
143312111221.content:
Annie had never been a modest eater - on the contrary, by the time she was seven she was eating two or three times what a normal kid her age would. However, in the months following the previous chapter her diet reached new levels of unhealthy. Her stomach was constantly filled fit to burst by masses of sugary food and drinks, and she spent almost all her time not at school either eating or sleeping. Most weekends she wouldn't even leave her bed from the Friday evening to the Monday morning, just lounging around in her increasingly strained pyjamas and drinking endless pop from the cooler.
Soon, the effects of her lifestyle began to show on her body. Whereas before all her weight had collected on her belly, now it began to settle in other places as puberty kicked in. Her arms and legs softened, becoming thick and weaker than ever. A slight double chin appeared below an increasingly rounded face, the jaw of which never seemed to stop moving in its quest to consume more and more food.
However, the worst effects were upon her torso. Over the course of six months, she became wider by almost half again as her hips spread outwards, matched in pace only by her belly. Before it had resembled that of a pregnant woman, a great mound of fat attached to her midsection; now, it was swamped in soft rolls that bulged over the front and sides of any pants she squeezed into - not that she bothered to put any on if she could help it.
She had even begun developing breasts, though they were more like flabby rolls at that point, downturned by gravity.
Whilst she was still particularly hefty around the middle, she had begun to even out as she approached her tenth birthday party, which incidentally is where our story resumes...
143312111221.title: In the not too distant future...

choices: A ludicrously undersized, clingy dress.
An ancient Greek style chiton, once used for fancy dress.
1433121112211.content:
Annie was lying flat on her bed, head propped up by pillows so she could see the TV on the wall by her feet. Or rather, so she could see the top half of the screen. Her belly, swollen by the masses of food already packed within, obscured her view of the lower half no matter how she craned her neck. Huffing irritably, she grabbed another slice of cold pizza and stuffed it in her mouth, wondering if it was worth the effort to sit up against the headboard so she could actually see the screen. Probably not, she concluded. The cartoon she was watching wasn't very good, just some drivel about a cat and mouse. Really, she was only watching it to fill the space between the other shows she wanted to watch.
The door opened unexpectedly and she jumped, peering over her distended midsection to see who had come in. The round, smiling faces of Cindy and Abeera met her eyes.
"Hey Annie!" Said Abeera cheerfully. "What's up?"
Annie heaved herself up to perch on the side of the bed, thick legs spread wide, belly sitting comfortably between her soft thighs. She smiled back at her friends, looking slightly confused.
"Hey. Uh, why're you two here?" She asked awkwardly.
"For your party, of course!" Cindy gushed. "You said for us to come help set it up with you!"
Annie bit her lower lip, thinking. Wasn't her party tomorrow? Wait a minute - it had been quite dark earlier... was it was Sunday already?
Reluctantly, she slid off the bed and waddled stiffly over to the window, muscles that hadn't been used for nearly forty straight hours groaning as they had to bear the weight of her oversized body once more. She parted the pink curtains with one chubby hand, squinting at the sudden rays of morning sunlight. She must have lost track of time after all; it was Sunday morning already.
She turned to her friends, rubbing the sleep from her eyes. They were looking rather bemusedly at her.
"Yeah, I remember now." She muttered. "Let me get dressed, then we'll go get started." Her current attire was some way short of modest; just a T-shirt and panties. The T-shirt, however, was so outgrown that it barely even covered her upper chest, utterly failing over her massive midriff. Lower, her blue-striped panties were almost completely hidden beneath her bottom flab roll, just a peek of fabric showing under the sagging expanse of her belly.
"Yeah, sure." Abeera and Cindy took Annie's place sitting on the bed, chatting idly as they watched her dress. With their weights in the middle, there was a noticeable bow in the bed's wooden frame, and ominous creaks whenever they shifted position. Both girls had also gained in the past months, though not as radically as Annie. For Cindy it was another couple of inches around her waist, and the beginnings of a new fat roll beneath her budding breasts. For Abeera, the new weight joined the rest around her hips and butt, exaggerating her form still further. Whenever her dress rode up, which was any time she moved, ragged stretch marks could be seen across the tender skin of her inner thigh.
Annie was getting annoyed. It was becoming obvious that nothing in her wardrobe was going to fit her, and her school uniform was still in the wash from when she'd spilt lemonade down the front. Was there nothing she could wear?
Reluctantly, she bent down and began rummaging in the bottom drawer. The clothes in here were seldom used - it made her knees hurt to bend down like this - but things fell off their hangers occasionally and ended up in there. Too lazy to fish them out, she'd let them lie until they were needed - like now.
Eventually, she gave an excited half-laugh and straightened up, revealing to her friends...
1433121112211.title: Abeera and Cindy arrive early to help set up

Perhaps a quick snack first...
14331211122111.content:
Cindy and Abeera blinked sceptically at the dress, not exactly sharing Annie's enthusiasm. The two girls exchanged looks as their friend looked on.

"What's wrong?" She asked, her excited face turning into a sad frown, "Don't you like it?"
Abeera was the first to speak. "Well, uh, it's really pretty Annie, but don't you think it's a little, um..."
"A little what?" Annie whimpered.

"A little cold!" Cindy jumped in, grinning awkwardly, "I mean, maybe you could put something on underneath it, like some tights or something...?" She shot a look at Abeera.
"O-oh, yeah, right," The wider girl nodded, getting the idea, "it was a little chilly coming over!"

"Ooh, gotcha!" Annie nodded, her bright grin returning as she grabbed a pair of tights from a higher drawer. Her apparent obliviousness invoked a sigh of relief from her friends.

With that, she waddled back over and draped the dress and tights over her bed, slowly taking off her shirt. The girls had changed clothes in front of each other for ages, so there was no hint of awkwardness in the air.
Once it was off, she dropped it onto the floor and grabbed the dress, easily pulling it over her head.

However, tugging it down her middle was the challenge. As expected, it stopped as it covered her chest and reached her round belly and wide sides. She'd gotten her arms and head through, so it was just a matter of tugging the rest of it down.
"Oof, c'mon you..." She grunted, wriggling and tugging with all her might, her chubby cheeks reddening with the effort.

"Try sucking in," Cindy suggested, getting a worried look from Abeera. Annie didn't seem to think much of it, as doing just that had gotten it down a tiny bit more.
The dress had reached down to just above her belly button before she decided it was finished.

Next were the tights. Annie sat next to her friends, invoking a deeper bend in the frame and another loud creak. She held her breath and leaned forward to get one of them over her foot, quickly exhaling and leaning back as soon as it was on. She repeated the process with the next one.

"C-could you, gimme, a hand, girls...?" She panted, looking toward her friends.
The two nodded and slid off the bed, which let out a loud creak of relief as it slightly straightened back up. Each girl grabbed a sock and pulled it up a thick leg, looking rather tight.

"I think we got them," Abeera nodded, watching their friend slide off her bed and land with a heavy thud on the floor.

"Thanks girls," Annie smiled widely, her cheeks dimpling.
14331211122111.title: A ludicrously undersized, clingy dress.
