Later, just before the party begins...
143312111221111.content:
"Uh... just a little further... there!" Annie finally managed to tie the knot, attaching a bunch of balloons to the curtain rod. Carefully, she climbed down off the chair and moved it over a few feet, then climbed back up.
"Careful, Annie." Said Abeera worriedly, taking hold again of Annie's thigh to steady her. On the other side, Cindy was looking equally anxious. The chair was old and rickety, the wooden legs warped outwards by years of heavy use, and whenever their friend shifted her weight it creaked ominously. Annie's mom had been supposed to do this bit, but she'd had to go out to buy replacement snacks after the last lot mysteriously disappeared.
Once more, Annie managed to get the balloons into place before dismounting the chair and moving it over one final time. She was puffing from the unaccustomed exertion, rounded face red to match the butterfly clip in her hair. Whenever she raised her arms her dress rode up, revealing the pale expanse of her gut to her concerned friends. Not that it was well hidden usually, however; the dress was so thinly stretched over her midsection and chest it was semi-transparent, every bump and dip blatantly visible. The fabric was so clingy, even her deep belly button stood out against the vaguely blue fabric (it had been ultramarine originally, but it was so stretched the colour had faded). Her tights were even worse; stretched to breaking point over her thick thighs and bulging butt, they hid practically nothing. Every stripe on her panties showed through, and down the sides little slices of flesh could be seen where the stitching had given up its struggle.
With a grunt of effort, she climbed back onto the chair with the final bunch of balloons and reached up. Her short, pudgy fingers strained as she tried to tie the knot far above her head, squinting up at the awkward piece of string. She reached up on tiptoes to get a better angle, feeling her ankles protest furiously at their treatment as she did so. Nearly... nearly... aha!
She pulled the knot tight, but at that very moment Cindy took the opportunity to sneeze, taking a hand away from supporting Annie to cover her mouth. Half a second later, of Annie's ankles buckled unexpectedly, and the inevitable happened. Like a great oak felled by dozens of burly lumberjacks, Annie toppled smoothly from the chair and tumbled to the ground far below.
"Oof!" All the air fled from Cindy's lungs as suddenly Annie's considerable weight landed on top of her, and the two girls crumpled to the floor. For a moment they lay there, fallen giants on the field of battle, then Annie's plump lips parted and she spoke.
"At least I got the balloons up!" She rolled heavily off her friend and climbed to her feet, before turning to look down at Cindy. The bigger girl was gasping like a fish out of water, face redder than ever. "You okay, Cindy?" Annie asked, vaguely concerned. The fat girl managed a nod, wheezing and gasping, hands clutching at her bruised middle. "Great. It's a good job you're so soft, really; I coulda hurt myself." Annie waddled of to find some more decorations, leaving her friend on the floor. Abeera helped her up.
"C'mon, take it easy." She said, struggling to support the other girl's weight. "Let's go get you some food, kay?
Abeera lead Cindy to a couch and sat her down again, before heading off to find something for her to eat. Her mom had always told her that if someone had injured the best medicine was food, and that tradition hadn't failed her yet.
143312111221111.title: Get to planning!

choices: Cindy falls asleep from her binge...
Annie discovers what's going on...
1433121112211111.content:
Abeera wandered into the kitchen, watching Annie humming to herself and putting up more decorations as she passed by. Part of her wished she was a little more concerned that one of her best friends had hurt herself, but on the other hand, she knew she would be if she was in genuine trouble, and she only seemed to have the wind knocked out of her.

She opened the pantry door and looked inside, seeing all the shelves were loaded to the brim. It seemed only the party snacks had 'mysteriously disappeared', so the regular ones went untouched.
Till now, at least.

Abeera grabbed armfuls of chip bags, chocolate bars, cupcake boxes and any other sugary calorie-packed treats she could reach. It'd take at least the majority of one shelf to cheer Cindy up.

She sneaked the treats past her oblivious hostess and into the living room, where Cindy was sat up and rubbing her sore middle with a quiet whimper.
"Here Cindy, this'll cheer you up a bit," she said, smiling softly to her rounder friend as she dumped the collection of snacks next to her.

Cindy sniffled and managed a little smile before grabbing a chocolate bar. "Thanks, Abby."
She ripped open the foil wrapper and chowed down on the sweet treat, letting out a little giggle of joy as she chewed.

Abeera felt a wave of relief as she watched her friend gobble up treat after treat. She was obviously feeling much better already, and she knew she'd let her have a share of the snack pile. The wider girl propped herself up next to her and grabbed a few chip bags for herself.

As Cindy ate and ate, her already rather packed shirt began to tighten even more, a pale sliver of her round belly peeking from underneath and getting larger as she continued. She didn't notice though; her need to eat was much too empowering.

Even though she ate much less, Abeera was still in a continuous war with her dress. She could constantly feel it riding up her love-handles as she adjusted herself to get more comfortable, and she constantly tugged it back down with one hand as she ate with the other.

In the back of her mind she had to wonder; how was Annie not noticing any of this?
1433121112211111.title: Abeera feeds Cindy.

choices: They have a rest and a drink before the party
Annie's mom's home!
14331211122111112.content:
"What are you doing?" Asked Annie, bemused. She watched as Abeera jumped guiltily, looking up from the half-unwrapped candy bar in her hand.
"Uh, um, we were just having a snack." She hurried. "I didn't think you'd mind us eating your food."
Annie shrugged.
"I don't care about the food, what's mine is yours and whatever, but you need to help with the decorations. The party's starting in an hour and we still need to do the piñata." She put her hands on her hips, feeling them sink slightly into the soft flab. "Plus, I'm getting tired doing all this by myself."
"Uh, yeah. Sorry." Abeera heaved herself off the couch, wincing slightly as the movement jostled her full stomach. The overfed girl glanced at the couch, and at the pile of empty wrappers on the cushions. She must've got carried away; that'd been an awful lot. She idly tugged her dress back down, wishing the damn thing would just stay in place; the old thing was tighter on her than ever, and rode up practically to her waist at the slightest provocation. It was a testament to the dress's manufacture that it stayed in one piece despite being stretched so tightly over her thighs and hips, and didn't just burst its stitches every time she moved.
Annie led her two friends through to the sitting room, where a piñata sat disembowelled on the floor next to a great mountain of candy. As they entered, they saw Madison hurriedly straighten up, stepping away from the multicoloured pile.
"Hey Skeleton. You eating our candy?" Annie frowned at her older sister. "That's not like you."
Madison glared at the three fat girls, anger flashing in her eyes.
"I told you not to call me that!" She said, slipping something into her hoodie's pocket even as she pushed past them and headed for the stairs. Annie glanced after her, almost curious as to what it had been; however, there was a piñata to be made, so she let it go.
Madison, in contrast to her sister, hadn't changed much. Underneath her hoodies and tracksuits, she had the same slim, strong body as ever; perhaps she'd grown a couple of inches, or lost a couple of pounds, but she was the same strange, skinny figure she'd always been.
Annie headed on in to the sitting room, and began fiddling with the piñata. Behind her Cindy and Abeera tried to enter at the same time and nearly got wedged in the door, filling the narrow space with their wide rears. They giggled and Abeera stepped back, letting Cindy go first. Soon, all three were sitting cross legged on the floor, shoveling great handfuls of chocolate and candy into the massive, multicoloured paper pony. In no time, its papier-mâché skin was bulging all over it was so full, and the girls stepped back to admire their work.
"It looks great!" Said Cindy enthusiastically. The food Abeera brought for her, as well as a few candies pinched from the pile, had erased any memory of her injury from her mind and she was cheerful once more.
Annie nodded, licking her lips hungrily.
"This is gonna be awesome! Help me carry it through okay? We'll hang it in the back yard."
Together, the three heaved it up off the carpet and headed to the back yard, huffing and puffing the whole way. It was truly huge, as large as Annie in size and probably about equal in weight, what with the amount of chocolate packed within. With much complaint and struggle, and more than one near-disastrous slip, they managed to get it out to the backyard and hung from a low tree branch. It looked magnificent, practically glowing in the blazing sun; it really had been a good idea on Annie's mom's part to have one. They stood admiring it for a while, fantasising about the candy within.
Eventually, Cindy wiped a hand across her brow, breaking the stillness that had settled as they stood there. All three girls were hot and sweaty from the work, especially Cindy who was the most unfit of the bunch, and she was eager to go inside to have a snack and a rest before the party guests arrived. She was wearing an undersized tank top that had ridden so far up it was basically just a strip of fabric tight around her chest, under a light jacket which didn't even come close to buttoning up. She also wore a pair of denim shorts that were so tight her thighs more resembled overstuffed sausages than anything. Despite this light summer clothing her clothes were already damp with sweat, so reluctantly she turned and headed back inside, soon followed by the two others.
They were all looking forward to the party, but right then a cold drink and a snack sounded perfect.
14331211122111112.title: Piñata and sneaky skeletons

choices: The girls get rather sleepy from their binge...
Annie's mom returns!
143312111221111121.content:
Somehow, even if it took them between five and ten minutes, the tubby trio had managed to haul their tired, oversized frames up the stairs and into Annie's room. Their clothes were already dampened with sweat thanks to their taxing efforts of setting up the party, and the taxing climb up the stairs and onto Annie's bed didn't help them one bit.

The bed's frame bended badly inward from the sheer weight set on it, and creaked ominously. Annie, sitting against the headboard, could just about reach the mini-fridge by the bed, which acted as somewhat of a bedside table. She pulled out a few cans of soda and shared them amongst her friends. Abeera sat just in front of her, her exaggerated pear-shaped body nearly taking up the entire width of the bed. Cindy sat before her, to her left. She pulled off her jacket and set it on the bed, thinking she'd cool down much faster without it.

Looking toward her two friends, she made a mental note to ask her mom about getting a bigger bed, like hers.

A large pile of sugary fattening treats was piled on the bed before the girls; after some thought, Annie decided her friends had the right idea, and they all decided to loot the pantry of as much food as their tubby arms could hold. Which was a surprisingly large amount each.

The young hostess flipped on the TV to a cartoon channel and the three began to relax their way - snacking and lazing. Annie helped herself to some chocolate bars; Abeera a box of small muffins; and Cindy a bag of sugar-coated doughnuts.

The girls continued to snack and watch TV, laughing at the screen every so often. Ripped wrappers, hollow boxes and empty cans began to clutter the floor around the bed, but they were too engrossed in their lazing to notice.

Their fingers and faces coated with sugar, chocolate, cream and all manners of remains. Debris from their messy binging dropped onto their clothes, which did not fair well from even more strain put on them.
Annie's shirt tightened, the overhang of her belly creeping out more and more, along with the tiniest bit of love handle.
Cindy's tank top was no different than from when she started, serving only to cover her chest, aside from the new colourful food stains.
Abeera was once again having a disagreement with her dress, and every few minutes, or every adjustment to get comfortable, she found the infernal thing riding up again and again, and with a huff of annoyance she tugged back down every time.

If Madison was in her room, no doubt she could hear the loud chomping and slurping of hedonism coming from close by.
143312111221111121.title: Snack Break

choices: One of them has a dream...
Something else?
1433121112211111211.content:
Boxes, wrappers, tubs and other emptied containers littered the bed and the floor around it, as the girls finally finished their calorie-infested feast. The three porkers simply lazed around on the overworked bed, sluggishly licking and sucking their fingers clean of sugar, chocolate, jelly and any other delicious residue left behind.

Annie's stuffed belly and love handles were in full view, her shirt strained to its limits. Tugging it down was impossible, especially for the lethargic girl.
Cindy lapped at her tank top, more accurately the delicious stains on it. It was strained even further, and a few pops of stitching could be heard from her stretching it up to her mouth.
Abeera's dress had ridden up once again, but she was too stuffed and tired to care at this point. She'd get it later.

A long yawn emerged out of Cindy, signalling her drowsiness. The yawn spread to her two friends, who let out ones of their own.

"Maybe we should have a nap before the party," the roundest girl suggested, pushing her tank top back down, "I can hardly move..."
"Me neither," Annie admitted, shoving trash off her bed for more room to sprawl out, "we need our energy for the party, after all..."
Abeera, usually the voice of reason amongst the trio, gave a nod. "Yeah, good idea..."

The girls lay back in whatever space they could find on the bed, which groaned and creaked in protest. More empty containers were carelessly pushed away, to make more room for the corpulent companions.

Within minutes, all three girls were out like a light...
1433121112211111211.title: The girls get rather sleepy from their binge...

choices: More friends
Annie's mom's back
14331211122111112112.content:
With three fat girls on the bed, there wasn't all that much room for then to nap. Cindy was taking the top half of the bed herself, lying on her back with her belly sticking up towards the ceiling. Abeera was sprawled across the foot of the bed with her large form, but she was sitting against the wall so Annie lay back and rested her head on the fatter girl's bare thigh. It was exceedingly comfortable, the flabby flesh soft and warm, and in but a few moments she felt herself drift to sleep. The only sounds were those of Cindy still sleepily slurping down cola at the other end of the bed, and the grumbles of Abeera and Annie's stomachs as they began digesting. Slowly, Annie's eyes meandered shut... only to spring open with a start as the doorbell's chimes echoed up the stairs. She glanced at the clock on the wall.
"The guests must be here!" She gasped, realising with a start how late it was. She rolled off the bed, landing precariously on her feet before waddling hurriedly out of the room. Abeera and Cindy heard her heavy footsteps clump down the stairs, and reluctantly they got up to follow their friend.
Annie reached the door as the bell rang a second time. Brushing the worst of the crumbs off her dress, and tugging the tight fabric down a bit further to cover her belly button, she pulled open the unlocked door. No-one ever really bothered securing their houses in Annie's town; everyone was too lazy to bother committing any crime, never mind burglary.
On the other side of the door were three girls, and Annie grinned as she recognised them as Marilyn, Emma and Mariana, three of the other girls in her year. Living in such a small town, there were only about thirty kids her age around, so she'd invited all sixteen girls from her class to the party. These three were some of her better friends, so she happily accepted their presents and showed them in, leading them through to the sitting room where decorative multicoloured ribbons and balloons adorned the walls. A moment later, Abeera and Cindy joined them, looking red faced from the walk down the stairs. They all began making introductions.
"You look nice, Annie." Said Emma, bright eyes looking her friend up and down. "That dress really suits you - though it is a little short."
Annie glanced down.
"Yeah, I guess it is." She made a halfhearted effort to tug the offending garment further over her bloated midsection. "Still, I think it looks pretty good on me. Um, you look nice too, I guess."
"Oh, thank you." Said Emma sweetly, standing up to give a little twirl. Her neat pink dress fit her extremely well, at least compared to the others' outgrown attire. Although she was quite chubby, her weight collected on her hips and chest to form an attractive, if somewhat exaggerated, hourglass shape. As an amateur fashion enthusiast, she was always trying out new styles of clothing. Sometimes it worked, like today's frilly dress; other times, she looked more like an arrangement of felt and fur that had somehow achieved life.
Meanwhile, Abeera had struck up a conversation with Mariana. The two were great friends, Abeera being from the only Asian family in town and Mariana being the only Hispanic kid their age. They also shared a great love of reality TV, and the two could spend hours talking avidly about who did what in the latest episode of Hollyoaks.
Mariana was a rather short, astonishingly rotund girl. She was the second fattest kid in their year, and had at some point given up on trying to find clothes that fit properly, resorting to wearing two-piece swimsuits practically everywhere instead. She had collapsed into an armchair the second they'd entered the room, and now looked rather thoroughly wedged.
Finally, at the other side of the room, Cindy was awkwardly trying to rouse up a conversation with Marilyn, with little success. Marilyn was quite short, with curly dark hair and pale skin. She was also a bit slimmer than the other girls, with just a bit of a pot belly and chubby thighs to show her excesses - though she was known at school for eating impressive amounts for her size. She wasn't, however, very talkative.
"I, er, I like what you've done with your hair." Cindy tried. Marilyn looked at her.
"I haven't done anything to it." She said quietly.
"Oh. Well, uh, how's school going?" She attempted again.
"Okay."
"That's nice." Cindy smiled falsely, looking around hurriedly for something else to say. Luckily for her, the doorbell rang a second later.
14331211122111112112.title: Ding-dong

choices: Even more guests!
Annie's mom finally returns
143312111221111121121.content:
Annie perked up as the doorbell went off once again. More guests arriving so soon?
"I'll be right back," she told Emma, and waddled off to the door to open it.

Standing at the porch were three more girls Annie fondly recognised from class. The one in front was a rather chubby girl, a potbelly stretching her light blue shirt and hanging over the waist of her jean-shorts. Her hair was shoulder-length and curled at the ends, and a wide smile dimpled her chubby cheeks.

"Hey Lisa," Annie grinned back, albeit not nearly as widely.
"Hi Annie!" Lisa squeaked, throwing her arms around the hostess, "Thanks for lettin' us come!"
"Well we're friends," the wider girl said with a shrug, "dunno why I wouldn't invite you."
She happily accepted Lisa's gift and let her in to meet up with the others. She was very affectionate and energetic, particularly for a girl her size.

The other two girls, Rebecca and Veronica, were twins, and it certainly showed; the two had the same brunette hair running down their backs, the same amber eyes, and the same apple-shaped figure that their matching purple tops and grey sweatpants struggled to keep contained. The only difference was Rebecca was more relaxed and Veronica was chattier.

"Thanks for coming, girls," Annie greeted them, accepting their presents.
"Thanks for letting us come," Rebecca smiled at her.
"Yeah, this is gonna be so cool!" Veronica grinned; she was much like Lisa, so the two got along quite well. "Wonder who else is here?" She waddled inside, her calmer sister following.
143312111221111121121.title: More friends!

choices: Yep, more friends
A delivery/TV crew/anything else
1433121112211111211212.content:
Annie was just about to close the door and follow them to the sitting room, when suddenly a car pulled up outside and her mom climbed out, burdened by several bulging bags of food. Annie held the door open for her as she hurried inside.
“Hey mom. Whatcha buy?” She asked.
“Loads.” her mom answered shortly, “Who’s here?”
Annie followed Julie through to the kitchen.
“Uhm, me, Abeera and Cindy… and Marilyn and Mariana and Emma… and Lisa and Veronica and Rebecca got here just now.” She listed. Julie grunted in agreement.
“Yeah, I saw their cars leaving as I got here.” She pushed a few family packs of potato chips into Annie’s arms, before flopping onto a chair, wiping sweat from her brow. “Take those through and give ‘em to your friends, okay? I’m gonna have a sit down.”
Annie headed back into the sitting room and took a look around. Mariana and Abeera were filling (quite literally) the armchairs by the TV, chatting away happily about some dramatic occurrence on yesterday's episode of Twin Peaks. Emma was perched on the arm of the big red couch, which was creaking and groaning under the considerable combined weights of Cindy, Rebecca, Veronica and Lisa who burdened its longsuffering cushions. To fit all four girls on at once they were squashed together like sardines in a can, and Annie giggled at the sight of them. Marilyn, ever the loner, was standing quietly in the corner, examining her nails.
Annie announced her arrival by chucking a packet of potato chips at everyone, giggling even harder as everyone but Emma failed to catch theirs. Grabbing a pack for herself as well, she planted her butt on the opposite, smaller couch and joined the conversation.
"Have you seen the building site yet?" Lisa was asking the others. "It's huge! Apparently, they're gonna build a gym or something."
Several confused looks appeared.
"What's a gym again?" Asked Rebecca, biting her lip in consternation. It was Emma who answered her.
"It's like, a place where you go to exercise and stuff." She said, but Rebecca just looked even more confused.
"A building just for exercise? Why would you want that?" She asked, but everyone just shrugged. Annie wondered if maybe they were building it just for Madison.
"Anyway, I heard they're going to have a swimming pool as well." continued Emma, brushing salt off her pink dress. "That could be pretty cool."
"Ooh!" Broke in Veronica, remembering something. "Have you seen the television crews around town? Apparently, they're making a docu... documentally?"
"Documentary." Supplied Rebecca.
"Yeah, that! They've been interviewing people for this show they're gonna make. They said it's gonna be called 'Collford; Fat Capital of the Western World' or something."
"That's weird," broke in Annie, "Why're they doing that?" She glanced around at all the people in the room. They all looked pretty normal to her.
"Apparently we've got more, uh, 'obese' kids than anywhere else in the world." Continued Veronica. "I guess that's a science word?"
"I guess..." Agreed Annie, biting her lip. She was sure she'd heard that word somewhere before.
"Oh wait, but that's not even the exciting part." Gushed Veronica. "They told me, they're gonna choose a family and do a big part of the documentary just about them, filming their daily lives and having interviews and all that stuff." Her amber eyes turned dreamy. "I hope they choose us. I always wanted to be a film star!"
A moment later though, the ringing of the doorbell precluded any more conversation, and Annie jumped (well - climbed laboriously) to her feet and waddled off hurriedly down the corridor to answer it. She was getting rather tired by all this upping and downing - but on the plus side, she was working up a healthy appetite for later, so it was okay in the end. Plus, what could this be but more friends?
1433121112211111211212.title: Triumphant return

choices: How about some MORE guests?
Something else...?
14331211122111112112121.content:
Annie opened up the door to another trio of large girls from her year, all of them bearing wrapped presents.

The one closest was a rather rounded brunette with blue eyes, her chocolate brown hair reaching down to the small of her back with a couple of short bangs covering her chubby cheeks. Her frilly rose-like dress fit rather snugly around her middle, her stomach and love-handles pushing against the fabric. Her white socks just barely covered her thick calves, and her dress hid her large thighs. Fancy matching red shoes with little bows covered her feet. She carried a nicely wrapped gift in her hands, topped with a bow and all.

"Hey Tamara," Annie greeted with a smile. Tamara was the more well-off girl of their year, and one of the more popular girls. She often acted rather haughty, but she had a good heart and considered the other girls her friends, otherwise she wouldn't dare show up.
"Hello Annie," she smiled back, letting herself inside, "I see I must be fashionably late. No matter, I'll take care of myself." She finished, making her way into the living room with her eyes fixed on something. Probably the family-sized chip bags.


The second girl was an inch or so shorter than Annie, but fixed her with a wide smile as she handed over her present. Her curly ginger hair reached her shoulders and her brown eyes almost shimmered on her round freckled face. Her pink t-shirt bore the slightly stretched image from a popular anime, with a pale sliver of overhanging stomach peeking from the bottom. Her black sweatshorts looked rather strained around the rear, and her thighs looked a little stuffed in the legs. Her tubby toes flexed in her sandals, free from socks.

"Hey Annie!" She squeaked, throwing her arms around her friend.
Annie grinned and returned the gesture happily. "Hey Sarah, make yourself at home!"
Sarah practically bounced inside and made her way over to meet with the others.


The last girl was about Annie's height, with a ponytail of blonde hair reaching just past her shoulders, and a pair of thin glasses shielding her amber eyes. A meek smile crossed her chubby face. Her t-shirt, dark blue with the graphic of a popular MMORPG, fit relatively well for her size; almost too well, looking more like a nightgown than a t-shirt. Her sweatpants fit snugly on her pear-shaped figure, and her sneakers were blue and white.

"H-hi Annie," she greeted, her voice soft.
"Hi Lucy," Annie greeted, and the two shared a soft hug, "c'mon in!"
Lucy nodded and made herself inside, no doubt looking around for Sarah. With the two of them being rather nerdy, Lucy for games and Sarah for anime, it was almost destined for the two to be friends.

Annie grinned and set her gifts with the others before joining the girls.
14331211122111112112121.title: Some more guests!

choices: Open some presents
Party games!
143312111221111121121212.content:
From there, the party picked up momentum. Snacks were brought through and devoured, and conversation sprang up in earnest as they discussed the new developments in their lazy little town. Historically, theirs had been a place where not much happened; this news story, bemused as most of the residents were by its fancy words like "obesity" and "malnutrition" and "caloric intake", was still by far the most interesting thing to happen to Collford NC since the bomb tests of '82, and everyone was abuzz with rumours.
Most of the girls had heard about the new gymnasium that was being built, but only Tamara knew about the changes to the local school. According to her mother (who was good friends with Mayor Saunders), there was going to be a new lesson every other day called "gym". What this new lesson was going to entail even Tamara didn't know - it seemed it was as much a mystery to the teachers as it was to the students.
At some point, Marilyn had spoken up suddenly from the corner of the room to tell them that she'd overheard that all the kids in the town were going to be assigned "nutrition management specialists" who would help them with... something? Marilyn hadn't been sure, and had quickly retreated back to the corner after saying her part. That had left everyone quiet for a moment as they collectively attempted to remember what nutrition was, but luckily Julie brought through a tray of three dozen donuts before anyone could think too hard about it.
Before long however, they were all well and truly rumoured-out. As the conversation began grinding to a halt, Annie looked around for something to entertain her guests.
143312111221111121121212.title: Moving swiftly along

choices: The game begins!
Suddenly...!
1433121112211111211212122.content:
While the conversation was starting to die down, Annie's eyes glanced toward the stereo in the unit beneath the TV. She lit up with an idea.

"Hey, let's play Musical Chairs!" She piped up, everyone suddenly going quiet to listen to her.
"Omygosh!" Lisa squeaked, grinning ear to ear, "I love Musical Chairs!"
"Me too!" Veronica giggled, feet kicking, "Let's go!"

"Sure, I could do something," Rebecca said, shrugging with a grin.
Sarah nearly hopped up from her seat, which she somehow shared with Lucy, and grinned over to Annie. "Great idea! Comin', Luce?"
"U-um," Lucy muttered quietly, then managed a small nod with a smile to match, "okay, sure!"

"Do we have to move around a lot?" Cindy complained with a fearful frown.
"Not really," Abeera answered, shaking her head, "You just walk around a circle of chairs and grab a seat when the music stops. You never played it before?"
"Not really," she admitted, with a slight shrug, "Always sounded like too much work."

"I suppose I could join in," Tamara answered, smiling as she, slowly and with some effort, got herself up, "but I intend to win, girls, just warning you."
"Me too," Emma smirked at the richer girl, sliding off the arm of the couch, "I'm not going easy on any of you!"
Mariana, with some help from Abeera, got herself up from her chair. "Me too!"

Annie grinned, happy that everyone was on board with the idea.
Or so it seemed; She noticed Marilyn hadn't given an answer yet. She simply stood there and watched everyone get excited.
"Do you wanna play too, Marilyn?" She tried, smiling warmly at her, "Or do you wanna do the music?"

The quiet girl blinked, biting her lip slightly in thought.
"...can I do the music?" She finally answered.
"Sure," Annie chirped with a nod, "I'll show you how the stereo works."

While the girls each got a chair from the dining room, and anywhere else they could find, Annie grabbed a CD from the unit and showed Marilyn how the stereo worked as she turned it on. It wasn't that Marilyn was unfamiliar with stereos, Annie just felt she should show her what way each button was placed on her particular machine.

"...and that's the pause button there," she finished, popping the CD in.
Marilyn nodded, understanding, and sat on a little stool Emma had left for her.

The chairs were all set, one too little, hence the point of the game.
"Whenever you're ready, Marilyn," Annie called to her friend, the others ready to walk...or waddle.
1433121112211111211212122.title: Party Games!

choices: Next rounds
Suddenly!
14331211122111112112121221.content:
The music started with a sharp click as Marilyn pressed the play button, jangling notes slightly tinny through the stereo's outdated speakers. There was a moment's pause, then like a heavy cargo train slowly struggling out of the station, the procession of girls began to move. Slowly, some walking, some forced to waddle by the sheer size of their thighs, they began to circle the group of chairs, each poised to leap into action the second the music stopped. Abeera was in front of Annie in the line, and Annie watched with perverted curiosity at the way the bigger girl's butt jiggled and shook with every step. Although the Asian girl wasn't the biggest there, a genetic fluke had left her with the largest derrière by no small margin.
Around and around they circled, and as the song dragged on without pause the line became more ragged as some of them began to stumble. Mariana, the fattest and laziest girl at the party, was already starting to pant, nearly falling as she tripped over her own feet and bumped into Sarah ahead. She wheezed an apology between gasps.
And still the music dragged on. Eventually they all ground, panting, to a halt. They turned as one to Marilyn.
"Come on Marilyn..." Annie said, before stopping to huff for breath. "You've gotta... you've gotta turn the music off eventually!"
"Yeah, c'mon." Said Lisa, who was less puffed than the rest of them. She was known as a bit odd in their year for occasionally walking to school when the weather was cool enough. "Cindy keeps stepping on my heels."
"Sorry..." gasped Cindy, who was leaning heavily on one of the chairs to catch her breath. "I can't really... I can't really see my feet most of the time... gotta guess... where I'm gonna step..."
Marilyn looked up from the stereo at the array of round facing glaring at her. She met Annie's eyes, the music still playing loudly in the background, and gave a very small smile. Then, very deliberately, she reached out one long finger and tapped the pause button. The music stopped.
For half a second, there was absolute silence as the girls stared blankly at Marilyn. They weren't really used to unexpected events, and anything that happened faster than they could eat an ice cream sundae was generally considered too fast to be healthy. Even the tortoise gets there eventually however, even it takes him a year.
Tamara leapt impressively for one of the chairs, bowling aside Lucy as she did so. After successfully planting her rear on a seat, she turned to smile smugly at the rest of the group.
What occurred next was, put conservatively, somewhat chaotic. The ten remaining girls all jumped for the nine remaining chairs, and as is inevitable when so much weight it thrown around, casualties were suffered. Many of them were still poised by their chosen seats and were able to grab them immediately, but a few of them, whether particularly slow on the uptake or otherwise indisposed, were slower - Mariana was still catching her breath when the music stopped, and hadn't noticed over the pounding in her ears, Lucy was picking herself up unhappily off the floor, and Abeera had been fiddling with her dress. Once everyone else had taken a seat, those three were left to fight over the two remaining.
Lucy recovered first, getting to her feet and slipping under Mariana's arm before going to plant herself on a chair. A millisecond before her butt hit the wood, however, Abeera slammed into her and sent her flying. Generally the Asian girl was rather calm and submitting, but the smug look on Tamara's face had incensed her and she was determined to win.
Lucy, suddenly airborne, was less fortunate. Without even hitting the ground, she collided with Mariana's stomach and bounced off, landing in a dazed heap near the television. Marilyn looked down at her from atop her stool at the stunned girl, the corner of her mouth twitching in silent laughter at the chaos she had wrought. In the background, Mariana grinned in victory as she placed her ponderous girth on the final chair.

Thus the first round of musical chairs was concluded, and Lucy went to lick her wounds on the Disqualification Couch.
14331211122111112112121221.title: The 74th annual Party Games

choices: Final rounds
Suddenly!
143312111221111121121212211.content:
After the madness of round one, things calmed down somewhat. Marilyn had had her fun and began to stop the music at appropriate times, the game progressing quickly for a few more rounds. The next person to go out after Lucy was, surprisingly, Lisa. Everyone had been expected Mariana to be out next, but her extra weight was actually coming in handy for once. Both her and Lisa had collided going for the same chair, and the lighter girl had come of worse, being knocked almost off her feet by the impact.
In fact, Mariana was the unexpected leader for several rounds. Although she was the slowest there, she used her ridiculous size as a weapon to bludgeon her way to victory, ousting Rebecca, Emma, Sarah and Veronica by merit of simple Newtonian physics. Each had a close encounter with the floor as one by one they were literally bounced from the circle.
Now only Annie, Cindy, Abeera, Mariana and Tamara were left in the competition, 5 girls fighting over 4 chairs. The others watched excitably from the Disqualification Couch, bruises already forgotten. With the click of a button the music started up once more and the five began to circle four, a wobbling parade of sweaty flesh. Mariana was in the worst shape; she was so lazy she didn't even leave the classroom at lunchtime on school days, preferring to stay in her seat from arriving in the morning to leaving in the afternoon. As a result she was horrendously out of shape, and even this slow shamble left her exhausted and gleaming with sweat. Cindy, although similarly unfit, was faring slightly better; she had been lucky with her seat choices, and had made it thus far almost unopposed.
There was a sudden intake of breath from the observers as suddenly the music stopped, and the five remaining contenders went to grab their seats. Annie and Abeera were the first down, quickly followed by Tamara who slipped around Cindy and into safety. That left Mariana and Cindy aiming for the same chair, a situation that could only end badly.

Cindy in particular was feeling quite disgruntled that she'd been flattened twice in one day, first by Annie when they'd done the decorations and now by the much heavier Mariana. She was beginning to feel rather sick what with all these blows to the midsection, and would much prefer to sit on the couch and sullenly eat donuts than participate any longer. Mariana on the other hand was still wheezing and coughing on the other couch, occasionally reaching down to massage her bruised buttocks. Cindy was far from a pillow despite her layers of flab, and Mariana was already regretting her lack of observation skills.
After the casualties of war had been taken care of, the wreckage of the fourth chair was removed as well as one more, and Annie, Abeera and Tamara took up their places around the two remaining. Abeera and Tamara glared at each other, both determined to win. Annie, meanwhile, was just pleased that the party was going pretty well so far. She wasn't particularly bothered whether she won or not.
The music began to play again and they all circled around, but there could only be one result that wouldn't preclude a dramatic conclusion, and the second the music turned off, Annie found herself left high and dry. Abeera shrugged at her apologetically - even though it was Annie's party, Abeera refused to lose to Tamara.
Tamara, however, called for a short break before the final round. Smiling, she offered Abeera a plate of cookies to eat, before hurrying off to whisper something to Emma. Then, she headed over to chat quietly with Marilyn as everyone else took bottles of pop to drink.
Soon, Abeera finished the plate of cookies and Tamara hurried back over. The Asian girl wiped the crumbs from her face, then glared at Tamara.
"I'm gonna beat you." She declared. "Your money won't help now."
Tamara merely raised an eyebrow.
"Oh, we're doing insults now?" She asked sardonically. "I think I have some prepared if that's what you want. Most of them revolve around the frankly revolting size of your rear though, so I'd prefer to abstain."
Abeera coloured. She hadn't understood much of Tamara's sentence, but she could guess accurately enough - even among the oversized residents of Collford, her butt was quite exceptional.
Before she could think of a counterattack, however, Marilyn started the music and they both lurched into action.
The two girls were quite equal in terms of fitness - however, Abeera was heavier by a reasonable margin, and had a distinctive waddle from her massive thighs. However, she had the fire of determination on her side - it was going to be close.
They circled the chair, each keeping one eye on Marilyn, the other on their opponent as they readied themselves for the second that would decide everything. Abeera was already beginning to tire, sweat staining the strained fabric of her dress and blurring her vision. She wiped a pudgy hand across her forehead, gasping for breath as the music droned on and on. Her inner thighs were chafing with every step she took, the flesh rubbed raw by the unaccustomed friction of skin on skin. What was Marilyn waiting for?
And then, she faltered. Her foot caught on something on the floor and she stumbled hastily forwards, and at the same time she was aware of someone shouting.
"Hey, Abeera. Catch!" managing to get her balance, Abeera glanced up - just in time to see Emma's hat come sailing towards her. Halfheartedly she attempted to dodge, but she was far too tired - the hat caught her square in the face and she sat down suddenly on the carpet, feeling rather overwhelmed. A moment later, the music stopped and Tamara sat down neatly in the final chair, the smile on her face intolerably smug.

14331211122111112112121221111.content:
Lisa offered Abeera a hand up and the dumpy Asian girl took it, heaving herself to her feet. She was still thoroughly out of breath, pulse pounding in her ears and sweat pouring down her face, but she was too angry to rest.
"You cheated!" She exclaimed, pointing accusingly at Tamara. "That was cheating! I know it!" face flushed with fury and exhaustion, she blinked rapidly as sweat ran into her eyes. "I saw you talk to Emma and Marilyn. That's not fair!"
Tamara adopted a look of innocent surprise.
"Who, me?" She asked.
"Yeah!" Abeera said. Emma was looking somewhat abashed on the couch, so she glared at her too. "It's not fair to cheat. I would've won that round otherwise."
Tamara snorted derisively.
"Sure you would have. I guess that's why you were already falling over when Emma threw a hat at you. It was all part of some master plan where you were going to win, right?" The rich girl said sarcastically. As far as she was concerned, a bit of minor cheating was necessary to get ahead in life.
Abeera fumed, stepping angrily towards Tamara, and Annie frowned worriedly; her friend was peaceful by nature, but hated unfairness. Luckily, before she had to step in an excuse appeared in the form of the ringing doorbell.
"I'll get it!" Annie announced unnecessarily, getting up and waddling hurriedly out of the room before anything happened. She wasn't very good at controlling Abeera when she got into this sort of mood, and any reason to avoid trying was worth it in her books.
Not that she read books, of course; she preferred computer games and watching TV herself. Collford actually did have a library, but it was more of a video rental store crossed with a sit-in cinema than anything, and few of the kids ever bothered reading outside of school. TV was much more entertaining, and didn't require turning pages.
The doorbell rang again and she sped up as best she could, puffing along the infuriating distance between the sitting room and the front door.
"One... one minute!" She managed to shout. Who was arriving so late?
She finally reached the door and pulled it open, and immediately her face broke into a wide grin as she saw who it was.
"Ella! I thought you weren't gonna come."
Outside the door was another of Annie's classmates, Ella. She was a fair-faced, blonde-haired girl who held the dubious honour of being the fattest girl in the year by a significant margin - and she really was huge. Her body was vast, great folds and rolls of soft flab obscuring any hint of a normal child's body within their sweaty corpulence. Any glint of form, any sharp line or hint of bone beneath the surface, all were lost in the heavy drapes of obesity.
"Hi Annie!" The massive girl managed, shifting uncomfortably just outside the door. "Can I come inside? My ankles are hurting real bad."
"Oh yeah, sure." Annie moved aside, and another girl stepped out from where she'd been hidden behind Ella's corpulence. The new girl smiled at Annie as she helped Ella through the door.
"Hello Annie!" She said brightly, supporting some of her friend's massive weight as they entered the house. Ella almost stumbled on the doorframe as they did so, but managed to save it at the last minute.
"Hey Lavender." Annie said, happily accepting the present that was thrust hurriedly into her hands. "Why're you two late?"
"We had some trouble with the car." Lavender said, as she helped Ella take off her shoes. The massive girl hadn't so much as seen her feet in as long as she could remember, never mind being able to tie her laces.
"Yeah," Ella agreed, leaning heavily against the wall as she waited for Lavender to finish with her shoes, "I got sorta stuck." She giggled absently, a sound that seemed quite out of place emitting from such a body as hers. A hearty chuckle seemed more appropriate, but Ella was not the sort of person to chuckle. She was rather girly and sweet, naïve in the extreme and more than a little dim. Most who met her found her terrifically adorable, and as such she had been pampered heavily by family and townsfolk alike. Unsurprisingly, she got on well with Annie.
Lavender, by comparison, was far less straightforward - although quite heavy by the standards of the rest of the world, she was actually one of the slimmest girls in their school. Despite the soft bulge of her belly and a noticeably rounded rear, the only girl smaller than her was Marilyn - who was also the only one in their year to not be medically obese.
She was fast friends with Ella, and had been since the two were only a few months old. At some point around the age of 5 or 6, she had assigned herself the role of carer to the oversized girl, and nowadays spent almost every waking minute looking after her. Every morning she'd walk the twenty feet across the road to Ella's house to serve her breakfast and help her get dressed, then proceeded to wait on her until that night when she'd put the bigger girl to bed and then return home herself. It seemed a dull life, especially in the holidays when there was no school to get them out the house at all - Ella was, however, far too large to manage on her own, and Lavender didn't seem to mind too much.
Soon, Ella's shoes were off and they all headed together towards the sitting room. It was slow going - even with Lavender supporting some of her bigger friend's weight, the best they could manage was a laboriously slow waddle, each step a trial. By the time the three reached the door to the sitting room, even Annie - a slow walker at the best of times - was getting impatient. Eventually however, she pushed open the door and led Ella and Lavender inside.
It seemed the argument from earlier had cleared itself up, more or less. Tamara was sitting on one couch, Abeera on the other, each glaring pointedly in different directions. That was fine by Annie though - she knew neither would be able to summon the energy to actually get up off their butts again for a good while, so it looked like peace would reign until then. A moment later, Ella maneuvered her way into the room, a chorus of greetings meeting her. She was popular among the group, if only because she had never given anyone a reason to dislike her.
"Hi guys!" She said, smiling inanely and waving with some difficulty. "Um, is there anywhere I can sit down?"
Annie cast her eye around the room. Ella had a point; the couches were all full, and the bulky girl could never squeeze her girth into one of the armchairs. What to do?

1433121112211111211212122111111111.content:
Madison moved away from the window, lip curling in disgust. She couldn’t understand how they could be such… such pigs. She felt ill just at the thought of how much food those girls were eating – and so slobbishly! She was no prude, but they seemed far more concerned with stuffing as much junk down their throats than anything else. It was disgusting!
Soon though – soon she’d get her own back.

Hurrying around to the back of the house and into the yard, she found the piñata already hanging from a tree branch a few feet off the ground. With any luck, the sleeping pills she’d embedded in every third chocolate would perform their magic – provided the girls actually got round to using the thing at some point. She was beginning to wonder if they weren’t just going to eat themselves to death in the sitting room – perhaps she should go remind them? It was getting late, the sun dipping down towards the horizon. There were still a couple hours of sunlight yet, but the heat remained as intense as ever.
Due to her lack of insulating flab, Madison was one of the few people who could actually go out in the sun without collapsing with heatstroke. This gave her a few hours in the middle of the day to savour – hours in which she didn’t have to put up with her disgusting sister or the bullies at school.
Still – it would be better for the party guests to do the piñata sooner rather than later, despite the heat. With a long sigh, Madison headed inside to remind them about it. Her sister wasn’t known for being organised, after all – she’d no doubt forget all about it if she wasn’t prompted.

Inside, the girls were still making impressive headway through the piles of food. Although some of them were beginning to feel some discomfort, the majority were still going strong, packing away incredible quantities of food considering their age. Each girl had long since lost their gag reflex, and beneath thick layers of fat and flabby muscle their stomachs were grotesquely stretched from consistent overeating. They did have limits - they were only human after all - but each could down several times what a child their age should be able to, and a bit more on top of that.
By the time Madison walked in, Ella had managed to get hold of the carton of double cream and was chugging it, gulping down the unhealthy liquid as eagerly as an addict. Every swallow it overflowed from her mouth, pouring in thick rivulets down her chins before getting lost in the sweaty folds of her chest and belly. The majority though made its way through her mouth and down her throat, to wreak more damage on her figure once digested and turned to fat. Occasionally, Lavender would reach back and dab ineffectively at her overgrown friend's chin with a stained handkerchief, before returning to her own bag of cookies. The devoted girl was dwarfed by Ella’s elephantine form, appearing practically slender by comparison – though the fleshy bulge of her midsection showed she was no stranger to overindulgence herself.

Madison did all she did to conceal her revulsion, but she couldn’t prevent her nose from wrinkling in disgust as she pushed open the door to the sitting room and saw the intemperate chaos within. It was surprisingly quiet, everyone’s mouths too full of food for conversation. The only sounds were those of crinkling packets, the munching of food, and the occasional immoderate belch.
Trying not to breathe too deeply, for the very air seemed loaded with sugar in that room, Madison attempted to get the group’s attention.
“Hey.” Not one girl so much as glanced up. “Hey. Annie!” Finally, Madison’s sister snapped out of her food induced daze and looked over, cookie halfway to her mouth.
“Wha?” She mumbled, spraying crumbs across the sofa.
“I - uh – just remember you’ve gotta do the piñata soon, before it gets dark.” She reminded her, forcing herself to meet her sister’s eyes. The younger girl was a mess, smears of chocolate all around her mouth and on her dress, the taut skin of her exposed belly as round and shiny as a full moon. She was out of breath from eating so quickly, the flabby mounds of her chest rising and falling in time with the hand that delivered more food to her mouth.
With difficulty, Annie swallowed down her mouthful of cookies, throat feeling rather dry. She glanced over enviously at where Ella was still chugging down double cream, but then turned back to her sister.
“Um, yeah. I guess we’ll do it once we’ve-” She paused to catch her breath “- once we’ve done eating.” She quickly stuffed the cookie in her hand into her aching mouth while she waited for Madison to reply, before reaching for another and finding that they were all gone. “Uh, actually,” She interrupted Madison as she was about to speak, “could you go grab us some more snacks? And some more drinks? We’re running out.”

Normally, Madison would outright refuse to encourage the eating habits of her little sister and her friends, more out of spite than anything else. Piñatas were a tradition in Collford. Long ago (or so the stories said) a lone bandit had arrived in the town, fleeing the law. With only a few meagre hours lead on his pursuers, he had begged for the townsfolk to hide him from the corrupt sheriffs chasing him and, touched by his pleas, they had obliged. However, they were good, honest people; they had no secret spaces or smuggling compartments in all the town, and as the dust from galloping horses became visible in the horizon, it had seemed all was lost for the brave bandit. Moments before the sherrifs arrived, however, the young daughter of the town's mayor had an idea - to hide him inside one of the stuffed animal toys she had received for her birthday, which was that very day.
Unfortunately, the plan didn't work. The sherrifs were not fools; upon their arrival they quickly deduced the bandit's location and, without even letting him leave his hiding place, beat him to death with their horsewhips. Despite this failure though, the myth have birth to a rather fun tradition - every birthday of a young Collford girl has, since that day, featured a piñata.

The walk from the sitting room out into the back yard, while short, still took the girls several minutes. Stupendously unfit at the best of times, they were now also weighed down by the almost painful amounts of food each girl had forced into their beleaguered stomachs. Ella was especially slow - even with Lavender's support, each step was a struggle, her vast thighs forcing her into an exaggerated waddle. She'd already walked far more than usual - often at the weekends she'd never even leave her bed, except for when Lavender helped her to the toilet. Her muscles, wasted and decrepit from a decade of neglect, were crying out in complaint at this new ordeal.

Finally though, the fleshy, wobbling procession made its way into the back yard, and they all crowded around the piñata.
"Who's going first?" Asked Madison, surveying the group. She held the multicoloured stick in her hand.
"Me!" Annie said, snatching it from her sister's hand. "It's my birthday, I go first!"
Madison did her best not to sneer.
"Okay. Stand still then." She took the blindfold out of her pocket and secured it tightly around the younger girl's head, then pushed her in the vague direction of the piñata. "There you go. One swing."

Slowly, Annie raised the stick into the air, trying to sense the animal through sheer force of concentration. Left a bit... right a bit... there! She brought down the stick with all of her (decidedly unimpressive) strength, but hit nothing but air. Overbalancing, she toppled forwards, landing with a yelp on her swollen gut.
Behind her, Marilyn put her head in her hands. How had Annie managed to knock herself over just waving a stick around?! She kicked her sister in the side, the toe of her shoe sinking into the younger girl's flabby love handles.
"Get up." She snapped, pulling away the blindfold and stick. As Annie picked herself up, with a helping hand from Abeera, Marilyn looked around the group. Who should go next? She thought the piñata could probably survive a few hits, so if Annie's performance just then was anything to go by this was going to take some time.

"Oh!" She squeaked, feeling something tiny and light fall onto her head and stay there. Instinctively, she released one chubby hand to reach overhead and grab it. "What'd I get?"

Madison took the bat back and untied the blindfold, revealing Cindy's prize.
"Ooh, toffee!" She chirped, unwrapping the treat and popping it into her mouth, happily chewing as she waddled back to Annie and Abeera, who exchanged rather envious glances.

"Alright," Madison sighed, "Next?"
143312111221111121121212211111111111212.title: Good ol' Cindy

choices: Little Lucy

1433121112211111211212122111111111112121.content:
“I’ll take a shot.” Tamara stepped forwards to take the bat, and Madison squinted at her suspiciously. This one, of all her sister’s friends, she felt was most respectable. Her dress, whilst rather too snug about the middle, was neat and free of stains, and she held herself neatly and upright. Whereas some of the others seemed to be weighed down by their bloated forms, Tamara stood quite straight.
“Uh, sure. There you go.” Madison fastened the blindfold around the younger girl’s head, than shoved the bat into her sweaty hands. “’ts that way.” She shoved her in the vague direction of the piñata.

Tamara adopted a position like a baseballer, almost knocking Lucy's glasses off as she brought the stick up and ready to swing. While still horrifically unfit by the standards of the rest of the world, Tamara was at least more muscular than Annie or Sarah, and so when she eventually did go to strike, the bat whistled through the air with some speed.
It caught the piñata right at the end of its arc, setting the flimsy horse into a wild spin around its tether. Candy spewed from its ruptured belly, showering the guests with spiked treats, and there was a brief scramble as each girl tried to grab as much as she could and stuff it into their mouth.
By the time Tamara managed to get off her blindfold, the majority of her spoils had already been scooped up by the other girls, the nauseating quantities of food they had already consumed forgotten in the face of this new opportunity. Veronica in particular was choking on at least a dozen fudges, which had melted in her bulging mouth. Half the viscous liquid, it seemed, she had managed to inhale - the other half now stained her purple top. How these girls had still not mastered the art of eating, after doing so damn much of it, Madison didn't know.

Tamara glared around at the group, in particular at the full mouths each of them now possessed. They all put on their best innocent expressions, however, and thus Tamara was left to collect up the dozen or so candies still scattered on the ground, before giving up the stick and blindfold to Madison.
"Thanks a lot, guys." She said, putting plump hands on her plumper hips, scowling accusingly. "I know there were more than this..."
Lisa swallowed with some difficulty, almost choking with the effort.
"N-no, Tamara. That was all there was!" She tried, smiling sweetly. The effect was somewhat ruined, however, by the chocolate stains around her mouth.
"Sure..." The rich girl said begrudgingly. She had won musical chairs after all - and there'd be candy enough for everyone once the piñata burst for real.

Meanwhile, Abeera was beginning to feel distinctly uncomfortable. Her skin was several shades darker than most of her peers, their already white pigmentation made pasty by a decade of lurking indoors. That, along with the muted colours of her dress, were combining to make her feel like she was trapped inside an oven - a moist, sweaty oven made of thick slabs of flab.
Leaning lethargically against the yard wall, she grimaced as she felt perspiration trickle its way down her bulging side. She tugged at the neckline of her dress, pulling the clingy fabric briefly away from her hot skin, but the moment she let go it snapped back into position. She’d owned this dress for years now, and she occasionally wondered if she wasn’t outgrowing it a little – it was incredibly tight, stretched to transparency across her wide hips and bulging waist, and now it was clammy with sweat the effect was only amplified. Every bump and bulge of her developing body was as visible through the fabric as if she’d been wearing cling film, and the hem was barely long enough to cover so much as her panties, never mind the meaty expanse of her thighs.
“Who’s next then?” Abeera heard Madison ask, through her heat-daze, and blearily she peeled herself away from the wall, her prodigious buttocks leaving two half-moon damp patches on the dry bricks.
“I’ll go next.” She mumbled, just wanting to get it over with, but Madison didn’t hear her. Before she could repeat herself though, someone else had stepped forwards from the crowd to take their turn instead, and Abeera was left to wait longer. She let herself fall back against the wall and slide down it, leaving a dark smear, until she was sitting on the dusty floor. Luckily for her, she had a thick cushion already built into her backside, and she watched from there as the next person stepped up to take their go.
It was…
1433121112211111211212122111111111112121.title: Tamara Rides Again

"U-um, can I...?" Lucy asked, with the volume and intensity of a church mouse. She had spent the whole game twiddling her thumbs and fidgeting with her oversized shirt while grinning softly at the other girls taking their turns. She'd even managed to sneak some of Tamara's loot, as apparent by the tiny stain of chocolate on her face.

After some encouraging mutters from Sarah, she plodded forward, with Madison getting a look at her. She at least tolerated the tiny (in comparison to the other girls) gamer, since she was quiet and seemed nice enough. The large shirt seemed to hide just how large she truly was, at least a bit, since her round belly and pear shaped midsection were still prominent.

"Alright, hold still," Madison said, tying the blindfold around her face and handing her the bat, "Right there...little nerd." She added under her breath, as she gently shoved Lucy toward the piñata.

Lucy swallowed and let out a tiny, nervous whimper as she gripped the bat and tried feeling for the piñata. Thinking she'd found it, she attempted an overhead swing, much like Cindy had before.
Being a lazy, greedy gamer of very little strength, her strike did not make much of an impact on the stuffed creature. However, with Tamara opening a sizeable space in the toy, a few treats dropped from the tree and into Lucy's hands, which had luckily been freed of the bat as she dropped it.

Madison undid the blindfold, and Lucy squeaked with delight at her reward. "Oh!"
Feeling pleased with herself, she toddled back to her spot next to Sarah, sharing her spoils with her and Emma.

"Next?" Madison called, growing increasingly exasperated.

1433121112211111211212122111111111112121.content:
"We'll go!" Lavender piped up, cutting of Abeera as the Asian girl tried once more to volunteer. "I'll help Ella."
Madison couldn't conceal her disgust as she watched the two approach. To even stand, the giant girl had needed help, so exhausted from the walk into the backyard was she. Unable to rise under her own power, Lavender had to help her up, supporting the far larger girl's every movement as she heaved her bulk off the ground and slowly moved towards the piñata. The sheer vastness of her thighs forced her into an obscene waddle, stubby feet tracing half-circles every step, the pounds of fat that weighed down her body jiggling to and fro. Although her shirt extended down to her waist, her paunch sagged far below that - were she naked from the waist down, her privates would be no more visible than if she were wearing clothes.
Eventually they reached Madison, and Lavender took the bat from the teen's hands and pushed it into her friend's. Both girls were looking nauseous - Ella from the strain of basic locomotion, Madison from sheer revulsion at the monster before her. As far as the skinny teen was concerned, this was the lowest form humanity could manifest. From the cultures that sprang up between the moist folds of her flab, to the dried food that encrusted her chin and upper chest, to her Ella was truly repugnant.
Of course - her friends saw differently. To them, weight was a non-entity, something thoroughly unimportant to life. Whilst they were aware their friend was essentially disabled, they were unable to connect that with the morbidity of her form. Had she been born with crippled legs, they would have viewed her in exactly the same way - an unfortunate victim of life's cruel tricks. As surely as they knew they would grow taller in the future, they knew they would become softer and weaker. That was just how it went - what you ate, and how much, had nothing to do with it. Many of them hadn't even grasped the concept that it was the extra weight that made exercise more difficult in the first place, instead assuming it was just sheer coincidence that the largest of them had the greatest trouble with everyday tasks.
Basic education in Collford, it seemed, was rather poor.

"Tha-thanks." Gasped out Ella as she took the stick, barely able to speak - though she still managed a breathy giggle. She let Lavender blindfold her, legs bowing outwards as they were forced to take the full weight of her bloated torso for a brief few moments, before the helpful smaller girl returned to lead her towards the piñata.
"Stop, Ellie." Said Lavender, before helping the big girl line up a shot - slowly, she heaved the stick into the air, then over her head, thick arms wobbling fleshily with the strenuous effort. There was a moments pause before Lavender reached up and corrected the angle, then stood back.
"Can - can I hit it now, Lav?" The far larger girl wheezed, bat shuddering violently as her arms began to shake with the effort of keeping them raised. She felt isolated and terribly vulnerable without her aide's presence at her side."Yep, hit it! Go!" Lavender was bouncing up and down with excitement, a grin plastered across her round face. She had no interest in participating herself - watching Ella try was enough for her, and when finally the bat jolted into motion she let out a bright cry of excitement.
"You got it! You got it!" She rushed forwards before Ella could take off the blindfold and gave the piñata a solid punch, dislodging a dozen candies and making it spin. Then, she pulled the sodden blindfold away from her big friend's face and gave her a hug, arms barely reaching halfway round the massive girl's girth.
"Good job!" She grinned up at her friend's rosy face.
"Wow." Ella said, looking delighted but slightly confused. "I thought I missed!" Indeed, the bat was lying on the floor behind her, where it had slipped from her sweaty grip just as she went to strike. Still, she wasn't about to complain; she let Lavender lead her back to the wall, stuffing handfuls of candy into her face the entire way.
The rest of the group smiled blithely - none of them minded the occasional machination on the part of Lavender, if it was for Ella's sake. Even Tamara didn't take objection, as happy as the rest of them to see the vast girl satisfied.

Meanwhile, Madison gazed on in disbelief. Was no-one going to point that out? No-one? She shook her head in dismay, only the thought of the sedatives soon taking affect staying her tongue.
"Who's up next?" She asked, tone clipped and irritable. What was the point in doing this if they were going to allow cheating, she thought angrily. The word 'fun', it seemed, just didn't exist in Madison's vocabulary - perhaps understandably considering her childhood thus far.

1433121112211111211212122111111111112121.content:
"Me!" Emma chirped, waving a chubby hand, "I'm next!"

She plodded up to Madison, who didn't seem nearly as disgusted with the young socialite as she was with Ella. For a start, her dress actually fit her! Albeit it was slightly snug from the before-game binge, it still complimented her hourglass shape rather nicely.
Madison had overheard from her sister one day that Emma tended to make her own outfits. That made sense, considering her mother was one of the state's top fashion designers. She would often tag along to her mother's modelling sessions and fashion shows, some even taking them out of the country, and developed a love for the art.
Her mother's extroverted attitude also rubbed off on her daughter, who had made many acquaintances while away from home. She never forgot who her true friends were, of course, hence why she was with them all at the party right now!

And, like her mother, she was a serious go-getter.

Madison tied the blindfold around Emma's face, after disgustedly wiping Ella's sweat off it onto her hoodie.
As soon as Emma was handed the bat, a smirk crossed her chubby face as she approached the piñata. "I got you now...!" She snickered.

With as mighty as swing as she could muster, which once again, wasn't anything to write home about, the bat just brushed the snout of the piñata. Luckily, it was just enough to dislodge a few candies from the large hole in the middle.
Immediately, she dropped the bat and undid the blindfold, beaming at the candies.
"Alright!" She cheered, dropping the blindfold and grabbing the treats, popping one in her mouth as she plodded back to Tamara, who she shared them with.

Madison picked up the bat and blindfold, rolling her eyes. "Next?"
1433121112211111211212122111111111112121.title: Emma's Time to Shine

1433121112211111211212122111111111112121.content:
“Me!” Abeera almost shouted, and everyone looked at her. She turned red. “I, uh, I'd like a turn please.”
Madison rolled her eyes. She didn't think much of this friend of her sister either - the younger girl's dress was immodestly tight, and her body shape was frankly ridiculous.
“C'mon then,” she held the bat out, and waited as the oversized girl struggled to her feet and waddled over. Abeera's legs were so thick that despite the impressive breadth of her hips, the brown skin of her inner thigh was still rubbed raw every step. Eventually though, she made it to Madison and took the bat.
“Thanks,” mumbled the fatter girl, vision blurred by heat exhaustion.
“Don't mention it,” Madison mumbled back. At least this one had manners, she thought. “Lemme put the blindfold on.” She span the smaller (at least on the y-axis) girl around, grimacing at how far her slender fingers sank into the flabby flesh of Abeera's upper arm. Did the kid have no muscles at all? Or even bones, for that matter? It felt like manhandling jelly - sweaty, caramel-coloured jelly that had been left out in the sun too long and had started to go off.

Once the blindfold was secure, Abeera was turned in the rough direction of the piñata and released, leaving her to sway woozily under the boiling sun. Slowly she raised the bat slowly over her head, the motion dragging up the hem of her dress and revealing her panties, crisp white cotton straining over her trembling butt as it wrestled with hips no underwear was ever meant to face. The pale fabric shone like a beacon to the other girls, and they stared in dumb wonderment as Abeera wound up to swing - this felt significant, though none of them knew why.

Not that Abeera noticed anything - so preoccupied with the piñata was she, that if all her clothes had burst off at once she likely would not have noticed. Madison for one would not have been at all surprised if the young girl's clothes did burst apart; stitches popped and fabric groaned as Abeera's body moved in unfamiliar ways - which were, of course, any ways that didn't involve reaching for food - and even her panties looked in imminent danger of splintering into rags. The corpulent girl had an armchair at home in which she spent almost all of her time, situated between a fridge and a cupboard. Reaching into either, it should be noted, did not require raising her arms at all, and as such the muscles needed to do so were - somehow - even weaker than those elsewhere on her body. Just holding the bat over her head was taking considerable effort, and so, when the blow eventually came, it was more due to accident than any intent on her part.

Her arms shaking, the bat had slipped from between her stubby fingers and, as she attempted to catch it again, bounced off the piñata's multicoloured flank. Although the impact was slight it was enough, and the piñata's bloated form finally split open, disgorging a tidal wave of candy directly into Abeera's head. The big girl sat down in surprise, landing cushioned by several inches of flab, and was quickly covered with bright-wrapped treats. She struggled with the blindfold but Madison had knotted it securely and it wouldn't budge, so not wanting to be left out she began grabbing candy blindly and shoving it into her mouth, foil wrappings and all.

The moment the piñata had burst, Madison had had to leap backwards to avoid being trampled by the girls as they all leapt forward - except Ella of course - and now she watched in unconcealed disgust as they gorged themselves. Mariana was on her hands and knees, exposed belly scraping along the rough ground as she shovelled truffles into her mouth. She didn't even seem to notice the damage though, so preoccupied was she. To Mariana's left, Rebecca and Veronica were filling both their mouths and the pockets of their sweatpants with toffee, already distended stomachs bloating more as they ignored their bodies every warning and continued sucking down food.

As the other girls gorged, Lavender was hurrying to and fro between the pile of candy and Ella, pushing chocolates between the massive girl’s feeble lips. Her eyelids fluttered weakly as she was fed, unable even to muster the energy to open them fully, but Lavender was unconcerned. These periods of exhaustion were normal, usually happening after a meal or any form of exercise - today, both had happened in a row, so Ella's state was no surprise. She’d probably have to have a nap soon, to rest, but first she needed to be filled with as much candy as possible so she wouldn’t go hungry as she slept.
1433121112211111211212122111111111112121.title: Conspicuous Consumption

1433121112211111211212122111111111112121.content:
As the girls continued to gorge themselves silly, the sun continued to bear down on them, the summer heat starting to effect them. Armpits were drenched and clothes were soaked with sweat as the overly insulated kids truly felt the heat.

Annie stood up, her tummy, bloated with sugary treats, protruding further in front of her, and wiped her wet brow. "Phew... girls, we should get inside..."
The girls, bellies and pockets bursting with candy, all nodded and grunted agreement. They were panting and wiping their brows, and couldn't wait to return to the comfort of the living room furniture. They'd spent far too much time outside, and even longer standing up!

Abeera and Cindy, thick arms and mouths cradling a large supply of treats, began to lead the way inside. Annie and the others followed, at an equally slow, lumbering pace.

The journey inside took the two girls longer than ever. Ella was all but asleep, stumbling on every step she took, and even Lavender was beginning to feel drowsy, so it took them a ridiculously long time just to get to the back door and stumble inside. They made it to the sitting room where the other girls were relaxing, before Ella collapsed onto her beanbag and fell immediately asleep.

Lavender examined her anxiously. The big girl often felt tired after a meal or exercise, but it wasn't like her to fall asleep entirely - not when there was food around at least. Then again, Lavender was starting to feel pretty tired herself. She yawned infectiously and soon all the other girls were yawning too, lying back in their seats to get more comfortable. Feeling drowsy, Lavender sat down between her friend's thick legs and relaxed against the sweaty cushion of her friend's stomach. Looking around the room, everyone else was acting similarly - Mariana was snoring loudly from an armchair, and all the others looked close to following their larger friends' leads.

Drearily, Lavender unwrapped a toffee and popped it into her mouth. Normally she'd give it to Ella, but right then she felt too lethargic to bother. Compared to the massive girl, Lavender barely ate anything. For every four cookies she fed her massive friend, she took perhaps one for herself - which was why she was slimmer than most of the other girls. She was still distinctly plump by the standards of the rest of the world though - her waistband struggled without much success to contain both her swollen stomach and round bottom, and two plump, pale thighs emerged from beneath the excessively short skirt she'd decided to wear that day.

Still, compared to the sagging corpulence of most of the other girls, she was in decent shape - it would not be odd to see her in a school in any large American city - and she used her relative fitness to help the much vaster Ella. Without her, Ella wouldn't even be able to lever herself to her feet, never mind walk more than a half-dozen steps. As such, they were all but inseparable.

1433121112211111211212122111111111112121.content:
Afternoon began its change to evening. The heavy-sleep breathing of Ella and the strenuous exercise of earlier quickly got to the girls. The smaller girls squeezed onto overburdened couches and stuffed easy chairs, while the larger ones simply slept where they fell. Abeera and Cindy together consumed one couch, while Annie herself took a loveseat- she was master of the house, after all, and plus her disproportionately large belly needed the second cushion badly. The enormous girls dozed off onto chairs, the floor, and on their friends, and soon the whole party was fast asleep, lost in their food-encrusted dreamlands.

Madison, seeing the drugged candies in action, was pleased. Good, they're falling asleep. she sniggered to herself. Seeing them act like this normally... It makes me so mad! Then, all of a sudden, another voice asked, Why?

Madison nearly fell over. What was that?! she thought, startled out of her wits. Answer the question, returned the other thought. Why? Well, I... because... because they're gross and I hate them! she thought back, satisfied that that would show the voice, whatever it was. However, rather than admitting defeat, the thought shot back with a simple Really?

The voice answered no more after that, for all her angry thoughts and imagined threats. However, the atmosphere of stillness in the room was beginning to seep into her mind, and as she, too, dozed off, a fateful thought sowed its seed in the depths of her mind- What WAS she so mad about, anyway?

When she wakes up...
