1433121112211111211212122111111111112121.content:
Madison jerked awake. She’d – she’d fallen asleep! And after all her planning too!
“Idiot!” She reprimanded herself under her breath, jumping hastily to her feet. Now all her sister’s friends would be gone, and-

She looked around the room properly for the first time, and saw the assembly of oversized girls still slumped across every available surface. From the sliver of sky she could see between the blind slats she’d been asleep for hours – only the moon shone outside – but it seemed the sleeping pills had worked even better than expected. All of them were still deep in slumber, and Madison breathed a sigh of relief. Thank God. She’d been planning this for so long; it would have killed her to have missed it.

For a moment, she recalled the voice she’d heard just before she’d fallen asleep. Had that been her conscience? For a moment she wavered – was this… wrong? Could she back out now?
Then she remembered the teasing words of her schoolmates, the disapproving look in her mother’s eyes every time she didn’t stuff herself like an animal, the repulsion she felt as she watched her little sister, once so cute and lively, transformed into a lethargic, bloated blob, and her resolve stiffened.
She’d teach them a lesson they wouldn’t forget! Stupid little voice, she’d show it she wasn’t going to be dissuaded so easily!

Her mom had certainly already gone to bed, and from experience Madison knew that unless the house literally collapsed around her she wouldn’t wake up any time soon. That gave her a few hours of complete freedom to do as she wanted with the 14 unconscious girls – and she had some ideas set up.

First – she was gonna teach a couple of them the dangers of overeating. There’d still be a load of food in the cupboards if she knew her mom’s shopping at all, and she was planning to give her sister’s friends a stomach-ache they’d never forget. But who to choose?

She gazed around the room at the selection of plump preteens, picking out two almost at random. Earlier she’d planned to take the biggest, but after watching Ella eat constantly and rapidly the entire evening and still not slow down, she feared there wouldn’t be enough food in the house to actually cause her discomfort.
Instead, she went for the smallish girl that seemed to be some kind of servant to the massive one – Lavender, had her name been? – and the bubbly girl with the cartoon picture on her shirt. Sarah, she’d heard her called.
The former was draped floppily over one of Ella’s meaty legs, the latter face down on the floor snoring loudly, and so with some difficulty Madison dragged them both to the wall and sat them against it. They were heavy, but not unmanageably so; Madison was strong for her age, and she had fiery determination on her side.
Once they were in place, she hurried through to the kitchen and began scavenging through the cupboards and fridges, grabbing anything she could see. Bars of chocolate, soda, the rest of the cream Ella had been drinking earlier – anything that wasn’t going to choke the unconscious eaters. When she had all she could carry, she hurried back to the sitting room and dumped it on the floor next to the girls and stood back, hands on bony hips as she surveyed the two.
This was going to be fun.

She started with Lavender. Despite giving most of her food to Ella she’d still managed to stuff herself with a fair amount, and her stomach sat full and bloated beneath the thin fabric of her blouse – not full enough yet though.
Madison tore the lid off a carton of double cream and put it to the younger girl’s mouth, tilting it to pour the thick liquid slowly down her throat. She swallowed automatically, gulping it down surprisingly fast until the carton was empty and Madison threw it aside, grabbed another one and repeated the process. Soon Lavender’s stomach was bulging more than ever, straining the buttons of her blouse.
With nervous hands Madison unbuttoned the tight garment, letting Lavender’s overstuffed gut swell forwards. The straining, stretched skin almost glowed in the moonlit room, already looking painfully full – but Madison wasn’t done yet. Almost giggling, she retrieved a stick of cooking butter from the pile of food next to her and peeled it open, and began cutting pieces off to feed to the sleeping girl. She prodded the chunks of butter between Lavender’s plump lips, watching them melt inside her mouth and slide down her throat. Soon the stick was gone entirely, but Madison just picked up another. She wasn’t going to stop yet!

Several sticks of butter later though and Lavender was beginning to look rather the worse for wear. Her belly was now agonisingly distended, the waistband of her skirt brutally tight beneath the great bulge of her midsection. Every slight shift or movement made her moan in pain, and though she was still fast asleep, she clutched her aching midsection protectively with both hands.
Reluctantly, Madison stopped. She poked the last piece of butter into Lavender’s mouth, then wiped her hands clean on the young girl’s blouse and stepped back. She wanted to keep going – she’d been feeling a rather sadistic pleasure, more so than she’d anticipated – but she was afraid she’d cause some permanent damage if she continued any longer, and then she really would be in trouble.

She gave the grotesquely overstuffed girl one last slap to the belly for good measure, causing her to topple over with a whimper and curl up into fetal position, before turning excitedly to Sarah.

Just – just a little more soda couldn’t hurt, could it? Madison pressed her hand against the fat girl’s belly, feeling the straining wall of her gut beneath a good couple of inches of flab. Sure, it felt full, but she’d seen these girls go on eating past what seemed possible a dozen times.

She pulled open another can and shoved it to the gaping mouth before her, spilling some more but getting most of it into the oversized girl. She heard Sarah’s stomach churn loudly, gurgling and heaving as it tried to cope with the amount of bubbling liquid it was being expected to deal with. Eventually, more cans later than Madison cared to admit, she realised that she should probably stop. Yeah... she deserved a bit of a stuffing, for sure! Being one of Annie's closest friends, Abeera was at the house often - and though she was quieter and slightly better-mannered than most of the others, Madison hated her nonetheless.
Grabbing a thick arm, she dragged Abeera off the couch (her oversized body making an amusingly loud 'splat' as she fell heavily to the floor), then sat her against the wall with the others.

Before she began the stuffing, Madison took a good look at the younger girl, eyes roving over her flabby body. How? How was it possible for her hips to be... to be so damn wide? They sprang out from her sides like buttresses, supporting the bulbous cathedral of her body as the young girl ate, slept, and... well, just ate and slept really. How else could she be so grossly overweight after only a decade on the planet?

Madison needed something special for this one. She slunk back into the kitchen and dragged open a drawer, revealing jar after jar of honey - her mom's secret stash. She grabbed half a dozen, then moved back into the other room, popping a lid off as she knelt down in front of Abeera. The heat had made the sweet substance runny, so she didn't even bother with a spoon - she just tilted the jar over the younger girls mouth and allowed a long stream of honey to pour out. For a moment, it looked like Abeera was about to choke - then she began to swallow, unconsciously gulping down honey like she had reached the Promised Land at last after forty years hard travel.
Before Madison had so much as a chance to giggle maniacally, the jar was empty, just a thin string of sugar left to show it had ever been full at all - all the rest was gone, slithering down the fat girl's throat and into her already-swollen belly. Grinning happily to herself, Madison popped another lid away and carried on her feeding.

In what seemed like no time at all - and indeed, was barely five minutes - all six jars of honey had been emptied into Abeera's gaping mouth. Her face and chest were sticky from where Madison had been a bit too hasty once or twice, causing an overflow, but most of the sickly sweet liquid had made its way into the shy girl's plump, bulging body. Compared with her hips and butt, her stomach was relatively small - but it was nonetheless oversized, a bloated, bulging potbelly that strained the seams of her stained dress past any reasonable bounds, gurgling and grumbling as it sat uncomfortably on her massive thighs. Not yet finished digesting the mass of sweets and candies she had already forced into her maligned body, now over 6000 calories worth of honey were added to the mix - her poor insides struggling audibly with her ridiculous consumption.

Madison, however, cared little for Abeera's discomfort. Instead, she was looking at the dwindling pile of snacks she'd brought through to feed the girls. Sure, the Asian girl sounded like she might burst if she ate any more - but since when had Madison let that kinda thing stop her? It was either keep stuffing Abeera, or move on.

White seams were showing from being popped by pale blubber, and her thunder thighs were sticking out of the legs like a muffin in a bun.

Madison put her hands beneath Cindy's plump upper arms and lifter her onto the ground, unable to do more than have her lean against the chair, but the globular girl didn't stir a bit. In fact, she simply snorted a bit and scratched her nose before her snoring resumed.

Madison was visibly unimpressed. Well, if she wants to be a fat little pig, then she needs a bit of fattening up.

The chubby girl's nose twitched as it caught the ever-so-familiar scent of chocolate, and she grinned and licked her lips in her sleep. Madison was almost amused.

She popped one of them into the girl's slightly agape mouth, and she swallowed almost instantly. Not even a single bite, which would almost be impressive.

The girl's mouth hung open again, as if silently asking for more.

Another went in, and another, and another. Gulp, gulp, gulp.

Madison decided it was going to slow, and just poured a larger amount in. This time the biting came, and the girl chewed in her sleep before swallowing the delicious treats.

Her thighs were forced wide apart by the great bulk of her potbelly, legs sticking out on either side of her to allow its swollen bulk room to sit without agitation - a position that only put more strain on her already-ailing shorts. How they'd held together this long in the first place was unknowable, but now the stitches were finally failing all down the sides as the thick sausages of her thighs put them through hell and high water. Even as Madison watched, Cindy shifted slightly and the seams split further, revealing yet more pale, stretch-marked blubber between them.
The button of the shorts was long since gone (it had burst off several weeks ago in fact, during a movie marathon with Annie, Abeera, and a metric ton of popcorn) but Cindy hadn't yet noticed that nor the popped seams - she was not a morning person, and thus was never aware of anything in the morning, and the sheer mass of her body prevented her seeing anything while she was wearing them, so she'd just carried on wearing them until she'd finally run them into the floor today.

Lip curled, Madison returned to stuffing Cindy.

She'd ended up eating an incredible amount, and that on top of the food she'd already stuffed herself with earlier left her ridiculously swollen and quite excruciatingly uncomfortable, arms curled around her aching belly in a futile attempt to protect it from mistreatment. Tamara's dress fitted perfectly. Handmade by a tailor in Nepal it effortlessly complemented her rotund figure, downplaying the round bulge of her gut whilst tastefully emphasising her breasts and voluptuous hips. The rose-coloured fabric brought out the subtlest shades in the carefully applied blusher on her cheeks, the white lace working in perfect combination with her skin tone to bring to mind the image of a graceful, budding flower standing apart from the weeds that were less privileged children.

Or rather, that had been how the dress had worked precisely two months ago when she'd been fitted for it. Since then, half a million calories worth of junk food (expensive junk food certainly - but still junk) had slipped its way between her plump lips and into her body, making the sight that met Madison's eyes that day a far cry from the good intentions of the past. Her belly had swollen, the thin fabric looking in danger of splitting with every laboured breath Tamara took, taking the centre stage in a way that made her look more like an radish than a rose. Further, the sweaty activity of the party games had left it stained and messy, and with her face flushed red from both the over-heated house and the mounting discomfort in her abdomen, she was altogether nothing like the composed young lady her mother had intended.

Well then, why stop now? The pig-queen might be swollen and messy now, but Madison could see room for improvement. She opened another box of chocolates - cheap, dollar store ones this time - and began stuffing the oversweetened hunks into Tamara's mouth, barely giving her time to chew. A few pieces dribbled from her mouth, half melting, and landed on her swollen belly where they were quickly smeared into the fabric by Tamara's unconsciously massaging hands. Her face twisted into a grimace - though whether from the pain of her overstuffed belly or the shame of eating bargain chocolate Madison didn't know - as her already distended belly swelled larger and larger beneath her dress.

Eventually, the inevitable happened. As Madison forced one last bar of chocolate down the rich girl's groaning throat, the red material finally gave up the good fight and split right down the middle, letting her bloated belly come surging forwards. The damage to her dress was severe - it now revealed the entirety of her pale, taught gut, and more besides - but from the sound of Tamara's agonised moan as her belly was suddenly jostled, it was in better shape than its owner. Hastily, Madison stepped back - that was quite enough for now.

Now, she looked around the room for what she knew to be the last time. Her food supply was dwindling, and she was slightly afraid she might go too far and cause some serious injury if she carried on much longer. Finally, her eyes settled on the perfect final target - her own sister. The little spoiled brat deserved it really, with her ridiculous clothes and repulsive manners. Right then, she was wearing a blue dress and tights, which sounded reasonable enough - then one saw the dress didn't even reach past her belly button it was so outgrown, and that the tights were tearing themselves to pieces just from the strain of trying to cover her thick, toneless legs. Both garments were so thin and overtaxed that Madison could easily see straight through them, and noted with resigned disappointment that get sister was wearing some immodestly tight blue and white striped panties, and no bra at all.

Her lips drew back in a predatory grin - she was going to enjoy this one most of all.

The floor out there was tiled, and Mariana’s sweaty body slid across it with surprising ease – though leaving a slug trail of crumbs, melted candy and perspiration behind her the whole way. A truly Machiavellian grin spread across Madison's shapely face.

After all her years of torment - all her years of passivity, of watching from the sidelines as pound after pound added themselves to the overburdened frames of her peers - she had finally had her ultimate revenge. She had shown the bloated sows the meaning of excess and then some. They would be sure to see the error of their gluttonous ways! Surely, finally, she would be the role model! She would be in the right! Her figure would be inspiring, not the object of derision!

She almost cackled, but a sudden motion on Annie's part made her reconsider. Instead, she flopped down into a small chair which only she could possibly hope to fit into and settled down to wait.

And, as one often does when waiting, to think.

Had she really done the right thing? To be sure, torment was wrong, but had it been intentional? Annie surely loved her, and the rest of the girls probably didn't have a mean bone in their bodies - if one could even locate a bone beneath the many, many layers of fat - so why had she done it? Did they deserve the fate they got if they weren't even trying to be mean in the first place?

Of course they did! she thought back viciously. Even if they aren't intentionally being mean, they're still being mean! Plus they deserve to see that they're too fat. They might even slim down!

Another part of her mind - the logical part - gently reminded her that this was completely improbable, but she shoved that part back down to where it belonged. This was a time of victory, and she deserved to celebrate. With that happy thought, she swallowed the chocolate with a look of triumph.

Madison nearly jumped out of her chair. Chocolate?! She stared at her hands in shock. Without even thinking about it her hands had automatically unwrapped one of the chocolates from inside the piñata and put it into her mouth. This would be bad enough for her strict diet if it wasn't for the fact that she had drugged several of these chocolates in particular - if the one she had ate was one of the tainted ones her revenge would be entirely pointless. Luckily, she had thought ahead and marked the wrappers of the drugged candies so she could get rid of them before any adults ate one. With trembling hands, she unfolded the wrapper all the way and looked for her little red x.

The coach gave chubby Maddie a disapproving look. While Maddie was worse than she expected, she wasn't bad. It was satisfying knowing she could eat herself into a chubby girl in just a month and still be a decent soccer player. It was a fun experiment and Maddie kind of liked observing the changes to her body, in a strictly observational sense, of course. Anyway she was completely done with exercise for now, all Maddie really cared about was letting herself go for a while and getting properly spoilt.

------

"Mom, I think I need some new school clothes."

Lucy knelt down and with her hands on her daughter's little love handles, and affectionately nuzzled Maddie's exposed tummy chub. "It looks like it honey."

Maddie giggled. "Thanks mom."

At the store, Maddie found she had to go up two sizes before she had clothes that were properly comfortable. However, Lucy got Maddie to try on some clothes that were a few sizes too big as well.

"I just want to prepare for my lovely growing little girl," she whispered in Maddie's ear, and kissed her plump tummy.

"Good idea mom, I guess these might not last that long." Maddie gestured to the clothes currently in her size. Lucy was pleased.

Maddie isn't the only one having a change of heart, however:
144111111121.title: More of Maddie is just fine

choices: April's mom is fine with it, especially after Lucy worked her magic
April's mom hates the idea, but April keeps indulging with Maddie/Lucy's help
1441111111212.content:
April was especially agitated at lunch a few days later. Her envy of Maddie's new life-style had peaked over the last few days, and she despised having to go to cheer-leading and soccer practice whiled she imagined Maddie joyfully lazing around and stuffing her face with so much enticing food.

"Is something up, April?" Maddie asked.

"I just hate having to work out all the time." April said, finally.

"Really?" Maddie asked inquisitively. "Well you could just stop."

"Yeah but it's not just that," she irritably bit into her apple, "I'm sick of dieting."

"Oooohhh," Maddie teased, taking a huge bite out of her third helping of bbq chicken, "does this make you jealous, Apirl?"

"Yes!" She snapped. It was nice to see April's trade-mark fire. "You get to stuff your face with whatever you want, and you look like you're having the time of your life, while I have to keep exercising. It's so boring! I mean sure you've put on some weight, but it just looks fun to indulge a bit, okay?" April had finally admitted her envy, just as Maddie had wanted. She knew April wanted to, but she needed to hear her say it. In truth, Maddie hadn't been able to spend as much time with April as she would have liked in the last month, and couldn't stop thinking about how fun it would be to stuff herself with her best friend.

Maddie gave April a sly smile. "Well, what's stopping you?"

"My mom, I don't think she'd like it if I started to get, you know...fat." April's tanned face flushed red for a moment.

"April, it's really not bad being a bit tubby. Feel how soft I am now," Maddie took April's hand and placed it on her chubby stomach. The plumper girl adopted a more sincere tone, "I'm fine with the bigger me, and I'd say it's worth gaining just for how fun it is to let yourself go." April pulled her hand away. "Look, if you're not sure about it, give in for a week or two, and if you're worried about it, you can just stop and go back to how things were before. You should come round mine tonight and me and Mom will show you how fun it is to let yourself go."

A smile crept across April's face. "You can be very convincing when you want to be." With that April got up from her seat and returned with a plate piled with sticky bbq chicken, and proceeded to stuff her face.

-----------

"Do you want another muffin, April?" Maddie's mom held out a second delicious muffin. Despite already feeling a little full from the two chocolate bars Maddie's mom had generously supplied her with, and the first muffin, April felt like she couldn't refuse.

"Oh, thanks Ms. Bloss." April bit into the muffin, her eyes rolling back in pleasure. She wasn't used to food this good.

"Please, call me Lucy." She smiled warmly and April took another big bite.

The next few hours passed in a blur of fattening treats and lazing around before Lucy bought them out pizzas for dinner. Both her and Maddie had a whole medium meat passion each, while Lucy had a whole large bbq worshipper to herself. April was properly stuffed by this point, but managed to force herself to eat nearly three quarters of the pizza. She didn't want to stop, the pizza was amazing, but she worried she might burst if she gorged herself anymore. April had never been so full in her entire life, and she rubbed her distended tummy as she unbuttoned her painfully tight trousers.

"I'm really sorry, Lucy, I'm so full, I don't think I can manage anymore."

"Oh that's fine April, I wouldn't have expected you to have eaten it all anyway. You have an excellent appetite for such a skinny girl, I'm sure in a week or two you'll be able to eat a lot more."

Lucy gave April's left over slices to Maddie, who had devoured her pizza and pushed herself to eat what remained of April and her mom's pizza. She couldn't let good food go to waste anymore.
For a sweet moment, April felt contented. Lucy was so cool, April wished her mom was more like her. She had a wonderful freeing, encouraging, and enabling aura about her that made April want to eat. In that moment as she just managed to finish one of Lucy's rich gooey brownies, April realised she wanted to let herself go.

How does April's mom feel about it?
1441111111212.title: April's new-found freedom

choices: Lucy and Maddie go shopping, Maddie wants new food, and a lot of it
Maddie and April start making new friends, who they also turn on to indulgence
14411111112121.content:
"It was nice having April over last night." Lucy told Kate, April's mom, as they waited for their daughters to come out of school. They had been friends ever since their daughters had met.

"Yes, she talked a lot about getting spoilt after that." Kate replied, with just a tinge of concern in her voice. Like Lucy, she too was a single mother, and would always do what she could to make sure her daughter was in the best position possible, whatever that may be. She was a refined woman, sophisticated, and always well dressed. Lucy had often admired how attractive Kate was, her Italian descent gave her pretty olive skin, and rich brown hair that hung down to her shoulders. That was on top of her lean, fit figure, moderate, but very perky and well-shaped bosom and her gody ass. It was not hard for Lucy to see where April got her beautiful and enticing looks from.

"Don't sound so worried, Kate." Lucy chuckled, "You must have noticed I've been feeding Maddie up a bit lately. She loves being spoilt, and I love spoiling her. She told me herself how happy it makes her, and we're much closer now."

"I'm just worried about April getting fat, that's all."

"Really? I think Maddie looks adorable with the extra weight, she's so cuddly and soft now." Lucy spoke so passionately. "It's only improved her confidence, she's always been short, so it's lovely that she's still able to make up for her height in a different way."

"I guess that's true, she does look cuter now she's a bit chubby," Kate admitted, blushing slightly.

"There you go, besides, April's so skinny she could stand to pack on a few pounds anyway." Lucy found the conversation so...exciting. She loved speaking so openly about their daughters fattening up. It felt good to be honest about spoiling them.

"You're so persuasive Lucy," Kate smiled warmly, and put her hand on Lucy's arm. "I will start spoiling April, it sounds fun."

The prospect actually excited Kate a little. She had seen how happy April was after returning from Maddie's, and it would be nice for April to be able to let herself go and enjoying indulging. Kate's skinny, boney daughter would be so much nicer if she were more cuddly and jiggly. Lucy's was right, Kate needed to put some meat on those bones.
14411111112121.title: Letting April let herself go

choices: After being so spoilt, Maddie and April both develop a cute princess complex
Maddie and April become more lazy and slobbish
144111111121211.content:
Maddie did a little twirl as she entered the Ultra mart, taking in all the colours and smells of all the fattening foods around her. To Maddie, Tubb's (a new supermarket chain that exclusively offered delicious food - there was nothing healthy to be found) was now a kind of paradise, and Maddie was already eyeing up all the food she wanted to stuff herself with in the coming weeks.

"You can choose whatever you want, honey." Lucy said with an encouraging smile.

"And as much of it as I want?" Maddie asked, with an equally expectant smile.

"Naturally, baby," Lucy said, giving Maddie a devious grin and a lightly patting her plump derrière, making it jiggle slightly, "I've got to keep my growing little girl well fed, don't I?"

"Mmmmm, you do." Maddie replied, half distracted by an shelf of Oreos. There was variety everywhere. She had no idea there were so many favours of just Oreos - lemon twist, candy cane, peanut-butter, red velvet, watermelon, birthday cake. She hummed happily as she dropped ten boxes of different flavours in the huge shopping cart, and threw in three packs of Mega stuf for good measure.

Maddie proceeded through the store as if she were in a trance. There were so many foods she wanted, nay needed to try. Cookies, cookie dough ice cream (the fourth tub of ice-cream in the cart), tubes of raw cookie dough, Twinkies, eclaires, tubs of caramel shortcakes, tubs of chocolate mini-rolls, ginger-bread men, packs of Jaffa-cakes, pink and white nougat bars, chocolate nougat bars, Maddie poured so much new food into the shopping cart. For cakes, Maddie chose a very rich triple chocolate cake, a thick carrot cake, a delicious looking battenberg cakes, and two heavy cheesecakes, one of which was chocolate, which Maddie was most excited to try.

Lucy would encourage Maddie throughout all of this, just to make sure her daughter was going to be eating the best (and most fattening) food in the coming weeks. She would say "Oooh, get the mini-doughnuts with sprinkles", or "You should get the triple chocolate cake" or "Here, have three more packs of M&Ms, they're buy one get one free." or "You might as well get five pounds of fudge", knowing they would add pounds to her daughter. Of course Maddie was only too happy to oblige her mother, and by the end of the trip the cart was practically overflowing with all sorts of fattening goodies, too much to list in any reasonable length of time.

The cashier was a cute hipster girl named Jane, who had obviously recently packed on a bit of weight, and was absent mindedly rubbing her belly, that was pressed tightly against her Tubb's uniform. She had raven hair and a fringe that framed her piercing blue eyes that seemed to see right into Lucy. She gave a wise, curious little smirk at Lucy, and leaned in close as she scanned the items.

"This is all for her right?" she whispered, giving a little nod to Maddie.

"Yep." Lucy replied confidently, raising an eye-brow inquisitively towards Jane.

"Seems like you've been feeding her up a bit, huh?" Jane stated with a confidence that let Lucy know she wasn't just assuming. "Do you have a picture of when she was skinny?"

Lucy was fascinated by Jane's demeanour. "Here you go." she said, with no hesitation holding up a picture of the once trim Maddie, from her phone for Jane. This was her first time showing off Maddie to someone, it was quite exciting.

Jane bit her lip. "She looks so much better now she's chubby." she said breathily.

Lucy felt a close connection with Jane. "Right? The weight looks so cute on her, I knew it would. She so much softer and more cuddly now." She'd never been able to speak about Maddie quite like this with anyone before.

Before they knew it, all the the food was scanned. "Enjoy this Maddie." Jane said, flashing Maddie an encouraging smile.

"Thanks, I will." Maddie beamed.

Lucy moved to pay, but Jane stopped her.

"You know what, you can have this on me."

"Really? But there's so much, won't they mind?"

"It's fine, I'll cover for it, just promise me one thing" Jane put both her hands on Lucy's shoulders, and looked her straight in the eye, "keep her well fed, okay?"

Lucy topped her, and stroked Jane's plump belly for a moment, whispering so close Jane could feel her breath on her ear. "Don't worry hon, she's only going to get fatter."

Jane flushed a fierce crimson.
144111111121211.title: Stocking up

choices: Maddie and April are both looking more hefty
Maddie's certainly gained but April's ballooned, what has Kate been feeding her?
1441111111212111.content:
"Mom, bring me another slice of that cheesecake." Maddie called, and pulled a playfully smug, self-satisfied grin. Maddie had graduated to full on demands now, and why shouldn't she? Lucy had made it clear she wanted nothing more than to cater to her growing daughter's every desire. Maddie was pretty lazy now anyway she need to exercise something, so why not her power.
Maddie licked the melted chocolate off her finger from the three different chocolate bars she'd been eating and habitually rubbed her tummy, which was starting to get a little stuffed. The feeling of being properly full had become a little unfamiliar as her appetite had increased over the last month, but it was nice to know she was indulging more.

"At your request, my queen." Lucy said with a mock-bow, and placed her bountiful offering in Maddie's lap. She was a good servant. "I also bought a tube of cookie dough, and some Nutella brownies for your pleasure."

"Excellent." Maddie stretched and Lucy squeezed her tummy like some kind of reward for her service.

It was all just a fun little act that had developed between Maddie and Lucy, but Maddie had to admit she enjoyed it, and Lucy did too. She piped out the thick cookie dough and ate it. "You have served me well, Mom."

"And I will keep serving my queen, until she's nice and fat and satisfied." She knelt down and gave Maddie's tummy a long kiss.

Maddie giggled. "You better bring me double for that next time."

"I'll bring you triple." Lucy said with a smile.

----------

"I want more casserole." April told Kate. She too was becoming more demanding, but April had always had more of a feisty streak than Maddie, so it came more naturally to her.

"This is your fourth helping, so you have to ask nicely." Kate told her mischievously.

April rolled her eyes, and laboured her words just to make a point. "Pleeaaassee?

"There you go, that's the last of it." Kate poured another generous helping of the greasy rich casserole onto April's plate and she ate it greedily. April was actually stuffed but her mom was such an unbelievably amazing cook that she wanted to push herself to eat beyond capacity.

No sooner had she finished the casserole, April said "Ooooh, I'd love one of those cinnamon buns." She gestured towards the fruits of her mother's baking cooling on the counter.

"Manners?" Kate prompted again.

"Come on, this is so unfair" April was suddenly impassioned, "Lucy doesn't do this to Maddie, she gives her whatever Maddie wants, and that's just part of being spoilt. If you really want me to indulge you should feed me whatever I want, when I want it because --"

Kate cut her daughter's speech short by cramming an especially plump cinnamon swirl into her mouth. April forced herself to scowl, but it was pretty difficult when her eyes were almost watering from how good Kate's baking was.

"Don't look so upset, I'm just messing with you when I make you talk politely. Besides you make a good point, if I'm going to properly spoil you then you shouldn't have to ask for it, so open up."

April opened her mouth, and Kate pushed another cinnamon roll into her mouth.

----------

In class a few days later, Maddie offered a packet of M&Ms to April, who took a handful, before Maddie tipped the rest into her mouth. The pair had taken to snacking in lessons to tide them over until lunch or the end of school.

"Maddie, April, how many times do I have to tell you, no eating in class." Mrs. Hall told them for the 4th time that week.

"Don't worry miss, we just have to eat these Oreos and then we're done." Maddie told her. Mrs. Hall rolled her eyes but didn't stop them.

Suzy, a particularly snobbish rich girl from the row in front of them turned to Maddie. "It's not like you need any more food, piggy."

"You should be begging me to share this with you, tooth-pick."

But Suzy turned her sights on April. "You should watch yourself, or you'll get fat as well."

"Maybe, but I wouldn't mind." She turned to Maddie. "She just doesn't know how good indulgence is."

Maddie shook her head condescendingly at Suzy.

After 2 weeks of being thoroughly pampered:
1441111111212111.title: The little queens of indulgence

choices: April's having doubts about her increased weight, but Maddie wins her round
April can't stop talking about how much she likes her fuller figure
14411111112121111.content:
“What food do we have left from Tubb's, Mom?” Maddie asked, lying out on the couch, her mouth full of the last slice of Battenberg cake.

“Just two eclairs, that's it, honey.”

“Ugh, I don't really like those eclairs, but bring me them, I'll eat them anyway.”

Lucy obediently bought them and Maddie stuffed the last two eclairs greedily into her mouth, before downing the last of the two litre bottle of soda she had been working on. She let out a little burp.

"It's all gone, Mom." Maddie said proudly, patting her much more stately belly.

It was true, there was not a crumb of all the food Lucy had bought from Tubb's left in the house. The last two weeks had passed in a euphoric blur of delicious abundance, gluttony and inactivity for Maddie. Lucy had made it her personal mission to ensure Maddie was pampered and worshipped with all the food and treats she desired. Maddie only had to make demands, and Lucy kept her comfortably full the whole time. She'd become Lucy's proud, fat little princess. She had also become lazy. Maddie's top priority was (over-)indulging, so she'd let herself grow pretty unfit, just the short walk to school was enough to get her out of breath. However her gluttony didn't stop there. Even in class, Maddie would often be munching away on something, which those around her had come to begrudgingly accept as normal. In fact some other students had even started to take advantage of Mrs. Hall's crumbling will, and began eating in class as well.

“Let's get you back on the scales, honey”, Lucy said, taking Maddie's chubby hand and leading her upstairs.

Lucy was ecstatic to be weighing Maddie again after only 2 weeks. The anticipation was giving her chills. The scale creaked a little more than it had done previously as Maddie put her full weight on it. Maddie's eyes widened as she saw the pin settle on the number.

“75lbs! The means I put on 12 lbs in two weeks. I guess I have gotten kind of fat...” Maddie blushed, realising in a rare moment of humility how big she'd made herself.

“Hey, don't be embarrassed, princess, you know how good the extra weight looks on you.” Lucy sunk a hand into Maddie's chunky rear and slowly caressed her lower belly with the other, “God, you're so soft and cuddly, I can hardly keep my hands off you.”

“You know you can't keep your hands off me, Mom.” Maddie said, with a cheeky smile and a wink.

The were both right. Having packed on more than double the weight she'd gained in the previous month, Lucy's little girl was now definitely tipping into fat girl territory. Maddie now carried a glorious extra 22 lbs on her petite frame, and it showed. Perhaps most impressively she had developed adorable, fluffy starter boobs, and was much more well endowed than most girls her age. Maddie's face was now plump, her cheeks had grown chubbier and her double chin was soft enough to be noticeable. Her arms had thickened out more, a nice layer of chub hung beneath them that wobbled as she moved. Her tummy had graduated into a full-on belly that stuck out illustriously in front of her. It was doughy and heavy, having thickened out so much recently that it now sported a few little stretch-marks. It had also developed a splendid little hang to it. When she was standing, it would ooze over her waistband. When she was sitting, it would cover her crotch, and rest seductively on her lap. Her remarkably heftier middle was backed up by meaty love handles that also bulged enticingly over her waistband. Maddie's back had grown fatter, with two thick rolls that reached around above her love handles. Maddie's pert ass had filled out into a bountiful bubble butt, and claimed more territory on Maddie's throne (the sofa). Lucy loved to watch how it proudly swung and jiggled with Maddie's self-satisfied strut. Her thick, creamy thighs had a nice coating of flab, and rubbed together lusciously as she walked - her thigh gap a distant memory of the skinny little girl Maddie once was. So much of Maddie had a jiggle to it now when she moved. For such a young, petite girl, it was impressive how much space she took up, sitting or standing.

“Let me get a picture of your progress, sweetie.” Lucy said, holding up her phone.

With no hesitation, Maddie struck a sassy pose, left hand cupping and lifting her belly fat, index finger of her right hand placed naughtily over her lips. Lucy took a picture and sent it to Jane, as well as a few other people she had gotten interested in seeing Maddie thicken out.

Maddie had to admit she actually kind of liked the extra weight. Everything was so much more...satisfying. The extra cushiony chub adorning her figure made every seat more comfortable, and there was something cosy and homely about the way her rolls rubbed softly against each other. She would often catch herself absent-mindedly rubbing and jiggling her doughy belly and feel a little embarrassed, but it was hard to resist when it felt so wonderfully soft. Yet it was about more than just feeling for Maddie. She loved being heavy and formidable. Being bigger made her feel important, she liked having a bit more weight behind her demands. Maddie knew she should feel bad when her classmates talked about how fat she was getting, but part of her liked the extra attention. She was a princess and it was only right that her subjects should acknowledge her superior weight and plumpness. Perhaps most of all Maddie liked pleasing her mom, who made her feel more like royalty than anyone else. Lucy adored the gorgeous fullness of her daughter and she was teaching Maddie to love it as well. Whereas before gaining weight was just acceptable, par for the course, suddenly the idea of packing on the pounds, maybe even intentionally, seemed almost desirable to Maddie. Almost.

As Lucy helped Maddie get dressed for school the next day, Maddie realised, with some surprise and a strange little rush of pleasure that she was now big enough to fill out the largest set of school uniform she had. It was even a little snug in some places. This was the uniform Lucy had bought Maddie to grow into, fat girl clothes, and she had managed it in just two weeks.

“God, you just keep sizing up, don't you honey?” Lucy said in a low moan, eagerly grabbing Maddie's belly under her jumper and giving it a shake.

Maddie felt butterflies in her tummy for the first time.

At school:
14411111112121111.title: Maddie the Fattie

choices: It's Maddie's birthday, Lucy buys her a whole cake!
Maddie and April give a class presentation encouraging the class to indulge
144111111121211111.content:
“Hey Maddie, I heard a rumour that you were deliberately gaining weight.” Chloe asked, licking her fingers clean of the iced bun she had just devoured. Chloe was a cute bottom-heavy brunette that sat on the table next to Maddie and April. She was never quite as svelte and sporty as Maddie and April had been, but she had become down-right tubby sitting next to the class' fastest growing duo.

Maddie chuckled at the question. “Nah I've just been eating very well. So yeah, I have gotten pretty fat, but it's not deliberate.”

“Could have fooled me,” Suzy cut in, spinning round from the desk in front so her legs were either side of her chair's back, “I thought you were trying to dethrone Mary as fattest girl in the class.”

Maddie stuffed a custard filled doughnut into her tormentor's mouth, partly to re-assert her dominance, but also to get back at her for making her think weird things again. “Better eat up, collar bones, looks like you're competing with Eleanor for the title of most anorexic girl in the class.”

It was the idea of being the fattest girl in the class that had got Maddie going. Being that fat did have a certain appeal. Her cheeks reddened just for a moment as she imagined students, parents and teachers all talking about how Maddie was so much heavier than the other girls in the class. She imagined Mrs. Hall, her friends, the whole class having to pay attention, staring stunned as she walked in, even fatter than Mary. She would be the most impressive, physically imposing girl there, demanding the most space and attention. Mary could easily be classed as obese, especially because she was even shorter than Maddie, but she wasn't bad looking for a girl of her size. Maddie knew she would be prettier when she was that big though. Her auburn hair was much richer than Mary's bright ginger colour, and Maddie's deep emerald eyes were more striking than Mary's dull lime. Maddie was certain her cheek bones would still be visible under all that cheek fat as well. She'd just carry the weight much better in general. Still, Maddie had caught her mom in awe a few times at how huge Mary was. She was easily a good 15lbs heavier than Maddie, but Maddie could definitely make herself bigger. Everyone would admire all that luscious- She stopped herself. Suzy had a weird way of getting to her.

Maddie watched the warm pleasure pass over Suzy's face as the custard of the doughnut filled her mouth. Maddie was beginning to develop a sort of weird respect for Suzy. Someone that would unapologetically tease her about her weight was actually kind of fun in a class that was no longer that impressed by Maddie's size. Suzy was a bit thin for Maddie though. She started to imagine how good the blonde bully would look if she were a bit chubbier... Maddie dragged herself back to reality, this was getting out of hand, she had completely missed the last few things that were said.

“I knew you'd like it.” Chloe mused between mouthfuls of Reese's. “You should eat more though, you really are skinny.”

“That's easy for you to say, I for one like not being fat.” Suzy awkwardly swallowed the rest of the doughnut, and turned her sights on April, sensing weakness. “Didn't I say you would get fat hanging round with Maddie?”

April looked shyly up from her work, having been uncharacteristically quiet throughout the conversation. She said nothing.

“You might need to change your name to another month, April. Looks like you've gained an extra day.”

This earned Suzy a few laughs as April flushed red.

“Alright leave her alone Suzy, I've probably just as big as April is.” Chloe was being nice, she'd had more of a head-start than April and had definitely eaten less. “Y'know, with the way this class is going, the skinny girls are going to be outnumbered soon.”

“Yeah you're right actually,” Maddie said, a little taken aback someone else was aware of this. She turned to Suzy with a devious grin. “Then we can all shame you for being skinny.”

“Ha, in your dreams.” Suzy grinned, spinning herself back around to resume her work.

Maddie wasn't sure how much Suzy knew.

-----------------------

“Maddie,” April hissed, attempting to summon her growing friend to her side as the other students went to break.

“What April?” Maddie returned, mocking April's whisper.

There was a long pause as April started to go red. “Look...I-I'm kind of worried that I'm getting fat.”

Maddie gave a very unsympathetic laugh. “You're not fat, look at you. Is this about what Suzy said yesterday?”

“What? No… well, a bit. But I've been kind of worried about it for a while now. Look at my gut. I've gained 12lbs, Maddie!”

Maddie wasn't entirely sure how April had managed to chub up quite so fast in the last two weeks. That said, April was always talking about how much of a fantastic cook her mom was and how she would feed April late into the night, so it might have had something to do with that. Whatever it was, it had certainly taken its toll on April's once athletic physique. Kate had taken a more dominant role than Lucy in diligently indulging her daughter, stuffing April full of her glorious cooking as a way of playfully keeping a lid on her daughter's ego. April's slender body was now coated in soft, cute fat. Her chest was looking a little fuller and her previously visible ribs were now protected by a slight layer of pudge. A flash of her plump, tanned tummy now peeked out enticingly from under her jumper. April carried a pleasant pot-belly now, a little rounder than Maddie's more jiggly tummy at that weight, but no less adorable. Her thighs had lost a lot of definition and had filled out in their softness, the olive skin of both vying to touch. April overall just looked much more domesticated, her body more the result of a loving mother than a tight sports regimen.

“You're over-reacting. So you're a bit chubby now, it's no big deal.”

“It is a big deal! Suzy keeps making all these horrible jokes, and she's kind of right, I used to be really in shape. I was a pretty good runner, and Mrs. Croach gave me this big talk about how I was letting the football team down by allowing myself to get chubby.”

“Who cares what they think? First of all, Suzy just...a skinny bitch. She doesn't get it. Second, you said yourself, you like indulging way more than you like training with Mrs. Croach. You don't want to give up your mom's cooking do you? Besides, I thought Kate said you look much prettier now you're a bit plumper.”

“Yeah, Mom's really likes how much I've gained,” a smile crept across April's lips, before her cheeks started to turn red, “but...I don't know, getting chubby just makes me feel...weird.”

“Weird in what way?” Maddie asked. She suddenly felt genuine curiosity, immediately much more engaged in the conversation.

“I don't know, it feels kind of...” April trailed off.

Maddie stood behind her friend, and slowly rubbed April's tummy chub. Maddie's belly fat was pressed tight against her back. “Kind of...nice?”

“In a really, really weird way…yeah.” April was now blushing profusely as she made eye contact with Maddie, who was eagerly looking up from behind her.

“I understand,” Maddie whispered, before slyly squeezing April's plusher behind. “It feels good being softer, right? It feels nice knowing there's more of you.”

April could only nod.

“You have nothing to be embarrassed about April. You look much cuter now, you know.”

Maddie surprised herself with the sincerity of that remark. She wasn't just saying that to comfort her friend, she genuinely did find April more attractive with the extra weight.

“Your problem is you still care too much what other people think. You started indulging because it makes you happy, so don't stop just because a few people are being mean. You do it for you.” It was ironic this was coming from Maddie, who was becoming increasingly fascinated with the idea of people talking about her fattening up, but that wasn't the point.
